GSP33vacbhamu:7: śāśvatāya namaskurmo vedāya ca bhavāya ca //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:21: sa cāyam ākīṭapataṅgebhya ā ca devarṣibhyaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasyedaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo
GSP33vacbhamu:23: na hi jātu kaścidatra saṃdigdhe 'ahaṃ vā nāhaṃ vā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:28: tadālambanatve hi 'yo 'haṃ bālye pitarāvanvabhūvaṃ sa eva sthāvire praṇaptṝnanubhavāmi' iti pratisaṃdhānaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:29: na hi bālasthavirayoḥ śarīrayorasti manāgapi pratyabhijñānagandho yenaikatvaṃ adhyavasīyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:30: tasmādyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣu yadanuvartate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā kusumebhyaḥ sūtram /
GSP33vacbhamu:31: tathā ca bālādiśarīreṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi parasparamahaṅkārāspadamanuvartamānaṃ tebhyo bhidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:32: api ca svapnānte divyaṃ śarīrabhedamāsthāya taducitānbhogānbhuñjāna eva pratibuddho
GSP33vacbhamu:33: manuṣyaśarīramātmānaṃ paśyan 'nāhaṃ devo manuṣya eva' iti devaṣaśarīre bādhyamāne
GSP33vacbhamu:35: api ca yogavyāghraḥ śarīrabhede 'pyātmānamabhinnamanubhavatīti nāhaṅkārālambanaṃ dehaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:37: indriyabhede 'pi 'yo 'hamadrākṣaṃ sa evaitarhi spṛśāmi' ityahamā-lambanasya pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:40: 'kṛśo 'ham' 'andho 'ham' ityādayastu prayogā asatyapyabhede kathañcit 'mañcāḥ krośanti' ityādivadaupacārikā iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:41: tasmādidaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sphuṭatarāhamanubhavagamya ātmā saṃśayābhāvādajijñāsya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:43: tathā hi- saṃsāranivṛttirapavarga iha prayojanaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:49: na ca 'aham' iti sarvajanīnasphuṭatarānubhavasamarthita ātmā dehendriyādivyatiriktaḥ śakya upaniṣadāṃ sahasrairapyanyathayitum,
GSP33vacbhamu:52: tasmādanubhavavirodhādupacaritārthā evopaniṣada iti yuktamutpaśyāma ityāśayavānāśaṅkya pariharati- yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarayoḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:53: atra ca yuṣmadasmat ityādiḥ mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ ityantaḥ śaṅkāgranthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:65: parasparānadhyāsahetau atyantavailakṣaṇye dṛṣṭāntaḥ - tamaḥ prakāśavat iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:66: na hi jātu kaścitsamudācāradvṛttinī prakāśatamasī parasparātmatayā pratipattumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:75: yathā kusumādbhedena gṛhyamāṇe 'pi sphaṭikamaṇāvatisvacchatayā japākusumapratibimbodgrāhiṇi 'aruṇaḥ sphaṭikaḥ' ityāruṇyavibhrama ityata idamuktam - taddharmāṇāmapi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:78: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ - rūpavaddhi dravyamatisvacchatayā rūpavato dravyāntarasya tadvivekena gṛhyamāṇasyāpi cchāyāṃ gṛhṇīyāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:79: cidātmā tu nīrūpo viṣayī na viṣayacchāyāmudgrāhayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:93: mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ yadyapi tathāpīti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:94: idamatrākūcam - bhavedetadevaṃ yadi 'aham' ityanubhave ātmatatvaṃ prakāśeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:97: na caitānyupakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraiḥ kriyāsamabhihāreṇedṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni śakreṇāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:98: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati yathā 'aho darśanīyā aho darśanīyā' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:106: na hyāgamajñānaṃ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyamupahanti yena kāraṇābhāvānna bhavet ;
GSP33vacbhamu:110: tathā ca varṇe hrasvatvadīrghatvādayo 'nyadharmā api samāropitāḥ tattvapratipattihetavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:111: na hi laukikāḥ 'nāgaḥ' iti vā“nagaḥ“iti vā padātkuñcaraṃ vā taruṃ vā pratipadyamānā bhavanti bhrāntāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:112: na cānanyaparaṃ vākyaṃ svārtha upacaritārthaṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:113: uktaṃ hi - 'na vidhau paraḥ śabdārthaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:114: jyeṣṭhatvaṃ ca anapekṣitasya bādhyatve hetuḥ na tu bādhakatve,
GSP33vacbhamu:118: tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram - 'paurvāparye pūrvadaurbalyaṃ prakṛtivat' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:123: api ca ye 'pyahaṅkārāspadamātmānamāsthiṣata tairapyasya na tāttvikatvamabhyupetavyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:124: 'ahamihaivāsmi sadane jānānaḥ' iti sarvavyāpinaḥ prādeśikatvena grahaṇāt uccataragiriśikharavartiṣu mahātaruṣu bhūmiṣṭhasya dūrvāpravālanirbhāsapratyayavat
GSP33vacbhamu:125: na cedaṃ dehasya prādeśikatvamanubhūyate na tvātmana iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:128: api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartata iti yatra prayoktṛpratipattroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:130: tadyathā, naiyamikāgnihotravacane 'gnihotraśabdaḥ prakaraṇāntarāvadhṛtabhede kuṇḍapāyināmayanagate karmaṇi 'māsamagmihotraṃ juhoti' ityatra sādhyasādṛśyena gauṇaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:132: na tvahaṅkārasya mukhyor'tho nirluṭhitagarbhatayā dehādibhyo bhinno 'nubhūyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:134: na cātyantanirūṭhatayā gauṇe 'pi na gauṇatvābhimānaḥ sārṣapādiṣu tailaśabdavaditi veditavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:135: tatrāpi snehāttilabhavādbhede siddha eva sārṣapādīnāṃ tailaśabdavācyatvābhimānaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:138: tadiha vyāpakaṃ vivekavijñānaṃ nivartamānaṃ gauṇatāmapi nivartayatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:139: na ca bālasthaviraśarīrabhede 'pi 'so 'ham' ityekasyātmanaḥ pratisaṃdhānadehādibhyo bhedenāstyātmānubhava iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:142: parīkṣakā api hi vyavahārasamaye na lokasāmāmyamativartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:144: bāhyā apyāhuḥ -'śāstracintakāḥ khalvevaṃ vivecayanti na pratipattāraḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:146: śarīrādyabhedagrahādātmanaḥ prādeśikatvamabhimanyate nabhasa iva ghaṭamaṇikamallikādyupādhyavacchedāditi yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:147: na cāhaṅkāraprāmāṇyāya dehādivadātmāpi prādeśika iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:154: pratyekaṃ cetanatvapakṣe bahūnāṃ cetanānāṃ svatantrāṇāmekavākyatābhāvādaparyāyaṃ viruddhadikkriyatayā śarīramunmathyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:156: samudāyasya tu caitanyayoge vṛkṇa ekasminnavayave cidātmano 'pyavayavo vṛkṇa iti na cetayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:158: ya evāvayavo yadā viśīrṇastadā tadabhāve na cetayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:161: etena 'sthūlo 'ham andho 'ham gacchāmi' ityādayo 'pi adhyāsatayā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:162: tadevamuktena krameṇa ahaṃpratyaye pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutiḥ apratyūhaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvasukhaduḥkhaśokādyātmatvamahamanubhavaprasañjitamātmano niṣeddhumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:169: iti śabdasūcitaśca śarīrādyanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ ca prameyajātaṃ pramāṇena pramāya tadupādānaparivarjanādiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:170: anyonyadharmāṃścādhyasya anyonyasmindharmiṇi dehādidharmān janmamaraṇajarāvyādhyādīnātmani dharmiṇi adhyastadehādibhāve samāropya,
GSP33vacbhamu:171: tathā caitanyādīnātmadharmān dehādāvadhyastātmabhāve samāropya 'mamedaṃ jarāmaraṇaputrapaśusvāmyādi' iti vyavahāro vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:173: atra ca adhyāsavyavahārakriyābhyāṃ yaḥ kartā unnītaḥ sa samāna iti samānakartṛkatvena 'adhyasya vyavahāraḥ' ityupapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:174: pūrvakālatvasūcitamadhyāsasya vyavahārakāraṇatvaṃ sphuṭayati - mithyājñānanimittaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:178: tadevamadhyāsasvarūpaṃ phalaṃ ca vyavahāramuktvā tasya nimittamāha - itaretarāvivekena iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:181: tathā ca nādhyāsa ityata āha - atyantaviviktayordharmadharmiṇoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:182: paramārthato dharmiṇoratādātmyaṃ vivekaḥ dharmāṇāṃ cāsaṃkīrṇatā vivekaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:185: iha tu paramārthasataḥ cidātmano 'nyanna dehādyasti vastusat,
GSP33vacbhamu:186: tatkutaḥ cidātmano bhedāgrahaḥ kutaśca tādātmyavibhramaḥ ityata āha - satyānṛte mithunīkṛtya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:191: na ca saṃvṛtiparamārthasatoḥ pāramārthakaṃ mithunamastītyabhūtatadbhāvārthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:192: etaduktaṃ bhavati - apratītasyāropāyogādāropyasya pratītirupayujyate na vastusatteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:194: āropyasya pratītau satyāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropanibandhanā ca pratītiriti durvāraṃ parasparāśrayatvamityata āha - naisargika iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:198: tataśca pūrvapūrvamithyājñānopadarśitasya buddhīndriyaśarīrādeḥ uttarottarādhyāsopayoga ityanāditvāt bījāṅkuravanna parasparāśrayatvamityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:202: pratītireva tu atyantāsato gaganakamalinīkalpasya dehendriyādeḥ nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:203: prakāśamānatvameva hi cidātmano 'pi sattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā vā dvaitāpatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:204: sattāyāścārthakriyākāritāyāśca sattāntarārthakriyākāritāntarakalpane anavasthāpātāt prakāśamānataiva sattā abhyupetavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:210: ityāśayavān āha ākṣeptā- ko 'yamadhyāso nāma iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:212: samādhātā lokasiddhamadhyāsalakṣaṇamācakṣāṇa evākṣepaṃ pratikṣipati- ucyate- smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:219: tasya ca dṛṣṭatvamātramupayujyate na vastusatteti dṛṣṭagrahaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:220: tathāpi vartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ nāropopayogīti pūrva- ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:228: asti hi svastimatyāṃ gavi pūrvadṛṣṭasya gotvasya paratra kālākṣyāmavabhāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:229: asti ca pāṭaliputre pūrvadṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra māhiṣmatyāmavabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:244: asaṃbandhāgrahaṇasārūpye 'pītaṃ tapanīyapiṇḍaṃ' 'pītaṃ bilvaphalaṃ' ityādau pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pītatvaśaṅkhatvayorāropyāha 'pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:246: evaṃ vijñātṛpuruṣābhimukheṣvādarśodakādiṣu svaccheṣu cākṣuṣaṃ tejo lagnamapi balīyasā saureṇa tejasā pratisrotaḥ pravartitaṃ mukhasaṃyuktaṃ mukhaṃ grāhayet,
GSP33vacbhamu:252: na hi sarpātadabhāvena rajjvādayo vā sphaṭikādayo vā raktādiguṇayogino na pratibhāsante,
GSP33vacbhamu:254: tathā sati maruṣu marīcikānicayam 'uccāvacamuccalattuṅgataraṅgabhaṅgamāleyamabhyarṇabhavatīrṇā mandākinī' ityabhisaṃdhāya pravṛttaḥ tattoyamāpīya pipāsāmupaśamayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:256: na ca marīcirūpeṇa salilamavastusat svarūpeṇa tu paramārthasadeva dehendriyādayastu svarūpeṇāpyasanta ityanubhavāgocaratvātkathamāropyanta iti sāṃpratam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:257: yato yadyasanto nānubhavagocarāḥ kathaṃ tarhi marīcyādīnāmasatāṃ toyādyātmatayānubhavagocaratvam ?
GSP33vacbhamu:258: na ca svarūpasattvena toyādyātmanāpi santo bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:260: api tu bhāva eva bhāvāntarātmanā abhāvaḥ svena rūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:267: na ca viṣayasya samastasāmarthyavirahe 'pi vijñānameva tattādṛśaṃ svapratyayasāmarthyādadṛṣṭāntasiddhasvabhāvabhedamupajātamasataḥ prakāśanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:278: vijñānasvarūpameva asataḥ prakāśa iti cet. kaḥ punareṣa sadasatoḥ saṃbandhaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:279: asadadhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ sato jñānasya asatā saṃbandha iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:280: aho batāyamatinirvṛtaḥ pratyayatapasvī yadasya asatyapi nirūpaṇamāyatate /
GSP33vacbhamu:283: asadantareṇa pratyayo na prathata iti pratyayasyaivaiṣa svabhāvaḥ na tvasadadhīnamasya kiñciditi cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:284: aho batāsya asatpakṣapātaḥ yadayamatadutpattiḥ atadātmā ca tadavinābhāvaniyataḥ pratyaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:287: tatkimidānīṃ marīcayo 'pi toyātmanā satattvāḥ yadanubhavagocarāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:290: dvividhaṃ ca vastūnāṃ tattvam- sattvamasattvaṃ ca tatra pūrvaṃ svataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:297: tathā ca samīcīna iti na bhrānto nāpi bādhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:298: addhā / na bādhyeta yadi marīcīnayaṃ atoyātmatattvānatoyātmanā gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:327: apūrvo 'pi pūrvamithyāpratyayopadarśita iva paratra cidātmanyadhyasyata iti upapannam,
GSP33vacbhamu:333: na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyaḥ arthakriyākāritā vā iti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:334: sa cāyamevaṃlakṣaṇako 'dhyāsaḥ anirvacanīyaḥ sarveṣāmeva saṃmataḥ parīkṣakāṇām ;
GSP33vacbhamu:335: tadbhede paraṃ vipratipattirityanirvacanīyatāṃ draḍhayitumāha- taṃ kecit iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:342: yadyapi na bāhyaṃ vastusat tathāpyanādyavidyāvāsanāropitamalīkaṃ bāhyam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:346: 'nedaṃ rajatam' iti bādhakasya idantāmātrabādhenāpyupapattau na rajatagocaratocitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:347: rajatasya dharmiṇo bhādhe hi rajataṃ ca tasya dharma idantā ca bādhite bhavetām ;
GSP33vacbhamu:350: tathā ca rajataṃ bahirbādhitamarthādāntare jñāne vyavatiṣṭhata iti jñānākārasya bahiradhyāsaḥ sidhyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:351: kecittu- jñānākārakhyātāvaparituṣyanto vadanti- yatra yadadhyāsaḥ tadvivekāgrahanibandhano bhrama iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:358: sa hi idaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamāvedayati na tvāntaram /
GSP33vacbhamu:364: sa kiṃ purovarti dravyaṃ rajatādvivecayati āho jñānākāratāmapyasya darśayati ?
GSP33vacbhamu:365: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:372: na ca rajatameva śuktikāyāṃ prasañjitaṃ rajatajñānena /
GSP33vacbhamu:384: api cendriyādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajanane sāmarthyamupalabdhamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānasaṃbhavaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:385: doṣasahitānāṃ teṣāṃ mithyāpratyaye 'pi sāmarthyamiti cet, na,
GSP33vacbhamu:393: doṣavaśāttadgataśuktitvasāmānyaviśeṣasyāgrahāt tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛtiṃ janayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:395: tathā ca rajatasamṛteḥ purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:397: ṭarajatam', iti dve ete api grahaṇasmaraṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravartayataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:400: atra hi vinirgacchannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kācasyeva svacchasya pītatvaṃ gṛhyate pittaṃ tu na gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:404: tadupapattau ca prāktanasya pratyayasya bhrāntatvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:409: yasmin śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsa iti lokaprasiddhiḥ nāsāvanyathākhyātinibandhanā,
GSP33vacbhamu:410: kiṃ tu gṛhītasya rajatādestatsmaraṇasya ca gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa gṛhītamātrasya yaḥ 'idam' iti puro 'vasthitāddravyamātrāttatprajñānācca vivekaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:413: anye tu- atrāpyaparituṣyantaḥ- yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:414: atredamākūtam- asti tāvadrajatārthinaḥ 'rajatamidam' iti pratyayātputovartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:418: kiṃ tu grahaṇasmaraṇe eva mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataścāgṛhītabhede,
GSP33vacbhamu:422: gṛhyamāṇe 'pi 'samīcīnajñānasārūpyamanayoridamiti rajatamiti ca jñānayoḥ' iti grahaṇam,
GSP33vacbhamu:423: atha vā 'tayoreva svarūpato viṣayataśca mitho bhedāgrahaḥ' iti grahaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:424: tatra na tāvatsamīcīnajñānasadṛśī iti jñānaṃ samīcīnajñānavadvyavahārapravartakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:425: na hi 'gosadṛśo gavayaḥ' iti jñānaṃ gavārthinaṃ gavaye pravartayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:429: tasmātsattāmātreṇa bhedāgrahaḥ agṛhīta eva vyavahāraheturiti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:432: vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ- cetanavyavahārasya ajñānapūrvakatvānupapatteḥ āropajñānotpādakrameṇaiva- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:438: kathaṃ cāyamidaṅkārāspade pravarteta yadi tu na tadicchet ?
GSP33vacbhamu:440: na cedidaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamiti jānīyāt kathaṃ rajatārthī tadicchet ?
GSP33vacbhamu:444: so 'yamupādānopekṣābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇaścecanaḥ avyavasthitaḥ idaṅkārāspade rajatasamāropeṇopādāna eva vyavasthāpyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:458: yadyadarthinaṃ yatra niyamena pravartayati tajjñānaṃ tadviṣayaṃ yathobhayasiddhasamīcīnarajatajñānam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:462: tatra bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām- kiṃ śuktikātvasya 'idaṃ rajatam' iti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvam āhosvit dravyamātrasya puraḥsthitasya sitabhāsvarasya
GSP33vacbhamu:465: tathā hi-'rajatamidam' ityanubhavannanubhavitā purovarti vastu aṅgulyādinā nirdiśati /
GSP33vacbhamu:472: tat bodhakatvena svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti vyutpādayadbhirasmābhiḥ parihṛtaṃ nyāyakaṇikāyāmiti neha pratanyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:475: tadidamuktam- anye tu yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:476: yatra śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsastasyaiva śuktikāderviparītadharmakalpanāṃ rajatatvadharmakalpanāmiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:478: prakṛte tu kimāyātamityata āha- sarvathāpi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:481: tena sarveṣāmeva parīkṣakāṇāṃ mate anyasyānyadharmakalpanānirvacanīyāvaśyaṃbhāvinītyanirvacanīyatā sarvatantrasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:484: api tu laukikānāmapītyāha- tathā ca loke anubavaḥ śuktikā hi rajatavadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:488: ekasya tvabhinnasya bhedabhramo na dṛṣṭa iti kutaḥ cidātmano 'bhinnānāṃ jīvānāṃ bhedavibhrama ityata āha- ekaścandraḥ sadvitīyavat iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:493: na khalvapratibhāsamāne purovartini dravye rajatasya vā taddharmāṇāṃ vā samāropaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:494: pratibhāsamāne vā na tāvadayamātmā jaḍo ghaṭādivatparādhīnaprakāśa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:495: na khalu sa eva kartā ca karma ca bhavati, virodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:497: na ca jñānakriyā parasamavāyinīti kathamasyāḥ karma ?
GSP33vacbhamu:498: na ca tadeva svaṃ ca paraṃ ca, virodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:502: ātmā jaḍo 'pi sarvārthajñāneṣu bhāsamāno 'pi kartaiva na karma,
GSP33vacbhamu:504: yathā hi caitrasamavetakriyayā caitranagaraprāptāvubayasamavetāyāmapi kriyamāṇāyāṃ nagarasyaiva karmatā,
GSP33vacbhamu:511: tathā hi- yo 'yamarthaprakāśaḥ phalaṃ yasminnarthaśca ātmā ca prathete sa kiṃ jaḍaḥ svayaṃprakāśo vā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:512: jaḍaścet viṣayātmāvapi jaḍāviti kasmin kiṃ prakāśeta aviśeṣāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:517: na ca nilīnameva vijñānamarthātmānau jñāpayati cakṣurādivaditi vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:524: tatkiṃ putraḥ paṇḍita iti pitāpi paṇḍito 'stu ?
GSP33vacbhamu:525: svabhāva eṣa saṃvidaḥ svayaṃprakāśāyā yadarthātmasaṃbandhiteti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:526: hanta putrasyāpi paṇḍitasya svabhāva eṣa yatpitṛsaṃbandhiteti samānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:527: sahārthātmaprakāśena saṃvitprakāśo na tvarthātmaprakāśaṃ vineti tasyāḥ svabhāva iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:534: ātmārthau saheti tāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvidarthātmaprakāśau saheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:548: tasmāccandre 'nubhūyamāne iva dvitīyaścandramāḥ svaprakāśādanyor'thaḥ anirvacanīya eveti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:550: na ca anirvācyārthabhedaḥ prakāśaṃ nirvācyaṃ bhettumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:552: na ca arthānāmapi parasparaṃ bhedaḥ samīcīnajñānapaddhatimadhyāste ityupariṣṭādupapādayiṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:553: tadayaṃ prakāśa eva svayaṃprakāśa ekaḥ kūṭastho nityo niraṃśaḥ pratyagātmā aśakyanirvacanīyebhyo dehendriyādibhya ātmānaṃ pratīpaṃ nirvacanīyamañcati jānātīti pratyaṅ,
GSP33vacbhamu:560: kasmādayamayukta ityata āha - sarvo hi puro 'vasthite viṣaye viṣayāntaramadhyasyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:561: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yatparādhīnaprakāśamaṃśavacca tatsāmānyāṃśagrahe karaṇadoṣavaśācca viśeṣāgrahe anyathā prakāśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:562: pratyagātmā tu aparādhīnaprakāśatayā na svajñāne kāraṇānyapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:567: na hi tadeva tadānīmeva tenaiva gṛhītamagṛhītaṃ ca saṃbhavatīti na svayaṃprakāśatāpakṣe adhyāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:569: na hi śuktau apuraḥsthitāyāṃ rajatamadhyasyati 'idaṃ rajatam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:570: tasmādatyantagrahe atyantāgrahe ca nādhyāsa iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:574: tatkathaṃ nādhyāsa ityata āha- yuṣmatpratyayāpetasya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:576: tathā ca yo viṣayī sa eva cidātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:585: anavacchinno 'pi vastuto 'vacchinna iva abhinno 'pi bhinna iva akartāpi karteva abhoktāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:588: na hi cidekarasasyātmanaḥ cidāṃśe gṛhīte agṛhītaṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:589: na khalu ānandanityatvavibhutvādayaḥ asya cidrūpādvastuto bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:591: gṛhītā eva tu kalpitena bhedena na vivecitā ityagṛhītā ivābhānti /
GSP33vacbhamu:592: na ca ātmano buddhyādibhyo bhedastāttvikaḥ yena cidātmani gṛhyamāṇe so 'pi gṛhīta eva bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:594: tasmāccidātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśasyaiva anavacchinnasya avacchinnebhyo buddhyādibhyo bhedāgrahāt tadadhyāsena jīvabhāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:596: tathā hi- kartā bhoktā cidātmā ahaṃpratyaye pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33vacbhamu:597: na ca udāsīnasya tasya kriyāśaktirbhogaśaktirvā saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:598: yasya ca buddhyādeḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātasya kriyābhogaśaktī na tasya caitanyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:601: iti ca janturiti ca kṣetrajña iti ca ākhyāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:604: tasmāccidātmano 'vyatirekāt jīvaḥ svayaṃprakāśo 'pi ahaṃpratyayena kartṛbhoktṛtayā vyavahārayogyaḥ kriyata ityahaṃpratyayālambanamucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:605: na ca adhyāse sati viṣayatvaṃ viṣayatve ca adhyāsaḥ ityanyonyāśrayatvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33vacbhamu:609: jīvo hi cidātmatayā svayaṃprakāśatayā aviṣayo 'pi aupādhikena rūpeṇa viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:612: kiṃ tu pratyagātmā na svato nāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:614: tathā ca sarvathāprathamāne pratyagātmani kuto 'dhyāsa ityata āha- aparokṣatvācca pratyagātmaprasiddheḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:617: yadyapi pratyagātmani nānyā prathāsti tathāpi bhedopacāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:619: etaduktaṃ bhavati- avaśyaṃ cidātmā aparokṣo 'bhyupetavyaḥ tadaprathāyāṃ sarvasyāprathanena jagadāndhyaprasaṅgādityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:620: śrutiścātra bhavati- 'tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:621: tadevaṃ paramārthaparihāramuktvā abhyupetyāpi cidātmanaḥ parokṣatāṃ prauḍhavāditayā parihārāntaramāha- na cāyamasti iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:624: kasmādayaṃ na niyama ityata āha- apratyakṣe 'pi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:626: nabho hi dravyaṃ sat rūpasparśavirahānna bāhyendriyapratyakṣam /
GSP33vacbhamu:630: atha ca tatra bālā avivekinaḥ paradarśitadarśinaḥ kadācitpārthivacchāyāṃ śyāmatāmāropya,
GSP33vacbhamu:633: tatrāpi pūrvadṛṣṭasya taijasasya vā tāmasasya vā rūpasya paratra nabhasi smṛtirūpo 'vabhāsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:638: tatkimarthamayamevādhyāsa ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyutpāditaḥ nādhyāsamātramityata āha- tametamevaṃlakṣaṇamadhyāsaṃ paṇḍitā avidyeti manyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:640: taducchedāya ca vedāntāḥ pravṛttā iti vakṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:641: pratyagātmanyanātmādhyāsa eva sarvānarthahetuḥ na punā rajatādivibhramā iti sa evāvidyā,
GSP33vacbhamu:642: tatsvarūpaṃ cāvijñātaṃ na śakyamucchettumiti tadeva vyutpādyaṃ nādhyāsamātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:646: na caivaṃ pṛthagjanā api manyante adhyāsam,
GSP33vacbhamu:648: nanu iyamanādiratinirūḍhanibiḍavāsanānubaddhā avidyā na śakyā niroddhum,
GSP33vacbhamu:650: iti yo manyante taṃ prati tannirodhopāyamāha - tadvivekena ca vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇam,
GSP33vacbhamu:653: pratyagātmani khalu atyantavivikte buddhyādibhyaḥ buddhyādibhedāgrahanimitto buddhyādyātmatvataddharmādhyāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:655: adhyāsāpabādhātmakaṃ vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ vidyā cidātmarūpaṃ svarūpe vyavatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:657: atinirūḍhanibiḍhavāsanānuvidvā avidyā vidyayā apabādhitāpi svavāsanāvaśātpunarudbhaviṣyati pravartayiṣyati ca vāsanādikāryaṃ svocitamityaya āha - tatraivaṃ sati,
GSP33vacbhamu:660: tatkṛtena doṣeṇa guṇena vā aṇumātreṇāpi sa na saṃbadhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:662: cidātmano guṇena caitanyānandādinā antaḥkaraṇādi na saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:663: etaduktaṃ bhavati - tattvāvadhāraṇābhyāsasya hi svabhāva eva sa tādṛśaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:670: viśeṣatastu cidātmasvabhāvasya tattvajñānasya atyantāntaraṅgasya kuto 'nirvācyayā avidyayā bādha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:673: 'ahamidam' 'mamedam' iti lokavyavahāraḥ“iti tatra vyapadeśalakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ kaṇṭhoktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:681: santu vā pratyakṣādīni saṃvṛtyāpi yathā tathā ;
GSP33vacbhamu:682: śāstrāṇi tu puruṣahitānuśāsanaparāṇi avidyāpratipakṣatayā nāvidyāvadviṣayāṇi bhavitumarhantītyāha - śāstrāṇi ca iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:687: ayamarthaḥ- pramātṛtvaṃ hi pramāṃ prati kartṛtvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:692: na ca kūṭasthanityaścidātmā apariṇāmī svato vyāpāravān /
GSP33vacbhamu:695: kiṃ naśchinnamityata āha- na hīndriyāṇyanupādāya pratyakṣādivyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:704: atha svayameva kasmānna pravartante ityata āha- na cādhiṣṭhānamantareṇendriyāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:707: na jātu karaṇānyanadhiṣṭhitāni kartrā svakārye vyāpriyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:710: kṛtamatrātmādhyāsenetyata āha- na cānadhyastātmabhāvena dehena kaścidvyāpriyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:714: evamanadhyastātmabhāvaṃ dehendriyādi vyāpārayan bhaviṣyati tadabhijñaḥ pramātā ityata āha- na caitasminsarvasmin,
GSP33vacbhamu:722: ātaścādhyāsāśrayāṇi pramāṇānītyāha- na ca pramātṛtvamantareṇa pramāṇapravṛttirasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:723: pramāyāṃ khalu phale svatantraḥ pramātā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:738: āgamopapattipratipannapratyagātmatattvānāṃ vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇyeva pramāṇānītyata āha- paśvādibhiścāviśeṣāt iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:739: vidantu nāma āgamopapattibhyāṃ dehendriyādibhyo bhinnaṃ pratyagātmānam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:741: yādṛśo hi paśuśakuntādīnāmavipratipannamugdhabhāvānāṃ vyavahārastādṛśo vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:745: etadeva vibhajate- yathā hi paśvādaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:746: atra ca śabdādibhiḥ śrotrādīnāṃ saṃbandhe sati iti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:749: tathā hi- śabdādisvarūpamupalabhya tajjātīyasya pratikūlatāmanusmṛtya tajjātīyatayopalabhyamānasya pratikūlatāmanumimata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:754: śāstraṃ tu 'jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta' ityādi na dehātmādhyāsena pravartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:756: tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram- 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāttasmātsvayaṃ prayoge syāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:757: na ca dehādi bhasmībhūtaṃ pāralaukikāya phalāya kalpata iti dehādyatiriktaṃ kañcidātmānamadhikāriṇamākṣipati śāstram ;
GSP33vacbhamu:761: adhikāraśāstraṃ hi svargakāmasya puṃsaḥ paralokasaṃbandhaṃ vinā na nirvahatīti tāvanmātramākṣipet,
GSP33vacbhamu:765: prayoktā hi karmaṇaḥ karmajanitaphalabhogabhāgī karmaṇyadhikārī svāmī bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:771: te tvavidyāvantamanuśāsato nirmṛṣṭanikhilāvidyamanuśiṣṭaṃ svarūpo vyavasthāpayantītyetāvāneṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:774: yadyapi virodhānupayogābhyāmaupaniṣadaḥ puruṣaḥ adhikāre nāpekṣyate tathāpyupaniṣadbhyo 'vagamyamānaḥ śaknotyadhikāraṃ niroddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:775: tataśca parasparaparāhatārthatvena kṛtsna eva vedaḥ prāmāṇyamapajahyādityata āha- prāk ca tathābhūtātma- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:777: tasmāttu purastātkarmavidhayaḥ svocitaṃ vyavahāramabhinirvartayanto nānupajātena brahmajñānena śakyā niroddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:780: yathā-'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti sādhyāṃśaniṣedhe 'pi 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta' iti śāstraṃ pravartamānaṃ 'na hiṃsyāt' ityanena na virudhyate
GSP33vacbhamu:785: avidyāvatpuruṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātivartata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva sphuṭayati- tathā hi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:798: dehatādātmyamātmanyadhyasya dehamarthaṃ putrakalatrādisvābhyaṃ ca kṛśatvādivat āropyāha- ahameva vikalaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:800: svasya khalu sākalyena svābhyasākalyāt svāmīśvaraḥ sakalaḥ saṃpūrṇo bhavati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:801: tathā svasya vaikalyena svāmyavaikalyāt svāmīśvaro visalo 'saṃpūrṇo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:802: bāhyadharmā ye vaikalyādayaḥ svābhyapraṇālikayā saṃcaritāḥ śarīre tānātmanyadhyasyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:803: yadā ca paropādhyapekṣe dehadharme svāmye iyaṃ gatiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:804: tadā kaiva kathā anaupādhikeṣu dehadharmeṣu kṛśatvādiṣu ityāśayavānāha- tathā dehadharmān iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:806: tato 'pyantaraṅgasyāntaḥkaraṇasya adhyastātmabhāvasya dharmān kāmasaṃkalpādīn ātmanyadhyasyatīti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:807: tadanena prapañcena dharmādhyāsamuktvā tasya mūlaṃ dharmyadhyāsamāha- evamahaṃpratyayinam /
GSP33vacbhamu:814: caitanyamupapādayati- taṃ ca pratyagātmānaṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ tadviparyayeṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:819: tadanena antaḥkaraṇādyavacchinnaḥ pratyagātmā idamanidaṃrūpaścetanaḥ kartā bhoktā
GSP33vacbhamu:822: pramāṇaprameyavyavahāradṛḍhīkṛtameva śiṣyahitāya svarūpābhidhānapūrvakaṃ sarvalokapratyakṣatayā adhyāsaṃ sudṛḍhīkaroti- evamayamanādiranantaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:829: virodhipratyayaṃ vinā kuto 'sya prahāṇamityaya uktam- ātmaikatvavidyāpratipattaye /
GSP33vacbhamu:836: etaduktaṃ bhavati- asmatpratyayasyātmaviṣayasya samīcīnatve sati brahmaṇo jñātatvāt niṣprayojanatvācca na jijñāsā syāt ;
GSP33vacbhamu:837: tadabhāve ca na brahmajñānāya vedāntāḥ paṭhyeran ;
GSP33vacbhamu:843: na hi rajjvā rajjutvaṃ sahasramapi sarpadhārāpratyayā apavaditumutsahante /
GSP33vacbhamu:844: mithyājñānaprasañjitaṃ tu rūpaṃ śakyaṃ tattvajñānena apavaditum,
GSP33vacbhamu:848: tatkathaṃ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāmātmaikatvapratipādanamartha ityata āha- yathā cāyamarthaḥ ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:851: tasya tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyaparamātmarūpatayā yā mīmāṃsā sā tathoktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:855: yadyapi ca 'aviśiṣṭastu vākyārthaḥ' iti nyāyāt mantrāṇāmiva vedāntānāmarthaparatvamautsargikam,
GSP33vacbhamu:856: yadyapi ca vedāntebhyaḥ caitanyānandaghanaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvarahito niṣprapañca ekaḥ pratyagātmā avagamyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:858: mohamayamātmānamavagāhamānenāhaṃpratyayena sedehabādhavirahiṇā virudhyamānā vedāntāḥ svārthātpracyutā upacaritārthā vā japamātropayogino vā ityavivakṣitasvārthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:859: tathā ca tadarthavicārātmikā caturlakṣaṇī śārīrakamīmāṃsā nārabdhavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:860: na ca sarvajanīnāhamanubhavasiddha ātmā saṃdigdho vā saprayojano vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:861: yena jijñāsyaḥ san vicāraṃ prayuñjīta- iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:869: tasya ca vakṣyamāṇena krameṇa saṃdigdhatvāt prayojanatvācca yuktā jijñāsā- ityāśayavān sūtrakāraḥ tajjijñāsāmasūtrayat,
GSP33vacbhamu:875: kiṃ tu brahmamīmāṃsākhyatarketikartavyatānujñātaviṣayairvedāntairāhitaṃ nirvicikitsaṃ brahmajñānameva samastaduḥkhopaśamarūpamānandaikarasaṃ paramaṃ prayojanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:878: yathā svagrīvāgatamapi graiveyakaṃ kutaścidbhramānnāstīti manyamānaḥ pareṇa pratipāditamaprāptamiva prāpnoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:879: jijñāsā tu saṃśayasya kāryamiti svakāraṇaṃ saṃśayaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:881: tathā ca śāstre prekṣāvatpravṛttihetusaṃśayaprayojanasūcanāt yuktamasya sūtrasya śāstrāditvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:888: sā hyanena śiṣyate śiṣyebhyo yathāvatpratipādyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:894: tadevaṃ sūtratātparyaṃ vyākhyāya tasya prathamapadaṃ atha iti vyācaṣṭe- tatrāthaśabda ānantaryārthaḥ parigṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:895: teṣu sūtrapadeṣu madhye yo 'yaṃ athaśabdaḥ sa ānantaryārtha iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:900: tatkimatrādhikārārtho na gṛhyata ityata āha- nādhikārārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:902: jijñāsā tāvadiha sūtre brahmaṇaśca tajjñānācca śabdataḥ pradhānaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:903: na ca yathā 'daṇḍī praiṣānanvāha' ityatra apradhānamapi daṇḍaśabdārtho vivakṣyate evamihāpi brahmatajjñāne iti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:905: tadavivakṣāyāṃ tadasūcanena kākadantaparīkṣāyāmiva na brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ prekṣāvantaḥ pravarteran /
GSP33vacbhamu:906: na hi tadānīṃ brahma tajjñānaṃ ca abhidheyaprayojane bhavitumarhataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:908: karmapravṛttyupayogitayā upacaritārthānāṃ vā japopayogināṃ vā 'hum' ityevamādīnāmivāvivakṣitārthānāmapi svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvasya saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:909: tasmātsaṃdehaprayojanasūcanī jijñāsā iha padato vākyataśca pradhānaṃ vivakṣitavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:916: na ca jijñāsā mīmāṃsā yena yogānuśāsanavadadhikriyeta ;
GSP33vacbhamu:917: nāntatvaṃ nipātya 'māṅ māne' ityasmādvā 'mānapūjāyām' ityasmādvā dhātoḥ 'mānbandha-' ityādinā anicchārthe sani vyutpāditasya mīmāṃsāpadasya pūjitavicāravacanatvāt ;
GSP33vacbhamu:922: na ca svārthaparatvasyopapattau satyāṃ anyārthaparatvakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33vacbhamu:926: tathā ca maṅgalahetutvāt pratyahaṃ brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti sūtrārthaḥ saṃpadyata ityata āha- maṅgalasya ca vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:929: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ vā lakṣyaṃ vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:931: na ca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śabdavyavahāre dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:932: tatkimidānīṃ maṅgalārtho 'śabdaḥ teṣu teṣu na prayoktavyaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:933: tathā ca oṅkāraścāthaśabdaśca dvāvetau brahmaṇaḥ purā /
GSP33vacbhamu:935: iti smṛtivyākopa ityata āha- arthāntaraprayukta eva hyathaśabdaḥ śrutyā maṅgalaprayojano bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:936: arthāntareṣvānantaryādiṣu prayuktaḥ athaśabdaḥ śrutyā śravaṇamātreṇa veṇuvīṇādhvanivanmaṅgalaṃ kurvan maṅgalaprayojano bhavati anyārthamānīyamānodakumbhadarśanavat
GSP33vacbhamu:938: tena ca iha ānantaryārthasya sataḥ śravaṇamātreṇa maṅgalārthatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:941: tadyathā- iyamevāthaśabdaṃ prakṛtya vimṛśyate 'kimayamathaśabda ānantarye athādhikāre' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:947: na hi jātu bhavati- kiṃ nitya ātmā,
GSP33vacbhamu:949: tasmādānantaryaṃ vinā pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣa ihāthaśabdaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:953: sā ca pūrvaprakṛtārthāpekṣatve 'pyathaśabdasya sidhyatīti vyartha ānantaryārthatvāvadhāraṇāgraho 'smākamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:956: na ceha kalpāntaropanyāsa iti pāriśeṣyādānantaryārtha eveti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:958: kimevaṃ satītyata āha- sati cānantaryārthatva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:962: na cānantaryamātrasya dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:963: tasmāttasyātrānantaryaṃ vaktavyaṃ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:967: dharmajijñāsāyā iva brahmajijñāsāyā api yogyatvāt svādhyāyādhyayanānantaryam,
GSP33vacbhamu:971: tasmādvedādhyayanānantaryameva brahmajijñāsāyā apyathaśabdārtha ityata āha- svādhyāyānantaryaṃ tu samānaṃ dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:972: atra ca svādhyāyena viṣayeṇa tadviṣayamadhyayanaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:973: tathā ca 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' ityanenaiva gatamiti nedaṃ sūtramārabdhavyam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:975: codayati - nanviha karmāvabodhānantaryaṃ viśeṣaḥ dharmajijñāsāto brahmajijñāsāyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:976: asyārthaḥ- 'vividiṣanti yajñena' iti tṛtīyāśrutyā yajñādīnāmaṅgatvena brahmajñāne viniyogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:981: na ca vākyaṃ sahakāritayā karmāṇyapekṣata iti yuktam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:986: tasmin sati tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjanaṃ tataśca tadbodha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:987: na ca vedāntavākyānāmeva svārthapratyāyane karmāpekṣā na vākyāntarāṇāmiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33vacbhamu:989: nanu 'tattvamasi' iti vākyāt tvaṃpadārthasya kartṛbhoktṛrūpasya jīvātmano nityaśuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvena
GSP33vacbhamu:996: tasmāt 'tattvamasi' ityādeḥ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā,
GSP33vacbhamu:1001: ata eva śrutiḥ- 'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:1003: vijñāya tarkopakaraṇena śabdena prajñāṃ bhāvanāṃ kurvītetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1006: yajñādisaṃskṛto hi puruṣaḥ ādaranairantaryadīrghakālairāsevamāno brahmabhāvanāmanādyavidyāvāsanāṃ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1008: ata eva smṛtiḥ- 'mahāyajñaiśca yajñaiśca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:1011: asti hi smṛtiḥ- 'ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet' /
GSP33vacbhamu:1013: anye tu 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena' ityādiśrutibhyaḥ tattatphalāya coditānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃyogapṛthaktvena brahmabhāvanāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1016: ata eva pāramarṣaṃ sūtram 'sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1019: tasmāt yadi śrutyādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vā pāramarṣaṃ sūtraṃ sarvathā yajñādikarmasamuccitā
GSP33vacbhamu:1025: karmāvabodhena hi karmānuṣṭhānasāhityaṃ bhavati brahmopāsanāyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1030: kiṃ kārye yathāgneyādīnāṃ paramāpūrve cirabhāviphalānukūle janayitavye samidādyapekṣā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:1035: sa cotpādyo vā syāt yathā saṃyavanasya piṇḍaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1040: na khalu ghaṭādisākṣātkāra iva jaḍasvabhāvebhyo ghaṭādibhyo bhinna indriyādyādheyo brahmasākṣātkāro bhāvanādheyaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:1042: tato bhinnasya vā bhāvanādheyasya sākṣātkārasya pratibhāpratyayavat saṃśayākrāntatayā prāmāṇyāyogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1044: na khalu anumānāvagataṃ siddhaṃ vahniṃ bhāvayataḥ śītārtasya śiśirabharamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasya sphurajjvālājaṭilānalasākṣātkāraḥ pramāṇāntareṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:1047: na ca kūṭasthanityasya sarvavyāpino brahmaṇa upāsanāto vikārasaṃskāraprāptayaḥ saṃbhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1053: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- pratisīrāpanaye pāriṣadānāṃ nartakīviṣayaḥ sākṣātkāro bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1064: na hi sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:1065: ārohapariṇāhavat dravyamiti vā śataśo 'pi jñānamabhyasyamānaṃ puruṣa eveti niścayāya paryāptam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1067: nanūktaṃ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā yuktimayena ca vyavasthāpyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1076: na caiṣa sākṣātkāro mīmāṃsāsahitasyāpi śabdapramāṇasya phalam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1081: na cāyamanubhavato brahmasvabhāvo yena na janyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:1084: na hi śābdajñānaprakāśyaṃ brahma svayaṃ prakāśaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1090: anyathā caitanyacchāyāpattiṃ vināntaḥkaraṇavṛtteḥ svayamacetanāyāḥ svaprakāśatvānupapattau sākṣātkāratvāyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1093: iha tu brahmasvarūpasya upādhikaluṣitasya jīvasya prāgapyaparokṣatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1095: jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhabuddhatvādisvabhāvo brahmeti gīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1099: antaḥkaraṇavṛttau brahmasākṣātkāre janayitavye asti tadupāsanāyāḥ karmāpekṣeti cet, na,
GSP33vacbhamu:1104: yadyucyeta niścite 'pi tattve viparyāsanibandhano vyavahāro 'nuvartamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1105: yathā guḍasya mādhuryaviniścaye api pittopahatendriyāṇāṃ tiktatāvabhāsānuvṛttiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1110: karmaṇo vā taducchedakasya kuta ucchedaḥ iti vācyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1112: yathā payaḥ payo 'ntaraṃ jarayati svayaṃ ca jīryati,
GSP33vacbhamu:1113: yathā viṣaṃ viṣāntaraṃ śamayati svayaṃ ca śāmyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:1114: yathā vā katakarajo rajo 'ntarāvile pāthasi prakṣiptaṃ rajo 'ntarāṇi bhindat svayamapi bhidyamānamanāvilaṃ pāthaḥ karoti,
GSP33vacbhamu:1120: tathāpi tānapyayaṃ vyavahārapratyayānmithyeti manyamāno vidvān ca śraddhatte,
GSP33vacbhamu:1121: pittopahatendriya iva guḍaṃ thūtkṛtya tyajannapi tasya tiktatām /
GSP33vacbhamu:1125: kriyākartrādisvarūpavibhāgaṃ ca vidvasyamāna iha vidvānabhimataḥ karmakāṇḍe /
GSP33vacbhamu:1126: ata eva bhagavān avidvadviṣayatvaṃ śāstrasya varṇayāṃbabhūva bhāṣyakāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1129: na cānadhikṛtena samarthenāpi kṛte vaidikaṃ karma phalāya kalpate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1131: tena dṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu śaktaḥ pravartamānaḥ prāpnotu phalam, dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1132: adṛṣṭārtheṣu tu śāstraikasamadhigamyaṃ phalamanadhikāriṇi na yujyata iti nopāsanākārye karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1135: evaṃ niṣedhavidhayo 'pi manuṣyādhikārā iti tadabhimānarahitasteṣvapi nādhikriyeta paśvādivat ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1136: tathā cāyaṃ niṣiddhamanutiṣṭhan na pratyaveyāt tiryagādivaditi bhinnakarmatāpātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1140: anuvartamānaṃ ca mithyeti manyamāno na śraddhatta ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1148: api tu niṣidhyamānakriyonmukho nara ityeva pravartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1149: tathā ca sāṃsārika iva śraddhāvagatabrahmatattvo 'pi niṣedhamatikramya pravartamānaḥ pratyavaitīti na bhinnakarmadarśanābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1154: 'na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvamānaśuḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:1157: tathā ca 'vividiṣanti yajñena' ityādyāḥ śrutayo virudhyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:1163: vastutaḥ pradhānasyāpi vedanasya prakṛtyarthatayā śabdato guṇatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1166: na hi 'rājapuruṣamānaya' ityukte vastutaḥ pradhāno 'pi rājā puruṣaviśeṣaṇatayā śabdata upasarjana ānīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1176: etāni ca nityāni upāttaduritanibarhaṇena puruṣaṃ saṃskurvanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1177: tathā ca śrutiḥ- 'sa ha vā ātmāyājī yo veda idaṃ me 'nenāṅgaṃ saṃskriyata idaṃ me 'nenāṅgamupadhīyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1181: nityanaimittikānuṣṭhānaprakṣīṇakalmaṣasya ca viśuddhasattvasyāviduṣa eva utpannavividiṣasya jñānottapattiṃ darśayatyātharvaṇī śrutiḥ-
GSP33vacbhamu:1182: '.................. viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1184: kḷptenaiva ca nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nityehitenopāttaduritanibarhaṇena puruṣasaṃskāreṇa jñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvopapattau na saṃyogapṛthaktvena sākṣādaṅgabhāvo
GSP33vacbhamu:1188: sa hi anityāśuciduḥkharūpe saṃsāre nityaśucisukhakhyātilakṣaṇena viparyāsena cittasattvaṃ malinayati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1189: ataḥ pāpanivṛttau pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya anityāśuciduḥsvarūpatvamapratyūhamavabudhyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1194: tataḥ śravaṇādikrameṇa tajjānātītyārādupakārakatvaṃ tattvajñānotpādaṃ prati cittasattvaśuddhyā karmaṇāṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1199: evaṃ ca ananuṣṭhitakarmāpi prāgbhavīyakarmavaśāt yo viśuddhasattvaḥ saṃsārāsāratādarśanena niṣpannavairāgyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1202: iyameva ca puruṣadhaureyabhedamadhikṛtya pravavṛte śrutiḥ- 'yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1206: ata eva na brahmacāriṇa ṛṇāni santi yena tadapākaraṇārthaṃ karmānutiṣṭhet /
GSP33vacbhamu:1207: etadanurodhācca 'jāyamāno vai brāhmaṇastribhirṛṇavā jāyate' iti gṛhasthaḥ saṃpadyamāna iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1212: tasmāttasyānantaryamatha-śabdārthaḥ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati yasmiṃstu sati bhavantī bhavatyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:1218: 'gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanī bhūtvā pravrajet' iti jābālaśrutirgārhasthyena hi yajñādyanuṣṭhānaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1221: iṣṭvā ca śaktito yajñairmano mokṣe niveśayet //
GSP33vacbhamu:1227: kutaḥ ? 'hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasaḥ' ityathāgraśabdābhyāṃ kramasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1232: ata eva 'yadahareva virajettadahareva pravrajet' iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1234: aviśuddhasattvo hi mokṣamicchannālasyāttadupāye 'pravartamāno gṛhasthadharmamapi nityanaimittikamanācaranpratikṣaṇamupacīyamānapāpmā adhogatiṃ gacchatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1237: pāṭhasthānamukhyapravṛttipramāṇakastu kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- śeṣaśeṣitve pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1238: śeṣāṇāṃ samidādīnāṃ śeṣiṇāṃ cāgneyādīnāṃ ekaphalavadupakāropanibaddhānāṃ ekaphalāvacchinnānām
GSP33vacbhamu:1242: yatra tu na śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ nāpyekādhikārāvacchedaḥ yathā sauryāryamṇaprājāpatyādīnām,
GSP33vacbhamu:1245: na ceha dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāve śrutyādīnāmanyatamaṃ pramāṇamasatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1246: nanu śeṣaśeṣibhāvābhāve 'pi kramaniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ yathā godohanasya puruṣārthasya dārśapaurṇamāsikairaṅgaiḥ saha,
GSP33vacbhamu:1247: yathā vā 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta' iti darśapūrṇamāsasomayoraśeṣaśeṣiṇorityata āha- adhikṛtādhikāre vā pramāṇābhāvāt- iti yojanā
GSP33vacbhamu:1248: svargakāmasya hi darśapūrṇamāsādhikṛtasya paśukāmasya sato darśapūrṇamāsa-
GSP33vacbhamu:1259: yadi vā jijñāsyabrahmaṇaḥ aṃśo dharmaḥ syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1260: yathā caturlakṣaṇīvyutpādyaṃ brahma kenacitkenacit aṃśenaikena lakṣaṇena vyutpādyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1261: tatra caturṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ jijñāsyābhedena parasparasaṃbandhe sati kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1265: jijñāsāyā vastuto jñānatantratvāt jñānaphalaṃ jijñāsāphalamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1274: bhavitā ca bhāvakavyāpāranirvartyatayā tattantra iti tataḥ prāgjñānakāle nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1282: pravṛttabhedaṃ vibhajate- yā hi codanā dharmasya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1285: sā ca svasādhye puruṣavyāpāre bhāvanāyāṃ tadviṣaye ca yāgādau ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1289: bhāvanāyāstaddvāreṇa ca yāgāderapekṣitopāyatāmavagamayantī tatrecchopahāramukheṇa puruṣaṃ niyuñjānaiva yāgādidharmamavabodhayati nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1290: brahmacodanā tu puruṣamavabodhayatyeva kevalaṃ na tu pravartayantyavabodhayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1293: puruṣo brahmāvabodhyata iti samānatvaṃ dharmacodanābhirbrahmacodanānāmityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1303: api cātmajñānavidhipareṣu vedānteṣu nātmatattvaviniścayaḥ śābdaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1306: yatparāśca te ta eva teṣāṃ arthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1312: yasminnasati brahmajijñāsā na bhavati sati tu bhavantī bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1321: tathā sati eṣa viparyāsādanyaḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1327: etaduktaṃ bhavati- mā bhūt idaṃ ṛtaṃ nityam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1334: tadeteṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocareṣu viṣayaviṣayiṣu yadṛtaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vyavasthāsyate tadāsthāgocaro bhaviṣyati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1335: yattvanityamanṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati tāpatrayaparītaṃ tattyakṣyata iti so 'yaṃ nityānityavastuvivekaḥ prāgbhavīyādaihikādvā karmaṇo viśuddhasattvasya bhavatyanubhavopapattibhyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:1336: na khalu satyaṃ nāma na kiñcidastīti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1339: athāsya puruṣadhaureyasyānubhavopapattibhyāmevaṃ sunipuṇaṃ nirūpayataḥ ā ca satyalokāt
GSP33vacbhamu:1340: ā cāvīceḥ jāyasva mriyasva iti viparivartamānaṃ kṣaṇamuhūrtayāmāhorātrārdhamāsamāsartvayanavatsarayugacaturyugamanvantarapralayamahāpralayamahāsargāvāntarasargasaṃsārasāgarormibhiraniśamuhyamānaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1348: rāgādikaṣāyamadirāmattaṃ hi manaḥ teṣu teṣu viṣayeṣūccāvacamindriyāṇi pravartayat
GSP33vacbhamu:1349: vividhāśca pravṛttīḥ puṇyāpuṇyaphalā bhāvayat puruṣamatighore vividhaduḥkhajvālājaṭāle
GSP33vacbhamu:1352: so 'yamasya vairāgyahetuko manovijayaḥ śama iti vaśīkarasaṃjña iti cākhyāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1355: yathā dānto 'yaṃ vṛṣabhayuvā halaśakaṭādivahanayogyaḥ kṛta iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1357: ata eva śrutiḥ- 'tasmācchānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet,
GSP33vacbhamu:1362: tato 'sya saṃsārabandhanānmumukṣā bhavatītyāha- mumukṣutvaṃ ca iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1363: tasya ca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabrahmajñānaṃ mokṣasya kāraṇamityupaśrutya tajjijñāsā bhavati dharmajijñāsāyāḥ prāgūrdhvaṃ ca ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1364: tasmātteṣāmevānantaryaṃ na dharmajijñāsāyā ityāha- teṣu hi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1370: atraivaṃ paricodyate- satyaṃ yathoktasādhanasaṃpattyanantaraṃ brahmajijñāsā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1385: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:1387: api ca dṛṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ candanavanitādisaṅgajanma kṣayitālakṣaṇena duḥkhenāghrātatvādatibhīruṇā tyajyetāpi,
GSP33vacbhamu:1391: tathā ca 'akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsyayājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1396: tasyārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ- yasmādveda eva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1397: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ- satyaṃ mṛgabhikṣukādayaḥ śakyāḥ parihartuṃ pācakakṛṣīvalādibhiḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1400: na hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamannaṃ viṣaṃ parityajya madhumiśraṃ śakyaṃ śilpivareṇāpi bhoktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1405: atra ca brahmapadena tatpramāṇaṃ veda upasthāpitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1406: sa ca yogyatvāt 'tadyatheha karmacitaḥ' ityādiḥ 'ataḥ' iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛśya hetupañcamyā nirdiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1408: yathā svargādeḥ kṛtakasya sukhasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgaḥ tathā brahmaṇo 'pītyata āha- tathā brahmavijñānādapi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1409: tenāyamarthaḥ- ataḥ svargādīnāṃ kṣayitāpratipādakāt brahmajñānasya ca paramapuruṣārthatāpratipādakāt āgamāt yathoktasādhanasaṃpat ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1412: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapradarśanena prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ brahmaṇe jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ parāsto veditavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1413: 'tādarthyasamāse prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyam' iti kātyāyanīyavacanena yūpadārvādiṣveva prakṛtivikārabhūteṣu caturthīsamāsaniyamāt aprakṛtivikārabhūte ityevamādau tanniṣedhāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1417: brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte tatrānekārthatvādbrahmaśabdasya saṃśayaḥ- kasya brahmaṇo jijñāsā ?- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1424: tamimaṃ saṃśayamapākaroti- brahma ca vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇam iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1425: yato brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya tajjñāpanāya paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayati tato 'vagacchāmaḥ paramātmajijñāsaiveyaṃ na vipratvajātyādijijñāsā, ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1428: saṃbandhamātraṃ ca śeṣa iti brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte brahmasaṃbandhinī jijñāsetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1429: tathā ca brahmasvarūpapramāṇayuktisādhanaprayojanajijñāsāḥ sarvā brahmajijñāsārthā brahmajijñāsayāvaruddhā bhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:1433: tathā cāpratijñātārthacintā pramāṇādiṣu bhavet- iti ye manyante tānpratyāhabrahmaṇa iti karmaṇi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1437: no khalu jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vinā nirūpyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1442: na hi candramasamādityaṃ vopalabhya kasyāyamiti saṃbandhyanveṣaṇā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1448: nanu satyaṃ na jijñāsyamantareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1450: brahma tu śeṣatayā saṃbhantsyata ityata āha- jijñāsyāntara iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1453: nigūḍhābhiprāya eva dūṣayati- evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1454: vācyasya karmatvasya jijñāsayā prathamamapekṣitasya prathamasaṃbandhārhasya cānvayaparityāgena paścātkathañcidapekṣitasya saṃbandhimātrasya
GSP33vacbhamu:1458: cedakaḥ svābhiprāyamudghāṭayati- na vyarthaḥ brahmāśritāśeṣa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1465: tadevamabhimataṃ samāsaṃ vyavasthāpya jijñāsāpadārthamāha- jñātum iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1474: tasmānna sūtrakāravacanamātrādiṣikarmatā jñānasyetyata āha- avagatiparyantam iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1475: na kevalaṃ jñānamiṣyate kiṃ tvavagatiṃ sākṣātkāraṃ kurvadavagatiparyantaṃ sanvācyāyā icchāyāḥ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:1476: kasmāt ? phalaviṣayatvādicchāyāḥ tadupāyaṃ phalaparyantaṃ gocarayatīccheti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1479: na hyanapekṣaṇīyaviṣayamavagatiparyantamapi jñānamiṣyata ityata āha- jñānena hi pramāṇenāvagantumiṣṭaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:1483: na, kiṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ vigalitanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgaparamānandaghanabrahmāvagatirbrahmaṇaḥ svabhāva iti saiva niḥśreyasaṃ puruṣārtha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1493: na pratibhātīva parādhīnaprakāśa iva dehendriyādibhyo bhinno 'pyabhinna iva bhāsata
GSP33vacbhamu:1494: iti saṃsārabījāvidyādyanarthanibarhaṇātprāgaprāpta iva tasminsati prāpta iva bhavatīti
GSP33vacbhamu:1502: tacca na kevalebhyo vedāntebhyaḥ api tu brahmamīmāṃsopakaraṇebhya iti icchāmukhena brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ pravartyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1504: tatra phalavadarthāvabodhaparatāṃ svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ sūtrayatā 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' ityanenaiva pravartitatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1506: yadyapi ca dharmamīmāṃsāvat vedārthamīmāṃsayā brahmamīmāṃsāpyākṣeptuṃ śakyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1508: nāpi brahmamīmāṃsāyā adhyayanamātrānantaryamiti brahmamīmāṃsārambhāya nityānityavivekādyānantaryapradarśanāya cedaṃ sūtramārambhaṇīyamityapaunaruktyam
GSP33vacbhamu:1510: etena sūtreṇa brahmajñānaṃ pratyupāyatā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyata ityuktam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1520: tarhi na tadvedāntāḥ pratipādayantīti sarvathāprasiddhaṃ naiva śakyaṃ jijñāsitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1521: anubhūte hi priye bhavatīcchā na tu sarvathānanubhūtāpūrve /
GSP33vacbhamu:1529: tasmātprasiddhasya jñātuṃ śakyasyāpyajijñāsanāt aprasiddhasyecchāyā aviṣayatvāt aśakyajñānatvācca na brahma jijñāsyamityākṣepaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1541: tatastu prāk dehādyabhedena taddharmajanmajarāmaraṇādiduḥkhayogādityata uktam- mukta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1542: sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiva kevalo 'nādyavidyāvaśāttu bhrāntyā tathāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1543: tadevamanaupādhikaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ darśayitvā avidyopādhikaṃ rūpamāha- sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisamanvitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1546: kutaḥ punarevaṃbhūtabrahmasvarūpāvagatiḥ ityata āha- brahmaśabdasya hi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1547: na kevalam 'sadeva somyedam' ityādīnāṃ vākyānāṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayā itthaṃbhūtabrahmāvagatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1552: tadevaṃ tatpadārthasya śuddhatvādeḥ prasiddhimabhidhāya tvaṃpadārthasyāpyāha- sarvasyātmatvācca brahmāstitvaprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1556: pratītimeva apratītinirākaraṇena draḍhayati- na na iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1559: nanu 'ahamasmi' iti ca jñāsyati mā ca jñāsīdātmānamityata āha- yadi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1561: ahaṅkārāspadaṃ hi jīvātmānaṃ cenna pratīyāt 'aham' iti na pratīyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1563: brahmaṇi tu kimāyātam ityata āha- ātmā ca brahma ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1565: tasmāttatpadārthasya śuddhabuddhatvādeḥ śabdataḥ tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmanaḥ pratyakṣataḥ prasiddheḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1567: tvaṃpadārthasya brahmabhāvāvagamaḥ 'tattvamasi' iti vākyādupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1568: ākṣeptā prathamakalpāśrayaṃ doṣamāha- yadi tarhi loka iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1570: tatra 'tattvamasi' iti vākyādyadi brahma ātmatvena prasiddhamasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1571: 'ātmā brahmatvena' iti vaktavye 'brahma ātmatvena' iti abhedavivakṣayā gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1577: anyathā anāśrayā bhinnāśrayā vā vipratipattayo na syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1582: na hi 'anityā buddhiḥ' 'nitya ātmā' iti pratipattivipratipattī /
GSP33vacbhamu:1584: tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmano lokataḥ siddhiḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1586: tasmāt sāmānyataḥ prasiddhe dharmiṇi viśeṣato vipratipattau yuktastadviśeṣeṣu saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1587: tatra tvaṃpadārthe tāvadvipratipattīrdarśayati- dehamātram ityādinā bhoktaiva kevalaṃ na karttā ityantena /
GSP33vacbhamu:1594: tvaṃpadārthavipratipattyā ca tatpadārthe 'pi vipratipattirdarśitā- vedāprāmāṇyavādino hi laukāyatikādayastatpadārthapratyayaṃ mithyeti manyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:1596: tadevaṃ tvaṃpadārthavipratipattidvārā tatpadārthe vipratipattiṃ sūcayitvā sākṣāttatpadārthe 'pi vipratipattimāha- asti tadvyatirikta īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti kecit /
GSP33vacbhamu:1601: tasyāpi jīvātmabhyo 'pi vyatirekāt na tvaṃpadārthena sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti svamatamāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1610: tathāpi kimarthaṃ brahmamīmāṃsā ārabhyate ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1619: tadavirodhinaśca ye 'nye 'pi tarkā adhvaramīmāṃsāyāṃ nyāye ca vedapratyakṣādiprāmāṇyapariśodhanādiṣūktāḥ t upakaraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1630: atra yadyapi brahmasvarūpajñānasya pradhānasya pratijñayā tadaṅgānyapi pramāṇādīni pratijñātāni,
GSP33vacbhamu:1632: tatra yadyāvadanubhūyate tatsarvaṃ parimitamaviśudadhamabuddhaṃ vidhvaṃsi ca ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1633: na tenopalabdhena tadviruddhasya nityaśuddhabuddhasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1634: na hi jātu kaścitkṛtakatvena nityaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1644: mā bhūdanubhūyamānaṃ jagattaddharmatayā tādātmyena vā brahmaṇo lakṣaṇam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1645: tadutpattyā tu bhaviṣyati deśāntaraprāptiriva saviturvrajyāyā iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1654: pradhānakālagrahalokapālakriyāyadṛcchāsvabhāvābhāveṣūpaplavamāneṣu satsu sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisvabhāvaṃ brahma jagajjanmādikāraṇamiti kutaḥ saṃbhāvanetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1657: nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasyaiti cetanabhāvakartṛkatvasaṃbhāvanayā pradhānādyacetanakartṛkatvaṃ nirupākhyakartṛkatvaṃ ca vyāsedhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1658: yatkhalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate taccetanakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1660: vivādādhyāsitaṃ ca jagannāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākṛtam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1662: cetano hi buddhāvālikhya nāmarūpe ghaṭa iti nāmnā rūpeṇa ca kambugrīvādinā bāhyaṃ ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1663: ata eva ghaṭasya nirvartyasyāpyantaḥ saṃkalpātmanā siddhasya karmakārakabhāvaḥ 'ghaṭaṃ karoti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1665: tathā cācetano buddhāvanālikhitaṃ karotīti na śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1667: cetanā grahā lokapālā vā nāmarūpe buddhāvālikhya jagajjanayiṣyanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:1678: deśādīni ca tāni pratiniyatāti ceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1690: evaṃ ya eva sukhinasta eva kadācidduḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1691: sarvametadākasmikāparanāmni yādṛcchikatve ca svābhāvikatve cāsarvajñāsarvaśaktikartṛkatve ca na ghaṭate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1696: ekasyā api hi śarīraracanāyā rūpaṃ manasā na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ kadācit,
GSP33vacbhamu:1702: kasmātpunarjanmasthitibhaṅgamātramihādigrahaṇena gṛhyate na tu vṛddhipariṇāmāpakṣayā apītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1706: tenālpāvayavādavayavino dvitantukāderanya eva mahānpaṭo jāyata iti janmaiva vṛddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1708: dharmiṇo hi hāṭakāderdharmalakṣaṇaḥ pariṇāmaḥ kaṭakamukuṭādiḥ tasyotpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1715: tathā sati hi tatpratipādake 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni' iti vedavākye buddhisthīkṛte jaganmūlakāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1716: anyathā tu jāyate asti vardhate ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe tatpratipādakaṃ nairuktavākyaṃ buddhau bhavet ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1723: tannāntarīyakatayā tu sthitibhaṅgaṃ gamyata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1731: tadanena prabandhena pratijñāviṣayasya brahmasvarūpasya lakṣaṇadvāreṇa saṃbhāvanoktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1754: śabdāvirodhinyā tadupajīvinyā ca yuktyā vivecanaṃ mananam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1765: yadyapi dharmajijñāsāyāmapi sāmagryāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ vyāpāraḥ tathāpi sākṣānnāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1766: brahmajijñāsāyāṃ tu sākṣādanubhavādīnāṃ saṃbhavo 'nubhavārthā ca brahmajijñāsetyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1778: anuṣṭhānasya ca vināpyanubhavaṃ śābdajñānamātrādeva siddheḥ ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1799: evaṃ nārāsthitasparśananiṣedho brahmaghnaśca tadvāraṇavidhiḥ- ityevañjātīyakā vidhipratiṣedhā arthavantaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1803: yasmādgrahaṇāgrahaṇayoruditānuditahomayośca virodhāt samuccayāsaṃbhave tulyabalatayā ca bādhyabādhakabhāvābhāve sati agatyā vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1805: kiṃ tu sāmānyaśāstrasya sparśananiṣedhasya dhāraṇavidhiviṣayeṇa viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1806: etaduktaṃ bhavati- vidhipratiṣedhaireva sa tādṛśo viṣayo 'nāgatotpādyarūpa upanītaḥ yena puruṣasya vidhiniṣedhādhīnapravṛttinivṛttyorapi svātantryaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1807: bhūte vastuni tu neyamasti vidhā, ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1815: tatkathaṃ na vastu vikalpyate, ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1820: savāsanendriyamanoyonayo vā yathā 'sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā' iti sthāṇau saṃśayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1823: na tu puruṣatattvaṃ vā sthāṇutattvaṃ vāpekṣante,
GSP33vacbhamu:1825: tasmādayathāvastato vikalpanā na vastu vikalpayanti vā anyathayanti vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1831: evamuktena prakāreṇa bhūtavastuviṣayāṇāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyasya vastutantratāṃ prasādhya brahmajñānasya vastutantratāmāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1841: na tu vedāntavākyāni tadadhīnasatyatvānīti kathaṃ vedāntavākyagrathanārthatā sūtrāṇāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1849: yathā ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭamapyanumānaṃ brahmaṇi na pravartate tathopariṣṭānnipuṇataramupapādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1857: atra ca pradhānādiviṣayatvasaṃśaye nirṇayavākyam- ānandādhyeva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1858: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yathā rajjvajñānasahitarajjūpādānā dhārā rajjvāṃ satyāmasti rajjvāmeva ca līyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1859: evamavidyāsahitabrahmopādānaṃ jagat brahmaṇyevāsti tatraiva ca līyata iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:1870: nityanaimittikakāmyakarmapaddhatiṣu ca brahmatattve ca śiṣyāṇāṃ śāsanāt śāstramṛgvedādiḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1879: taiḥ tayā tayā dvārā vedān vyācakṣāṇaistadarthaṃ cādareṇānutiṣṭhadbhiḥ parigṛhīto veda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1885: sarvajñasya hi jñānaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ śāstrasyāpyabhidhānaṃ sarvaviṣayamiti sādṛśyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1896: adyatve 'pyasmadādibhiryatsamīcīnārthaviṣayaṃ śāstraṃ viracyate tatrāsmākaṃ vaktṛṇāṃ vākyājjñānamadhikaviṣayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1897: na hi te te asādhāraṇadharmā anubhūyamānā api śakyā vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1899: vistarārthamapi vākyaṃ na vaktṛjñānena tulyaviṣayamiti kathayituṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1903: vedasya yasmāt mahato bhūtāt yoneḥ saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1904: tasya mahato bhūtasya brahmaṇo niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1915: devarṣayo hi mahāpariśrameṇāpi yatrāśaktāḥ tadayamīṣatprayatnena līlayaiva karotīti niratiśayamasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ coktaṃ bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:1916: aprayatnenāsya vedakartṛtve śrutiruktā 'asya mahato bhūtasya' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1917: ye 'pi tāvat varṇānāṃ nityatvamāsthiṣata tairapi padavākyādīnāmanityatvamabhyupāyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1921: varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ ca kālato deśato vā paurvāparyāyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1922: vyaktiścānityeti kathaṃ tadupagṛhītānāṃ varṇānāṃ nityānāmapi padatā nityā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:1925: yathā hi yādṛśaṃ gātracalanādi nartakaḥ karoti tādṛśameva śikṣyamāṇānukaroti nartakī,
GSP33vacbhamu:1927: evaṃ yādṛśīmānupūrvīṃ vaidikānāṃ varṇapadādīnāṃ karotyadhyāpayitā tādṛśīmevānukaroti māṇavakaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1932: yathāhuḥ- 'yatnataḥ pratiṣedhyā naḥ puruṣāṇāṃ svatantratā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1935: paramātmano nityasya vedānāṃ yonerapi na teṣu svātantryam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1937: yathā hi yāgādibrahmahatyādayor'thānarthahetavo brahmavivartā api na sargāntare vipariyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1943: evaṃ sargāntareṣvapīti tadanurodhāt sarvajño 'pi sarvaśaktirapi pūrvapūrvasargānusāreṇa vedānviracayanna svatantraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1947: na caikasya pratibhāne anāśvāsa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1948: na hi bahūnāmapyajñānāṃ vijñānāṃ vā āśayadoṣavatāṃ pratibhāne yukta āśvāsaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1951: tatpratyayena cārvācīnānāmapi tatra saṃpratyaya ityupapannaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śāstrayonitvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1958: tasyaiva tu lakṣaṇasyānena anumānatvāśaṅkāmapākṛtya āgamopadarśanena brahmaṇi śāstraṃ pramāṇamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1964: kim ākṣepe- śuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvatayā upekṣaṇīyaṃ brahma bhūtamabhidadhatāṃ vedāntānāmapuruṣārthopadeśināmaprayojanatvāpatteḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1966: na khalu laukikāni vākyāni pramāṇāntaraviṣayamarthamavabodhayanti svataḥ pramāṇam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1974: evaṃ hi pratyakṣādyanadhigatagocaratvenānapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ ca prayojanavattvaṃ ca sidhyatīti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1989: vedāntānāṃ cājñātaṃ brahma jñāpayatāṃ tathābhāvāt , ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1999: tasmāt bhāvanāviṣayo vidhirna siddhe vastuni bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2004: evaṃ ca sati uktarūpe brahmaṇi śabdasyātātparyāt pramāṇāntareṇa yādṛśamasya rūpaṃ vyavasthāpyate na tacchabdena virudhyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2025: 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni' iti tu vākyaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtaṃ jagadutpattisthitināśakāraṇamiti ceha smāritamiti na paṭhitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2026: yena hi vākyamupakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate sa eva vākyārtha iti śābdāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2029: iti ca jīvasya brahmātmanopasaṃhārāt tatparataiva vākyasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:2031: na ca tatparatvasya dṛṣṭasya sati saṃbhave 'nyaparatā adṛṣṭā yuktā kalpayitum,
GSP33vacbhamu:2038: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ- puṃvākyanidarśanena hi bhūtārthatayā vedāntānāṃ sāpekṣatvamāśaṅkyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2045: evaṃ tarhi atatpūrvakāṇāṃ vedāntānāṃ bhūtārthānāmapi nāprāmāṇyaṃ pratyakṣādīnāmiva niyatendriyaliṅgādijanmanām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2046: yadyucyeta- siddhe kilāpauruṣeyatve vedāntānāmanapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyet ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2048: bhūtārthasya śabdānapekṣeṇa puruṣeṇa mānāntarataḥ śakyajñānatvādbuddhipūrvaṃ viracanopapatteḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2052: kāryārthatve tu kāryasyāpūrvasya mānāntarāgocaratayā atyantānanubhūtapūrvasya tattvena
GSP33vacbhamu:2053: samāropeṇa vā puruṣabuddhāvasamārohāt tadarthānāṃ vedāntānāmaśakyaracanatayā pauruṣeyatvābhāvādanapekṣaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2055: atra brūmaḥ- kiṃ punaridaṃ kāryamabhimatamāyuṣmataḥ yadaśakyaṃ puruṣeṇa jñātum ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2059: lokānusārataḥ kriyāyā eva laukikyāḥ kāryatayā liṅāderavagamāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2062: na ca kriyā kṣaṇabhaṅgurā āmuṣmikāya svargāya kalpata iti pāriśeṣyādvedata evāpūrve kārye liṅādīnāṃ saṃbandhagraha iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:2065: spaṣṭadṛṣṭena pauruṣeyatvena vā teṣāmapūrvārthatvapratiṣedhe vākyatvādinā liṅgena vedāntānāmapi pauruṣeyatvamanumitamityapūrvārthatā na syāt
GSP33vacbhamu:2069: tenāpauruṣeyatve siddhe bhūtārthānāmapi vedāntānāṃ na sāpekṣatayā prāmāṇyavighātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2070: na cānadhigatagantṛtā nāsti yena prāmāṇyaṃ na syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2090: tatrāprāptaprāptau cātyaktatyāge ca bāhyopāyānuṣṭhānasādhyatvāt tadupāyatattvajñānādasti parācīnānuṣṭhānāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2092: na hi sahasramapi rajjupratyayā vastusantaṃ phaṇinamanyathayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2093: samāropite tu prepsitajihāsite tattvasākṣātkāramātreṇa bāhyānuṣṭhānānapekṣeṇaiva śakyete prāptumiva hātumiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:2096: tathehāpyavidyāsamāropitajīvabhāve brahmaṇyānande vastutaḥ śokaduḥkhādirahite samāropitanibandhanastadbhāvaḥ 'tattvamasi' iti vākyārthatattvajñānādavagatiparyantānnivartate
GSP33vacbhamu:2100: brahmātmāvagamādevajīvasya sarvakleśasya savāsanasya viparyāsasya- sa hi kliśnāti jantūnataḥ kleśaḥ- tasya prakarṣeṇa hānāt
GSP33vacbhamu:2111: santu tarhi vedāntā devatāpratipādanadvāreṇopāsanāvidhiparā evetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2113: upāsyopāsakopāsanādibhedasiddhyadhīnopāsanā na nirastasamastabhedaprapañce vedāntavedye brahmaṇi saṃbhavatīti nopāsanāvidhiśeṣatvaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadvirodhitvāt ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2117: na hi hānopādānabuddhī eva prāmaṇasya phale,
GSP33vacbhamu:2119: iti kṛtam 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam' ityādiniṣedhavidhiparatvenaiteṣāmityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2121: svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatayā hi sarvo vedarāśiḥ puruṣārthatantra ityavagatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2124: na ca vedāntebhya iva tadarthāvagamamātrādeva kaścitpuruṣārtha upalabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2126: 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam' ityayamapi niṣedhavidhiḥ svaniṣedhyasya nindāmapekṣate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2128: tadyadi dūrato 'pi na nindāmavāpsyattato niṣedhavidhireva rajataniṣedhe ca nindāyāṃ ca darvihenatasvasya sāmarthyadvayamakalpayiṣyat /
GSP33vacbhamu:2129: tadevamuttaptayoḥ 'so 'rodīt' iti ca 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam' iti ca padasaṃdarbhayorlakṣyamāṇanindādvāreṇa naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat parasparaṃ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2132: nanu vidhyasaṃsparśino vedasyānyasya na prāmāṇyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kathaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadaspṛśāṃ tadbhaviṣyatītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2140: vedāntānāmapi brahmaṇyastīti dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṃ teṣāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2141: anyathā nendriyāntarāṇāṃ rūpaprakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cakṣurapi na rūpaṃ prakāśayediti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2151: yatra hi śabdā lokena na prayujyante na tatra teṣāṃ saṃgatigrahaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2155: tasmāt pratipitsitaṃ pratipipādayiṣannayaṃ lokaḥ pravṛttinivṛttihetubhūtamevārthaṃ pratipādayet,
GSP33vacbhamu:2161: api ca narāntarasya vyutpannasyārthapratyayamanumāya tasya ca padaśabdabhāvābhāvānuvidhānamavagamyaya śabdasya tadviṣayabodhakatvaṃ niścetavyam
GSP33vacbhamu:2163: kāryapratyaye tu narāntaravartini pravṛttinivṛttī sto hetū ityajñātasaṃgatitvānna brahmarūpaparā vedāntāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2172: na ca 'rajjuriyaṃ na bhujaṅgaḥ' iti yathākathañcillakṣaṇayā vākyārthatattvaniścayādyathā bhayakampādinivṛttiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2173: evam 'tattvamasi' iti vākyārthāvagamānnivṛttirbhavati sāṃsārikāṇāṃ dharmāṇām. śrutavākyārthasyāpi puṃsasteṣāṃ tādavasthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2174: api ca yadi śrutabrahmaṇo bhavati sāṃsārikadharmanivṛttiḥ kasmāt punaḥ śravaṇasyopari mananādayaḥ śrūyante ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2177: tacca kāryaṃ svātmani niyojyaṃ niyuñjānaṃ niyoga iti ca mānāntarāpūrvatayāpūrvamiti cākhyāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2178: na ca viṣayānuṣṭhānaṃ vinā tatsiddhiriti svasiddhyarthaṃ tadeva kāryaṃ svaviṣayasya karaṇasyātmajñānasyānuṣṭhānamākṣipati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2179: yathā ca kāryaṃ svaviṣayādhīnanirūpaṇamiti jñānena viṣeyeṇa nirūpyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2180: evaṃ jñānamapi svaviṣayamātmānamantareṇāśakyanirūpaṇamiti tannirūpaṇāya tādṛśamātmānamākṣipati tadeva kāryam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2181: yathāhuḥ- 'yattu tatsiddhyarthamupādīyate ākṣipyate tadapi vidheyamiti tantre vyavahāraḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2184: āropitatadbhāvasya tvanyasya nirūpakatve tena tannirūpitaṃ na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2190: 'yūpe paśuṃ badhnāti' iti bandhanāya viniyukte yūpe,
GSP33vacbhamu:2193: 'yūpamaṣṭāśrīkaroti' ityādibhirvākyaistakṣaṇādividhipapairapi saṃskārāviṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasaṃsthānaṃ dāru yūpa iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2196: kārya eva ca saṃbandho na svarūpo,
GSP33vacbhamu:2200: na ca svatantraṃ kāryaṃ niyojyamadhikāriṇamanuṣṭhātāramantareṇeti niyojyabhedamāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2203: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' iti siddhavadarthavādādavagatasyāpi brahmabhavanasya niyojyaviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ brahma bubhūṣorniyojyaviśeṣasya rātrisatranyāyena pratilambhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2204: piṇḍaputṛyajñānyāyena tu svargakāmasya niyojyasya kalpanāyāmarthavādasyāsamavetārthatayātyantaparokṣā vṛttiḥ syāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2207: amṛtatvaṃ ca amṛtatvādeva na kṛtakatvena śakyamanityamanumātum,
GSP33vacbhamu:2214: taddhi dṛśerupalabdhivacanatvāt śrāvaṇaṃ vā syāt pratyakṣaṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2228: arthavattyā mananādipratītyā cetyasya śeṣaḥ prapañco vidajavyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2236: tacca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ ca vināśi ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:2240: etaduktaṃ bhavati- tvayāpyupāsanāvidhiparatvaṃ vedāntānāmabhyupagacchatā nityaśuddhabuddhatvādirūpabrahmātmatā jīvasya svābhāvikī vedāntagamyāsthīyate
GSP33vacbhamu:2250: na ; gāndharvaśāstrārthepāsanāvāsanāyā ivāpūrvānapekṣāyāḥ ṣaṭjādisākṣātkāre vedāntārthopāsanāvāsanāyā jīvasya brahmabhāvasākṣātkāre 'napekṣāyā eva sāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2253: na ca tatkāmaḥ kriyāmeva kāryamavagamiṣyati nāpūrvamiti sāṃpratam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2259: viśvajinnyāyena tu svargakalpanāyāṃ tasya sātiśayatvaṃ kṣayiṣṇutvaṃ ceti na nityaphalatvamupāsanāyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2262: upāsanāyāḥ saṃskārahetubhāvasya saṃskārasya ca sākṣātkāropajanane manaḥsācivyasya ca mānāntarasiddhatvāt. 'ātmetyevopāsīta' iti na vidhiḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2264: yathopāṃśuyājavākye 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo vidhisarūpā na vidhayaḥ-iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2274: pare hi dvayīṃ nityatāmāhuḥ-kūṭasthanityatā pariṇāminityatāṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:2278: tathā hi-tatsarvātmanā vā pariṇamate ekadeśena vā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2280: ekadeśapariṇāme vā sa ekadeśastato bhinno vā abhinno vā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2284: abhede vā kathaṃ na sarvātmanā pariṇāmaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2289: na ca bhedābhedayorvirodhānnaikatra samavāya iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2292: yattu yathā pramāṇenāvagamyate tasya tathābhāva eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:2293: 'kuṇḍalamidaṃ suvarṇam' iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaye vyaktaṃ bhedābhedau cakāstaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2299: so 'yamabādhito 'saṃdigdhaḥ sarvajanīnaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaya eva kāryakāraṇayorbhedābhedau vyavasthāpayati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2300: tathā ca kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇātmatvāt kāraṇasya ca sadrūpasya sarvatrānugamāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2317: api ca kaṭakasya hāṭakādabhede yathā hāṭakātmanā kaṭakamukuṭakuṇḍalādayo na bhidyante evaṃ kaṭakātmanāpi na bhidyeran,
GSP33vacbhamu:2319: tathā ca hāṭakameva vastusat na kaṭakādayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2323: yadi hāṭakādabhinnaḥ kaṭakaḥ kathamayaṃ kuṇḍalādiṣu nānuvartate ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2325: ye hi yasminnanuvartamāne vyāvartante te tato bhinnā eva,
GSP33vacbhamu:2330: idamevaṃ nedam' iti vibhāgo na syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2332: api ca dūrātkanakamityavagate na tasya kuṇḍalādayo viśeṣā jijñāsyeran,
GSP33vacbhamu:2340: asti cābhede kāraṇasatteti kanake jñāte jñātā eva kuṇḍalādaya iti tajjijñāsājñānāni cānarthakāni syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2341: tena yasmin gṛhyamāṇe yanna gṛhyate tattato bhidyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2343: gṛhyamāṇe ca dūrato hemni na gṛhyante tasya bhedāḥ kuṇḍalādayaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2345: kathaṃ tarhi hema kuṇḍalamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:2346: na hyādhārādheyabhāve samānāśrayatve vā vā sāmānādhikaraṇyamityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2347: athānuvṛttivyāvṛttivyavasthā ca hemni jñāte kuṇḍalādijijñāsā ca katham ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2359: tasmāt kūṭasthanityataiva pāramārthikī. na pariṇāminityateti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:2367: vrīhīṇāṃ khalu prokṣaṇena saṃskārākhyoṃ'śo yathā janyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2375: sukhaṃ cāpratīyamānaṃ na puruṣārtha ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2377: tadevaṃ svamatena mokṣākhyaṃ phalaṃ nityaṃ śrutyādibhirupapādya kriyāniṣpādyasya tu mokṣasyānityatvaṃ prasañjayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:2381: api ca jñānajanyāpūrvajanito mokṣo naiyogika ityasyārthasya santi bhūyasyaḥ śrutayo nivārikā ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2402: mithyājñānaṃ cāvidyā rāgādyupajananakrameṇa dṛṣṭenaiva saṃsārasya paramaṃ nidānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2405: na tu vidyākāryastajjanitāpūrvakāryo vā- iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2411: yena mithyājñānaṃ bhedāvabhāsaṃ nivartayanna vidhiviṣayo bhavet ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2413: tathā ca vidheḥ prāgaprāptaṃ puruṣecchayā kartavyaṃ sat vidhigocaro bhaviṣyati;
GSP33vacbhamu:2414: yathā vṛttyantaratvena manaso viśvedevasāmyādviśvāndevānmanasi saṃpādya mana ālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena saṃpādyānāṃ viśveṣāmeva
GSP33vacbhamu:2416: evaṃ cidrūpasāmyājjīve brahmasvarūpaṃ saṃpādya jīvamālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena brahmānucintanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2429: yathāha draviḍācāryaḥ- 'saṃharaṇādvā saṃvaraṇādvā svātmībhāvādvāyuḥ saṃvargaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2432: prāyaṇakāle hi sa eva sarvāṇīndriyāṇi saṃgṛhyotkrāmatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2433: seyaṃ saṃvargadṛṣṭirvāyau prāṇe ca daśāśāgataṃ jagaddarśayati yathā,
GSP33vacbhamu:2434: evaṃ jīvātmani bṛṃhaṇakriyayā brahmadṛṣṭismṛtatvāya phalāya kalpata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2438: ātmā tu dravyaṃ karmaṇi guṇa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2443: evaṃ kartṛtvena kratvaṅgabhūte ātmani 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ' iti darśanaṃ guṇakarma vidhīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2444: 'yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇastatra pratīyeta' iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2449: darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe hi samāmnātamājyāvekṣaṇaṃ tadaṅgabhūtājyasaṃskāra iti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2450: na ca 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ' ityādi kasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2451: na cānārabhyādhītamapi 'yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati' ityavyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhajuhūdvāreṇa juhūpadaṃ kratuṃ smārayadvākyena yathā parṇatāyāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2453: yena taddarśanaṃ kratvaṅgaṃ sadātmānaṃ kratvarthaṃ saṃskuryāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2455: tathāpi 'suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ bhāryam' itivat viniyogabhaṅgena pradhānakarmaiva,
GSP33vacbhamu:2468: sarvameva hi vākyaṃ nedantayā vastubhedaṃ bodhayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2471: tena pramāṇāntarasiddhe laukike evārthe yadā gatiridṛśī śabdasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:2474: tvaṃpadārtho hi pramātā pramāṇādhīnayā pramityā prameyaṃ ghaṭādi vyāpnotītyavidyāvilasitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2475: tadasya aviṣayībhūtodāsīnatatpadārthapratyagātmasāmānādhikaraṇyena pramātṛtvābhāvāt tannivṛttau pramāṇādayastisro vidhā nivartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2476: na hi pakturavastutve pākyapākapacanāni vastusanti bhavitumarhantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2478: vigalitaparāgvṛttyarthatvaṃ padasya tadastadā tvamiti hi padanaikārthatve tvamityapi yatpadam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2479: tadapi ca tadā gatvaikārthyaṃ viśuddhacidātmatāṃ tyajati sakalānkartṛtvādīnpadārthamalānnijān //
GSP33vacbhamu:2493: tathā ca viśuddhavijñānotpādo mokṣa iti nirvartyo mokṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2494: anyeṣāṃ tu saṃskārarūpāvasthāmapahāya yā kaivalyāvasthāvāptirātmanaḥ sa mokṣa iti vikāryo mokṣaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2499: 'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate' iti śruterbrahmaṇo vikṛtāvikṛtadeśabhedāvagamādavikṛtadeśabrahmaprāptisvarūpāsanādividhikāryā bhaviṣyati
GSP33vacbhamu:2500: tathā ca prāpyakarmatā brahmaṇa ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2508: atha jīvo brahmaṇo bhinnastathāpi na tena brahmāpyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2516: tena hi tatkusumaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ lākṣārasasavarṇaṃ phalaṃ prasūte ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2520: guṇo hi brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo vā bhinno vā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2548: kriyā hi brahmasamavetā vā brahma saṃskuryāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2555: na hi darpaṇe nighṛṣyamāṇe maṇirviśuddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2562: anādyanirvācyāvidyopadhānameva brahmaṇo jīva iti ca kṣetrajña iti cācakṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2567: tenātrāpi yadāśritā kriyā sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇaviṣayīkṛtā tasyaiva saṃskāro nānyasyeti na vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2568: tattvatastu na kriyā na saṃskāra iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2569: sanidarśanaṃ tu śeṣamadhyāsabhāṣye eva kṛtavyākhyānamiti neha vyākhyātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2587: yayā mokṣasya karmatā ghaṭiṣyata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2591: etaduktaṃ bhavati- catasṛṇāṃ vidhānāṃ madhye 'nyatamatayā kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāptam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2592: sā ca mokṣādvyāvartamānā vyāpakānupalabdhyā mokṣasya kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāvartayatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2594: tathā ca tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo 'narthakānītyata upasaṃhāravyājenāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2596: atha jñānaṃ kriyā mānasī kasmānna vidhigocaraḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2597: kasmācca tasyāḥ phalaṃ nirvartyādiṣvanyatamaṃ na mokṣaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2611: vastusvarūpanirapekṣaiva codyate- yathā devatāsaṃpradānakahavirgrahaṇe devatāvastusvarūpānapekṣā devatādhyānakriyā ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2613: yā sā kriyā hi nāmaiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2614: na hi 'yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ dhyāyedvaṣaṭkariṣyan' ityasmādvidheḥ prāgdevatādhyānaṃ prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2618: na hyasau svasāmagrībalalabdhajanmā manujecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā śakyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2622: tayoranvayavyatirekāvadhṛtasāmarthyayoḥ sākṣātkāre vā anādyavidyāpanaye vā vidhimantareṇa prāptatvena puruṣecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā aśakyatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:2639: sa eva ca heya upādeyo vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:2640: yaṃ puruṣaḥ kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2641: tatraiva ca samarthaḥ kartādhikṛto niyojyo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2643: iti prayuktā api liṅādayaḥ pravartanāyāmasamarthā upala iva kṣurataikṣṇyaṃ kuṇṭhamapramāṇībhavantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2656: anyataḥ prāptā eva hi śravaṇādayo vidhisarūpairvākyairanūdyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2659: tathāhi- tattadiṣṭāniṣṭaviṣayepsājihāsāpahṛtahṛdayatayā bahirmukho na pratyagātmani manaḥ samādhātumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2661: udghāṭyata iti pravṛttiviśeṣakaratā anuvādānāmastīti saprayojanatayā svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvamupapadyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2663: svato 'sya puruṣārthatve siddhe yadanuṣṭhānānaṅgatvaṃ tadbhūṣaṇaṃ na dūṣaṇamityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2676: yadi hi padānāṃ kāryābhidhāne tadarthasvārthābhidhāne vā niyamena vṛddhavyavahāre sāmarthyamabadhṛtaṃ bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:2680: atha tu bhūte 'pyarthe padānāṃ loke śakyaḥ saṃgatigrahaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2681: tata upaniṣadāntatparatvaṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayāvagamyamānamapahnutya na kāryaparatvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum,
GSP33vacbhamu:2684: yadi tatparaḥ prayogo na loke dṛśyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:2686: na tāvattatparaḥ prayogo na dṛśyate loke,
GSP33vacbhamu:2694: tathā hi- aviditāryajanabhāṣārtho draviḍo nagaragamanodyato rājamārgābhyarṇaṃ devadattamandiramadhyāsīnaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2696: paṭavāsopāyanārpaṇapuraḥsaraṃ 'diṣṭyā vardhase devadatta putraste jātaḥ' iti vārttāhāravyāhāraśravaṇasamanantaramupajātaromāñcakañcukaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2699: na cāyamapratipādayan harṣahetumarthaṃ harṣāya kalpata ityanena harṣaheturartha ukta iti pratipadyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2700: harṣahetvantarasya cāpratīteḥ putrajanmanaśca taddhetoravagamāttadeva vārttāhāreṇābhyadhāyīti niścinoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2703: evaṃ ca brahmasvarūpajñānasya paramapuruṣārthahetubhāvādanupadiśatāmapi puruṣapravṛttinivṛttī vedāntānāṃ puruṣahitānuśāsanācchāstratvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2713: upanīya advayaṃ brahma savāsanāmavidyāṃ hinastīti brahmavidyāmāha ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2722: anyaśeṣaṃ hi bhūtaṃ dravyaṃ cikīrṣitaṃ sadutpattyādyāpyaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:2730: upaniṣadāmanārabhyādhītānāṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayā puruṣapratipādanaparatvena puruṣasyaiva prādhānyenedaṃ prakaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2732: ataḥ svaprakaraṇasthaḥ so 'yaṃ tathāvidha upaniṣadbhyaḥ pratīyamāno na nāstīti śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2734: mānāntarogocaratvenāgṛhītasaṃgatitayā apadārthasya brahmaṇo vākyārthatvānupapatteḥ kathamupaniṣadarthatetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2737: tathāpi prakāśātmana eva satastattadupādhiparihāṇyā śakyaṃ vākyārthatvena nirūpaṇam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2739: na hi prakāśaḥ svasaṃvedano na bhāsate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2741: tena 'sa ena neti netyātmā' iti tattadavacchedaparihāṇyā bṛhattvādāpanācca svayaṃprakāśaḥ śakyo vākyāt brahmeti cātmeti ca nirūpayitumityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2746: na hi jātu rajjvabhāve rajjvāṃ bhujaṅga iti vā dhāreti vā vibhramo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2747: api cātmānaḥ prakāśasya bhāsā prapañcasya prabhā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2748: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2749: na cātmanaḥ prakāśasya pratyākhyāne prapañcaprathā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2753: sarvajanīnāhaṃpratyayaviṣayo hyātmā kartā bhoktā ca saṃsārī,
GSP33vacbhamu:2757: te eva ca teṣāmarthā ityaupaniṣadamapyātmapadaṃ tatraiva pravartitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:2762: tatsākṣitvena-ahaṃpratyayaviṣayo yaḥ kartā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātopahito jīvātmā-tat sākṣitvena,
GSP33vacbhamu:2765: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadyapi 'anena jīvenātmanā' iti jīvaparamātmanoḥ pāramārthikamaikyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2776: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati ātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2777: api cātaḥ sarveṣāmātmatvādeva na heyo nāpyupādeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2783: tasmāddheyopādeyaviṣayau vidhiniṣedhau na tadviparītamātmatattvaṃ viṣayīkuruta iti sarvasya prapañcajātasyātmaiva tattvamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2788: yaśca paramārthāsan asau prakṛtiḥ rajjutattvamiva sarvavibhramasya vikārasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:2792: na hi sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśata ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2794: puruṣa eva hi sarvasya prapañcavikārajātasya tattvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2799: atha mā bhūtsvarūpeṇa puruṣo heya upādeyo vā ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2804: api cātmanaḥ paramārthasato dharmo 'pi paramārthasanniti na tasyātmavadanyathātvaṃ kāraṇaiḥ śakyaṃ kartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2814: na hi somaśarmaṇi prakṛte tadguṇābhidhānaṃ parisaṃcaṣṭe viṣṇuśarmaṇo guṇavattām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2819: na hi te kriyārthā ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2825: yathāhuḥ śāstravidaḥ 'codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantam' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2829: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-na tāvatkāryārthā eva svārthe padānāṃ saṃgatigraho nānyārtha ityupapāditaṃ bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiṃ darśayadbhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2832: na hi pratyekaṃ svapradhānatayā guṇapradhānabhāvarahitānāmekavākyatā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2841: tathā cārthāntarasaṃsargaparatāmātreṇa vākyārthapratyayopapattau na kāryasaṃsargaparatvaniyamaḥ padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2858: tathā ca bhūter'the 'vadhṛtaśaktayaḥ śabdāḥ kvacitsvaniṣṭhabhūtaviṣayā dṛśyamānā mṛtvā śīrtvā vā na kathañcitkriyāniṣṭhatāṃ gamayitumucitāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2859: na hyupahitaṃ śataśo dṛṣṭamapyanupahitaṃ kvaciddṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2860: tathā ca vartamānāpadeśā astikriyopahitā akāryārthā apyaṭavīvarṇakādayo loke bahulamupalabhyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2865: na hi pṛcchatā puruṣasya vā tarūṇāṃ vāstitvanāstitve pratipitsite ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2866: kiṃ tu puruṣasya svāmibhedastarūṇāṃ ca prakārabhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2867: praṣṭurapekṣitaṃ cācakṣāṇaḥ svāmibhedameva prakārabhedameva ca prativyakti,
GSP33vacbhamu:2870: upapāditā ca bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiḥ prayojanavati padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2884: api ca ye 'pi kāryaparatvaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāmāsthiṣata,
GSP33vacbhamu:2886: 'na surā pātavyā' ityādīnāṃ na kāryaparatā śakyā āsthātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2887: kṛtyupahitamaryādaṃ hi kāryaṃ kṛtyā vyāptaṃ tannivṛttau nivartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2891: viṣayaścāsya sādhyasvabhāvatayā bhāvārtha eva pūrvāparībhūto 'nyotpādānukūlo bhavitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:2895: ata eva śāstrakṛdvacaḥ- 'bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdāstebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2897: bhāvasya svataḥ dravyaguṇaśabdānāṃ tu bhāvayogātkāryāvamarśa iti bhāvārthebhya evāpūrvāvagatiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2907: bhāvārtho hi kārakavyāpāramātratayāviśiṣṭaḥ kārakaviśeṣeṇa dravyādinā viśeṣyata iti dravyādistadanubandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2908: tathā ca bhāvārthe vidhīyamāne sa eva sānubandho vidhīyata iti dravyaguṇāvaviṣayāvapi tadanubandhatayā vihitau bhavataḥ /
