GSP33vacbhamu:2910: cānyataḥ prāptatayā tadanuvādena tadanubandhībhūtadravyādiparo bhavatīti sarvatra
GSP33vacbhamu:2912: etena 'yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavati' ityatra saṃbandhaviṣayo vidhiriti parāstam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2925: nanu vyāpāraviṣayaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ kathamavyāpārarūpaṃ saṃbandhaṃ gocarayet ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2926: na hi 'ghaṭaṃ kuru' ityatrāpi sākṣānnāmārthaṃ ghaṭaṃ puruṣaprayatno gocarayati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2930: uddeśyatayā tvasyāmasti ghaṭo na tu viṣayatayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2932: ata eva 'āgneyaḥ' ityatrāpi dravyadevatāsaṃbandhākṣipto yajireva kāryaviṣayo vidheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2935: ata eva 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsyāṃ yajate',
GSP33vacbhamu:2936: 'ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajate' ityanuvādo bhavati 'yadāgneyaḥ' ityādivihitasya yāgaṣaṭkasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:2937: ata eva ca vihitānūditasya tasyaiva 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta' ityādhikārasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2943: evaṃ ca prajāpativratanyāyena paryudāsavṛttyāhananāpānasaṃkalpalakṣaṇayā tadviṣayo vidhiḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2945: na ca sati saṃbhave lakṣaṇā nyāyyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2946: 'nekṣetodyantam' ityādau tu 'tasya vratam' ityadhikārātprasajyapratiṣedhāsaṃbhavena paryudāsavṛttyānīkṣaṇasaṃkalpalakṣaṇā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2949: tadabhāve ca tadvyāptasya kāryasyābhāva iti na kāryaparatvaniyamaḥ sarvatra vākye ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2960: na ca rāgataḥ pravṛttasya hananapānādāvakasmādaudāsīnyamupapadyate vinā vidhārakaprayatnam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2961: tasmātsa eva pravṛttyunmukhānāṃ manovāgdehānāṃ vidhārakaḥ prayatno niṣedhavidhigocaraḥ kriyeti nākriyāparamasti vākyaṃ kiñcidapīti āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2962: na ca hananakriyānivṛttyaudāsīnyavyatirekeṇa nañaḥ śakyamaprāptakriyārthatvaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2965: ayamarthaḥ- hananapānaparo hi vidhipratyayaḥ pratīyamānaste eva vidhatte ityutsargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2968: na cātra nañaḥ prasajyapratiṣedho vidheyaḥ. tasyāpyaudāsīnyarūpasya siddhatayā prāptatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2977: sādhye ca sādhyavadbhāsata iti sādhyaviṣayo nañarthaḥ sādhyavadbhāsata iti nañarthaḥ kārya iti bhramaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2987: ca tato nivṛttimupalabhya bālo vyutpitsuḥ prayojyavṛddhasya pravṛttinivṛttihetū icchādveṣāvanumimīte /
GSP33vacbhamu:2995: api tu bhūyo bhūyaḥ svagatamālocayata uktakāraṇapūrvāveva pratyavabhāsete /
GSP33vacbhamu:2998: sa cāvagamaḥ prāgabhūtaḥ śabdaśravaṇānantaramupajāyamānaḥ śabdaśravaṇahetuka iti
GSP33vacbhamu:2999: pravartakeṣu vākyeṣu 'yajeta' ityādiṣu śabda eva kartavyamiṣṭasādhanaṃ vyāpāramavagamayaṃstasyeṣṭasādhanatāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:3014: tayā khalvayaṃ cetana āpātato ramaṇīyatāṃ paśyannapyāyatimālocya pravṛttyabhāvaṃ nivṛttimavabudhya nivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3030: na ca kavacāpagame ca asati ca śastraprahāre,
GSP33vacbhamu:3068: yatpunaraśarīratvaṃ tadasya svabhāva iti na śakyaṃ nivartayitum,
GSP33vacbhamu:3072: na mithyājñānanimittaṃ saśarīratvam api tu dharmādharmanimittam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:3074: tannivṛttau ca prāyaṇameveti na jīvato 'śarīratvamiti śaṅkate-
GSP33vacbhamu:3080: vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhajanitau hi tau nāsati śarīrasaṃbandhe bhavataḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:3081: tābhyāṃ tu śarīrasaṃbandhaṃ rocayamāno vyaktaṃ parasparāśrayatvaṃ doṣamāvahati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:3090: na hi yato dharmādharmabhedādya ātmaśarīrasaṃbandhabhedastata eva śarīrasaṃbandhāt sa dharmādharmabhedaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:3108: prasiddho vastubhedo yasya puruṣasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3110: yathā mandāndhakāre sthāṇurayamityagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣe vastuni puruṣāt sāṃśayikau puruṣaśabdapratyayau sthāṇuviṣayau ;
GSP33vacbhamu:3114: śuklabhāsvarasya dravyasya puraḥsthitasya sati śuktikārajatasādhāraṇye yāvadatra rajataviniścayo bhavati tāvatkasmācchuktiviniścaya eva na bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:3146: na tāvanmanananididhyāsane pradhānakarmaṇī apūrvaviṣaye amṛtatvaphale ityuktamadhastāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3158: itarathā tu dharmajijñāsaiveti na śāstrāntaramiti na śāstrāntarārambhatvaṃ syādityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:3165: te ca sādhyasādhanetikartavyatābhedādhiṣṭhānā dharmotpādinaśca tadadhiṣṭhānā na brahmātmaikye sati prabhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:3219: etaduktaṃ bhavati- pāramārthikaprapañcavādibhirapi dehādiṣvātmābhimāno mithyeti vaktavyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:3237: ' brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya 'janmādyasya yataḥ' ityādinā 'tattu samanvayāt' ityantena sūtrasaṃdarbheṇa sarvaśaktau jagadutpattisthitivināśakāraṇe prāmāṇyaṃ vedāntānāmupapāditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3241: atra ca vipratipatteḥ pravādīnāṃ viśeṣānupalambhe sati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3254: yadyapi ca sāmyāvasthāyāṃ pradhāne samudācaradvṛttinī kriyājñāne na staḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3256: tathā ca pradhānameva sarvajñaṃ ca sarvaśakti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:3269: ' api cāhurvṛddhāḥ- yathāgryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadanti bhavedayamagryaḥ iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:3270: tathedapi 'tā āpa aikṣanta' tatteja aikṣata ityādyupacāraprāye kṣutam tadaikṣata ityaupacārikameva vijñeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3271: anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi iti ca pradhānasya jīvātmatvaṃ jīvārthakāritayāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:3272: yathā hi bhadraseno rājārthakārī rājñā bhadraseno mamātmetyupacaryate,
GSP33vacbhamu:3273: evaṃ tattvamasi ityādyāḥ śrutayo bhāktāḥ saṃpattyarthā vā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3274: svamapīto bhavati iti ca niruktaṃ jīvasya pradhāne svakīye 'pyayaṃ suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ brūte /
GSP33vacbhamu:3277: vṛttīnāmanyāsāṃ pramāṇādīnāmabhāvastasya pratyayakāraṇaṃ tamastadālambamā nidrā jīvasya vṛttirityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3278: tathā sarvajñaṃ prastutya śvetāśvataramantrro 'pi - sakārāṇāṃ karaṇādhipādhipa- iti prādhānābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3280: tasmādacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagadupādānamanuvadanti śrutaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3286: sattvasaṃpattyā cedasya sarvajñatātha tamaḥsaṃpattyāsarvajñataivāsya kasmānna bhavatītyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:3296: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadyapi rajastamasī api staḥ tathāpi puruṣārtaprayuktaguṇavaiṣamyātiśayātsattvasya
GSP33vacbhamu:3297: niratiśayotkarṣe sārvajñyaṃ kāryamutpadyata iti pradhānavasthāyāmapi tanmātraṃ vivakṣitvāvivakṣitvā
GSP33vacbhamu:3301: nahi kiñcidekaṃ kāryaṃ janayedapi tu bahūni /
GSP33vacbhamu:3303: pradhānaṃ tu triguṇamiti tata eva kāryamutpattimarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:3305: tavāpi ca yogyatāmātreṇaiva cidātmanaḥ rvajñatābhyupagamo na kāryayogādityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:3317: jagadbījaṃ tadeveṣṭaṃ cetane ca sa āñjasaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:3318: teṣu teṣu khalvāmnāyapradeśeṣu tadaikṣata ityevañjātīyakairvākyairīkṣituḥ kāraṇajjagajjanmākhyāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3329: pārthivatve tulya iva maṇerbimbodgrāhitā na loṣṭādīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:3334: akriyānimittasya ca kārakatvanivṛttau tadvyāptasya tadviśeṣasya kartṛtvasya nivṛtteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3336: tasya tvanavacchinnasya tattadviṣayopadhānamedāvacchedena kalpitabhedasyānityatvaṃ kīryatvaṃ copapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3337: tathā caivaṃlakṣaṇa īkṣaṇe sarvaviṣaye brahmaṇaḥ svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ kartṛtvamupapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3338: yadyapi ca kūṭasthanityasyāpariṇāmina audāsīnyamasya vāstavaṃ tathāpyanādyanirvacanīyavidyāvacchinnasya vyāpāravattvabhavabhāsata iti kartṛtvopapattiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3339: parairapi ca cicchekte- kūṭasthanityāyā vṛttīḥ prati kartṛtvamīdṛśamevābhyupeyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3342: tadvṛttayā svaṃ vā paraṃ vā veditumutsahante /
GSP33vacbhamu:3343: no khalvandhāḥ sahasramapi pānthāḥ panthānaṃ vidanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3345: sa eva tarhi mārgadarśī svatantraḥ kartā netā teṣām /
GSP33vacbhamu:3346: evaṃ buddhisattvasya svayamacetanasya citibimbasaṃkrāntyā cedāpannaṃ caitanyasya jñātṛtvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3354: sarvathā bhavanmateṣaḍapi nedaṃ svābhāvikaṃ kvacidapi jñātṛtvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3356: nityasyātmano jñānaṃ pariṇāma iti ca bhedābhedapakṣamapākurvadbhirapāstam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3357: kūṭasthasya nityasyātmano 'vyāpāravata eva bhinnaṃ jñānaṃ dharma iti copariṣṭādapākariṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3359: tasya kartā īśvaro jñātā sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:3360: tathā ca śrutiḥ- tapasā cīyate brahma tato 'nnamabhijāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3361: annātprāṇo manaḥ satyaṃ lokāḥ karmasu cāmṛtam //
GSP33vacbhamu:3368: vyācikīrṣāyāṃ copacaye sati tato nāmarūpamannamadanīyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ vyācikīrṣitamabhijāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3369: tasmādavyākṛtādvyācikīrṣitādannātprāṇo hiraṇyagarbho brahmaṇo jñānakriyāśaktyadhiṣṭhānaṃ jagatsūtrātmā sādhāraṇe jāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:3373: tebhyaśca satyākhyebhyo 'nukrameṇa lokāḥ bhūrādayaḥ teṣu manuṣṭādiprāṇino varṇāśramakrameṇa karmāṇi dharmādharmarūpāṇi jāyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:3379: yasya bhagavato jñānamayaṃ tapo dharmo nāyāsamayam,
GSP33vacbhamu:3381: kiñca nāmarūpamannaṃ ca vrīhiyavādi jāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3383: kṣetrajñānāṃ ca satyapi caitanye sargādau viṣayānīkṣaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3389: iha tu mukhyasyautsargikatvena niścaye sati saṃśayābhāvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3397: na ca pradhānaṃ paramāṇavo vā tadatiriktasarvajñeśvarādhiṣṭhitā jagadupādānamiti sāṃprataṃ kāryatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3398: kāraṇātkāryāṇāṃ bhedābhāvāt kāraṇajñānena samastakāryaparijñānasya mṛdādinidarśanenāgamena prasādhitvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3403: sadupādānatve hi siddhe jagatastadupādānaṃ cetanamacetanaṃ veti saṃśayya mīmāṃsyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:3409: bahu syām' iti cācetanaṃ kāraṇamātmana eva bahubhāvamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:3411: yadyapyākāśādyā bhūtasṛṣṭistathāpi tejo 'bannānāmeva trivṛtkaraṇasya vivakṣitatvāttatra tejasaḥ prāthamyāttejaḥ prathamamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3415: tadyathā- prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3417: tathā pṛthivyantarīkṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra ityaparaścatasraḥ kalā dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantavānnāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:3425: na cāvivakṣitārthasya dhātusvarūpasya cetanopādānasādhanatvasaṃbhava ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:3442: apica caitanyapradhānavṛttivacano jānātirna cācetane vṛttimātre dṛṣṭacaraprayoga ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:3444: kathaṃ tarhi yogināṃ sattvāśotkarṣahetukaṃ sarvajñatvamityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:3450: teṣāmapi hi prakṛṣṭasattvopādānaṃ puruṣaviśeṣasyaiva kleśakarmavipākāśayāparābhṛṣṭasya sarvajñatvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3461: kiṃ vāstavaṃ karmābhāvamabhipretya vaiṣamyamāha bhavān uta tadvivakṣābhāvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3466: atha ca prakāśasvabhāva pratyāsta svātantryaṃ savituriti pariharati- na /
GSP33vacbhamu:3474: yāsāṃ sati karmaṇyavivakṣite śrutīnāmupapattistāsāṃ sati karmaṇi vivakṣite sutarāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3476: yasya bhagavata īśvarasya prasādāt tasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasya nityaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatīti kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3495: na tu ātmani svabhāvasiddhaprakāśe sa ghaṭata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:3504: śaṅkottaratvena vā svātantryeṇa vā pradhānanirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram /
GSP33vacbhamu:3508: tacca na prathamaṃ sūkṣmatayā śakyaṃ śvetaketuṃ grāhayitumiti tatsaṃbaddhaṃ pradhānameva
GSP33vacbhamu:3509: sthūlatayātmatvena grāhyate śvetaketurarundhatīmivātīva sūkṣmāṃ darśayituṃ tatsaṃnihitāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:3515: api ca jagatkāraṇaṃ prakṛtya svapitītyasya niruktaṃ karvitī śrutiścetanameva jagatkāraṇaṃ brūte /
GSP33vacbhamu:3518: nahi mṛdātmā ghaṭa ātmīye 'pi pāthasi pralīyate 'pi tvātmabhūtāyāṃ mṛdyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:3527: api tu teṣu sarvatra jagatkāraṇacetanyāvagatiḥ samāneti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3529: yathā hi sarveṣāṃ cakṣū rūpameva grāhayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:3533: 'tadaikṣata ityatra īkṣaṇamātraṃ jagatkāraṇasya śrutaṃ na tu sarvaviṣayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3535: śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ tūpaniṣadi sarvajña īśvaro jagatkāraṇamiti sākṣāduktamiti viśeṣaḥ // 11 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3540: śastraṃ ca sarvajñe sarvaśaktau jagadutpattisthitipralayakāraṇaṃ brahmaṇyeva pramāṇaṃ na pradhānādāviti nyāyato vyutpāditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3541: na cāsti kaścidvedāntabhāgo yastadviparītamapi bodhayediti ca gatisāmānyāt ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3548: yadyapi tatvato nirastasamastopādhirūpaṃ brahma tathāpi na tena rūpeṇa śakyamupadeṣṭumityupahitena rūpeṇopadeṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3565: nanu yadyeka ātmā kūṭasthanityo niratiśayaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3568: yadyapi niratiśayakameva rūpamātmana eśvaryaṃ ca jñānaṃ cānandaśca,
GSP33vacbhamu:3569: tathāpyanādyātamaḥ samāvṛtāṃ teṣu teṣu prāṇabhṛdbhedeṣu kvacidasadiva,
GSP33vacbhamu:3576: tathottamaprakāśaḥ savitā dihmaṇḍalamokarūpeṇaiva prakāśenāpūrayannapi varṣāsu nikṛṣṭaprakāśa iva śaradi tu prakṛṣṭaprakāśa iva prathate,
GSP33vacbhamu:3585: ' ānandamaya iti hi vikāre prācurye ca mayaṭastulyaṃ mukhyārthatvamiti vikārārthānnamayādipadaprāyapāṭhādānandamayapadamapi vikārārthameveti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3586: na ca prāṇamayādiṣu vikārārthatvāyogātsvārthiko mayaṅiti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3591: priyādibhāgī śarīro jīvo na brahma yujyate //
GSP33vacbhamu:3597: nahi devadatto balavānityukte sarvānsiṃhaśārdūlādīnapi prati halavānapratīyate 'pi tu samānajātīyanarāntaranapekṣya /
GSP33vacbhamu:3602: na tu brahmarūpaṃ jñeyatveneti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3606: ānandaprācurya hi tadviparītaduḥkhalavasaṃbhave bhavati na tu tadatyantāsaṃbhave /
GSP33vacbhamu:3610: aśarīrasya punarapriyasaṃbandho manāgapi nāstīti prācuryārtho 'pi mayaṅ nopapadyayata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3614: tathāca tadhikāre paṭhitamabhyasyamānamānandapadaṃ tadbuddhimādhatta iti tasyaivānandamayasyābhyāsa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3615: jyotiṣṭomādhikāre 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta' iti jyotiḥpadamiva jyotiṣṭomābhyāsaḥ kālaviśeṣavidhiparaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3627: mantre hi punaḥ 'anyo 'ntara ātmā' iti parabrahmaṇyāntaratvaśravaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3628: tasyaiva ca 'anyo 'ntara ātmānandamayaḥ' iti brāhmaṇe pratyabhijñānāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3631: māntravarṇikameva paraṃ brahma brāhmaṇe 'pyānandamaya iti gīyata iti //15 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3640: rasaḥ sāro hyayamānandamaya ātmā 'rasaṃ hyevāyaṃ labdhvā'nandī bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3644: tasmādānandamayasya jīvātmano bhede parabrahmatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3648: kathaṃ tarhi paramātmano vastuto 'bhinnena jīvātmanā paramātmā labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3656: na jīvasyāvidyayāpi svato bhedo darśita iti na labdhṛlabdhavyabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3659: yathā parameśvarādbhinno jīvātmā draṣṭā na bhavatyevaṃ jīvātmano 'pi draṣṭurna bhinnaḥ parameśvara iti jīvasyānirvācyatve parameśvaro 'pyanirvācyaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3662: rajataṃ hi rāmāropitaṃ na śuktito bhidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3663: na hi tadbhedenābhedena vā śakyaṃ nirvaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:3672: eṣa tāvadutsargo yat- brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭheti brahmaśabdātpratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3674: ' tatra kiṃ pucchapadasamabhivyāhārāt annamayādiṣu cāsyāvayavaparatvena prayogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3675: ihāpyavayavaparatvātpucchapadasya tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ brahmapadamapi svārthatyāgena kathañcidavayavaparaṃ vyākhyāyātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:3679: ānandapadābhyāsena ca jyotiḥ padeneva jyotiṣṭoma anandamayo lakṣyatāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3686: pucchapadaṃ hi vāladhau mukhyaṃ sadānandamayāvayave gauṇameveti mukhyaśabdārthalaṅghanamavayavaparatāyāmaṅikaraṇaparatāyāṃ ca tulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3702: tathā ca māntravarṇikasya brahmaṇā eva brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti svapradhānasyābhidhānāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3704: so 'kāmayeta' ityādyā api śrutayo brahmaviṣayā ityarthasaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3708: ānandamayaśabdena tadvākyasya brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā ityetadgataṃ brahmapadamupalakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3709: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ānandamaya ityādivākye yat brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti brahmapadaṃ tatsvapradhānameveti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3710: yattu brahmādhikaraṇameveti vaktavye brahma puccham ityāha śrutiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3715: yat satyaṃ jñānam' ityādinā mantravarṇena brahmoktaṃ tadevopāyabhūtena brāhmaṇena svapradhānyena gīyate- brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3719: atra 'itaścānandamayaḥ iti bhāṣyasya sthāne itaśca brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti paṭhitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3721: atrāpi itaścānandamayaḥ ityasya ca ānandamayādhikāre ityasya ca bhāṣyasya sthāne brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti brahmapucchādhikāre iti ca paṭhitavayam
GSP33vacbhamu:3724: ityanayorapi sūtrayorbhāṣye ānandamayasthāne brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti pāṭho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3726: vikārasyānandamayasya brahma pucchamavayavaścetkathaṃ sarvasyāsya vikārajātasya sānandamayasya brahma pucchaṃ kāraṇamucyeta idaṃ sarvamasṛjata
GSP33vacbhamu:3728: nahyānandamayavikārāvayavo brahma vikāraḥ san sarvasya kāraṇamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3729: tasmādānandamayavikārāvayavo brahmeti tadavayavayogyānandamayo vikāra iha nopāsyatvena vivakṣitaḥsa kintu svapradhānamiha brahma pucchaṃ jñeyatveneti siddham // 1.9 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3733: brahmaiva tu pradhānaṃ brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti jñeyatvenopakṣiptamiti nirṇītam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3736: tatra maryādādhārarūpāṇi saṃsāriṇi pare na tu /
GSP33vacbhamu:3741: ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ca ityaiśvaryādāśruteśca saṃsāryeva kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmako rūpādisaṃpanna ihopāsyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3747: rūpādimattvānyānupapattyā ca kāryakāraṇātmake jīve upāsyatvena vivakṣite yattāvadṛgādyātmakatayāsya
GSP33vacbhamu:3748: sarvātmakatvaṃ śrūyate tatkathañcidādityapuruṣasyaiva stuturiti ādityapuruṣa evopāsyo
GSP33vacbhamu:3750: anādhāratve ca nityatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ ca hetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3752: nityamapyasarvagataṃ ca yattasmādadharabhāvenāsthitaṃ tadeva tasyottarasyādhāra iti nānādhāraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3758: na cādityasya devatāyāḥ karmānadhikāre 'pi sarvapāpmavirahaḥ prāgbhavīyadharmarūpapāpmasaṃbhave sati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3759: na caiteṣāṃ prāgbhavīyo dharma evāsti na pāpmeti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3764: tatra tatra sarvapāpmavirahasya bhūyobhūyo brahmaṇyeva śravaṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3782: sa evāntarāditya ityantaḥ śrutisāmyena pratyabhijñāyamāno bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3796: tatra 'ākāśa iti hovāca' iti kiṃ mukhyakāśapādānurodhena 'asya lokasya kā gitaḥ' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:3797: 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni' iti 'jyāyā' itica 'parāyaṇam' iti ca kathañcidvyākhyāyatāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3801: ' 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ' iti praśnottare 'ākāśa iti hovāca' ityākāśasya gatitvena pratipādyatayā prādhānyāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3802: 'sarvāṇi ha vā' ityādīnāṃ tu tadviśeṣaṇatayā guṇatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3805: tena tadanuraktāyāṃ buddhau yadyadeva tadekavākyagatamupanipatati tattajjaghanyatayā upasaṃjātavirodhi tadānuguṇyenaiva vyavasthānamarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3806: naca kkacidākāśaśabdo bhaktyā brahmaṇi prayukta iti sarvatra tena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3807: nahi gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgapadamanupapattyā tīraparamiti yādāṃsi gaṅgāyāmityatrāpyanena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3814: tadānuguṇyena ca 'sarvāṇi ha vā' ityādīni bhāṣyakṛtā svayameva nītāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:3823: ' yadyapyākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ tathāpi yatpṛṣṭaṃ tadeva prativaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3825: tadiha, 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ' iti praśno dṛśyamānanāmarūpaprapañcamātragativiṣaya iti tadanurodhādya eva sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ sa evākāśaśabdena prativaktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3831: naca praśnena pūrvapakṣarūpeṇānavasthitārthenottaraṃ vyavasthitārthaṃ na śakyaṃ niyantumiti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3835: tathāhi-'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyakāśādeva samutpadyante' iti sarvaśabdaḥ kathañcidalpaviṣayo vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3837: na khalvapāmākāśa eva kāraṇamapi tu tejo 'pi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3838: evamannasyāpi nākāśameva kāraṇamapi tu pāvakapāthasī api /
GSP33vacbhamu:3852: tathāca tadarthaṃ sat ākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ bhavati, nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3859: tatra tatra brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya tatparyāyasya ca prayogaprācuryādatyantābhyāsenāsyāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:3864: yatra tu na śakyaṃ tatrottarānuguṇyenaiva prathamaṃ nīyata ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:3867: udgīthe-'yā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā' ityukramya śrūyate-'katamā sā devateti prāṇa iti hovāca' uṣastiśkrāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3869: prastāva iti sāmno bhaktiviśeṣastamanvāyattā anugatā prāṇo devatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3870: atra prāṇaśabdasya brahmaṇi vāyuvikāre ca darśanātsaṃśayaḥ-kimayaṃ brahmavacana uta vāyuvikāravacana iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3871: tatra ata eva brahmaliṅgādeva prāṇo 'pi brahmaiva na vāyuvikāra iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3876: ākāśasya vā vāṭvādibhūtakāraṇatvaṃ prati nāgamādṛte mānāntaraṃ prabhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3877: tatra paurvāparyaparyālocanayā yatrārthe samañjasa āgamaḥ sa evārthastasya gṛhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:3879: iha tu saṃveśanodgamane bhūtānāṃ prāṇaṃ pratyucyamāne kiṃ brahma pratyucyate āho
GSP33vacbhamu:3880: vāyuvikāraṃ pratīti viśaye 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti' ityādikāyāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3884: api cātrodgīthapratihārayoḥ sāmabhaktyorbrahmaṇo 'nye ādityaścānnaṃ ca devate abhihite kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpe,
GSP33vacbhamu:3891: ' no khalu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvamapauruṣeyaṃ vacaḥ svaviṣayajñānotpāde vā tadvyavahāre vā mānāntaramapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:3895: tasmādasaṃvādino vā cakṣuṣa iva rūpe tvagindriyasaṃvādino vā tasyaiva dravye nādārḍhyaṃ vā dārḍhyaṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3898: pratītau vā tatrāpi prāṇo brahmaiva bhavenna vāyuvikāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3899: 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityatra vākye yathā prāṇaśabdo brahmavacanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3900: na cāsminvāyuvikāre sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamane mānāntareṇa dṛśyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:3910: tathā copāsakasya prāṇaprāptiḥ karmasamṛddhirvā phalaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3915: idamāmananti-'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate niśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3916: yajjyotirato divo dyulokātparaṃ dīpyate prakāśate viśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu viśveṣāmupari /
GSP33vacbhamu:3917: asaṃkucadvṛttirayaṃ viśvaśabdo 'navayavatvena saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ brūta iti darśayitumāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:3922: śrotragrāhyeṇa ca pihitakarṇena puṃsā ghoṣeṇa liṅgenānumīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3927: atra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaḥ teja uta brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3934: kokṣeyajyotiḥsārūpyaṃ ca cakṣuṣyo rūpavān śruto viśruto bhavatītyalpaphalatvaṃ ca svavākye śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3935: na jātu jvalanāparanāmā dīptirvinā tejo brahmaṇi saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3939: audarye tu tejasyadhyasya bāhyaṃ teja upāsanametat phalānurūpaṃ yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3944: tasya sauryādeḥ sāvayavatvena tadekadeśamaryādāsaṃbhavāt tasya copāsyatvena vidhānāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3947: naca 'pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti brahmapratipādakaṃ vākyāntaraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3948: 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥśabdaṃ brahmaṇi vyavasthāpayatīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3949: nahi saṃnidhānamātradvākyāntareṇa vākyāntaragatā śrutiḥ śakyā mukhyārthāntryāvayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:3950: naca vākyāntare 'dhikaraṇatvena dyauḥ śrutā diva iti maryādāśrutau śakyā pratyabhijñātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:3951: apica vākyāntarasyāpi brahmārthatvaṃ prasādhyameva nādyāpi sidhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:3952: tatkathaṃ tena niyantuṃ brahmaparatayā 'yadataḥ paraḥ' iti vākyaṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3954: tejaḥkathanaprastāve tamaḥkathanaṃ pratipakṣopanyāsena pratipakṣāntare dṛḍhā pratītirbhavatītyetadartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:3969: 'ekaikāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ karavāṇi' iti tejaḥprabhṛtyupāsanāmātraviṣayā śrutirna saṃkocayituṃ yuktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3974: tathāpi yathā kārye jyotiṣyatiśayenopapadyate na tathātretyata uktam-
GSP33vacbhamu:3981: brahmaṇyeva pradhānaṃ hi brahmacchando na tatra tu //
GSP33vacbhamu:3985: tatra vacanāni tvapūrvatvāditi sarvanāmnaḥ prasiddhārthatvaṃ balādapanīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3987: tadiha 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥ' iti yacchabdasāmarthyāt dyumaryādenāpi jyotiṣā prasiddhena bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3989: pūrvavākye ca dyusaṃbandhitayā tripādbrahma prasiddhamiti prasiddhyapekṣāyāṃ tadeva saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3990: naca pradhānasya prātipadikārthasya tattvena pratyabhijñāne tadviśeṣaṇasya vibhaktyarthasyānyatāmātreṇānyatā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3991: evaṃ ca tadvākyasthāni tejoliṅgānyasamañjasānīti brahmaṇyeva gamayitavyāni,
GSP33vacbhamu:3994: athavā prakāśamātravacano jyotiḥśabdaḥ prakāśasya brahmeti brahmaṇi mukya iti jyotirbahmeti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:4008: chandobhidhānānneti cet na tathā cetorpaṇanigadāttathāhi darśanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4012: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca' iti gāyatrīṃ prakṛtyedaṃ śrūyate-'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4016: evaṃ 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' ityakṣarasaṃniveśamātrasya gāyatryā na sarvatvamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4019: tasmādgīyatrīdvārā brahmaṇa evopāsanā na gāyatryā iti pūrveṇaiva gatārthatvādanārambhaṇīyametat /
GSP33vacbhamu:4029: 'vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca' ityādiśritibhyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4030: tathāca 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' ityupakramya gāyatryā eva hṛdayādibhirvyākhyāya ca 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī' ityupasaṃhāro gāyatryāmeva samañjaso bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4039: gāyatryākhyacchandodvāreṇa gāyatrīrūpavikārānugate brahmaṇi cetorpaṇaṃ cittasamādhānamanena brahmaṇavākyena nigadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4044: kintu yadetadbrahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvakāraṇaṃ satsvarūpeṇāśakyopadeśamiti tadvikāragāyatrīdvāreṇopalakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4045: gāyatryāḥ sarvacchandovyāptyā ca savanatrayavyāptyā ca dvijātidvitīyajanmajananīyatayā ca śrutervikāreṣu madhye prādhānyena dvāratvopapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4047: nahi kuṇḍalenopalakṣitaṃ kaṇṭharūpaṃ kuṇḍalaviyoge 'pi paścātpratīyamānamapratīyamānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4049: tadevaṃ gāyatrīśabdasya mukhyārthatve gāyatryā brahmopalakṣyata ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4050: saṃprati ti gāyatriśabdaḥ saṃkhyāsāmānyādgauṇyā vṛttyā brahmaṇyeva vartata iti darśayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:4059: tathā-'ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yamantaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:4070: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākprāṇā iti ṣaṭ prakārā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:4073: asyārthaḥ-hṛdayasyāsya khalu pañca suṣayaḥ pañca chidrāṇi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4074: tāni ca devaiḥ prāṇādibhī rakṣyamāṇāni svargaprāptidvārāṇīti devasuṣayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4075: tathāhi-hṛdayasya yatprāṅmukhaṃ chidraṃ tatstho yo vāyuḥ sa prāṇaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4079: 'ādityo ha vai bāhyaḥ prāṇaḥ' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4080: atha yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣo vyānaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4083: atha yo 'sya pratyaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatatstho vāyuviśeṣo 'pānaḥ sa ca vāksaṃbandhādvāk,
GSP33vacbhamu:4085: atha yo 'syodaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa udānaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4089: tatsaṃbaddhāḥ pañca hārdasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣā na gāyatryāmakṣarasaṃniveśamātre saṃbhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4093: yo hi śyeno vṛkṣāgre vastuto 'sti sa ca tataḥ paro 'pyastyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:4096: yadā tu maryādaiva mukhyatayā prādhānyena vivakṣitā tadā lakṣaṇayādhāratvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4107: na cāyamarthaḥ 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' ityatra vicāritaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4109: hitatamapuruṣārthasiddhiśca nikhilabhrūṇahatyādipāpāparāmarśaśca prajñātmatvaṃ cānandādiśca na mukhye prāṇe saṃbhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4110: tathā 'eṣa sādhu karma kārayati' 'eṣa lokādhipatiḥ' ityādyapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4112: vaktṛtvaṃ ca vākkaraṇavyāpāravattvaṃ yadyapi paramātmani svarūpeṇa na saṃbhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:4116: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi' iti vāgvadanasya brahma kāraṇamityāha-śarīradhāraṇamapi yadyapi mukhyaprāṇasyaiva tathāpi prāṇavyāpārasya paramātmāyattatvātparamātmana eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:4132: indrasya devatāyā ātmani pratibuddhasya caramadehasya vāmadevasyeva prarabdhavipākakarmāśayamātraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4133: bhogena kṣapayato brahmaṇa eva sarvametatkalpata iti vigrahavadindrijīvaprāṇavāyuparityāgena
GSP33vacbhamu:4135: atrocyate-'yo vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vā prajñā sa prāṇaiḥ saha hyetavasmin śarīre
GSP33vacbhamu:4136: vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ' iti yasyaiva prāṇasya prajñātmana upāsyatvamuktaṃ tasyaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:4142: saha pravṛttinivṛttyā bhaktyaikatvamanayorupacaritaṃ 'yo vai prāṇaḥ' ityādina /
GSP33vacbhamu:4152: tameva tvekaṃ vākyārthaṃ padārthāvagamamantareṇa na śaknuvanti kartumityantarā tadarthameva tamapyavagamayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4155: tena yathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre caikavākyatvāya 'prajāpaturupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo na pṛthagvidhayaḥ kintvarthavādā iti nirṇītaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4156: tathehāmāmevi vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā' ityuktvānte 'sa prāṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:4162: ata evopalakṣyasya pratyagātmasvarūpasyābhedamupalakṣaṇaṃ bhedenopalakṣayati-'prāṇa eva prajñātmā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4181: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhasya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4182: tadevaṃ svamatena vyākhyāya prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ matena vyācaṣṭe-
GSP33vacbhamu:4184: pūrvaṃ prāṇasyaikamupāsanamaparaṃ jīvasyāparaṃ brahmaṇa ityupāsanātraividhyena vākyabhedaprasaṅgo dūṣaṇamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4185: iha tu brahmaṇa ekasyaivopāsātrayaviśiṣṭasya vidhānānna vākyabeda ityabhimānaḥ prācāṃ vṛttikṛtām /
GSP33vacbhamu:4189: iha tu siddharūpaṃ brahma na vidhiviṣayo bhavitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:4192: vākyāntarebhyaśca brahmavagateḥ prāptatvāttadanūdyāprāptopāsanā bhāvārthaḥ vidheyastasya ca bedādvidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabedo 'tisphuṭa iti bāṣyakṛtā nodghāṭitaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4194: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4197: atha dvitīyaṃ pādamāripsuḥ pūrvoktamarthaṃ smārayati vakṣyamāṇopayogitayā-
GSP33vacbhamu:4200: na caite sākṣātpūrvamupapāditā iti kathaṃ hetubhāvena na śakyā upadeṣṭumityata uktam-
GSP33vacbhamu:4202: yadyapyete na pūrvaṃ kaṇṭhata uktāstathāpi brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvopapadānenādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenopakṣiptā ityupapannasteṣāmuttaratra hetubhāvenopanyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4206: tatra kaiva kathā manomayādīnāmarthāntaraṃ prasiddhānāṃ padānāṃ brahmagocaratvanirṇayaṃ pratītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4215: tasmiṃścāniti sthitikāle ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ jagat tasmātsarvaṃ khalvidaṃ jagadbrahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:4216: ataḥ kaḥ kasminrajyate kaśca kaṃ dveṣṭīti rāgadveṣarahitaḥ śāntaḥ sannupāsīta /
GSP33vacbhamu:4217: atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturasmiṃlloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīta manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīra ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4218: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimiha manomayatvādibhirdharmaiḥ śārīra ātmopāsyatvenopadiśyate āhosvidbrahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4222: 'kratum' ityādivākyena vihitāṃ kratubhāvanāmanūdya 'sarvam' ityādivākyaṃ śamaguṇe vidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4223: tathā ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyaṃ prathamapaṭhitamapyarthālocanayā parameva,
GSP33vacbhamu:4225: evaṃ ca saṃkalpavidhiḥ prathamo nirviṣayaḥ sannaparyavasyanviṣayāpekṣaḥ svayamanirvṛtto na vidhyantareṇopajīvituṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4228: manomayatvādi ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmano jīvātmana eva nirūḍhamiti jīvātmanopāsyenoparaktopāsanā na paścāt brahmaṇā saṃbaddhumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:4230: naca 'sarvaṃ khalvidam' iti vākyaṃ brahmaparamapi tu śamahetuvannigadārthavādaḥ śāntatāvidhiparaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4232: na cānyaparādapi brahmāpekṣitatayā svīkriyata iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4239: evaṃ karmakartṛvyapadeśaḥ saptamīpraṇamāntatā cābhede 'pi jīvātmani kathañcidbhedopacāreṇa rāhoḥ śira itivaddraṣṭavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4250: ' bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prāṇaśarīra ca sarvanāmārthaṃ saṃprāpya tadabhidhānaṃ paryavasyet /
GSP33vacbhamu:4252: tadeva tu manovikāro vā manaḥpracuraṃ vā kimarthamityadyāpi na vijñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4253: tadyatraiṣa śabdaḥ samavetārtho bhavati sa samāsārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4254: na caiṣa jīva eva samavetātho na brahmaṇīti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4257: vikārāṇāṃ ca svakāraṇādabhedātteṣāṃ ca manomatayā brahmaṇastatkāraṇasya manomayatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4270: vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ-'samāropyasya rūpeṇa viṣayo rūpavānbhavetṣa viṣayasya tu rūpeṇa samāropyaṃ na rūpavat //
GSP33vacbhamu:4271: ' samāropitasya hi rūpeṇa bhujaṅgasya bhīṣaṇatvādinā rajjū rūpavatī,
GSP33vacbhamu:4274: bhujaṅgadaśāyāṃ tu na nāsti vāstavī rajjuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4278: tasmādbrahmaliṅgadarśanājjīve ca tadasaṃbhavādbrahmaivopāsyaṃ na jīva iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:4279: etadupalakṣaṇaṇāya ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyamupanyastamiti //1 // 1.2.1.2.
GSP33vacbhamu:4296: śārīraguṇā iva manomayatvādayo brahmaṇītyata āha sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33vacbhamu:4303: na tāvadbhedapratiṣedhādbhedavpadeśācca bhedābhedāvekatra tāttvikau bhavitumarhato virodhādityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4317: yo hi paratantraḥ so 'nyena bandhanāgāre praveśyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:4322: na caitāvatā īśvarasyānīśatā na hyupakaraṇādyapekṣitā kartuḥ svātantryaṃ vihanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4329: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate-yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4330: mṛtyuryasyopasetacanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra sa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4332: attṛtvaṃ ca bhoktṛtā vā saharntṛtā vā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4336: tadyadi bhoktṛtvamattṛtvaṃ tato muktasaṃśayaṃ jīvātmaiva pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4337: brahmakṣatrādi cāsya kāryakāraṇasaṃghāto bhogāyatanatayā vā sākṣādvā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4340: tatastrayāṇāmagnijīvaparamātmanāṃ praśnopanyāsopalabdheḥ saṃhartṛtvasyāviśeṣādbhavati saṃśayaḥ-kimattā agnirāho jīva utāho paramātmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4341: tatraudanasya bhogyatvena loke prasiddherbhoktṛtvameva prathamaṃ buddhau viparivartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:4344: 'na jāyate mriyate' iti ca tasyaiva stutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4354: tatra yadi jīvasya bhogāyatanatayā tatsādhanatayā ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātaḥ sthitaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4359: naca bhogāyatanasya bhogasādhanasya vā bhogyatvaṃ mukhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4362: kasyacitkrūrasattvasya vyāghrādeḥ kaścidbhavet na tu sarvathā sarvajīvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:4369: 'brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca' iti ca śrutī saṃkocamarhataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4377: tathāca 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit' iti prakṛtasya na hānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4378: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ' iti ca durjñānatopapatsyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4388: autsargikasya mukhyatābalātpūrvasiddhāntapakṣāsaṃbhavena pakṣāntaraṃ kalpayiṣyata iti manvānaḥ saṃśayamākṣipati-
GSP33vacbhamu:4399: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi kartā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4400: ata eva cāhuḥ-'yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeva' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4411: apica 'sukṛtasya loke' iti sukṛtalokavyavasthānena karmagocarānatikrama uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4413: jīvo hi bhoktṛtayā buddhiśca bhogasādhanatayā dharmasya gocare sthitau,
GSP33vacbhamu:4417: tatrāpi prete vicikitsāpanuttaye buddherbhedena paralokī jīvo darśanīya iti buddhirucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4419: brahmaṇaiva sarūpeṇa na tu buddhyā virūpayā //1 // 1.2.3.12.
GSP33vacbhamu:4424: tadiha cetano jīvaḥ sarūpeṇa cetanāntareṇaiva brahmaṇā sadvitīyaḥ pratīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:4426: tadevam 'ṛtaṃ pibantau' ityatra prathamamavagate brahmaṇi tadanurodhena caramaṃ guhāśrayatvaṃ śālagrāme hariritavadvyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4427: bahulaṃ hi guhāśrayatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutaya āhuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4431: evañca prathamāvagatabrahmānurodhena sukṛtalokavartitvamapi tasya lakṣaṇayā chatrinyāyena gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4432: chāyātapatvamapi jīvasyāvidyāśrayatayā brahmaṇaśca śuddhaprakaśasvabhāvasya tadanāśrayatayā mantavyam //11 // 1.2.3.14.
GSP33vacbhamu:4433: imameva nyāyaṃ 'dvā suparṇā' ityatrāpyudāharaṇe kṛtvācintayā yojayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:4435: atrāpi kiṃ buddhijīvau uta jīvaparamātmānāviti saṃśaṭya karaṇarūpāyā api buddheredhāṃsi pacantītivatkartṛtvopacārābuddhijīvāviha pūrvapakṣayitvā siddhāntayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4437: taddarśanāditi ca 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagnaḥ' ityatra mantre /
GSP33vacbhamu:4438: na khalu mukhye kartṛtve saṃbhavati karaṇe kartṛtvopacāro yukta iti kṛtvācintāmudghāṭayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:4455: tasya tu brahmarūpatāyāṃ paryavasyanna pūrvapakṣamapi svīkarotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4458: sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi raja ādhvaṃsata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4472: apitu buddhisattvaṃ mukhādirupapariṇataṃ citicchāyāpattyopapannacaitanyamiva bhuṅkte natu tattvato jīvaḥ paramātmā bhuṅkte /
GSP33vacbhamu:4481: parokṣaṃ brahma na tathā pratibimbe tu yujyate //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4484: 'ṛtaṃ pibantau ityatra hi jīvaparamātmānau prathamamanagatāviti tadanurodhena guhāpraveśādayaḥ paścādavagatā vyākhyātāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4485: tadvidihāpi 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' iti pratyakṣābhidhānātprathamamavagate chāyāpuruṣe tadanurodhenāmṛtatvābhayatvādayaḥ stutyā kathañcidvyākhyeyāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:4492: kaṃ ca khaṃ cetyādi tu vākyamagnīnāṃ nācāryavākyaṃ niyantumarhi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4493: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatyantarābhiprāyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4503: ' saṃnihitāśca puruṣātmādiśabdāste ca na yāvatsvārthamabhidadhati tāvatsarvanāmabhyāṃ nārthatuṣo 'bhidhīyata iti kutastadarthasyāparokṣatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4504: puruṣātmaśabdau ca sarvanāmanirapekṣau svarasato jīve vā paramātmani vā vartete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4505: naca tayoṣcakṣuṣi pratyakṣadarśanamiti nirapekṣapuruṣapadapratyāyitārthānurodhena ya eṣa iti dṛśṭata iti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4507: viduṣaḥ śāstrata upalabdireva dṛḍhatayā pratyakṣavaduparyate praśaṃsārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4508: api ca tadeva caramaṃ prathamānuguṇatayā nīyate yannetuṃ śakyam, alpaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:4511: tathā sati kiṃ nāma nāmṛtaṃ syāditi vyarthamamṛtapadam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4517: nanu sarvagatasyeśvarasya kasmādviśiṣeṇa cakṣureva sthānamupadiśyata iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4519: śrutiḥ-'tadyadyapyasminsārpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4530: sa eva puṇyaphalāni vāmāni nayati lokamiti vāmanīḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4533: taduktaṃ śrutyā-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti //13 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4540: tatkathamatyalpaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ paramātmanaḥ paramamahata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4543: sthānānyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakarāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvagatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4545: viśeṣatastu brahmaṇastāni tānyupāsanāsthānānīti tairasya yukto vyapadeśaḥ //14 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4549: evaṃ khalūpākhyāyate-upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacaryamuvāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:4555: śraddadhānāyāsmai dṛḍhabhaktaye sametya brahmavidyāsūcire-'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4559: kintu kaṃ ca khaṃ ca brahmetyetanna vijānāmi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4560: nahi viṣayendriyasaṃparkajaṃ sukhamanityaṃ lokasiddhaṃ khaṃ ca bhūtākāśamacetanaṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4561: athainamagnayaḥ pratyūcuḥ-'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4562: evaṃ saṃbhūyoktvā pratyekaṃ ca svaviṣayāṃ vidyāmūcuḥ-'pṛthivyagnirannamādityaḥ' ityādanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4564: eṣā somya te 'smidvidyā pratyekamuktā svaviṣayā vidyā,
GSP33vacbhamu:4565: ātmavidyā cāsmābhiḥ saṃbhūya pūrvamuktā prāṇo brahma kaṃ khaṃ brahmeti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4569: evaṃ vyavasthite 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam' ityetadvyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ-
GSP33vacbhamu:4576: laukikasya mukhasya sādhanapāracantryaṃ kṣayiṣṇutā cāmayastena saha vartata iti sāmayaṃ sukham /
GSP33vacbhamu:4580: sukhaśabdasamānādhikaraṇo hi khaṃśabdo bhūtākāśamarthaṃ parityajya brahmaṇi guṇogena vartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4581: tādṛśā ca khena sukhaṃ viśiṣyamāṇaṃ sāmayādvyāvṛttaṃ nirāmayaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4586: evaṃ khaṃpadasyāpi brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoḥ kaṅkhaṃpadayoste brahmaśirasī,
GSP33vacbhamu:4591: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi' ityācāryavākye 'pa tadevānuvartanīyamiti tu kuta ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:4592: ācāryastu te gatiṃ vakteti ca gatimātrābhidhānamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4593: yadyapyete bhinnavaktṛṇī vākye tathāpi pūrveṇa vaktnā ekavākyatāṃ gamite,
GSP33vacbhamu:4602: brahmavida iva te somya mukhaṃ prasannaṃ bhāti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4604: upakosalastu hrīṇo bhītaśca ko nu māmanuśiṣyāt bhagavan proṣite tvayītyāpātato 'pajñāya nirbadhyamāno yathāvadagnīnāmanuśāsanamavocat /
GSP33vacbhamu:4605: tadupakṣutya cācāryaḥ suciraṃ kliṣṭa upakosale samupajātadaryārdrahṛdayaḥ pratyuvāca,
GSP33vacbhamu:4606: somya kila tubhyamagnayo na brahma sākalyenāvocan,
GSP33vacbhamu:4608: tadanubhavamāhātmyāt 'yathā puṣpakarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvida pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:4612: yaduktamagnibhiḥ prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti tatparipūraṇāya 'eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4613: etaduktaṃ bhavati-ācāryeṇa ye sukhaṃ brahmākṣisthānaṃ saṃyadvāmaṃ vāmanībhāmanītyevaṅguṇakaṃ prāṇasahitamupāsate te sarve 'pahatapāpmāno 'nyatkarma kurvantu mā vākārṣuḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4618: yeṣu māseṣūttarāṃ diśameti savitā te ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇaṃ taddevatāṃ pratipadyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:4625: sa tādṛśaḥ puruṣa etānsatyalokasthaṃ kāryaṃ brahma gamayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:4626: sa eṣa devapatho devairarcirādibhirnetṛbhirupalakṣita iti devapathaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4627: sa eva ca brahmaṇā gantavyenopalakṣita iti brahmapathaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4628: etena pathā pratipadyamānāḥ satyalokasthaṃ brahma imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ kiṃbhūtamāvartaṃ janmajarāmaraṇapaunaḥ punyamāvṛttistatkartāvarto mānavo lokastaṃ nāvartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:4629: tathāca smṛtiḥ-'brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare /
GSP33vacbhamu:4638: vijñānātmano hi na pradeśe upāsanānyatra dṛṣṭacarī,
GSP33vacbhamu:4646: pravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ cetanasya śarīriṇaḥ svaśarīrendriyādau vā śarīreṇa vā vāsyādau dṛṣṭaṃ nāśarīrasya brahmaṇo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4650: pradhānasya vā pṛthivyādyabhimānavatyā devatāyā vāṇimādyaiśvaryayogino yogino vā jīvātmano vāntaryāmitā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4653: anātmatvācca 'eṣa ta ātmā' iti śruteranupapatterna pradhānasyāntaryāmitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4658: tathāpi tasya pratiniyataniyamanāt 'yaḥ sarvaṃllokānantaro yamayati yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyantaro yamayati' iti śrutivirodhādanupapatteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4659: yogī tu yadyapi lokabhūtaviśatayā sarvāṃllokānsarvāṇi ca bhūtāni niyantumarhati tatra tatrānekavidhadehendriyādinirmāṇena 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati' ityādiśrutibhyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4660: tathāpi 'jagadvyāpāravarjaṃ prakaraṇāt' iti vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vikāraviṣaye vidyāsiddhānāṃ vyāpārabhāvātso 'pi nāntaryāmī /
GSP33vacbhamu:4661: tasmātpāriśeṣyājjīva eva cetano dehendriyādimān dṛṣṭṛtvādisaṃpannaḥ svayamadṛśyādiḥ svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4664: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' iti cābhede 'pi kathañcidbhedopacārāt 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni' itivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:4665: 'yamātmā na veda' iti ca svātmani vṛttivirodhābhiprāyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4666: 'yasyātmā śarīram' ityādi ca sarvaṃ 'sve mahimni' itivadyojanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4667: yadi punarātmano 'pi niyantūranyo niyantā bhavet veditā vā tatastasyāpyanya ityanavasthā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4669: tadupārjitau hi dharmājharmau niyacchata ityanayā dvārā jīvo niyacchati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4675: ' śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tāvadatrabhavataḥ sarvajñasya sa4vaśakteḥ parameśvarasya jagadyonitvamavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4677: tathāca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tadavidyāśaktipariṇāmastasya śarīrendriyasthāne vartata iti yathāyathaṃ pṛthivyādidevatādikāryakaraṇaistāneva pṛthivyādidevatādīñchaknoti niyantum /
GSP33vacbhamu:4680: kintu yo jīvo niyantā lokasiddhaḥ sa paramātmaivopādhyavacchedakalpitabhedastathā vyākhyāyata ityasakṛdāveditaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4682: tathāca 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' ityādyā api śrutaya upapannārthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4689: 'yaḥ sarvāṃllokān' 'yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni' ityatra ya ityekavacanamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4691: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' ityādau cābhede 'pi bhedopacārakleśo na bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4724: tathā vivartā api vartamānasarūpā eva na virūpāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4726: na jātu rajjvāṃ kuñjara iti viparyasyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4729: atyantavairūpyāt. tasmātpradhānameva jaḍaṃ jaḍasya jagato yoniriti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4734: ato yaḥ pradhānātparaḥ paramātmā sa sarvavit /
GSP33vacbhamu:4740: tatkhalu jaḍamanirvācyamanirvācyasya jaḍasya prapañcasyopādānaṃ yujyate, sārūpyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4751: iha tvavidyāśaktereva jagadyonitvasaṃbhave na dvārādvāribhāvo yayukta iti pradhānamevātra vākye jagadyonirucyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4752: atha yoniśabdo nimittakāraṇaparastathāpi brahmaiva nimittaṃ na tu jīvātmeti vinigamanāyāṃ na heturastīti saṃśayena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4754: yaḥ sarvajña iti śrutyā sarvajñasya sa ucyate //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4760: yattu sārūpyābāvānna cidātmanaḥ pariṇāmaḥ prapañca iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4764: na khalu bāhyasārūpyanibandhana eva sarvo vibhrama iti niyamanimittamasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4773: na kevalaṃ liṅgādapi tu 'parā vidyā' iti samākhyānādapyetadeva pratipattavyamityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:4778: avacchinno hi jīvātmā bogyebhyo viṣayebyo vyatirikta iti tajjñānena na sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4788: ṛtuyajanenopādhinā ṛtvikśabdaḥ pravṛtta iti yajñopādhaya ṛtvijaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4815: saṃnidheśca prakaraṇaṃ balīya iti jāyamānaparityāgena viśvayonereva prakaraṇino rūpābhidhānamiti cet na,
GSP33vacbhamu:4817: na caitāvatā mūrdhādiśrutayaḥ prakaraṇavirodhātsvārthatyāgena sarvātmatāmātraparā iti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:4819: siddhe ca prakaraṇināsaṃbandhe jāyamānamadhyapātitvaṃ jāyamānagrahaṇe kāraṇamupanyastaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4820: tasmāddhiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān prāṇātmanā sarvabhūtāntaraḥ kāryo nirdiśyata iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4827: ātmetyukte jīvātmani pratyayo mā bhūdata uktaṃ kiṃ brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4828: te ca mīmāṃsamānā niścayamanadhigacchantaḥ kaikeyarājaṃ vaiśvanaravidyāvidamupaseduḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4834: prāṇo vāyuḥ pṛthagvartmātmā pṛthak vartma yasya vāyoḥ sa pṛthagvartmā sa evātmā svabhāve yasya sa pṛthagvartmātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4835: saṃdeho dehasya madhyabhāgaḥ sa ākāśo bahulaḥ sarvagatatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4837: āpaḥ, yato 'dbhyo 'nnamannācca rayirdhanaṃ tasmādāpo rayiruktāstāsāṃ ca mūtrībhūtānāṃ bastiḥ sthānamiti bastireva rayirityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4854: nanu 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma' ityupakrame ātmabrahmaśabdayoḥ paramātmani rūḍhatvena
GSP33vacbhamu:4855: taduparaktāyāṃ buddhau vaiśvānarāgnyādayaḥ śabdāstadanurodhena paramātmanyeva kathañcinnetuṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4857: yadyapi ca vājasaneyināṃ vaiśvānaravidyopakrame 'vaiśvānaraṃ ha vai bhagavān saṃprati veda taṃ no brūhi' ityatra nātmaśabdau staḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4858: tathāpi tatsamānārthaṃ chāndogyavākyaṃ tadupakramamiti tena niścitārthena tadavirodhena vājasaneyivākyārtho niścīyata /
GSP33vacbhamu:4863: naca sarvapāpmapradāha iti pāriśeṣyātparamātmaiva vaiśvānara iti niścite kutaḥ punarityamāśaṅkā-
GSP33vacbhamu:4868: api cāntaḥpratiṣṭhatatvaṃ ca prādeśamātratvaṃ ca na sarvavyāpino 'parimāṇasya ca parabrahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4875: athavā agniśarīrāyā devatāyā aiśvaryayogāt dyumūrdhatvādaya upapadyanta iti śahkiturabhisaṃdhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4883: tadupādhyupadeśena vā manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bārūpa itivadupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4885: pratyayasyāśrayāntare jāṭharavaiśvānarāhvaye kṣepeṇa vā jāṭhavaiśvānaropādhini vā
GSP33vacbhamu:4886: brahmaṇyupāsye vaiśvānaradharmāṇāṃ brahmadharmāṇāṃ ca samāveśa upapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4893: ata eṣa yatpuruṣa iti puruṣamanūdya na vaiśvānaro vidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4895: evaṃ ca parameśvaradṛṣṭirhi jāṭhare vaiśvānara ihopadaiśyata iti bhāṣyaṃ virudhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:4897: 'sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ puruṣaṃ puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda' iti vaiśvānarasya hi puruṣatvavedanamatrānūdyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:4899: tasmāt 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaro yat' iti yadaḥ pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4900: puruṣa iti tu tatra puruṣadṛṣṭerupadeśa iti yuktam //24 // // 25 // // 26 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4901: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:4903: 'yo bhānunā pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemām' iti mantravarṇo 'pi na kevalauṣṇyaprakāśavibhavamātrasya bhūtāgneramamīdṛśaṃ mahimānamāhaga,
GSP33vacbhamu:4938: ata eva hi śrutiḥ-'anena jīvenātmanā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4942: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakamīmaṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4949: ' pārāvāramathyapātī hi setuḥ tābhyāmavacchidyamāno jalavidhārako loke dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4951: haḍinigāḍādiṣvapi prayogaprasaṅgāt. na cānavacchinnaṃ brahma setubhāvamanubhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4962: tathāca pāravatyamṛtavyatirikte setāvanuśriyamāṇe pradhānaṃ vā sāṃkhyapārikalpitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:4963: tat khalu svakāryopahitamaryādatayā puruṣaṃ yāvadagacchadbhavatīti pāravat,
GSP33vacbhamu:4977: 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāya ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4978: yadi punarasya dyubhvādyāyatanasya sārvajñyaśruteratrāpi na parituṣyami,
GSP33vacbhamu:4979: bhavatu tato hiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sūtrātmā dyubhvādyāyatanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4980: tasya hi kāryatvena pāravattvaṃ cāmṛtātparabrahmaṇo bhedaścetyādi sarvamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4981: ayamapi 'vāyunā vai gotama sūtreṇa' iti śrutimupanyasyatā sūcitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4988: ' nahi mṛddārumayo mūrtaḥ pārāvāramadhyavartī pāthasāṃ vidhārako lokasiddhaḥ setuḥ pradhānaṃ vāvyākṛtaṃ vā vāyurvā jīvo vā sūtrātmā vābhyupeyate
GSP33vacbhamu:4990: so 'smākaṃ pāravattāvarjaṃ vidharaṇatvamātreṇa yogamātrādrūḍhiṃ parityajya pravartsyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4997: tathā cāmṛtasyeti ca seturiti ca brahmaṇi dyubhvādyāyatane upapatsyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:4998: atra ca svaśabdāditi tantroccaritatamātmaśabdāditi ca sadāyatanā iti sacchabdāditi ca brahmaśabdāditi ca sūcayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5001: āyatanāyatanavbhāvaḥ sarvaṃ brahmeti ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhepyupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5002: tathāca sa evātrāstvamṛtatvasya seturityāśaṅkya śrutivākyena sāvadhāraṇenottaramāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5012: nātra dyubhvādyāyatanasya setunocyate yena pāravattā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5017: naca prādhānyādeṣa iti sarvanāmnā dyubhvādyāyatanamātmaiva parāmṛśyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:5025: brahmaṇaśca muktopasṛpyatvaṃ 'yadā sarve pramucyante' ityādau śrutyantare prasiddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:5032: yathā 'carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti' iti carmārthamiti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5050: yāvatā 'na prāṇabhṛdanumāne' ityeka eva yogaḥ kasmānna kṛta ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5056: na khalu hiraṇyagarbhādiṣu jñāteṣu sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati kintu brahmaṇyeveti //6 // 1.3.1.7.
GSP33vacbhamu:5058: yadi jīvo hiraṇyagarbho vā dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:5068: tatra hi 'anaśrannanyo 'abhicākaśīti' iti jīva upādhirahitena rūpeṇa brahmasvabhāva udāsīno 'bhoktā darśitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5070: tathā cetthaṃbhūtaṃ jīvaṃ kathayatānena mantravarṇena dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ brahmaiva kathitaṃ bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:5076: nāradaḥ khalu devarṣiḥ karmavidanātmavittayā śocyamātmānaṃ manyamāno bhagavantamātmajñamājānasiddhaṃ mahāyoginaṃ sanatkumāramupasasāda /
GSP33vacbhamu:5080: tadupaśrutya sanatkumāreṇa 'nāma brahmetyupāstva' ityukte nāradena pṛṣṭaṃ kiṃnāmno 'sti bhūya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5081: tatra sanatkumārasya prativacanam-'vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5087: prāṇasya ca samastakriyākārakaphalabhedena pitrādyātmatvena ca rathāranābhidṛṣṭāntena
GSP33vacbhamu:5089: eva nāradena sanatkumāra ekagranthena 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti
GSP33vacbhamu:5091: tadupaśrutya nāradena 'sukhaṃ tveva bhagavo vijijñāse' ityukte sanatkumāraḥ 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukham' ityupakramya bhūmānaṃ vyutpādayāṃbabhūva-'yatra nānyatpaśyati' ityādinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5093: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ prāṇo bhūmā syādāho paramātmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5097: ' naca prāṇāt kiṃ bhūya iti pṛṣṭam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5100: apica bhūmeti bhāvo na bhavitāramāntareṇa śakyo nirūpayitumiti bhavitāramapekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇasyānantaryeṇa buddhisaṃnidhānāttameva bhavitāraṃ prāpya nirvṛṇoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5103: na cātmanaḥ prakaraṇādātmaiva buddhaistha iti tasyaiva bhūmā syāditi yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5108: tadetatsaṃśayabījaṃ darśayatā bhāṣyakāreṇa sūcitaṃ pūrvapakṣasādhanamiti na punaruktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5109: naca bhūyobhūyaḥ praśnātparamātmaiva nāradena jijñāsita iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5111: tadevaṃ prāṇa eva bhūmeti sthite yadyattadvirodhitayā vacaḥ pratibhāti tattadanuguṇatayā neyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5114: 'eṣa tu vā ativadati' iti tuśabdena prāṇadarśino 'tivādino vyavacchidya satyenātilāditvaṃ vadan kathaṃ prāṇasya bhūmānamabhidadhītetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5119: apitu tadativāditvamaparityajya pratyuta tadanukṛṣya tasyaiva prāṇasya satyasya śravaṇamananaśraddhāniṣṭhakṛtibhirvijñānāya
GSP33vacbhamu:5126: matvā ca guruśiṣyasabrahmacāribhiranusūyubhiḥ saha saṃvādya tattvaṃ śraddhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:5127: śraddhānantaraṃ ca viṣayāntaradarśī niraktastato vyāvṛttastattvajñānābhyāsaṃ karoti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5132: apyāhuḥ-'bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ yogijñānam' iti bhāvanāprakarṣasya prayanto niṣṭhā tasmājjāyate tattvānubhava iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5133: tasmātprāṇa eva bhūmeti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' ityuktvā bhūmocyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5134: tatra satyaśabdaḥ paramārthe nirūḍhavṛttiḥ śrutyā paramārthamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:5137: tathāca 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivaditi' iti brahmaṇo 'tivāditaṃ śrutyānyanirapekṣayā
GSP33vacbhamu:5140: evaṃ ca prāṇādūrdhvaṃ brahmaṇi bhūtāmavagamyamāno na prāṇaviṣayo bhavitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:5142: evaṃ cānātmavida ātmānaṃ vividiṣornāradasya praśne paramātmānamevāsmai vyākyāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānsanatkumāraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5145: naca praśnapūrvatāpravāhapatitenottareṇa sarveṇa praśnapūrveṇaiva bhavitavyamiti niyamo 'stītyādisugamena bhāṣyeṇa vyutpaditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5148: tadabhidhāne hi sāpekṣatvena na prakaraṇaṃ samāpyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:5149: tasmānnedaṃ prāṇasya prakaraṇamapi tu yadāyattaḥ prāṇastasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:5163: yadapi pūrvapakṣiṇā kathañcinnītaṃ tadanubhāṣya bhāṣyakāro dūṣayati
GSP33vacbhamu:5180: nahi dhūmopāyā bahnidhīrdhumasaṃbhinnaṃ bahnimavagāhate dhūmo 'yaṃ bahniriti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5183: apica śabdānupāye 'pi rūpadheyapratyaye liṅgendriyajanmani nāmasaṃbhedo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5186: 'tadyathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi saṃtṛṇṇānyevamoṅkāreṇa sarvā vāk' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5187: ata oṃkārātmakāḥ pṛthivyādayo 'mbarāntā iti varṇā evākṣaraṃ na paramātmeti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5200: rūpadheyāni tu ghaṭapaṭādīni ghaṭatvapaṭatvādisāmānyātmakāni cakṣurādīndriyāgrāhyāṇi madhudhāraṇaprāvaṇādyarthakriyāṇi ca bhedenānubhūyante iti kuto nāmasaṃbhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5203: kintu yo nānādeśakālasaṃplutaḥ piṇḍaḥ so 'yaṃ saṃnihitadeśakāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5206: piṇḍa eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ sansaṃjñāṃ smārayituṃ kṣamaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:5207: saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na bādhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5208: saṃjñinaḥ sā taṭasthā hi na rūpācchādanakṣamā //2 // '
GSP33vacbhamu:5214: ye tu pradhānaṃ pūrvapakṣayitvānena sūtreṇa paramātmaivākṣaramiti siddhāntayanti cairambarāntadhṛterityanena kathaṃ pradhānaṃ nirākriyata iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5225: praśāsanamājñā cetanadharmo nācetane pradhāne vāvyākṛte vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5228: ambarāntavidharaṇalasyākṣarasyeśvarāgadyadanyadvarṇā vā pradhānaṃ vā.vyākṛtaṃ vā teṣāmanyeṣāṃ bhāvalo 'nyabhāvastamatyantaṃ vyavartayati śrutiḥ-'tadvā etadakṣaraṃ gārgi' ityādikā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5235: akṣarasya cakṣurādyupādhiṃ vārayantī śrutiraupādhikasya jīvasyākṣaratāṃ niṣedhatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5242: ' 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' iti śruteḥ sarvagataparabrahmavedena tadbhāvāpattau 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam iti na deśaviśeṣaprāptirupapadyate
GSP33vacbhamu:5244: na cekṣaṇasya loke tattvaviṣayatvena prasiddheḥ parasyaiva brahmaṇastathābhāvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:5268: tadanurodhena ca parātpara ityatra parāditi jīvaghanaviṣayaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5269: tasmāttu paraḥ puruṣo dhyātavyaśca draṣṭavyaśca bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5271: na cātra jīvaghanaśabdena prakṛto 'bhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyateḥkintu jīvaghanāt parāt paro yo dhyātavyo draṣṭavyaśca tameva kathayituṃ jīvaghano jīvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5273: 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' ityanantaravākyanirdiṣṭo brahmaloko vā jīvaghanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5274: sa hi samastakaraṇātmanaḥ sūtrātmano hiraṇyagarbhasya bhagavato nivāsabhūmitayā karaṇaparivṛtānāṃ jīvānāṃ saṃghāta iti bhavati jīvaghanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5278: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' iti tu nirupādhibrahmavedanaviṣayā śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5281: 'atha yadidamāsmin brahmapure daharam' sūkṣmaṃ guhāprāyaṃ puṇḍarīkasaṃniveśaṃ veśma 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyam' āgamācāryopadeśābhyāṃ śravaṇaṃ ca,
GSP33vacbhamu:5289: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadevaṃ saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ daharākāśādanyadeva kiñcidanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ ca uta daharākāśa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5290: yadāpi daharākāśo 'nveṣṭavyastadāpi kiṃ bhūtākāśa āho śārīra ātmā kiṃ vā paramātmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5295: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadbhūtākāśa eva dahara iti pūrvapakṣayati
GSP33vacbhamu:5297: eṣa tu bahutarottarasaṃdarbhavirodhāttucchaḥ pūrvapakṣa ityaparitoṣeṇa pakṣāntaramālambate pūrvapakṣī-athavā jīvo dahara iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5305: tadiha śarīraṃ brahmavikāro 'pi na brahmaṇā vyapadeṣṭavyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:5310: naca brahmaṇaḥ sve mahimni vyavasthitasyānādheyasyādhārasaṃbandha kalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5312: tasmādbrahmaśabdo rūḍhiṃ parityajya dehādibṛṃhaṇatayā jīve yaugike vā bhākto vā vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5319: vatsarājasya pura ivojjayinyāṃ bhaitrasya sajñmetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5321: ayamarthaḥveśma khalvadhikaraṇamanirdiṣṭhādheyamādheyaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ purasvāminaḥ prakṛtatvāttenaivādheyena saṃbaddhaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ nādheyāntareṇa saṃbandhaṃ kalpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5322: nanu tathāpi śarīramevāsya bhogāyatanamiti ko hṛdayapuṇḍarīkasya viseṣo yattadevāsya sajñmetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5324: nanu mano 'pi calatayā sakaladehavṛtti paryāyeṇetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5333: agatyā bhedamāropya gatau satyāṃ na yujyate //
GSP33vacbhamu:5334: ' asti tu daharākāśasya brahmatvena bhūtākāśādbhedenopamānasya gatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5339: api tu bhūtākāśopamānena puṇḍarīkopādhiprāptaṃ daharatvaṃ nivartyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5340: apica sarva evottare hetavo daharākāśasya bhūtākāśatvaṃ vyāsedhantītyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5346: ' dehe hi brahmopalabhyata ityasādhāraṇatayā deho brahmapuramiti vyapadiśyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:5350: tathāpi yathā vatsarājasya pure ujjayinyāṃ maitrasya sajñma bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:5351: evaṃ jīvasya pure hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ brahmasadanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:5353: brahmaṇo hi bādhake pramāṇe balīyasi jīvasya ca sādhake pramāṇe sati brahmaliṅgāni kathañcidabhedavivakṣayā jīve vyākhyāyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:5359: talliṅgānāṃ nābrahmaṇi vyākhyānamucitamiti brahmaiva daharākāśo na jīvabhūtākāśāviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5360: śravaṇamananamanuvidya brahmānubhūya caraṇaṃ cārasteṣāṃ kāmeṣu caraṇaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5374: ācāryeṇa hi 'daharo 'sminnantakarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyam' ityupadiṣṭe 'tevāsinākṣiptam-'kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyam' /
GSP33vacbhamu:5380: tadasminnākṣepe parisamāpte samādhānāvasara ācāryasyākāśopamānopakramaṃ vacaḥ-'ubhe asmindyāvāpṛthivī samāhite' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5388: no khalvabhyupagamā eva doṣatvena ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5392: yacca kartavyaṃ tadicchitīti 'tadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyam' iti taddaharākāśaviṣayamavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5407: 'asminkāmāḥ' iti ca 'eṣaḥ' iti caikavacanāntaṃ na dve dyāvāpṛthivyau parāmnaṣṭumarhatīti daharākāśa eva parāmraṣṭavya iti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5408: tadanena krameṇa 'tasminyadantaḥ' ityatra tacchabdo 'nantaramapyākāśamatilaṅgasya hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ parāmṛśatatyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5411: uttarebhya ityasya prapañcaḥ etameva daharākāśaṃ prakramya batāho kaṣṭamidaṃ vartate jantūnāṃ tattvāvabodhavikalānāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5415: sādbhutamiva sakhedamiva śrutaḥ pravartate-'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya
GSP33vacbhamu:5417: svāpakāle hi sarva evāyaṃ vidvānavidvāṃśca jīvaloko hṛtpuṇḍarīkāśrayaṃ daharākāśākhyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:5418: brahmalokaṃ prāpto 'pyanādyavidyātamaḥ paṭalapihitadṛṣṭitayā brahmabhūyamāpanno 'hamasmīti na veda /
GSP33vacbhamu:5419: so 'yaṃ brahmalokaśabdastadgatiśca pratyahaṃ jīvalokasya daharākāśasyaiva brahmarūpalokatāmāhatuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5421: itaśca parameśvara eva daharo yasmāddaharavākyaśeṣa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5426: yadyapi suṣuptasya brahmabhāve laukikaṃ na pramāṇāntaramasti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5428: īdṛśī nāmeyaṃ vaidiko prasiddhiryalloke 'pi gīyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5429: yathā śrutyantare yathā ca loke tatheha brahmalokaśabdo 'pīti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5435: tathāpīha ṣaṣṭhisamāsanirākaraṇena karmadhārayasamāsasthāpanāya liṅgamapyadhikamastīti tadapyuktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:5438: naca daharākāśo brahmaṇo lokaḥ kintu tadbrahmeti brahma ca tallokaśceti karmadhārayaḥ siddho bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5441: yatkhalu puṇḍarīkasthamantaḥkaraṇaṃ tasminviśuddhe pratyāhṛtetarakaraṇānāṃ yogināṃ nirmala ivodake candramaso bimbamatisvacchaṃ caitanyaṃ jyotiḥsvarūpaṃ brahmāvalokyata iti //15 // 1.3.5.16.
GSP33vacbhamu:5445: kutaḥ, asya dhāraṇalakṣaṇasya mahimno 'sminneveśvara eva śrutyantareṣūpalabdheḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:5452: taiḥ 'anyāyaścānekārthatvam' iti ca 'ananyalabhyaḥ śabdārthaḥ' iti ca mīmāṃsakānāṃ mudrābhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5455: naca brahmaṇyeva mukhyo nabhasi tu tenaiva guṇayogena vartsyatīti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5457: nanu 'yāvanvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ' iti vyatirekanirdeśānna lakṣaṇā yuktā /

GSP33vacbhamu:5466: naca 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajeta ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyām' ityatra paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdau na lākṣaṇikau /
GSP33vacbhamu:5469: samyak prasīdatyasmin jīvo viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanitaṃ kāluṣyaṃ jahātīti suṣuptiḥ saṃprasādo jīvasyāvasthābedaḥ na brahmaṇaḥ tathā śarīrātsamutthānamapi śarīrāśrayasya jīvasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:5472: evaṃ vākyaśeṣagatābhyāmeva saṃprasādasamutthānābhyāṃ daharākāśo jīvaḥ kasmānnāvagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5477: tathā caiṣa parāmarśo brahmaṇa eveti na saṃprasādasamutthāne jīvaliṅgam,

GSP33vacbhamu:5482: tamātmānaṃ vividiṣantau surāsurarājavindrivirocanau samitpāṇī prajāpatiṃ varivasitumājagmatuḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:5486: tāvūcatuḥ, ya ātmāpahatapāpmā tamāvāṃ vividiṣāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5488: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:5495: yaśca svaṅgādau katama eteṣvasau atavaika eva sarveṣviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5499: tadyadi vayaṃ bhrāntau stha iti brūmastataḥ svātmani samāropitapāṇḍityabahumānau vimānitau santau daurmanasyena yathāvadupadeśaṃ na gṛhṇīyātām,
GSP33vacbhamu:5509: sādhvalaṅkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvā punarudaśarāve paśyatamākmānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5511: tau ca sādhvalaṅkṛtau suvasanau chinnanakhalomānau bhūtvā tathaiva cakratuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5513: tadupaśrutya prajāpatiraho batādyāpi na praśānta enayorvibhramaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5515: kālena kalmaṣe kṣīṇe 'smadvacanasaṃdarbhapaurvāparyalocanayātmatattvaṃ pratipatsyete svayameveti matvovāca,
GSP33vacbhamu:5517: tayorvirocano dehānupātitvācchāyāyā deha evātmatattvamiti matvā nijasadanamāgatya tathaivāsurānupadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5519: taṃ taṃ doṣaṃ paribhāvayan nāhamatra chāyātmadarśane bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti prajāpatisamīpaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:5520: samitpāṇiḥ punarevevāya āgataśca prajāpatināgamanakāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pathi paribāvitaṃ jagad /
GSP33vacbhamu:5522: tatpunarapi tatprakṣayāyā carāparāṇi dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5524: sa ca tathā caritatbrahmacaryaḥ surendraḥ prajāpatimupasasāda /
GSP33vacbhamu:5526: ya ātmāpahatapāpmadilakṣaṇo 'kṣaṇa darśitaḥ so 'yaṃ ya eṣa svapne mahiyamāno vanitādibhiranekadhā svapnopabhogān bhuñjāno virahatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5530: punaraparāṇi cara dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi svacchaṃ brahmacaryamidānīmapyakṣīṇakalmaṣo
GSP33vacbhamu:5533: ya eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇo darśito 'kṣiṇi ca svapne ca sa eṣa yo viṣayendriyasaṃyogavirahātprasannaḥ suṣuptāvasthāyāmiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5535: yathā hi jāgradvā svapnagato vāyamahamasmīti imāni bhūtāmani ceti vijānāti naivaṃ suṣuptaḥ kiñcidapi vedayate,
GSP33vacbhamu:5538: eva muktavati maghavati batādyāpi na te kalmaṣakṣayo 'bhūt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5541: caturthe ca paryāye pañca varṣāṇītyekottaraṃ śataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ carataḥ sahasrākṣasya sopedire /
GSP33vacbhamu:5542: athāsmai brahmacaryasaṃpadunmṛditakalmaṣāya maghavate ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi yaśca svapne suṣupte anusyūta eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇako darśitaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5543: tameva 'maghavan martyaṃ vai śarīram' ityādinā vispaṣṭaṃ vyācaṣṭe prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5545: na tvātmanaḥ. sa punaretāneva śarīrādīn anādyavidyāvāsanāvaśādātmatvenābipratītastadgatena sukhaduḥkhena tadvantamātmānamabhimanyamāno 'nutapyate
GSP33vacbhamu:5546: yadā tvayamapahatapāpmatvādilakṣaṇamudāsīnamātmānaṃ caitanyānandaghane rūpe vyavasthitaḥ samastalokakāmān prāpto bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5547: etasyaiva hi paramānandasya mātrāḥ sarve kāmāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5551: ' evaṃ vyavasthita uttarādvākyasaṃdarbhātprājāpatyāt akṣiṇi ca svapne suṣupte ca
GSP33vacbhamu:5552: caturtho ca paryāye 'eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya' iti jīvātmaivopahatapāpmādiguṇaḥ śrutyocyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5557: jīvasya caitat sarvamiti sa evāpahatapāpmādiguṇaḥ śrutyokta iti nāpahatapāpmādibiḥ paraṃ brahma gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5564: kintu vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhasaṃbhavo 'sya pāpmādiḥ śarīrādyabhāve na bhavati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābāva iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5567: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-paurvāparyālocanayā tāvadupaniṣadāṃ śuddhabuddhamuktamekamaprapañcaṃ brahma tadatiriktaṃ ca sarvaṃ tadvivarto rajjoriva bhujaṅga ityatra tātparyamavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5568: tathāca jīvo 'pyavidyākalpitadehendriyādyupahitaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇo na tu svabāvikaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5570: āvirbhūtabrahmarūpe tu nirupādhau saṃbhavanto brahmaṇa eva na jīvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:5571: evaṃ ca brahmaivāpahatāpāpmādiguṇaṃ śrutyuktamiti tadeva daharākāśo na jīva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5574: tarhi vipratiṣiddhamidamabhidhīyate jīva āvirbhūtasvarūpa iti, ata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5578: evaṃ dehendriyādyapyupajanāpāyadha4makaṃ nātmetyudaśarāvadṛṣṭāntena śarīrātmatāyā vyutthānaṃ bādha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5580: dravyāntarasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ hi tenābhibhūtaṃ tasmādvivicyamānaṃ vyajyate hematārakādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5584: te ca saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ bhāsanta iti kathaṃ jīvarūpaṃ na bhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5595: tathāpi na sākṣājjapādikusumasaṃyogina ityetāvatā dṛṣṭācintatā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5601: tadanena śravaṇamananadhyānābhyāsādvivekavijñānamuktvā tasya vivekavijñānasya phalaṃ kevalātmarūpasākṣātkāraḥ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5602: sa ca sākṣātkāro vṛttirūpaḥ prapañcamātraṃ pravilāpayan svayamapi prapañcarūpatvātkatakaphalavatpravilīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5605: atra copasaṃpattāvuttarakālāyāmapi ktvāprayogo mukhaṃ vyādāya svapitītīvanmantavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5610: na kevalaṃ 'sa yoha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' ityādiśrutibhyo jīvasya paramātmano 'bedaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5614: praticchāyātmavajjīvaṃ paramātmano vastuto bhinnamapyamṛtābhayātmatvena grāhayitvā paścātparamātmānamṛtābhayādimantaṃ prajāpatirgrāhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:5615: na tvayaṃ jīvasya paramātmabhāvamācaṣṭe chāyātmana ivetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5619: kiñca dvitīyādiṣvapi paryāyeṣu 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāyasyāmi' ityupakramātprathamaparyāyanirdiṣṭo na chāyāpuruṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5623: atha chāyāpuruṣa eva jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5624: tathāca chāyāpuruṣa evaitamiti parāmṛśyata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5640: ya evāhaṃ jāgaritvā suptaḥ sa evaitarhi jāgarmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5643: yadi hyetamityanenānantaroktaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ puruṣaṃ parāmṛśṭa tasyātmatvamucyeta tato na bhavecchāyāpuruṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5657: na cābhede brahmaṇo jīvānāṃ brahmaguṇānāmasaṃbhavo jīveṣviti teṣāmabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5661: naca vastusato brahmaṇo guṇāḥ samāropiteṣu jīveṣu saṃbhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5662: no khalu vastusatyā rajjvā dharmāḥ sevyatvādayaḥ samāropite bhujaṅge saṃbhavinaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5665: avidyākalpitaṃ ca kartṛtvabhoktṛtvaṃ yathālokasiddhamupāśritya karmavidhayaḥ pravṛttāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5666: śyenādividhaya iva niṣiddhe 'pi 'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti sādhyāṃśe 'bhicāre 'tikrāntaniṣedhaṃ puruṣamāśrityāvidyāvatpuruṣāśrayatvācchastrasyetyuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:5669: nanu brahmacedatra vaktavyaṃ kṛtaṃ jīvaparāmarśenetyuktamityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5672: na cāsau jīvamaparāmṛśya śakya upadeṣṭumiti tisṛṣvavasthāsu jīvaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5679: ' balīyasā hi saureṇa tejasā mandaṃ tejaścandratārakādyabhibhūyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5681: ye 'pi pidhāyakāḥ pradīpasya gṛhaghaṭādayo na te svabhāsā pradīpaṃ bhāsayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5682: śrūyate ca-'tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5687: tasmādyadyapi 'yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotam' iti brahma prakṛtaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5691: tatra taṃ tasyeti ca sarvanāmapadāni pradarśanīyamevāvamrakṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5693: nahi 'tena raktaṃ rāgāt' 'tasyāpatyam' ityādau pūrvoktaṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5694: tasmātpramāṇāntarāpratītamapi tejo 'ntaramalaukikaṃ śabdādupāsyatvena gamyata iti prāpte ucyate-'brahmaṇyeva hi talliṅgaṃ na tu tejasyalaukike
GSP33vacbhamu:5695: tasmānna tadupāsyatve brahma jñeyaṃ tu gamyate //
GSP33vacbhamu:5696: ' 'tameva bhāntat' ityatra kimalaukikaṃ tejaḥ kalpayitvā sūryādīnāmanubhānamupapadyatām,
GSP33vacbhamu:5697: kiṃvā 'bhārūpaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ' iti śrutyantaraprasiddhena brahmaṇo bhānena sūryādīnāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:5698: bhānamupapādyatāmiti viśaye na śrutasaṃbhave 'śrutasya kalpanā yujyata ityaprasiddhaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:5707: tathā tadeva cākṣuṣaṃ tejo bāhyasauryāditejāpyāyitaṃ rūpādi prakāśayati nānāpyāyitam,
GSP33vacbhamu:5721: vanhyayaḥ piṇḍayostu yadyapi dahanakriyā na bhidyate tathāpi dravyabhedena kriyābhedaṃ kalpayitvā kriyāsādṛśyaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5722: tadevamanukṛteriti vibhajya tasya ceti sūtrāvayavaṃ vibhajate-
GSP33vacbhamu:5728: brahmaṇi tu niḥśeṣajagadavabhāsake na sarvaśabdasya vṛttiḥ saṃkucatīti-
GSP33vacbhamu:5731: 'tena raktaṃ rāgāt' ityādāvapi prakṛteḥ parasminpratyayer'thabhede 'nvākhyāyamāne prātipadikapratyarthasya pūrvavṛttatvamastīti teneti tatparāmarśānna vyabhāciraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5734: śrutistu liṅgādbalīyasīti śrautamiha brahmaiva gamyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5737: anantaraṃ ca hiraṇyamaye pare kośa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5743: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-'na tatra sūryo bhāti' iti neyaṃ satisaptamī,
GSP33vacbhamu:5746: tena na tatra brahmaṇi prakāśayitavye sūryādayaḥ prakāśakatayā bhānti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5747: kintu brahmaiva sūryādiṣu prakāśayitavyeṣu prakāśakatvena bhāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5764: ātmaśabdo hyayaṃ svabhāvavacano vā jīvavacano vā brahmavacano vā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5765: tatra svabhāvasya svabhavitradhīnanirūpaṇatayā svasya ca bhavituranirdeśānna jñāyate kasya madhya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5766: naca jīvaparayorasti madhyamañjaseti naiṣa sthānanirdeśo vispaṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5773: api ca jīvātmanaḥ spaṣṭamaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ smaryate-'aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ puruṣaṃ niścakarṣa yamo balāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5774: nahi sarveśasya brahmaṇo yamena balānniṣkarṣaḥ kalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5775: yamo hi jagau-'hariguruvaśago 'smi na svatantraḥ prabhavati saṃyamane mamāpi viṣṇuḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5776: tenāṅguṣṭhamātratvasya jīve niśchayādāpekṣikaṃ kiñcidbhūtabhavyaṃ prati jīvasyeśānatvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5781: ' iha hi bhūtabhavyamātraṃ prati niraṅkuśamīśānatvaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5782: prāk pṛṣṭaṃ cātra brahma 'anyatra dharmādanyatrādharmāt' ityādinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5783: tadanantarasya saṃdarbhasya tatprativacanateciteti 'etadvai tat' iti brahmābhidhānaṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5784: tathā cāṅguṣṭhamātratayā yadyapi jīve 'vagamyate tathāpi na tatparametadvākyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5788: tena yathā 'tattvamasti' iti vijñānātmanastvaṃpadārthasya taditi paramātmanaikatvaṃ pratipādyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:5789: tathehāpyaṅguṣṭhaparimitasya vijñānātmana īśānaśrutyā brahmabhāvaḥ pratipādya iti yuktam //24 // 1.3.7.25.
GSP33vacbhamu:5792: na cānyaḥ paramātmāna iha grahaṇamarhatīti na jīvaparametadvākyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5796: antaḥsaṃjñānāṃ mokṣamāṇānāṃ ca kāmyeṣu karmasvadhikāraṃ niṣedhati-
GSP33vacbhamu:5808: naca tajjīvamanabhidhāya śakyaṃ vaktumiti jīva ucyata ityarthaḥ //25 // 1.3.8.26.
GSP33vacbhamu:5810: devarṣīṇāṃ brahmavijñānādhikāracintā samanvayalakṣaṇe 'saṃgatetyasyāḥ prāsaṅgikīṃ saṃgatiṃ darśayituṃ prasaṅgamāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:5816: nanu devādīnāṃ vigrahādyabhāvendriyārthasaṃnikarṣajāyāḥ pramāṇādivṛtteranupapatteravidvattayā sāmarthyābhāvena nādhikāra ityata āha
GSP33vacbhamu:5821: na khalu vidhivat gurumukhādgṛhyamāṇo vedaḥ phalavatkarmabrahmāvabodhahetuḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5823: sa ca manuṣyāṇāmiha janmanīva devadīnāṃ prāci bhave vidhivadhīta āmnāya iha janmani smaryamāṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5824: ata eva svayaṃ pratibhāto vedaḥ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5831: mantrādipadasamanvayātpratīyamānor'thaḥ pramāṇāntarāvirodhe satyupeyaḥ na tu virodhe /
GSP33vacbhamu:5834: tathāca vigrahādyabhāvācchabdopahitārthor'thopahito vā śabdo devatetyacetanatvānna tasyāḥ kkacidapyadhikāra iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5846: mā bhūdyāgādīnāmapi svargādisādhanatvamadṛṣṭamiti manuṣyaśararasya mātāpitṛsaṃyogajatvaniyamādapi pitroḥ saṃyoge kutaḥ saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5847: saṃbhave vānagnito 'pi dhūmaḥ syāditi bādhadarśanamiti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:5848: hanta kiṃ śarīratvena hetunā devādiśarīramapi mātāpitṛsaṃyogajaṃ siṣādhayiṣasi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5853: bhūtavaśināṃ hi devādīnāṃ nānākāyacikīrṣāvaśādbhūtakriyotpattau bhūtānāṃ parasparasaṃyogena nānākāyamasutpādāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5859: na cāsmadādivatteṣāṃ śarīritvena vyavahitāviprakṛṣṭādidarśanāsaṃbhavo 'numīyata iti vācyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:5862: tena saṃnihitānāmapi na kratudeśe darśanaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5865: vaiśvadevaśāstrasya hi nividi 'kati devāḥ' ityupakramya nividaivottaraṃ dattaṃ śākalyāya yājñavalkyena-
GSP33vacbhamu:5866: trayaśca trī ca śatā trayaśca trī ca sahasreti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5868: etaduktaṃ bhavati-vaiśvadevasya nividi kati devāḥ śasyamānāḥ prasaṃkhyātā iti śākalyena pṛṣṭe yājñavalkyasyottaraṃ-'trayaśca trī ca śatā' ityādi
GSP33vacbhamu:5869: yāvatsaṃkhyākā vaiśvadevanividi saṃkhyātā devāsta etāvanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5870: punaśca śākalyena 'katame te' iti saṃkhyeyeṣu pṛṣṭeṣu yājñavalkyasyottaram-
GSP33vacbhamu:5872: aṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityā indraśca prajāpatiśceti trayastriṃśaddevāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5873: tatrāgniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca dyauśca candramāśca nakṣatrāṇi ceti vasavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5874: ete hi prāṇināṃ karmaphalāśrayeṇa kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpeṇa pariṇamanto jagadidaṃ sarvaṃ vāsayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5876: katame rudrā iti daśeme puruṣe prāṇāḥ buddhikarmendriyāṇi daśa,
GSP33vacbhamu:5880: te hi prāyaṇakāla utkrāmantaḥ puruṣaṃ rodayantīti rudrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5881: katama ādityā iti dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsarasyāvayavāḥ punaḥ punaḥ paruvartamānāḥ prāṇabhṛtāmāyūṃṣu ca karmaphalopabhogaṃ cādāpayantītyādityāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5888: yajñasādhanaṃ ca yajñarūpaṃ ca paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5889: eta eva trayastriṃśaddevāḥ ṣaṇṇāmagniṣṭathivīvāṭvantarikṣādityadivāṃ mahimāno na tato bhidyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:5891: te tu ṣaḍagniṃ pṛthivīṃ caikūkṛtyāntarikṣaṃ vāyuṃ caikīkṛtya divaṃ cādityaṃ caikīkṛtya trayo lokāstraya eva devā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5892: eta eva ca trayo 'nnaprāṇayorantarbhavanto 'nnaprāṇau dvau devau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5897: yadasminsati sarvamidamadhyardhaṃ vṛddhiṃ prāpnoti tenādhyardha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5900: sarvadevātmatvena bṛhattvādbrahma tadeva tyadityācakṣate parokṣābhidhāyakena śabdena /
GSP33vacbhamu:5907: na khalu bahuṣu śrāddheṣveko brāhmaṇo yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5910: yathaikaṃ brāhmaṇamuddiśya yugapannamaskāraḥ kriyate bahubhistathā svasthānasthitāmekāṃ devatāmuddiśya bahubhiryajamānairnānādeśāvasthitairyugapaddhavistyajyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:5914: gotvādivatpūrvāvamarśābhāvādupādherapyekasyāpratīteḥ pācakādivadākāśaṣādiśabdavadvyaktivacanā eva vasvādiśabdāḥ tasyāśca nityatvāttayā saha saṃbandho nityo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:5915: vigrahādiyoge tu sāvayavatvena vasvādīnāmanityatvāttataḥ pūrvaṃ vasvādiśabdo na svārthena saṃbaddha āsīn,
GSP33vacbhamu:5917: tataścotpanne vasvādau vasvādiśabdasaṃbandhaḥ prādurbhavandevadattādiśabdasaṃbandhavatpuruṣabuddhiprabhava iti tatpūrvako vākyārthapratyayo 'pi puruṣabuddhyadhīnaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5918: puruṣabuddhiśca mānāntarādhīnajanmeti mānāntarāpekṣayā prāmāṇyaṃ vedasya vyāhanyeteti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5921: vasutvādijātivācakācchabdāttajjātīyāṃ vyaktiṃ cikīrṣitāṃ buddhivāsikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5923: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi na śabda upādānakāmaṃ vasvādīnāṃ brahmopādānatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:5934: etaduktaṃ bhavati-svayaṃbhuvo vedakartṛtve 'pi na kālidāsādivatsvatantratvamapi tu pūrvasṛṣṭyanusāreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:5944: tatra na tāvadvasvādīnāṃ vakārādayo varṇā vācakāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5947: api caite pratyekaṃ vā vākyārthamabhidadhīran militā vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5952: teṣāmekavaktṛprayujyamānānaṃ rūpato vyaktito vā pratikṣaṇamapavargiṇāṃ mithaḥ sāhityasaṃbhavābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5954: naca svarūpasāhityābhāve 'pi varṇānāmāgneyādīnāmiva saṃskāradvārakamasti sāhityamiti sāṃprataṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5971: nahi yaiva bahnerdahanaśaktiḥ saiva tasya prakāśanaśaktiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5972: nāpi dahanaśakteḥ prakāśanaśaktiḥ.apica vyutkrameṇoccaritebhyo varṇebhyaḥ saivāsti smṛtibījaṃ vāsanetyarthapratyayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:5984: na sphoṭa iti tu na mṛṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5989: na cāyamasīti bādhake ekapadavākyānubhavaḥ śakyo mithyetivaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:5994: tathā sati dhavasvadirapalāśā iti na jātu syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6000: sa sphoṭa iti taṃ ca dhvanayaḥ pratyekaṃ vyañjayanto 'pi na drāgitveva viśadayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6003: carame cetasi cakāsti viśadaṃ padavākyatattvamiti prāganutpannāyāstadanantaramarthadhiya
GSP33vacbhamu:6013: arthadhiyastvapratyakṣāyā mānāntarajanmano vyakta evopajano na vā syānna punarasphuṭa iti na samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6014: tasmānnityaḥ sphoṭa eva vācako na varṇā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6016: varṇā eva tu na śabda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6030: tatra kkacidvyabhicāradarśanena tadutprekṣāyāmucyate vṛddheḥ svataḥprāmāṇ.vādibhiḥ-'utprekṣeta hi yo mohādajñātamapi bādhanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6034: na cedaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ gatvādijātiviṣayaṃ na gādivyaktiviṣayaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6035: tāsāṃ pratinaraṃ bhedopalambhādata eva śabdabedopalambhādvāktṛbheda unnīyate 'somaśarmādhīte na viṣṇuśarmā' iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6037: yathā kālakṣīṃ ca svastimatīṃ cekṣamāṇasya vyaktibhedaprathāyāṃ satyāmeva tadanugatamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ prathate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6038: tathā kiṃ gakārādiṣu bhedena prathamāneṣveva gatvamekaṃ tadanugataṃ cakāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6040: mahadiva dīrghamiva vāmanamiva tathāgavyaktirājānata ekāpi vyañjakabhedāttadharmānupātinīva
GSP33vacbhamu:6042: tatra havyaktibhedamaṅgīkṛtyāpi yo gatvasyaikasya paropadhānabhedakalpanāprayāsaḥ sa varaṃ gavyaktāvevāstu kimantargaḍunā gatvenābhyupetena
GSP33vacbhamu:6046: tathā sati daśa gakarānudacārayaccaitra iti hi pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6048: na caiṣa jātyabhiprāyo 'bhyāso yathā śatakṛtvastittirīnupāyuṅkta devadatta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6049: atra hi sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi gakārādivyaktau lokasyoccāraṇābhyāsapratyayasya vinirvṛttiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6062: mā bhūvan ghrāṇarasanaśrotrāṇāṃ gandharasaśabdagocarāṇāṃ tadvantaḥ pṛthivyudakākāśā gocarāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6063: evaṃ ca mā nāma bhūdvāyugocaraṃ śrotram,
GSP33vacbhamu:6066: naca śabdasya pratyabijñānāvadhṛtaikatvasya svarūpata udāttādayo dharmāḥ parasparavirodhino
GSP33vacbhamu:6069: na tu bhāviko nānādharmasaṃsarga iti sthite 'bhyupetya parihāramāha bhāṣyakāraḥ-
GSP33vacbhamu:6077: na cāyamanirdhāritaviśeṣavarṇatvasāmānyamātrapratyayo na tu varṇātiriktadabhivyañjakadhvanipratyaya iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6082: śabdavñjakaḥ śrāvaṇo 'bhyupeyaḥ ubhayathāpi cākṣu vyañjaneṣu ca tattaddhvanibhedopadhānenānunāsikatvādayo
GSP33vacbhamu:6083: 'vagamyamānāstaddharmā eva śabde pratīyante na tu svataḥ śabdasya dharmāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6084: tathā ca yeṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmāḥ parasparaviruddhā bhāsante bhavatu teṣāṃ dhvanīnāmanityatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6086: yeṣu tu varṇeṣu pratyabhijñānaṃ na teṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmā iti nānityāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6089: yadyeṣa parasyāgraho dharmiṇyagṛhyamāṇe taddharmā na śakyā grahītumiti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6092: tadanena prabandhena kṣaṇikatvena varṇānāmaśakyasaṃgatigrahatayā yadavācakatvamāpāditaṃ varṇānāṃ tadapākṛtam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6109: evaṃ ca kalpitā evāsya bhāgā varṇā iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:6112: hantāsyāṃ nānā varṇāḥ prathanta iti nānātvāvabhāsa ekaikatvaṃ kasmānna bādhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6114: no khalu senāvanabuddhī gajapadātituragādīnāṃ campakāśokakiṃśukādīnāṃ ca bhedamapabādhamāne udīyete,
GSP33vacbhamu:6124: na caikasmṛtisamārohiṇāṃ kramākramaviparītakramaprayuktānāmabhedo varṇānāmiti yathākathañcitprayuktebhya etebhyor'thapratyayaprasaṅga iti vācyam
GSP33vacbhamu:6125: uktaṃ hi-'yāvanto yādṛśā ye ca padārthapratipādane /
GSP33vacbhamu:6128: nanu paṅktibuddhāvekasyāmakramāyāmapi vāstavī śālādīnāmasti paṅgiriti tathaiva prathā yuktā,
GSP33vacbhamu:6129: naca tatheha varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ cāsti vāstavaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6134: tathāhi-jārārājeti padayoḥ prathayantyoḥ smṛtidhiyostattve 'pi varṇānāṃ kramabhedātpadabhedaḥ sphuṭataraṃ cakāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6143: santvanityā eva varṇāstathāpi gatvādyavacchedenaiva saṃgatigraho 'vanādiśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatītyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6146: nanu prācyāmeva mīmāṃsāyāṃ vedasya nityatvaṃ siddhaṃ tatkiṃ punaḥ sādhyata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6147: svatantrasya karturasmaraṇādeva hi sthite vedasya nityatva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6158: niranvayasya tu jagataḥ pravilaye 'tyantāsataścāpūrvasyotpāde 'bhidhānābhidheyāvatyantamucchinnāviti kimāśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ syāt /
