GSP33vacbhamu:6161: antaḥkaraṇādyupādhikalpitā hi te tadvicchede na sthātumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6164: brahmaṇaśca sṛṣṭyādāvantaḥkaraṇāni tadavacchinnāścha jīvāḥ prādurbhavanto napūrvakarmāvidyāvāsanāvanto bhavitumarhanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6170: yadyapi mahāpralayasamaye nāntaḥkaraṇādayaḥ samudācaradvṛttayaḥ santi tathāpi svakāraṇe
GSP33vacbhamu:6171: 'nirvācyāyāmavidyāyāṃ līnāḥ sūkṣmeṇa śaktirūpeṇa karmavikṣepakāvidyāvāsanābhiḥ mahāvatiṣṭhanta eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:6175: te cāvadhaiṃ prāpya parameśvarecchāpracoditā yathā kūrmadehe nilīnānyaṅgāni tato niḥsaranti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6176: yathā vā varṣāpāye prāptamṛdbhāvāni maṇḍūkaśarīrāṇi tadvāsanāvāsitatayā ghanaghanāghanāsārāvasekasuhitāni punarmaṇḍūkadehabhāvamanubhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6180: naca sargapralayapravāhasyānāditāmantareṇaitadupapadyata iti sargapralayābyupagaṃme 'pi saṃsārānāditā na virudhyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6186: tathāpi mahāpralayāntarite kutaḥ smaraṇaṃ vedānāmityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6189: tathāpi karmavikṣepasaṃskārasahitalayalakṣaṇā vidyāvaśeṣatāsāmyena svāpapralayāvasthayārabheda iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6193: prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣayośca vāsanocchedakāraṇayorabhāvena satyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ smaraṇopapatteḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhavedavyahārānucchedo yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6195: prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣau ca tatra saṃskāramātrocchedahetū sta iti kutaḥ suṣuptavatpūrvaprabodhavyavahāravaduttaprabodhavyavahāra iti codayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:6205: tatra kaiva kathā parameśvarānugraheṇa dharmajñānavairāgyaiśvaryātiśayasaṃpannānāṃ hiraṇyagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mahādhiyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:6206: yathāvā ā ca manuṣyebhya ā ca kṛmibhyo jñānādīnāmanubhūyate nikarṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6207: evamā manuṣyebhya eva ā ca bhagavato hiraṇyagarbhajjñānādīnāṃ prakarṣe 'pi saṃbhāvte /
GSP33vacbhamu:6229: tathā sati vastusāmarthyaniyamābhāvātsarvaṃ sarvasmādbhavediti pipāsurapi dahanamāhṛtya pipāsāmupaśamayet,
GSP33vacbhamu:6232: evaṃ ya eva vedā asminkalpe ta eva kalpāntare,
GSP33vacbhamu:6233: ta eva caiṣāmarthā ta eva ca varṇāśramāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6244: kiṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyā svaviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ kiṃvā kāsucideva keṣāñcit /
GSP33vacbhamu:6248: asau vā ādityo devamadhvityatra hi manuṣyā ādityaṃ madhvadhyāsenopāsīran /
GSP33vacbhamu:6249: upāsyopāsakabhāvo hi bhedādhiṣṭhāno na svātmanyādityasya devatāyāḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6253: ayamarthaḥ-'asau vā ādityo devamadhu' iti devānāṃ modahetutvānmadhviva madhu /
GSP33vacbhamu:6259: yathā hi bhramarāḥ puṣpebhya āhṛtya makarandaṃ svasthānamānayantyevamṛṅmantrabhramarāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6264: āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ yajurvedamantrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6267: āhṛtyau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ sāmamantrastotrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6269: athāsyādityamadhuna udīcibhiratikṛṣṇābhī raśmināḍībhirathavedavihitebhyaḥ karmakusumebhya āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhavamāpannamatharvāṅgirasamantrabhramarāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6271: aśvamedhe vācaḥ stome ca pāriplavaṃ śaṃsanti iti śravaṇāditihāsapurāṇamantrāṇāmapyasti prayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6273: athāsya yā ādityamadhuna ūrdhvā raśmināḍyo gopyāstābhirupāsanabhramarāḥ praṇavakusumādāhṛtyādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6275: tā etā ādityavyapāśrayāḥ pañca rohitādayo raśmināḍya ṛgādisaṃbaddhāḥ krameṇopadiśyeti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6276: etadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvopalabhya yathāsvaṃ samastaijha karaṇairyaśastejahandriyasākalyavīryānnādyānyamṛtaṃ tadupalabhyāditye tṛpyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6277: tena khalvamṛtena devānāṃ vasvādīnāṃ modanaṃ vidadhadādityo madhu /
GSP33vacbhamu:6282: ākāśasya hi sarvagatatvaṃ rūpādihīnatve ca brahmaṇā sārūpyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6283: tasya caitasyākāśasya brahmaṇaścatvāraḥ pādā agnyādayaḥ 'agniḥ pādaḥ' ityādinā darśitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6284: yathā hi goḥ pādā na gavā viyujyatanta,
GSP33vacbhamu:6286: tadevamākāśasya catuṣpado brahmadṛṣṭiṃ vidhāya svarūpeṇa vāyuṃ saṃvargaguṇakamupāsyaṃ vidhātuṃ mahīkaroti-vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6290: yadyucyeta nāviśeṣaṇa sarveṣāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyāsvadhikāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6303: indro vṛtrāṇi jighrate' iti vigrahavattvaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādā abhivadanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6304: tathā havirbhojanaṃ devatāyā darśayanti 'addhīndra piba caprasthitasya' ityādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6305: yatheśanam-'indro diva indra īśe pṛthivyā indro apāmindra itparvatānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:6306: indro vṛdhāmindra inmedhirāṇāmindraḥ kṣeme yoge havya indraḥ' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6308: tathā varivasitāraṃ prati devatāyāḥ prasādaṃ prasannāyāśca phaladānāṃ darśayati-'āhutibhireva devān hutādaḥ prīṇāti tasmai prītā iṣamūrjaṃ ca yacchanti' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6312: laukikā api devatāvigrahādipañcakaṃ smaranti coparacaranti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:6318: tathāsyāḥ prasādaṃ ca prasannāyāśca phaladānamāhuḥ-prasanno 'sya paśupatiḥ putro 'sya jātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6333: vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāpadyamānā arthavādā vidhiviṣayaprāśastyalakṣaṇāparā na svārthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6334: 'yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ' iti hi śābdanyāyavidaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6343: na caikaṃ vākyamubhayaparaṃ bhavatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6347: kathamupayujyantāṃ teṣa teṣu karmasvityapekṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭe prakāre saṃbhavati nādṛṣṭakalpanocitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6350: autsargikī cārthaparatā padānamityapekṣitaprayogasamavetārthasmaraṇatātparyāṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ nānadhigate vigrahādāvapi tātparyaṃ yujyata iti na tebhyo 'pi tatsiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6367: nahi śvitrinirṇejanaparaṃ śveto dhāvatīti vākyamitaḥ sārameyagamanaṃ gamayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6372: nahyudakāharaṇārthinā ghaṭadarśanāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣurghaṭapaṭau vā paṭaṃ vā kevalaṃ nopalabhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6375: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-loke viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanāya padāni prayuktāni tadantareṇa na svārthamātrasmāraṇe paryavasyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6376: nahi svārthasmāraṇamātrāya loke padānāṃ prayogo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6378: na caitānyasmāritasvārthāni sākṣādvākyārthaṃ pratyāyayitumīśate iti svārthasmāraṇaṃ vākyārthamitathe 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ kalpitaḥ padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:6379: naca yadarthaṃ yattattena vinā paryavasyatīti na svārthamātrabhidhāne paryavasānaṃ padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:6388: yatra tu vākyasyaikasya vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhastatra lokānusārato bhūtārthavyutpattau
GSP33vacbhamu:6391: yathā 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta' ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:6392: iha hi yadi na svādhyāyādhyāyanavidhiḥ svādhyāyaśabdavācyaṃ vedarāśiṃ puruṣārthatāmaneṣyattato bhūtārthamātraparyavasitā nārthavādā vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāgamiṣyam
GSP33vacbhamu:6393: tasmāt svādhyāyavidhivaśātkaimarthyākāṅkṣāyāṃ vṛttāntadigocarāḥ santastatpratyāyanadvāreṇa vidheyaprāśastyaṃ lakṣayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6397: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārthasaṃbaddhabheva tīraṃ lakṣayati na tu samudratīraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6401: ata eva yatra pramāṇāntaraviruddhārtā arthavādā dṛśyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:6406: tasmādyatra sor'thorthavādānāṃ pramāṇāntaraviruddhastatra guṇavādena prāśastyalakṣaṇeti lakṣitalakṣaṇā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6407: yatra tu pramāṇāntarasaṃvādastatra pramāṇāntarādivārthavādādapi sor'thaḥ prasidhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:6410: pramātā hyavyutpannaḥ prathamaṃ yathā pratyakṣādibhyor'thamavagacchati na tathāmnāyataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6420: yathaikasminvākye padānāṃ padārthā dvārato vākyārthaśca tātparyato viṣayaḥ evaṃ vākyadvayaikavākyatāyāmapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:6425: yathā viṣaṃ bhakṣayeti vākyaṃ mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti vākyāntarārthaparaṃ sat /
GSP33vacbhamu:6426: yatra tu tātparyaṃ tatra mānāntaravirodhe pauruṣeyapramāṇameva bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6432: tatra dvārato 'pi viṣayaḥ pratīyamāno na śakyastyaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6435: tathā satyanadhigataṃ vigrahādi pratipādayam vākyaṃ bhidyeteti cet addhā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6439: naca yasya yatra na tātparyaṃ tasya tatrāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6441: sati viśiṣṭaparaṃ vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇeṣvapramāṇamiti viśiṣṭaparamapi na syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:6445: tasmādviśiṣṭapratyayaparebhyo 'pi viśeṣaṇāni pratīyamānāni tasyaiva vākyasya viṣayatvenānicchatāpyabhyupeyāni yathā,
GSP33vacbhamu:6446: tadyānyaparebhyo 'pyarthavādavākyebhyo devatāvigrahādayaḥ pratīyamānā asati pramāṇāntaravirodhe na yuktāstyaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6454: sa tu padārthāntaraviśiṣṭaḥ padārtha ekaḥ kkacid dvārabhūtaḥ kkacid dvārītyetāvān viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6455: nanvevaṃ sati odanaṃ bhuktvā grāmaṃ gacchatītyatrāpi vākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6459: bhuktveti hi samānakartṛkatā pūrvakālatā ca pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6461: tasmādyāvati padābhyāṃ viśiṣṭārthapratyayaparyavasānāt pañcaṣaṭpadavati vākye ekasminnānātvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6465: tasmādvidhivākyādarthavādavākyamanyaditi vākyayoreva svasvavākyārthapratyayāvasitavyāpārayoḥ paścātkutaścidapekṣāyāṃ parasparānvaya iti siddham
GSP33vacbhamu:6467: devatāmuddiśya haviravamṛśya ca tadviṣayasvatvatyāga iti yāgaśarīram /
GSP33vacbhamu:6469: naca rūparahitā cetasi śakyata ālekhitumiti yāgavidhinaiva tadrūpāpekṣimā yādṛśamanyaparebhyo 'pi mantrārthavādebhyastadrūpamavagataṃ tadabhyupeyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6472: yathā hi 'vrātyo vrātyastomena yajate' iti vrātyasvarūpāpekṣāyāṃ yasya pitā pitāmaho vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti vidhināpekṣitaṃ sadarthavādato 'vagamyamānaṃ vidhipramāṇakam,
GSP33vacbhamu:6475: devatāyāḥ samāropeṇāpi ca rūpajñānamupapadyata iti samāropitameva rūpaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādairucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6478: tasya tu rūpasyāsati bādhake 'nubhāvarūḍhaṃ tathābhāvaṃ parityajyānyathātvamananubhūyamānamasāṃprataṃ kalpiyatum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6487: api tu itihāsapurāṇalokasmaraṇebhyo mantrārthavādamūlebhyo vā pratyakṣādamūlebhyo vetyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6491: tadevaṃ mantrārthavādādisiddhe devatāvigrahādau gurvādipūjāvaddevatāpūjātmako yāmo devatāprasādādidvāreṇa saphalo 'vakalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6493: na caivaṃ yajñakarmaṇo devatāṃ prati guṇabhāvāddevatātaḥ phalotpāde yāgabhāvanāyāḥ śrutaṃ phalavattvaṃ yāgasya ca tāṃ prati tatphalāṃśaṃ vā prati śrutaṃ karaṇatvaṃ hātavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6497: tasmātkarmaṇo 'pūrvāvāntaravyāpārasya vā devatāprasādāvāntaravyāpārasya vā phalavattvāt pradhānatvamubhayasminnapi pakṣe samānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6498: natu devatāyā vigrahādimatyāḥ prādhānyamiti na dharmamīmāṃsāyāḥ sūtram-'api vā śabdapūrvatvādyajñakarma pradhānaṃ guṇatve devatāśrutiḥ' iti virudhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6505: nirmṛṣṭanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅge śāśvatika ānande kasya nāma cetanasyārthitā nāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6508: dvividhaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ nijaṃ cāgantukaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:6518: naca tathā brahmavidyāyāmalaukikamasti sādhanaṃ yacchūdrasya na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6526: nahi 'svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ' iti kañcit kratuṃ prakṛtya paṭhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6530: nahi yathā juhvādi avyabhicaritakratusaṃbaddhamevaṃ svādhyāya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6539: na cādhyayanaṃ vā svādhyāyo vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā prāgvidheḥ puruṣecchādhīnapravṛttiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6544: tathā cādhyayanavidheraniyāmakatvācchūdrasyādhyayanena vā pustakādipāṭhena vā sāmarthyamastīti so 'pi brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6547: 'aha hāretvā śūdra' iti śūdraṃ saṃbodhya tasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6550: tasmādyathānadhīyānasyeṣṭau niṣādasthapateradhikāro vacanasāmarthyādevaṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śūdrasyādhikāro bhaviṣyatīti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6557: suvarṇaṃ bhāryamitivadārthavādikaṃ vā phalaṃ kalpayitvā viniyogabhaṅgena svādhyāyenādhīyītetyevamarthaḥ kalpatāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6559: na dṛṣṭadvāreṇa paramparayāpyanyato 'pekṣitapratilambhe ca yathāśrutiviniyogopapattau ca saṃbhavantyāṃ śrutiviniyogabhaṅgenādhyayanādevāśrutādṛṣṭaphalakalpanocitā
GSP33vacbhamu:6563: natu suvarṇadhāraṇādau dṛṣṭadvāreṇa kiñcit paramparayāpyastyapekṣitaṃ puruṣasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:6566: iti sthāpitaṃ tadā yasyādhyayanaṃ tasyaiva karmabrahmāvabodho 'bhyudayaniḥśreyasaprayojano nānyasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:6569: śūdrāṇāṃ na phalāya kalpata iti śāstrīyasāmarthyābhāvānna śūdro brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyata iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:6583: sa cānyataḥ siddhamarthamavadyotayati na tu prāpayatītyadhvaramīmāṃsakāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6584: asmākaṃ tu anyaparādapi vākyādasati bādhake pramāṇāntareṇārtho 'vagamyamāno vidhinā cāpekṣitaḥ svīkriyata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:6588: vidhyuddeśagatatve tvayaṃ nyāyo 'podyate vacanabalanniṣādasthapativanna tveṣa vidhyuddeśagata ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6590: apica kimarthavādabalādvidyāmātre 'dhikāraḥ śūdrasya kalpate saṃvargavidyāyāṃ vā na tāvadvidyāmātra ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6593: astu tarhi saṃvargavidyāyāmeva śūdrasyādhikāra ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6599: evaṃ kilātropākhyāyate-jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇo bahudāyī śraddhādeyo bahupākyaḥ priyātithirbabhūva /
GSP33vacbhamu:6600: sa ca teṣu teṣu grāmanagaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vividhānāmannapānānāṃ pūrṇānatithibhya āvasathān karayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6602: athāsya rājño dānaśauṇḍasya guṇagārimasotaṣitāḥ santo devarṣayo haṃsarūpamāsthāya tadanugrahāya tasya nidāghasamaye doṣā harmyatalasthasyopari mālāmābadhyājagmuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6603: teṣāmagresaraṃ haṃsaṃ saṃbodhya pṛṣṭhataḥ patannekatamo haṃsaḥ sādbhutamabhyuvāda /
GSP33vacbhamu:6604: bho bho bhallākṣa jānaśruterasya pautrāyaṇasya dyuniśaṃ dyuloka āyataṃ jyotistinmā prasāṅkṣīrmaitattvā dhākṣīditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:6610: yasmādayaṃ varākastasmātkamenaṃ kiṃbhūtametaṃ santaṃ prāṇimātraṃ jānaśrutimāttha /
GSP33vacbhamu:6612: tasya hi bhagavataḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtasya raikkasya brahmavido dharme trailokyodaravartiprāṇabhṛnmātradharmo
GSP33vacbhamu:6615: jānaśrutiḥ kitava ivākṣaparājitaḥ paunaḥpunyena niḥśvasannudvelaṃ kathaṃ kathamapi
GSP33vacbhamu:6617: tato niśāvasānapiśunamanibhṛtavandāruvṛndaprārabdhastutisahasrasaṃvalitaṃ maṅgalatūryanirdhoṣamākarṇya talpatalastha eva rājā ekapade yantānaramāhūyādideśa,
GSP33vacbhamu:6619: raikkāhvayaṃ brahmavidamekaratiṃ sayugvānamativivikteṣu teṣu teṣu vepinanaganikuñjanadīpulinādipradeśeṣvanviṣya prayatnato 'smabhyamācakṣveti
GSP33vacbhamu:6620: sa ca tatra tatrānviṣyan kkacidativivekte dese śakaṭasyādhastāt pāmānaṃ kaṇḍūyamānaṃ brāhmaṇāyanamadrākṣīt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6621: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā raikko 'yaṃ bhaviteti pratibhāvānupaviśya savinayamaprākṣīt,
GSP33vacbhamu:6624: tasya ca raikkabhāvānumatiṃ ca taistairiṅgitairgārhasthyecchāṃ dhanāyāṃ connīya yantā rājñe nivedayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6625: rājā tu taṃ niśamya gavāṃ ṣaṭśatāni niṣkaṃ ca hāraṃ cāśvatarīrathaṃ cādāya satvaraṃ raikkaṃ praticakrame /
GSP33vacbhamu:6627: hai raikka, gavāṃ ṣaṭśatānīmāni niṣkaśca hāra ścāyamaśvatarīrathaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6630: tamevamuktavantaṃ prati sāṭopaṃ ca saspṛhaṃ covāca raikkaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6634: hāreṇa yuktā itvā gantrī ratho hāretvā sa gobhiḥ saha tavaivāstu,
GSP33vacbhamu:6635: kimetanmātreṇa mama dhanenākalpavartino gārhasthyasya nirvāhānupayogineti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6636: āharetveti tu pāṭhonarthakatayā ca gobhiḥ sahetyatra pratisaṃbandhyanupādānena cācāryairdūṣitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6637: tadasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ śakyaḥ śūdraśabdena jānaśrutī rājanyo 'pyavayavavyutpattyā vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6638: sa hi raikkaḥ parokṣajñatāṃ cikhyāpayiṣurātmano jānaśruteḥ śūdreti śucaṃ sūcayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6639: kathaṃ punaḥ śūdraśabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6647: tasmāttadādravaṇāditi tacchabdena śugvā jānaśrutirvā raikko vā parāmṛśyata ityuktam //34 // 1.3.9.35.
GSP33vacbhamu:6649: itaśca na jātiśūdro jānaśrutiḥ yatkāraṇaṃprakaraṇanirūpeṇa kriyamāṇe kṣatriyatvamasya jānaśruteravagamyate caijñarathena liṅgāditi vyācakṣāṇaḥ prakaraṇaṃ nirūpayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:6651: caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā niścitakṣātriyatvena samānāyāṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ samabhivyāhārālliṅgātsaṃdigdhakṣatriyabāvo jānaśrutiḥ kṣatriyo niścīyate
GSP33vacbhamu:6652: 'atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyamabhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe' iti prasiddhayājakatvena kāpeyenābhiprayāriṇo yogaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6659: etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayannitichandogānāṃ dvirātre śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6661: eṣa cābhipratāri citrarathādanyaḥ sanneva kāpeyānāṃ rājyo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6662: yadi caitrarathiḥ syāt samānānvayānāṃ hi prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6667: kṣattṛpreṣaṇe cārthasaṃbhave ca tādṛśasya vadānyapraṣṭhasyaiśvaryaṃ prāyeṇa kṣatriyasya dṛṣṭaṃ yudhiṣṭhirādivaditi //35 // 1.3.9.36.
GSP33vacbhamu:6669: na kevalamupanītādhyayanavidhiparāmarśena na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ kintu teṣu teṣu vidyopadeśeṣūpanayanasaṃskāraparāmarśāt śūdrasya tadabhāvābhidhānādbrahmavidyāyāmanadhikāra iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6674: tacca dvijātīnāmiti dvijātaya eva niṣiddhopanayanā adhikriyante na śūdra iti //36 // 1.3.9.37.
GSP33vacbhamu:6676: satyakāmo ha vai jābālaḥ pramītapitṛkaḥ svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāṃ prapaccha,
GSP33vacbhamu:6685: sa hovāc, nāvijñātagotra upanīyata iti kiṅgotro 'sīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6686: athovāca satyakāmo nāhaṃ veda svaṃ gotraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6691: tenāsminna śūdratvasaṃbhāvanāstīti tvāṃ dvijātijanmānamupaneṣya ityupanetamanuśāsituṃ ca jābālaṃ gautamaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6699: prāṇavajraśrutihalādvākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca bhaṅktvā vāyuḥ pañcavṛttirādhyātmiko bāhyaścātra pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6703: vāyureva hi vāhyo dhūmajyotiḥsalilasaṃvalitaḥ parjanyabhāvena pariṇato vidyutstanayitnuvṛṣṭyaśanibhāvena vivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6704: yadyapi ca sarvaṃ jagaditi savāyukaṃ pratīyate tathāpi sarvaśabda āpekṣiko 'pi na svābhidheyaṃ jahāti kintu saṃkucadvṛttirbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6708: amṛtaśabdo 'pi maraṇābhāvavacano na sārvakālikaṃ tadabhāvaṃ brūte,
GSP33vacbhamu:6716: brahmaṇonahi bibhdetajjagatkṛtnnaṃ svavyāpāre niyamena pravartate na tu maryādāmativartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6724: yatkhalu pṛṣṭaṃ tadeva pradhānaṃ prativaktavyamiti tasya prakaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6727: 'apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati' iti śrutyā hyapamṛtyorvijaya ukto natu paramamṛtyuvijaya ityāpe..kitvaṃ (?)
GSP33vacbhamu:6729: na kevalamapaśrutyā tadāpekṣikamapi tu paramātmānamabhidhāya 'ato 'nyadārtam' iti vāṭvāderārtatvābhidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6741: ādityaścārcirādyapekṣayā paraṃ jyotirbhavatīti tadupasaṃpadya tasya samīpe bhūtvā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6743: brahmajyotiḥpakṣe tu brahma bhūtvā kā parā svarūpaniṣpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6745: sā hi brahmabhūyātprācīnā na tu parācīnā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6747: tasmāttisṛbhiḥ śrutibhiḥ prakaraṇabādhanātteja evātra jyotiriti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6758: natu śrutyanurodhamātreṇa prakaraṇādapakraṣṭavyā iti hi lokasthitiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6759: anyathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisādhānopasaṃhāre ca tadantaḥ pātino 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo vidhiśrutyanurodhena pṛthagvidhayaḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:6760: tatkimidānīṃ 'tisra eva sāhnasyopasadaḥ kāryā dvādaśāhīnasya' iti prakaraṇānurodhātsāmudāyaprasiddhibalalabdhamahargāṇābhidhānaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6763: sa hi kṛtsnavidhānānna kutaścidapi hīyate kratorityahīnaḥ śakyo vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6765: avayavaprasiddheḥ samudāyaprasiddhirbalīyasīti śrutyā prakaraṇabādhanānna dvādaśopakratomahīnaguṇayukte jyotiṣṭome śaknoti vidhātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6769: tenānapakṛṣṭenaiva dvādaśāhīnasyetivākyena sāhnasya tisra usapadaḥ kāryā iti vidhiṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6770: stotuṃ dvādaśāhavihitā dvādaśopasattā tatprakṛtitvena ca sarvāhīneṣu prāptā nivītādivadanūdyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6771: tasmādahīnaśrutyā prakaraṇabādhe 'pi na dvādaśāhīnasyeti vākyasya prakaraṇādapakarṣa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6774: iha tvapakṛṣṭasyārcirādimārgopadeśe phalasyopāyamārgapratipādake 'tiviśade 'eṣa saṃprasādaḥ' iti vākyasyāviśadaikadeśamātrapratipādakasya niṣprayojanatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:6775: naca dvadaśāhīnasyetivadyathoktātmadhyānasādhanānuṣṭhānaṃ stotumeṣa saṃprasāda iti vacamarcirādimārgamanuvadatīti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:6784: iha tu svārthasaṃsargatātparye noktadoṣaprasaṅga iti paurvāparyālocanayā prakaraṇānurodhādrūḍhimapi pūrvakālatāmapi parityajya prakaraṇānuguṇyena jyotiḥ paraṃ brahma pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6788: naca kramamuktyabhiprāyaṃ svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vacanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6790: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasmāt prāṇā utkrāmanti atraiva samavanīyante' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6792: arcirādimārgasya hi kāryabrahmalokaprāpakatvaṃ na tu brahmabhūyahetubhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6795: tasmānna jyotirādityamupasaṃpadya saṃprasādasya jīvasya svena rūpeṇa pāramārthikena brahmaṇābhiniṣpattirāñjasīti śruteratrāpi kleśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6796: apica paraṃ jyotiḥ sa uttamapuruṣa itihaivopariṣṭādviśeṣaṇāttejaso vyāvartya puruṣaviṣayatvenāvasthāpanājjyotiḥpadasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:6797: parameva brahma jyotiḥ na tu teja iti siddham //40 // 1.3.12.41.
GSP33vacbhamu:6801: nāmarūpe antarā brahmeti ca nākāśasya nāmarūpayornirvahiturantarālatvamāha,
GSP33vacbhamu:6811: bhūtākāśaṃ ca vikāratvena nāmarūpāntaḥpāti sat kathamātmānamudvahet /
GSP33vacbhamu:6812: nahi suśikṣito 'pi vijñānī svena skandhenātmānaṃ voḍhumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6813: naca nāmarūpaśrutiraviśeṣataḥ pravṛttā bhūtākāśavarjaṃ nāmarūpāntare saṃkocayituṃ sati saṃbhave yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6814: naca nirvāhakatvaṃ niraṅkuśamavagataṃ brahmaliṅgaṃ kathañcitkleśena paratantre netumucitam
GSP33vacbhamu:6815: 'anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi' iti ca sraṣṭṛtvamatisphuṭaṃ brahmaliṅgamatra pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6816: brahmarūpatayā ca jīvasya vyākartṛtve brahmaṇa eva vyākartṛtvamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6818: tathā ca te nāmarūpe yadantaretyayamarthāntaravyapadeśa upapanno bhavatyākāśasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:6825: tameva ca 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' ityādiśrutisaṃdarbha ādimadhyāvasāneṣvāmṛśatīti tadanuvādaparo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6828: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kaścidatra nityaśuddhabuddhamuktatvabhāvaḥ pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6829: yattu suṣuptyutkrāntyoḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta iti bhedaṃ manyase,
GSP33vacbhamu:6831: tena suṣuptyutkrāntyavasthāyāṃ viśeṣaviṣayābhāvātsaṃpiṇḍitaprajñeva prājñenātmanā svabhāvenā pariṣvakto na kiñcidvedetyabhede 'pi bhedavadupacāreṇa yojanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6833: patyādayaśca śabdāḥ saṃsāriṇyeva kāryakaraṇasaṃghātātmakasya jagato jīvakarmārjitatayā tadbhogyatayā ca yojanīyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6834: tasmātsaṃsāryevānūdyate na tu paramātmā pratipadyata iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6840: tatpratipādakā hi śataśa āgamāḥ 'īkṣaternāśabdam' 'gatisāmānyāt' ityādibiḥ sūtrasaṃdarbhairupapāditāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6843: naca prājñasya paramātmano jīvādbhedena saṃkīrtanaṃ sati saṃbhave rāhoḥ śira itivadaupacārikaṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6844: naca prājñaśabdaḥ prajñāprakarṣaśālini nirūḍhavṛttiḥ kathañcidajñaviṣayo vyākhyātumucitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6847: tasmātsuṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena jīvātprājñasya paramātmano vyapadeśāt 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ' ityādinā jīvātmānaṃ lokasiddhamanūdya tasya paramātmabhāvo 'nanadhigataḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6852: evaṃ ca mahattvaṃ cājatvaṃ ca sarvagatasya nityasyātmanaḥ saṃbhavānnāpekṣikaṃ kalpayiṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6866: kiñca sa evaṃbhūto hyadyantarjyotiḥ puruṣo vijñānamayo na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānutkṛṣṭo bhavatītyevamādyāḥ śrutayo 'saṃsāriṇaṃ paramātmānameva pratipādayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6867: tasmājjīvātmānaṃ mānāntarasiddhamanūdya tasya brahmabhāvapratipādanaparo 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ' ityādivākyasaṃdarbha iti siddham //43 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6873: brahmajījñāsāṃ pratijñāya brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamuktam-'janmādyasya yataḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6877: gatisāmānyaṃ ca vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmakaraṇavādaṃ prati vidyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6880: naca 'mahataḥ paramavyaktam' ityādīnāṃ pradhāne samanvaye 'pi vyabhāciraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6883: naca tatsadbhāvamātreṇa 'janmādyasya yataḥ' iti brahmalakṣaṇasya kiñciddhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6891: evaṃ ca lakṣaṇavyabhicārādavyabhicārāya yukta uttarasaṃdarbhārambha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6912: yathāhuḥ-'ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāsta eva caiṣāmarthāḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6925: pradhāsyākāṅkṣāvato vacanaṃ prakaraṇamiti gantavyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ pradhānamiti tadākāṅkṣāmavatārayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:6929: nanvāntaratvena yadi śreṣṭhatvaṃ tadendriyāṇāmeva bāhyebhyo gandhāhibhyaḥ śreṣṭhatvaṃ syādityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6933: grahebhyaścendriyebhyo 'tigrahayārthānāṃ pradhānyaṃ śrutyā vivakṣitamitīndriyebhyor'thānāṃ prādhānyātparatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6934: ghrāṇajihvāvākcakṣuḥ śrotramanohastatvaco hi indriyāṇi śrutyāṣṭau grahā uktāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6942: grahatvenendriyaiḥ sāmye 'pi manasaḥ svagatena viśeṣeṇārthebhyaḥ paratvamāha
GSP33vacbhamu:6954: tadevaṃ sarvāsāṃ buddhīnāṃ prathamajahiraṇyagarbhabuddhyekanīḍatayā hiraṇyagarbhabuddhermahattvaṃ cāpanādā(copanādānā?)tmatvaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:6956: nanvetasminpakṣe hiraṇyagarbhabuddherātmatvānna rathita ātmano bhokturatropādānamiti na rathamātraṃ pariśiṣyate 'pi tu rathavānapītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:6958: yathā hi samāropitaṃ pratibimbaṃ bimbānna vastuto bhidyate tathā na paramātmano vijñānātmā vastuto bhidyata iti paramātmaiva rathavānihopāttastena rathamātraṃ parisiṣṭamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6959: atha rathādirūpakakalpanāyāḥ śarīrādiṣu kiṃ prayojanamityata āha
GSP33vacbhamu:6983: pradhānaṃ hi sāṃkhyānāṃ seśvarāṇāmanīśvarāṇāṃ veśvarāt kṣetrajñebhyo vā vastuto bhinnaṃ śakyaṃ nirvaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6984: brahmaṇastviyamavidyā śaktirmāyādiśabdavācyā na śakyā tattvenānyatvena vā nirvaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6993: yadi brahmaṇo 'vidyāśaktyā saṃsāraḥ pratīyate hanta muktānāmapi punarutpādaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6995: tadvināśe vā samastasaṃsārocchedaḥ tanmūlavidyāśakteḥ samucchedādityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7003: tena yasyaiva jīvasya vidyotpannā tasyaivāvidyāpanīyate na jīvāntarasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:7007: pradhānasyaikatvena taducchede sarvocchedo 'nucchede vā na kasyacidityanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ. pradhānabhede 'pi caitadavivekakhyātilakṣaṇāvidyāsadasattvanibandhanau
GSP33vacbhamu:7010: na cāvidyopādhibhedādhīno jīvabhedo jīvabhedādhīnaścāvidyopādhibheda iti parasparāśrayādubhayāsiddhiriti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7015: nahyacetanaṃ caitanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ kāryāya paryāptamiti svakāryaṃ kartuṃ parameśvaraṃ nimittatayopādānatayā vāśrayate,
GSP33vacbhamu:7017: tena yathāhivibhramo rajjūpādāna evaṃ prapañcavibhrama īśvaropādānaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7022: yasyāṃ svarūpapratibodharahitāḥ śerate saṃsāriṇo jīvā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7028: yadyapi jīvāvyaktayoranāditvenāniyataṃ paurvāparyaṃ tathāpyavyaktasya pūrvatvaṃ vivakṣitvaitaduktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7051: natu ṣāṭkauśikasya sthūlasyaṣa etaddhi dṛṣṭabībhatsatayā sukaraṃ vairāgyaviṣayatvena śodhayitumityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7054: viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamavagamayituṃ paraṃ paramatra pratipādyatvena prastutaṃ na tu vairāgyāya śodhanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7061: sāṃkhyaiḥ khalu pradhānādvivekena puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasāya jñātuṃ vā vibhūtyai vā pradhānaṃ jñeyatvenopakṣipyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7062: na ceha jānīyāditi copāsīteti vā vidhivibhaktiśrutirasti,
GSP33vacbhamu:7069: varapradānopakramā hi mṛtyunaciketaḥ saṃvādavākyapravṛttirāmāpteḥ kaṭhavallīnāṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7070: mṛtyuḥ kila na ciketase kupitena pitrā prahitāya tuṣṭastrīnvarān pradadau /
GSP33vacbhamu:7071: naciketāstu pathamena vareṇa pituḥ saumanasyaṃ vavre,
GSP33vacbhamu:7075: nanu tatra varapradāne pradhānagocare staḥ praśnapartivacane /
GSP33vacbhamu:7078: 'hantaḥ ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam' ityanena vyavahitaṃ jīvaviṣayaṃ 'yathā tu maraṇaṃ prāpyātmā bhavati gautama' ityādiprativacanamiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7080: kiṃ vānyo jīvasya 'yeyaṃ prete' manuṣya iti praśāntaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7085: varapradānānantarbhāve praśnasya tadvat pradhānākhyānamapyanantarbhūtaṃ varapradāne 'stu 'mahataḥ paramavyakta'mityākṣepaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7091: vāstavaśca jīvaparamātmanorabhedastatra tatra śrutyupanyāsena bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7093: 'yeyaṃ prete' iti hi naciketasaḥ praśnamupaśrutya tattatkāmaviṣayamalobhaṃ cāsya
GSP33vacbhamu:7094: pratītya mṛtyuḥ 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye' ityādinā naciketasaṃ praśasya
GSP33vacbhamu:7100: apica yadviṣayaṃ praśnamupaśrutya mṛtyunaiṣa praśaṃsito naciketāḥ yadi tameva bhūyaḥ pṛcchettaduttare cāvadadhyāt tataḥ praśaṃsā dṛṣṭārthā syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7108: puruṣārthakriyākṣamaṃ sattasya bhāvaḥ sattā tanmātraṃ mahattattvamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7109: yā yā puruṣārthakriyā śabdādyupabhogalakṣaṇā ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātilakṣaṇā ca sā sarvā mahati buddhau samāpyata iti mahattattvaṃ sattāmātramucyata iti //7 // 1.4.2.8.
GSP33vacbhamu:7111: ajāśabdo yadyapi chāgāyāṃ rūḍhastathāpyadhyātmavidyādhikārānna tatra kartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7113: tatra kiṃ svatantraṃ pradhānamanena mantravarṇenānūdyatāmuta pārameśvarī māyāśaktistejo 'bannavyākriyākāraṇamucyatām kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7115: tathāhi-yādṛśaṃ pradhānaṃ sāṃkhyaiḥ smaryate tādṛśamevāsminnanyūnānatiriktaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7116: sā hi pradhānalakṣaṇā prakṛtirna jāyata ityajā ca ekā ca lohitaśuklakṛṣṇā ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7117: yadyapi lohitatvādayo varṇā na rajaḥprabhṛtiṣu santi,
GSP33vacbhamu:7128: 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nyaḥ' iti tvātmabhedaśravaṇāt sāṃkhyasmṛterevātra mantravarṇe pratyabhijñānaṃ na tvavyākṛtaprakriyāyāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7132: avayavāḥ pradhānasmaikasya sattvarajastamāṃsi teṣāṃ dharmā lohitatvādayastairiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7148: viṣayā hi śabdādayaḥ prakṛtivikārastraiguṇyena sukhaduḥkhamohātmāna indriyamano 'haṅkārapraṇālikayā buddhisattvamupasaṃkrāmanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7149: tena tadbuddhisattvaṃ pradhānavikāraḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ śabdādirūpeṇa pariṇamate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7150: citiśaktistvapariṇāminyapratisaṃkramāpi buddhisattvādātmano vivekabudhyamānā buddhivṛttyaiva viparyāsenāvidyayā buddhisthānsukhādīnātmanyabhimanyamānā sukhādimatīva bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7162: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-na tāvat 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogamajo
GSP33vacbhamu:7164: sa cānūdito bhedaḥ 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā' ityādiśrutibhirātmaikatvapratipādanaparābhirvirodhātkalpaniko 'vatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7165: tathāca na sāṃkhyaprakriyāpratyabhijñānamityajāvākyaṃ camasavākyavatpariplavamānaṃ na svatantrapradhānaniścayāya paryāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7179: ajāpadasya ca samudāyaprasiddhiparityāgena na jāyata ityavayavaprasiddhyāśrayaṇe doṣaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7181: api cāyamapi śrutikalāpo 'smaddarśanānuguṇo na sāṃkhyasmṛtyanuguṇa ityāha
GSP33vacbhamu:7186: yathāhuḥ-'puruṣasya tu śuddhasya nāśuddhā vikṛtirbavet' ityāśayavatīva śrutiḥ pṛcchati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7189: te brahmavido dhyānayogenātmānaṃ gatāḥ prāptā apaśyanniti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7202: nanu kiṃ chāgā lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaivānyādṛśīnāmapi chāgānāmupalambhādityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7209: pañcajanā iti hi samāsārthaḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7210: naca 'diksaṃkhye saṃjñāyām' iti samāsavidhānānmanujeṣu nirūḍho 'yaṃ pañcajanaśabda iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7212: evaṃ cātmani pcamanujānāmākāśasya ca pratiṣṭhānamiti nistātparyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7216: tatrāpi kiṃ pañca prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣagatā vivakṣyante uta tadatiriktā anya eva vā kecit /
GSP33vacbhamu:7223: tasmātkānicideva tattvānīha pañca pratyekaṃ pañcasaṃkhyāyogīni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7225: pañcaviṃśatitattvāni smaryanta iti tānyevānena mantreṇocyanta iti nāśabdaṃ pradhānādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7226: na cādhāratvenātmano vyavasthānātsvātmani cādhārādheyabhāvasya virodhāt ākāśasya ca vyatirecanāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7227: trayoviṃśatirjanā iti syānna pañca pañcajanā iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7229: tathāca satyātmākāśābhyāṃ saptaviṃśatisaṃkhyāyāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānīti svasiddhāntavyākopa iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:7247: yadyapi pṛthivyādayo goghaṭādīnāṃ prakṛtistathāpi na te pṛthivyādibhyastattvāntaramiti na prakṛtiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7255: na khalu sattvarajastamohadahaṅkārāṇāmekaḥ kriyā dā guṇo vā dravyaṃ vā jātirvā dharmaḥ pañcatanmātrādibhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sattvādiṣu cānugataḥ kaścidasti
GSP33vacbhamu:7262: yadyapi parasyāṃ saṃkhyāyāmavāntarasaṃkhyā dvitvādikā nāsti tathāpi tatpūrvaṃ tasyāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7263: saṃbhavāt paurvāparyalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā parasaṃkhyopalakṣaṇārthaṃ pūrvasaṃkhyopanyasyata iti dūṣayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:7265: naca pañcaśabdo janaśabdena samasto 'samastaḥ śakyo vaktumityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7269: api ca vīpsāyāṃ pañcakadvayagrahaṇe daśaiva tattvānīti na sāṃkhyasmṛtipratyabhijñānamityasamāsamabhyupetyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7271: na caikā pañcasaṃkhyā pañcasaṃkhyāntareṇa śakyā viśeṣṭum /
GSP33vacbhamu:7276: atra tāvadrūḍhau satyāṃ na yogaḥ saṃbhavatīti vakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7280: samudāyino 'vacchinatti na samudāyaṃ samāsapadagamyamatastasmin kati te samudāyā
GSP33vacbhamu:7282: pañcajanā ityatra tu pañcasaṃkhyayotpattiśiṣṭatayā janānāmavacchinnatvātsamudāyasya ca pañcapūlīvadatrāpratīterna padāntarābhihitā saṃkhyā saṃbadhyate
GSP33vacbhamu:7289: nahyupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaṇena yujyate pañcaśabda eva tāvatsaṃkhyeyopasarjanasaṃkhyāmāha viśeṣatastu pañcajanā ityatra samāse /
GSP33vacbhamu:7292: nahi bhavati ṛddhasya rājapuruṣa iti samāso 'pi tu (pada)
GSP33vacbhamu:7297: yadi sattvarajastamāṃsi pradhānenaikīkṛtyātmākāśau tattvebhyo vyatiricyete tadā siddhāntavyākopaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7298: atha tu sattvarajastamāṃsi mitho bhedena vivakṣyante tathāpi vastutattvavyavasthāpane ādhāratvenātmā niṣkṛṣyatām /
GSP33vacbhamu:7301: 'diksaṃkhye saṃjñāyām' iti saṃjñāyāṃ samāsasmaraṇāt pañcajanaśabdastāvadayaṃ kkacinnirūḍhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7305: tadyadi rūḍhau mukhyor'thaḥ prāpyate tataḥ sa eva grahītavyo 'tha tvasau na vākye saṃbandhārhaḥ pūrvāparavākyavirodhī vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7307: yathā 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta' iti śyenaśabda śakuniviśeṣe nirūḍhavṛttistadaparityāgenaiva nipatyādānasādṛśyenārthavādikena kratuviśeṣe vartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:7309: yathā saptarṣiśabdo vasiṣṭha ekasmin saptasu ca vartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7312: rūḍhau satyāṃ pcaviṃśatereva saṃkhyāyā abhāvātkathaṃ tattveṣu vartate //11 // 1.4.3.12.
GSP33vacbhamu:7313: evaṃ ca ke te pañcajanā ityapekṣāyāṃ kiṃ vākyaśeṣagatāḥ prāṇādayo gṛhyantāmuta pañcaviṃśatistattvānīti viśaye tattvānāmaprāmāṇikatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7314: prāṇādīnāṃ ca vākyaśeṣe śravaṇāttatparityāge śrutahānyaśrutakalpanāprasaṅgātprāṇādaya eva pañcajanāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7315: naca kāṇḍavamādhyandinayorvirodhānna prāṇādīnāṃ vākyaśeṣagatānāmapi grahaṇamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33vacbhamu:7323: tasya kathaṃ prāṇādiṣvajaneṣu prayoga iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7324: anyathā tu pratyastamitāvayavārthe samudāyaśabdārthe janaśabdārtho nāstītyaparyanuyoga eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:7332: samāsabalāccedrūḍhirāsthīyate hanta na dṛṣṭastarhi tasya prayogo 'śvakarṇādivadvṛkṣādiṣu /
GSP33vacbhamu:7335: janeṣu tāvatpañcajanaśabdaśca prathamaḥ prayogo lokeṣu dṛṣṭa ityasati prathamaprayoga
GSP33vacbhamu:7345: ayamarthaḥ nānekaśākhāgatatattadvākyālocanayā vākyārthāvagame paryavasite sati pramāṇāntaravirodhena
GSP33vacbhamu:7347: prāsaṅgikaṃ tu tatra sṛṣṭiviṣayāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparamavirodhapratipādanaṃ na tu lakṣaṇārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7349: iha tu-vākyānāṃ sṛṣṭipratipādakānāṃ parasparavirodhe brahmaṇi jagadyonau na samanvayaḥ seddhumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7353: tasmādvākyānāṃ virodhāvirodhābyāmuktārthākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ samanvayaḥ evopapādyata iti samanvayalakṣaṇe saṃgatamidamadhikaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7361: sṛṣṭyā ca kāryeṇa tatkāraṇatayā brahma lakṣitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7362: sṛṣṭivipratipattau tatkāraṇatāyāṃ brahmalakṣaṇe vipratipattau satyāṃ bhavati tallakṣye brahmaṇyapi vipratipatti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7364: vedāntāstu kartrādipratipādanena karmavidhiparatayopacaritārthā avivakṣitārthā vā japopayogina iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7367: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-'sargakramavivāde 'pi na sa sṛṣṭari vidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7376: tadasya devadattasya sarvatraitāsmin kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ devadattāccakrādi saṃbhūtaṃ tasmāccakrādeḥ kumbhādīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7378: nahyastyasaṃbhavaḥ sarvatrāsmin kāryajāte kramavatyapi devadattasya sākṣātkarturanusyūtatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7379: tathehāpi yadyapyākāśādikrameṇaiva sṛṣṭistathāpyākāśānakālānilādau tatra tatra sākṣāt parameśvarasya kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ parameśvarādākāśaḥ saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7380: śakyaṃ ca vaktuṃ parameśvarādanalaḥ saṃbhūta ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7381: yadi tvākāśādvāyurvāyosteja ityuktvā tejaso vāyurvāyorākāśa iti brūyādbhavedvirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7385: eṣā hi svavyāpāramabhidhānakrameṇa kurvatī nābhidheyānāṃ kramaṃ niruṇāddhi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7386: te tu yathākramāsthitā evākrameṇocyante-yathā kramavanti jñānāni jānātīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7391: naca sṛṣṭivigānaṃ sraṣṭari tadadhīnanirūpaṇe vigānamāvahatīti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7392: nahyeṣa sraṣṭṛtvamātreṇocyate 'pi tu 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma' ityādinā rūpeṇocyate sraṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7397: tena 'phalavatsaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgam' iti sṛṣṭivijñānaṃ sraṣṭṛbrahmavijñānāṅgaṃ tadanuguṇaṃ sadbrahmajñānāvatāropāyatayā vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7398: tathāca śrutiḥ-'annena somya śuṅgenāpo mūlamanviccha' ityādikā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7402: api tu 'guṇe tvanyāyakalpanā' iti tadanuguṇatayā vyākhyeyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7403: yacca kāraṇe vigānam'asadvā idamatra asīt' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:7404: tadapi 'tadapyeṣa śloko bhavati' iti pūrvaprakṛtaṃ sadbrahmaṇākṛṣya 'asadevedamatra āsīt' ityucyamānaṃ tvasato 'bhidhāne 'saṃbaddhaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7407: 'taddhaika āhurasadevedamatra āsīt' iti tu nirākāryatayopanyastamiti na kāraṇe vivāda iti sūtre caśabdastvarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7409: ākāśādiṣu sṛjyamāneṣu kramavigāne 'pi na sraṣṭari vigānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7411: yathaikasyāṃ śrutau vyapadiṣṭaḥ parameśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā tathaiva śrutyantareṣūkteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7414: aparaḥ kalpo yathā vyapadiṣṭaḥ krama ākāśādiṣu,
GSP33vacbhamu:7416: tasyaiva kramasyānapabādhanena 'tattejo 'sṛjata' ityādikāyā api sṛṣṭerukterna sṛṣṭāvapi vigānam //14 // 1.4.4.15.
GSP33vacbhamu:7424: vyakriyata iti ca karmakartari karmaṇi vā rūpaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7426: nahi lūyate kedāraḥ svayameveti vā lūyate kedāra iti vā lavitāraṃ devadattādiṃ pratikṣipati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7431: upasaṃhāre ca 'sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda' iti niratiśayaphalaśravaṇādbrahmavedanādanyatra
GSP33vacbhamu:7432: ādityacandrādigatapuruṣakartṛtvasya ca 'yasya vaitatkarma' iti cāsyāsatyavacchede sarvanāmnā pratyakṣasiddhasya jagataḥ paramārśena,
GSP33vacbhamu:7434: ucyate-brahma te bravaṇīti bālākinā gārgyeṇa brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñāya tattadādityādigatābrahmapuruṣābhidhānena na tāvadbrahmoktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7435: yasya cājātaśatroḥ 'yo vai bālāke eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā yasya vaitatkarma' iti vākyaṃ na tena brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7439: kārye tu kriyata iti vyutpattyā vartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7442: vākyaśeṣe ca 'athāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' iti śravaṇātparispandalakṣaṇasya ca karmaṇo yatropapattiḥ sa eva veditavyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7446: upakramānurodhena copasaṃhāre sarvaśabdaḥ sarvān pāpmana iti ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmiti cāpekṣikavṛttirvahūn pāpmano bahūnāṃ bhūtānāmityevaṃparo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7448: yadi tu dṛptabālākimabrahmaṇi brahmābhidhāyinamapodyājātaśatrorvacanaṃ brahmaviṣayamevānyathā tu taduktādviśeṣaṃ vivakṣorabrahmābhidhānamasaṃbaddhaṃ syāditi manyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:7451: yatkāraṇaṃ veditavyatayopanyastasya puruṣāṇāṃ karturvedanāyopetaṃ bālakiṃ prati bubodhayiṣurajātaśatruḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:7453: yaṣṭighātotthānāt prāṇādivyatiriktaṃ jīvaṃ bhoktāraṃ svāminaṃ pratibodhayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7454: parastādapi 'tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prajñātmaitairātmabhirbhuṅkte evamevaita ātmāna enamātmānaṃ bhuñjanti' iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7455: yathā śreṣṭhī pradhānaḥ puruṣaḥ svairbhṛtyaiḥ karaṇabhūtairviṣayān bhuṅkte,
GSP33vacbhamu:7456: yathā vā svā bhṛtyāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7459: te hyādityādaya ālokavṛṣṭyādinā sācivyamācaranto jīvātmānaṃ bhojayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:7468: ye ca praśnaprativacane-'kkaiṣa etad bālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7471: tasmājjīvaprāṇayoranyatara iha grāhyo na raparameśvara iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7474: ' yathā hi kenacinmaṇilakṣaṇajñamamāninā kāce maṇireva veditavya ityakte parasya
GSP33vacbhamu:7475: kāco 'yaṃ maṇirna tallakṣaṇāyogādityabhidhāya ātmano viśeṣaṃ jijñāpayiṣostattvābhidhānamasaṃbaddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:7476: amaṇau maṇyabhidhānaṃ na pūrvavādino viśeṣamāpādayati svayamapi mṛṣābhidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7478: evamajātaśatruṇā dṛptabālākerabrahmavādino viśeṣamātmano darśayatā jīvaprāṇābhidhāne asaṃbaddhamuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7484: sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svarājyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda' iti ca sati saṃbhave sarvaśruterasaṃkocānniratiśayena
GSP33vacbhamu:7486: ādityādipuruṣakartṛtvasya ca svātantryalakṣaṇasya mukhyasya brahmaṇyeva saṃbhavādanyeṣāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ tatpāratantryāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7488: na kañcana paśyatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityāderuttasya ca brahmaṇyevopapatterbrahmaviṣayatvaṃ niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7489: atha kasmānna bhavato hiraṇyagarbhagocare eva praśnottare,
GSP33vacbhamu:7490: tathā ca naitābhyāṃ brahmaviṣayatvasiddhirityetannirācikīrṣuḥ paṭhati-etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā yathā yathāyatanaṃ pratiṣṭhanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7492: yadyapi ca jīvo nātmano bhidyate tathāpyupādhyavacchinnasya paramātmano jīvatvenopādhibhedādbhedamāropyādhārādheyabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7493: evaṃ ca jīvabhavanādhāratvamapādānatvaṃ ca paramātmana upapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7495: yasya vaitatkarmaiti vyāpārābhidhāne na saṃgacchata iti karmaśabdaḥ kāryābhidhāyī bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7499: na cādityādipuruṣāḥ saṃnihitā api parāmarśārhāḥ bahutvāt puṃliṅgatvācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7500: etaditi caikasya napuṃsakasyābhidhānāt 'eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā' ityanenaiva gatārthatvācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7504: kintu kṛtsnameva jagadyasya kāryamiti vāśabdena sūcyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7515: nirdiśyantāṃ puruṣāḥ kāryāstadviṣayā tu kṛtiranirdiṣṭā tatphalaṃ vā kāryasyotpattista yasyedaṃ karmeti nirdekṣyete,
GSP33vacbhamu:7521: nanu yadīdamā jagatparāmṛṣṭaṃ tatastadantarbhūtāḥ puruṣā apīti ya eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāmiti punaruktamityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7524: nanu 'prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityādikādapi vākyājjīvātiriktaḥ kutaḥ pratīyata ityato vākyāntaraṃ paṭhati-
GSP33vacbhamu:7529: tasmādyatrāsyaātmano yato niḥsaṃbodho 'taḥ svacchatārūpamiva rūpamasyeti svacchatārūpo na tu svacchataiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:7532: etadeva vibhajate-upādhibhiḥ antaḥkaraṇādibhiḥ janitaṃ yadviśeṣavijñānaṃ ghaṭapaṭādivijñānaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7534: sadbrahmaiva syāttacca nityamiti nopādhijanitaṃ nāpi tadrihitaṃ svarūpaṃ brahmasvabhāvasyāprahāṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7537: yadā tu layalakṣaṇāvidyopabṛṃhito vikṣepasaṃskāraḥ samudācarati tadā viśeṣavijñānotpādātsvapnajāgarāvasthātaḥ paramātmano rūpādbhraṃśarūpamāgamanamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:7541: nanvatrākāśaṃ śayanasthānaṃ tatkutaḥ paramātmapratyaya ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7544: yadapi ca dvāsaptatisahasrahitābhidhānāḍīsaṃcāreṇa suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ purītadavasthānamuktaṃ tadapyantaḥkaraṇasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:7547: tatra mandadhiyāṃ nedaṃ prāṇanirākaraṇāyeti buddhirmā bhūdityāśayavānāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7558: maitraiṭyā bhāryāyāḥ kātyāyanyā sahārthasaṃvibhāgakaraṇa ukte maitreyī yājñavalkyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7560: yannu ma iyaṃ bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthvī vittena pūrṇā syātkimahaṃ tanāmṛtā syāmuta neti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7562: yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syādamṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti vittena /
GSP33vacbhamu:7563: evaṃ vittenāmṛtatvāśā bhavedyadi vittasādhyāni karmāṇyamṛtatve upayujyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:7565: jñānasādhyatvādamṛtatvasya karmaṇāṃ ca jñānavirodhināṃ tatsahabhāvitvānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7566: sā hovāca maitreyī yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tenaṃ kuryāṃ yadeva bhagavān veda tadeva me brūhi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7569: patijāyādiṣu vairāgyamutpādayituṃ yājñavalkyo 'na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya' ityādivākyasaṃdarbhamuvāca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7570: ātmaipādhikaṃ hi priyatvameṣāṃ na tu sākṣāt priyāṇyetāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:7571: tasmādetebhyaḥ patijāyādibhyo viramya yatra sākṣātprema sa eva
GSP33vacbhamu:7572: ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7574: vā are darśanena śravaṇādisādhanenedaṃ jagatsarvaṃ viditaṃ bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7575: yato nāmarūpātmakasya jagatastattvaṃ pāramārthikaṃ rūpamātmaiva bhujaṅgasyeva samāropitasya tattvaṃ rajjuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7576: tasmādātmani vidite sarvamidaṃ jagattattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7577: rajjvāmiva viditāyāṃ samāropitasya bhujaṅgasya tattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7578: yatastasmādātmaiva draṣṭavyo na tu tadatiriktaṃ jagat svarūpeṇa draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7580: yato 'brahma taṃ parādāt' brāhmaṇajātirbrahmaṇo 'hamityevamabhimāna iti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:7584: ātmaiva jagatastattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ kiñcittaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7586: yat khalu yadgrahaṃ vinā na śakyate grahītuṃ tattato na vyatiricyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7590: na gṛhyante ca cidrūpagrahaṇaṃ vinā sthitikāle nāmarūpāṇi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7596: 'pi tu nāmarūpotpatteḥ prāgapi cidrūpāvasthānāt tadupādānatvācca nāmarūpaprapañcasya tadanatirekaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7597: rajjūpādānasyeva bhujaṅgasya rajjoranatireka ityetadvṛṣṭāntena sādhayati bhagavatī
GSP33vacbhamu:7598: śrutiḥ-'sa yathārdraidho 'grerabhyāhitasya pṛthagdhūnā viniścarantyevaṃ vā are 'sya
GSP33vacbhamu:7599: mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ' ityādinā caturvidho mantra uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7606: yadā ca nāmadheyasyeyaṃ gatistadā tatpūrvakasya rūpadheyasya kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7607: na kevalaṃ tadupādānatvāttato na vyatiricyate nāmarūpaprapañcaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7609: yathā sāmudramevāmbhaḥ pṛthivītejaḥ saṃparkāt kāṭhinyamupagataṃ saindhavaṃ khilyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7610: sa hi svākāre samudre kṣipto 'mbha eva bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7611: evaṃ cidambhodhau līnaṃ jagacchideva bhavati na tu tato 'tiricyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7623: etebhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya sāmyenotthāya /
GSP33vacbhamu:7624: kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya hyavacchedādduḥ khitvaśokitvādayastadavacchinne cidātmani tadviparīte 'pi pratīyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:7629: tānyeva bhūtāni naśyantyani tadupādhiścidātmanaḥ khilyabhāvo vinaśyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7631: na pretya saṃjñāstīti saṃjñāmātraniṣedhādātmā nāstīti manyamānā sā maitreyī hovāca,
GSP33vacbhamu:7632: atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanmohitavān na pretya saṃjñāstīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7635: ānandajñānaikarasabrahmādvayānubhave tu tat kena kaṃ paśyet,
GSP33vacbhamu:7643: dvaitanindayā cādvaitaguṇakīrtanādbrahmaiva maitreyībrahmaṇe pratipādyaṃ na jīvātmeti nāsti pūrvapakṣa ityanārabhyamevedamadhikaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7646: nāpijñānakartṛtvamakartuḥ sākṣācca mahato bhūtasya vijñānātmabhāvena samuttānābhidhānaṃ vijñānātmana eva draṣṭavyatvamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:7647: anyathā brahmaṇo draṣṭavyatvapare 'smin brāhmaṇo tasya vijñānātmatvena samutthānābhidhānamanupayuktaṃ syāttasya tu draṣṭavyamupayujyata ityupakramamātraṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7650: tadevaṃ paurvāparyālocanayā maitreyībrāhmaṇasya brahmadarśanaparatve sthite bhoktrā jīvātmanopakramamācāryadeśīyamatena tāvatsamādhatte sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33vacbhamu:7652: yathā hi vahnervikārā vyuccaranto visphuliṅgā na vahneratyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:7656: tathā jīvātmano 'pi brahmavikāra na brahmaṇo 'tyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:7662: tatra tadvijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāsiddhaye vijñānātmaparamātmanorabhedamupādāya paramātmani darśayitavye vijñānātmanopakrama ityāśmaradhya ācāryo mene //20 // 1.4.6.21.
GSP33vacbhamu:7665: jīvo hi paramātmano 'tyantaṃ bhinna eva san dehendriyamanobuddhyupadhānasaṃparkātsarvadā kaluṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7668: yathāhuḥ pāñcarātrikāḥ-'āmukterbheda eva syājjīvasya ca parasya ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7674: saṃprati svābhāvikameva jīvasya nāmarūpaprapañcāśrayatvalakṣaṇaṃ kāluṣyaṃ pārthivānāmaṇūnāmiva śyāmatvaṃ kevalaṃ pākeneva /
GSP33vacbhamu:7684: ākāśa iva ghaṭamaṇikādikalpitāvacchedo ghaṭākāśo maṇikākāśo na tu paramākāśādanyastadvikāro vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7689: atha vikāraḥ paramātmano jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavatyākāśādivadityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7691: nahi yathā tejaḥprabhṛtīnāmātmavikāratvaṃ śrūyate evaṃ jīvasyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7695: tathāca kathañcidbhedo 'pīti tamāsthāya kāryakāraṇabhāva iti matatrayamuktvā kāśakṛtsnīyamataṃ sādhutvena nirdhārayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:7702: rājaputrasyeva va mlecchakule vardhamānasyātmani samāropito mlecchabhāvo rājaputro 'sīti āptopadeśena /
GSP33vacbhamu:7703: na tu mṛdvikāraḥ śarāvādiḥ śataśo 'pi mṛnmṛditi cintyamānastajjanmanā mṛdbhāvasākṣātkāreṇa śakyo nivartayituṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7708: api ca jīvasyātmavikāratve tasya jñānadhyānādisādhanānuṣṭhānāt svaprakṛtāvapyaye sati nāmṛtatvasyāśāstītyapuruṣārthatvamamṛtatvaprāpiśrutivirodhaśca
GSP33vacbhamu:7711: nanu yadi jīvo na vikāraḥ kintu brahmaiva kathaṃ tarhi tasminnāmarūpāśrayatvaśrutiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7720: aikāntike hyādvaite ātmano 'nyakarmakaraṇe 'kena kaṃ paśyet' iti ātmanaśca karmatvaṃ 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti śakyaṃ niṣeddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:7722: na kevalaṃ kāśakṛtsnīyadarśanāśrayaṇena bhūtapūrvagatyā vijñātṛtvamapi tu śrutipaurvāparyaparyālocanayāpyevamevetyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7724: kasmāt punaḥ kāśakṛtsnasya matamāsthīyate netareṣāmācāryāṇāmityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7726: kāśakṛtsnīyasya matasya śrutiprabandhopanyāsena punaḥ śrutimattvaṃ smṛtimattvaṃ copasaṃhāropakramamāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7734: apica yadi jīvaparamātmanorbhedābhedāvāsthīyeyātāṃ tatastayormitho virodhātsamuccayābhāvādekasya balīyastve nātmani nirapavādaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:7737: tataḥ saṃśaye sati na suniścitārthamātmani jñānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7738: suniścitārthaṃ ca jñānaṃ mokṣopāyaḥ śrūyate-'vedāntavijñānasuniścitārthāḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7743: kathaṃ tarhi vyapadeśabuddhibhedau kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti kathañca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya bhagavataḥ saṃsāritā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7752: na tāvadbhedadābhedāvekātra bhāvikau bhavitumarhata iti viprapañcitaṃ prathame pāde /
GSP33vacbhamu:7753: dvaitadarśananindayā caikāntikādvaitapratipādanaparāḥ paurvāparyālocanayā sarve vedāntaḥ pratīyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:7754: tatra yathā bimbādavadatāttāttvike pratibimbānāmabhede 'pi nīlamaṇikṛpāṇakācādyupadhānabhedātkālpaniko jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedau vartayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7755: idaṃ bimbamavadātamimāni ca pratibimbāni nīlotpalāśaśayāmalāni vṛttadīrghādibhedabhāñji bahūnīti,
GSP33vacbhamu:7757: jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedāvayaṃ ca paramātmā śuddhavijñānānandasvabhāva ime
GSP33vacbhamu:7759: avidyopadhānaṃ ca yadyapi vidyāsvabhāve paramātmani na sākṣādasti tathāpi tatpratibimbakalpajīvadvāreṇa parasminnucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7765: kathaṃ cātmānaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ vividhavedanābhājaṃ kuryādityādyanuyogo niravakāśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7772: hanta jīvaḥ sphuṭa iti brahmāpi tathā syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7773: tathā ca 'nihitaṃ guhāyām' iti nopapadyata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7775: yathāhi bimbasya maṇikṛpāṇādayo guhā evaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi pratijīvaṃ bhinnā avidyā guhā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7776: yathā pratibimbeṣu bhāsamāneṣu bimbaṃ tadabhinnamapi guhyamevaṃ jīveṣu bhāsamāneṣu tadabhinnamapi brahma guhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7781: brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanā bhagaśo vā pariṇāmābhyupagame tasya kāryatvādanityatvācca tadaśrito mokṣo 'pi tathā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7784: evaṃ ye nadīsamudranidarśanenāmukterbhedaṃ muktasya cābhedaṃ jīvasyāsthiṣata teṣāmapi nyāyenāsaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7788: kiṃ pāthaḥ paramāṇava utaiṣāṃ saṃsthānabheda āhosvittadārabdho 'vayavī /
GSP33vacbhamu:7789: tatra saṃsthānabhedasya vāvayavino vā samudraniveśe vināśāt kasya samudreṇaikatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7790: nadīpāthaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ tu samudrapāthaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrvavasthitebhyo bheda eva nābhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7792: ye tu kāśakṛtsnīyameva matamāsthāya jīvaṃ paramātmanoṃ'śamācakhyusteṣāṃ kathaṃ 'niṣphalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntam' iti na śrutivirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7793: niṣphalamiti sāvayavatvaṃ vyāsedhi na tu sāṃśatvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:7794: aṃśaśca jīvaḥ paramātmano nabhasa iva karṇanemimaṇḍalāvacchinnaṃ nabhaḥ śabdaśravaṇayogyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7795: vāyoriva ca śarīrāvacchinnaḥ pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇa iti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7799: hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7801: hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7806: nabhodharmatve hi tadanavayavaṃ sarvatrābhinnamiti tatsaṃyogaḥ sarvatra pratheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:7810: vyāpyaivāsti kevalaṃ pratisaṃbandhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā na sarvatra nirūpyata iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:7812: tatsaṃyuktaṃ tu nabhaḥ śravaṇayogyaṃ sarvatrāstīti sarvatra śravaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7813: naca bhedābhedayoranyatareṇāṃśaḥ śakyo nirvaktum na cobhābhyāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7815: tasmādanirvacanīyānādyavidyāparikalpita evāṃśo nabhaso na bhāvika iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7818: na jātu rajjvāmajñāyamāna urago bhayakampādikāryāya paryāpta iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7824: api ca bhāvikāṃśavādināṃ mate bhāvikāṃśasya jñānenocchettumaśakyatvānna jñānadhyānasādhano mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7826: evaṃ jīvo brahmaṇoṃ'śa iti kāśakṛtsnīyaṃ matamiti siddham //22 // 1.4.7.23.
GSP33vacbhamu:7829: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi samanvaye darśite samāptaṃ samanvayalakṣaṇamiti kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthamidamārabhyata iti śaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ saṃgatiṃ darśayannavaśeṣamāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7831: atra ca lakṣaṇasya saṃgatimuktvā lakṣaṇenāsyādhikaraṇasya saṃgatiruktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7832: etaduktaṃ bhavati-satyaṃ jagatkāraṇe brahmaṇi vedāntānāmuktaḥ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7833: tatra kāraṇabhāvasyobhayathā darśanājjagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ nimittatvenaiva,
GSP33vacbhamu:7835: tatra yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastata upādānakāraṇānusāraṇe sāṃkhyasmṛtisiddhaṃ pradhānamabhyupeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7839: yadi tūttaraḥ pakṣastato nātivyāptirnāpyavyāptiriti sādhu lakṣaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7845: āgamasya kāraṇamātre paryavasānādanumānasya tadviśeṣaniyamamāgamo na pratikṣipatyapi tvanumanyata evetyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7847: brahmopādānatvasya prasaktasya pratiṣedhe 'nyatrāprasaṅgātsāṃkhyasmṛtiprasiddhamānumānikaṃ pradhānaṃ śiṣyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7851: yathā somaśarmaṇaikena jñātena sarve kaṭhā jñātā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7862: ' tadihāpi pratijñādṛṣṭāntau mukhyārthāveva yuktau na tu 'yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ' itivadguṇakalpanayā netavyau,
GSP33vacbhamu:7865: nimittakāraṇaṃ tu kāryādatyantabhinnamiti na tajjñāne kāryajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7869: nahi tadānīṃ brahmaṇi jñāte sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7871: yata iti ca pañcamī na kāraṇamātre smaryate api tu prakṛtau,
GSP33vacbhamu:7876: etayā khalu svātantryalakṣaṇena kartṛtvena nimittatvaṃ darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7898: kathaṃ ca tadbrahmaṇo rūpaṃ yadi tasya brahmopādānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7907: hanta tarhi yādṛśamīśvaramāgamo gamayati tādṛśo 'bhyupagatavyaḥ sa ca nimittakāraṇaṃ copādānakāraṇaṃ ceśvaramavagamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7909: iyaṃ copādānapariṇāmādibhāṣā na vikārābhiprāyeṇāpi tu tathā sarpasyopādānaṃ rajjurevaṃ brahma jagadupādānaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7910: na khalu nityasya niṣphalasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanaikadeśena vā pariṇāmaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7916: tasmādadvaitopakramādupasaṃhārācca sarva eva vedāntā aikāntikādvaitaparāḥ santaḥ sākṣādeva kkacidadvaitamāhuḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7923: mā bhūtpradhānaṃ jagadupādānaṃ tathāpi na brahmopādānatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7925: teṣāmapi hi kiñcidupodbalakamasti vaidikaṃ liṅgamityāśaṅkāmapanetumāha sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33vacbhamu:7928: 'pratijñālakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyamāṇe padasamanvayaḥ vaidikaḥ sa ca tatraiva nānyatretyatra sādhitam //28 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7929: ' iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmacchārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7935: vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayoḥ samanvayavirodhaparihāralakṣaṇayoḥ saṃgatipradarśanāya sukhagrahaṇasya caitanyoḥ saṃkṣepatastātparyārthamāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7942: tadevākhyā yasyāḥ sā smṛtistantrākhyā paramarṣiṇā kapilenādividuṣā praṇītā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7944: na khalvamūṣāṃ smṛtīnāṃ manvādismṛtivadanyo 'vakāśaḥ śakyo vaditumṛte mokṣasādhanaprakāśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7949: prasādhitaṃ khalu dharmamīmāṃsāyāṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam' ityatra,
GSP33vacbhamu:7950: yathā śrutiviruddhānāṃ smṛtīnāṃ durbalatayānapekṣaṇīyatvaṃ tasmānna durbalānurodhena balīyasīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ yuktamupavarṇanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:7951: api tu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvāḥ śrutayo durbalāḥ smṛtīrbādhanta eveti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7969: tāsāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ brahmopādānatvapratipādanaparāṇāṃ tatra tatra darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7970: tasmādavigānācchraita evārtha āvastheyo na tu smārto vigānāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7971: tatkimidānīṃ parasparavigānātsarvā eva smṛtayo 'vaheyā ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:7980: kintu viniścatavedaprāmāṇyānāṃ teṣāṃ tadanuṣṭhānavatāṃ prāci bhave 'smiñjanmani siddhiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7984: apramāṇena ca na vedārtho 'tiśaṅkituṃ yuktaḥ pramāṇasiddhatvāttasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:7985: tadevaṃ vedavirodhe siddhavacanamapramāṇamuktvā siddhānāmapi parasparavirodhe tadvacanādanāścāsa iti pūrvoktaṃ smārayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:7993: na tāvatsiddhānāṃ parasparaviruddhāni vacāṃsi pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7998: tasmācchutisāmānyamātreṇa bhramaḥ sāṃkhyapraṇetā kapilaḥ śrauta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8011: bhavatu vedaviruddhaṃ kāpilaṃ vacastathāpi dvayorapi puruṣabuddhiprabhavatayā ko vinigamanāyāṃ heturyato vedavirodhi kāpilaṃ vaco nādaraṇīyamityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8013: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-satyaṃ śāstrayonirīśvarastathāpyasya na śāstrakriyāyāmasti svātantryaṃ kapilādīnāmiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:8014: sa hi bhagavān yādṛśaṃ pūrvasmin sarge cakāra śāstraṃ tadanusāreṇāsminnapi sarge praṇītavān /
GSP33vacbhamu:8015: evaṃ pūrvatarānusāreṇa pūrvasmin pūrvatāmanusāreṇa ca pūrvatara ityanādirayaṃ śāstreśvarayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8016: tatreśvarasya na śāstrārthajñānapūrvā śāstrakriyā yenāsya kapilādivatsvātantryaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8019: śāstraṃ ca svatobodhakatayā puruṣasvātantryābhāvena nirastamastadoṣāśaṅkaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ sākṣādeva svārthe pramāṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8023: siddhapramāṇabhāvayānepakṣayaiva śrutyā svārtho viniścāyita iti śīghratarapravṛttayā
GSP33vacbhamu:8026: ahaṅkāraprakṛtikatvena tanmātrāṇyapyaprasiddhāni smartuṃ na śakyanta ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8032: sāṃkhyasmṛtermahadādiṣviva pradhāne 'pi prāmāṇyaṃ neti niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8033: sāṃkhyasmṛterbādhe 'pi taduktayuktīnāṃ kathaṃ bādha cārṣajñānamatra mūlamupapadyata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8034: tasmānna kāpilasmṛteḥ pradhānopādānatvaṃ jagata iti siddham //2 // 2.1.2.3.
GSP33vacbhamu:8036: nānena yogaśāstrasya hairaṇyagarbhapātañjalādeḥ sarvathā prāmāṇyaṃ nirākriyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8042: tacca kiñcinnimittīkṛtya vyutpādyamiti pradhānaṃ savikāraṃ nimittīkṛtaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8049: ata eva yogaśāstraṃ vyutpādayitāha sma bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ-'guṇānāṃ paramaṃ rūpaṃ na dṛṣṭipathamṛcchati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8064: yogaśāstrāttu pradhānādisattā vijñāpayiṣyate bahulaṃ hi yogaśāstrāṇāṃ vedena saha saṃvādo dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8072: yathāhuḥ-'prasaraṃ na labhante hi yāvatkkacana markaṭāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8075: seyaṃ labdhaprasarā pradhānādau yogāpramāṇatāpiśācī sarvatraiva durvārā bhavedityasyāḥ prasaraṃ niṣedhatā pradhānādyabhyupeyamiti nāśabdaṃ pradhānamiti śaṅkārthaḥ / sā
GSP33vacbhamu:8089: tā api kasmānna nirākriyanta ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8091: tāsu khalu bahulaṃ vedārthavisaṃvādinīṣu śiṣṭānādṛtāsu kaiścideva tu puruṣāpasadaiḥ paśuprāyairmlecchādibiḥ parigṛhītāsu vedamūlatvāśaṅkaiva nāstīti na nirākṛtāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8092: tadviparītāstu sāṃkhyayogasmṛtaya iti tāḥ pradhānādiparatayā vyudasyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8097: sāṃkhyā samyagbuddhirvaidikī tayā vartanta iti sāṃkhyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8101: anye 'pi yamaniyamādayo bāhyā āntarāśca dhāraṇādayo yogopāyā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8120: sāvakāśā vahvayo 'pi śrutayo 'navakāśaikaśrutivirodhe tadanuguṇatayā yathā nīyante
GSP33vacbhamu:8122: api ca brahmasākṣātkāro virodhitayānādimavidyāṃ nivartayan dṛṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa mokṣasādhanamiṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8123: tatra brahmasākṣātkārasya mokṣasādhanatayā pradhānasyānumānaṃ dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇādṛṣṭaviṣayaṃ viṣayato 'ntaraṅgaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8127: api ca śrutyāpi brahmaṇi tarka ādṛta ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8129: so 'yaṃ brahmaṇo jagadupādānatvākṣepaḥ punastarkeṇa prastūyate-'prakṛtyā ca śrutyāpi vikārāṇāmavasthitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8130: jagadbrahmasarūpaṃ ca neti no tasya vikriyā //
GSP33vacbhamu:8133: ' tathāhi-eka eva strīkāyaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatayā patyuśca sapartnānāṃ ca caitrasya ca straiṇasya tāmavindato 'paryāyaṃ sukhaduḥkhaviṣādānādhatte
GSP33vacbhamu:8135: tasmātsukhaduḥkhamohātmatayā ca svarganarakādyuccāvacaprapañcatayā ca jagadaśuddhamacetanaṃ ca,
GSP33vacbhamu:8138: tasmātpradhānasyāśuddhasyācetanasya vikāro jaganna tu brahmaṇa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8159: śabdārthāt khalu cetanaprakṛtitvāccaitanyaṃ pṛthivyādīnāmavagamyamānamupodvalitaṃ mānāntareṇa sākṣācchūyamāṇamapyacaitanyamanyathayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8170: naitāḥ śrutayaḥ sākṣānmṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāhuḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8172: tenaitacchutibalena na mṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāśaṅkanīyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8177: bhoktṛṇāmupakāryatvādbhūtendriyāṇāṃ copakāratvāt sāmye ca tadanupapatteḥ sarvajanaprasiddheśca
GSP33vacbhamu:8178: 'vijñānaṃ cābhavat' iti śruteśca viśeṣaścetanācetanalakṣaṇaḥ prāguktaḥ sa nopapadyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8184: api ca bhūyasyaḥ śrutayaḥ 'agnirvāg bhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśadvāyuḥ prāṇo bhūtvā nāsike prāviśadādityaścakṣurbhūtvākṣiṇī prāviśat' ityādaya indriyaviśeṣagatā devatā darśayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8187: api ca prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe prāṇānāmasmadādiśarīrāṇāmiva kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitānāṃ vyavahāraṃ darśayan prāṇānāṃ kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhānena caitanyaṃ draḍhayatītyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8190: yadyapi prathame 'dhyāye māktatvena varṇitaṃ tathāpi mukhyatayāpi kathañcinnetuṃ śakyamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8206: yathā hi kāryatvāviśeṣa'pi 'ārogyakāmaḥ pathyamaśrīyāt' 'svarakāmaḥ sikatāṃ bhakṣayet' ityādīnāṃ mānāntarāpekṣatā,
GSP33vacbhamu:8216: tarko hi pramāṇaviṣayavivecakatayā taditikartavyatābhūtastadāśrayo 'sati pramāṇe 'nugrāhyasyāśrayasyābhāvācchuṣkatayā nādriyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8221: mato hi bhāvyamāno bhāvanāyā viṣayatayānubhūto bhavatīti mananamanubhavāṅgam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8225: api ca cetanakāraṇavādibhiḥ kāraṇasālakṣaṇye 'pi kāryasya kathañciccaitanyāvirbhāvānāvirbhāvābhyāṃ vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ cābhavaditi jagatkāraṇe yojayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8228: cetanasya jagatkāraṇasya suṣuptādyavyavasthāsviva sato 'pi caitanyasthānāvirbhāvatayā śakyameva kathañcidavijñānātmatvaṃ yojayitumityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8240: tathā cedaṃ jagatkāryaṃ sattve 'pi cidātmanaḥ kāraṇasya prāgutpatternāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:8251: api tu kāraṇarūpeṇa śakyaṃ sattvena nirvaktumiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8252: evaṃ ca kāraṇasattaiva kāryasya sattā na tato 'nyeti kathaṃ tadutpatteḥ prāk sati kāraṇe bhavatyasat /
GSP33vacbhamu:8253: svarūpeṇa tūtpatteḥ prāgutpannasya dhvastasya vā sadasattvābhyāmanirvācyasya na sato 'sato votpattiriti nirviṣayaḥ satkāryavādapratiṣedha ityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8258: yathā hi yūṣādiṣu hiṅgisaindhavādīnāmavibhāgalakṣaṇo layaḥ svagatarasādibhiryūṣaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:8259: rūṣayatyevaṃ brahmaṇi viśuddhyādidharmiṇi jagalliyamānamavibhāgaṃ gacchadbrahma svadharmeṇa rūṣayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8260: na cānyathā layo lokasidda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8263: nahi samudrasya phenormibudbudādipariṇāmo vā rajjvāṃ sarpadhārādivibhrame vā niyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8274: tatra ca taddharmārūṣaṇe santi sahasraṃ dṛṣṭāntāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8275: tava tu kāraṇe kāryasya laye kāryadharmarūṣaṇe na dṛṣṭāntalavo 'pyastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8279: yathā rajatasyāropitasya pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ śukti4na ca śuktī rajatameva midamapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8280: api ca sthityutpattipralayakāleṣu triṣvapi kāryasya kāraṇādabhedamabhidadhatī śrutiranatiśaṅkanīyā sarvaireva vedavādibhiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8281: tatra sthityutpattyoryaḥ parihāraḥ sa pralaye 'pi samānaḥ kāryasyāvidyāsamāropitatvaṃ nāma,
GSP33vacbhamu:8295: tattvajñānena ca saśaktino mithyājñānasya samūlaghātaṃ nihatatvāditi //9 // 2.1.3.10.
GSP33vacbhamu:8299: nāsmatpakṣa iti yadyapyupariṣṭātpratipādayiṣyāmastathāpi guḍajihvikayā samānatvāpādanamidānīmiti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8303: kevalāgamagamyer'the svatantratarkāviṣaye na sāṃkhyādivat sādharmyadharmyamātreṇa tarkaḥ pravartanīyo yena pradhānādisiddhirbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8317: api ca yena tarkeṇa tarkāṇāmapratiṣṭhāmāha sa eva tarkaḥ pratiṣṭhito 'bhyupeyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8323: sati caiṣa pūrvapakṣaviṣaye tarke pratiṣṭhārahite pravartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8334: bhūtārthagocarasya hi samyagjñānasya vyavasthitavastugocaratayā vyavasthānaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8336: vaidikaṃ cedaṃ cetanajagadupādānaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ vedotthatarketikartavyatākaṃ vedajanitaṃ vyavasthitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8337: vedānapekṣeṇa tu tarkeṇa jagatkāraṇabhedamavasthāpayatāṃ tārkikāṇāmanyonyaṃ vipratipattestattvanirdhāraṇakāraṇābhāvācca na tatastattvavyavastheti na tataḥ samyagjñānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8348: nahi tadeva tadānīmevāsti nāsti ceti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8349: kiṃ cedaṃ maṇimantrauṣadhamindrajālaṃ kāryeṇa śikṣitaṃ yadidamajātāniruddhātiśayamavyavadhānamavidūrasthānaṃ ca tasyaiva tadavasthendriyasya puṃsaḥ kadācitpratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ ca,
GSP33vacbhamu:8353: athāpi syāt kāryāntarāṇi piṇḍakapālaśarkarācūrṇakaṇaprabhṛtāni kumbhaṃ vyavadadhate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8356: tasya kāryajātasya kāraṇātmanaḥ sadātanatvena sarvadā vyavadhānena kumbhasyātyantānupalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8367: tasmādyatredamalpatāramyaṃ viśrāmyati yato na kṣodīyaḥ saṃbhavati tajjagato mūlakāraṇaṃ paramāṇuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8373: tena vaiśeṣikādyabhimatasya tarkasya śuṣkatvenāvyavasthiceḥ sūtramidaṃ sāṃkhyadūṣaṇamatidiśati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8374: yatra kathañcidvedānusāriṇī manvādibhiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ parigṛhītasya sāṃkhyata4kasyaiṣā gatistatra paramāṇvādivādasyātyantavedabāhyasya manvādyupekṣitasya ca kaiva katheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8376: sṛṣṭyādayo hi vyutpādyāste na kiñcitsadasadvā pūrvapakṣanyāyotprekṣitamapyudāhṛtya vyutpādyanta iti kenacidaṃśenetyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8384: pravṛttā hi śrutiranapekṣatayā svataḥpramāṇatvena na pramāṇāntaramapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8401: yadikāraṇāt paramārthabhūtādananyatvamākāśādeḥ prapañcasya kāryasya kutastarhi na vaiśeṣikādyuktadoprapañcāvatāra ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8406: kintvabhedaṃ vyāsedhadbhirvaiśeṣikādibhirasmāsu sāhāyakamevācaritaṃ bhavati. bhedaniṣedhahetuṃ vyācaṣṭe-ārambhaṇaśabdastāvaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:8407: evaṃ hi brahmavijñānena sarvaṃ jagattattvato jñāyeta yadi brahmaiva tattvaṃ jagato bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8408: yathā rajjvāṃ jñātāyāṃ bhujaṅgatattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8414: mṛdi jñātāyāṃ kathaṃ mṛmnayaṃ ghaṭādi jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8417: na cānyasminvijñāte 'nyadvijñātaṃ bhavatītyata āha śrutiḥ-'vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8421: yathā puruṣasya caitanyamiti rāhoḥ śira iti vikalpamātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:8426: tena mṛdi jñātāyāṃ yeṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva tattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8431: ye hi dṛṣṭanaṣṭasvarūpā na te vastusanto yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikodakādayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8436: kintu sarvadā sarvatra sarvathāstyeva, na nāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8439: nahi rūpaṃ kadācit kkacit kathañcidvā gandho bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8442: tattarhi vikārajātaṃ daṇḍāyamānaṃ sadātanamiti na vikāraḥ kasyacit /
GSP33vacbhamu:8452: athāsyāsattvaṃ nāma kiñcinna jāyate kintu sa eva na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8453: yathāhuḥ-'na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8455: kiṃ tatsvabhāvo bhāva uta bhāvasvabhāvaḥ sa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8456: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvānāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā tucchatayā jagacchūnyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8459: kalpanāmātranimittatve 'pi niṣedhasya bhāvanityatāpattistadavasthaiva tasmādbhinnamasti kāraṇādvikārajātaṃ na vastu sat /
GSP33vacbhamu:8461: tadanena pramāṇena siddhamanṛtatvaṃ vikārajātasya kāraṇasya nirvācyatayā sattvaṃ 'mṛttiketyeva satyam' ityādinā prabandhena dṛṣṭāntatayānuvadati śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8462: 'yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ' iti cākṣapādasūtraṃ pramāṇasiddho dṛṣṭānta ityetatparaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8468: anekābhiḥ śaktibhiryāḥ pravṛttayo nānākāryasṛṣṭayastadyuktaṃ brahmaikaṃ nānā ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8471: yadi punarekatvameva vastusadbhavet tato nānātvābhāvādvaidikaḥ karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ samasta evocchidyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8473: evaṃ cānekātmakatve brahmaṇo mṛdādidṛṣṭāntā anurūpā bhaviṣyantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8477: mṛdātmanaikatvaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvamiti vadataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ parasparaṃ kimabhedo 'bhimataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8480: tatrābheda aikāntike mṛdātmaneti ca ghaṭaśarāvādyātmaneti collekhadvayaṃ niyamaśca nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8487: nahi dharmiṇoḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃkare taddharmāvekatvanānātve na saṃkīryete iti saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8489: evaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvaṃ yāvadbhavati tāvanmṛdātmanā nānātvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8499: aṃśo hi saḥ, tasya karmasāhitena jñānena brahmabhāva ādhīyata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8502: yaduktaṃ nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti, tatrāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8504: yāvadabādhaṃ hi sarvo 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ svapnadaśāyāmiva tadupadarśitapadārthajātavyavahāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8505: sa ca yathā jāgradanasthāyāṃ bādhakānnivartate evaṃ tattvamasyādivākyaparibhāvanābhyāsaparipākabhuvā śārīrasya brahmātmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇa bādhakena nivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8507: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttat kena kaṃ paśyet' ityādinā mithyājñānādhīno vyavahāraḥ kriyākārakādilakṣaṇaḥ samyagjñānenāpanīyata itri na
GSP33vacbhamu:8515: api tu na bhujaṅgo rajjuriyamitivat sadātanaṃ tamabhivadati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8519: nahi jātu kāṣṭhasya daṇḍakamaṇḍalukuṇḍalaśālinaḥ kuṇḍalitvajñānaṃ daṇḍavattāṃ kamaṇḍalumattāṃ bādhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8528: ekatvaikāntābhyupagame tu teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhedaviṣayāṇāṃ bādhitatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8532: na kevalaṃ vidhiniṣedhākṣepeṇāsya mokṣaśāstrasyākṣepaḥ svarūpeṇāsyāpi bhedāpekṣatvādityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8541: nahi pratyakṣādibhirarthaṃ paricchidya pravartamāno vyavahāre visaṃbādyate sāṃsārikaḥ kaścit /
GSP33vacbhamu:8553: 'kathaṃ cānṛtena mokṣaśāstreṇa' iti yaduktaṃ tadanubhāṣya dūṣayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:8560: yatkhalu satyaṃ na tadutpadyata iti kutastasyāsatyādutpādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8562: sāṃvyavahārikaṃ tu satyatvaṃ vṛttirūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasyeva śravaṇādīnāmapyabhinnam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8563: tasmādabhyupetya vṛttisvarūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasya paramārthasatyatāṃ vyabhicārodbhāvanamiti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8564: yadyapi sāṃvvahārikasya satyādeva bhayātsatyaṃ maraṇamutpadyate tathāpi bhayaheturahistajjñānaṃ vāsatyaṃ tato bhayaṃ satyaṃ jāyata ityasatyātsatyasyotpattiruktā
GSP33vacbhamu:8565: yadyapi cāhijñānamapi svarūpeṇa sattathāpi na tajjñānatvena bhayaheturapi tvanirvācyāhirūṣitatvena /
GSP33vacbhamu:8569: yataḥ samāropitadhūmabhāvāyā dhūmamahiṣyā vahnijñānaṃ satyaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8570: nahi cakṣuṣo rūpajñānaṃ satyamupajāyata iti rasādijñānenāpi tataḥ satyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8571: yato niyamo hi sa tādṛśaḥ satyānāṃ yataḥ kutaścit kiñcideva jāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8575: na cobhayatra dīrghasamāropaṃ prati kaścidasti bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8579: yathā sāṃsāriko jāgradbhujaṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyate tataśca na daṃśavedanāmāpnoti,
GSP33vacbhamu:8580: pipāsuḥ salilamālokya pātuṃ pravartate tatastadāsādya pāyaṃpāyamāpyāyitaḥ sukhamanubhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8588: laukiko hi suptotthito 'vagamyaṃ bādhitaṃ manyate na tadavagatiṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8589: tena yadyapi parikṣakā anirvācyarūṣitāmavagatimanirvācyāṃ niścinvanti tathāpi laukikābhiprāyeṇaitaduktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8594: svapne pratibuddho mānuṣīmātmanastanuṃ paśyati tadobhayadehānugatamātmānaṃ pratisaṃdadhāno
GSP33vacbhamu:8605: nahi saṃketayitāraḥ saṃketayantīdṛśena rekhābhedenāyaṃ varṇaḥ pratyetavyo 'pi tvīdṛśo rekhābhedo 'kāra īdṛśaśca kakāra iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8608: nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti, tatrāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8620: antyā cediyamavagatirniṣprayojanā tarhi tathā ca prekṣāvadbhirupādīyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:8624: nahīyamutpannā satī paścādavidyāṃ nivartayati yena nāntyā syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:8643: anekatvajñānasya ca pratiyogigrahāpekṣayā durbalatvena bādhyatvaṃ vadan prakṛtamupasaṃharati-
GSP33vacbhamu:8654: sākṣātkūṭasthanityatvapratipādikāstu santi sahasraśaḥ śrutaya iti na pariṇāmadharmatā brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8655: atha kūṭasthasyāpi pariṇāmaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8659: yathaikabāṇāśraye gatinivṛtti evamekasminbrahmaṇi pariṇāmaśca tadabhāvaśca kauṭasthyaṃ bhaviṣyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8664: naca dharmiṇo vyatiricyate dharmo yena tadupajanāpāye 'pi dharmī kīṭasthaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8666: vāṇādayastu pariṇāminaḥ sthityā gatyā ca pariṇāmanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8667: api ca svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyāpāditārthavattvasya vedarāśerekenāpi varṇenānarthakena na bhavitavyaṃ kiṃ punariyatā jagato brahmayonitvapratipādakena vākyasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:8668: tatra phalavadbrahmadarśanasamāmnānasaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ jagadyonitvaṃ samāmnāyamānaṃ tadarthaṃ sattadupāyatayāvatiṣṭhate nārthāntarārthamityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8671: tadananyatvamityasya sūtrasya pratijñāvirodhaṃ śrutivirodhaṃ ca codayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:8675: nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te eva bījaṃ tasya vyākaraṇaṃ kāryaprapañcastadapekṣatvādaiśvaryasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:8676: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na tāttvikamaiśvaryaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ kintvavidyopādhikamiti tadāśrayaṃ pratijñāsūtraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8681: kāraṇasya bhāvaḥ sattā copalambhaśca tasmin kāryasyopalabdherbhāvācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:8685: tathā ca prabhārūpānuviruddhabodhyena cākṣuṣeṇa na vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8704: paṭa iti pratyakṣabuddhyā tantava evātānavitānāvasthā ālambyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:8708: arthakriyāyāṃ ca pratyekamasamarthā apyanārabhyaivārthāntaraṃ kiñcinmilitāḥ kurvanto dṛśyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:8711: naca samavāyādbhinnayorapi bhedānavasāyaḥ anavasāya iti sāṃpratama,
GSP33vacbhamu:8713: bhede hi siddhe samavāyaḥ samavāyācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8717: anayā ca diśā mūlakāraṇaṃ brahmaiva paramārthasat,
GSP33vacbhamu:8726: nahi tailaṃ sikatātmanā sikatāyāmasti yathā ghaṭo 'sti mṛdi mṛdātmanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8729: tena yathā sikatāyāstailaṃ na jāyata evamātmano 'pi jaganna jāyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:8734: yathā hi ghaṭaḥ sarvadā sarvatra ghaṭa eva nā jātvasau kkacitpaṭo bhavatyevaṃ sadapi sarvatra sarvadā sadeva na tu kkacitkadācidasadbhavitumarhatītyupapāditamadhastāt
GSP33vacbhamu:8740: tataścābhinnasattānanyatvādete api mitho na bhidyete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8746: abhedagrahasya ca nirapekṣatayā tadanupapatterekaikāśrayatvācca bhedasyaikābhāve tadanupapatterabhedagrahopādānaiva bhedakalpaneti sarvabhavadātam
GSP33vacbhamu:8752: atiśayo hi dharmo nāsatyatiśayavati kārye bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8753: nanu na kāryasyātiśayo niyamaheturapi tu kāraṇasya śaktibhedaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8754: sa cāsatyapi kārye kāraṇasya sattvātsannevetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8760: anabhyupagamyamāne casamavāyasya samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbandhe vicchedaprasaṅgo 'vayavāvayavidravyaguṇādīnāṃ mithaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8765: sattvaṃ tu svabhāvata eva saditi na sattvāntarayogamapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8766: tathā samavāyaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbaddhuṃ na saṃbandhāntarayogamapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8770: naca saṃyogasya kāryatvāt kāryasya ca samavāyikāraṇādhīnajanmatvāt asamavāye ca tadanupapatteḥ samavāyakalpanā saṃyoga iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8773: saṃbandhyadhīnanirūpaṇaḥ samavāyo yathā saṃbandhidvayabhede na bhidyate tannāśe ca na naśyatyapi tu nitya eka evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8776: tathā sati yathaikasmānnimittakāraṇādeva jāyata evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi nimittakāraṇādeva janiṣyata iti samānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8784: atha samastāvayavavyāsaṅgyapi katipayāvayavasthāno grahīṣyata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8787: bahutvasaṃkhyā hi svarūpeṇaiva vyāsajya saṃkhyeyeṣu vartate ityekamasaṃkhyeyāgrahaṇe 'pi na gṛhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8791: tena yathā sūtramavayavaiḥ kusumāni vyāpnuvanna samastakusumagrahaṇamapekṣate katipayakusumasthānasyāpi tasyopalabdheḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8798: yadyapi gotvasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā anirvācyā na paramārthasantastathā ca kkāsya pratyekaparisamāptiriti,
GSP33vacbhamu:8803: yadyucyeta ghaṭaśabdastadavayaveṣu vyāpārāviṣṭatayā pūrvāparībhāvamāpanneṣu ghaṭopajanābhimukheṣu tādarthyanimittādupacārātprayujyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8804: teṣāṃ ca siddhatvena kartṛtvamastītyupapadyate ghaṭo bhavatīti prayoga ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8806: utpādanā hi siddhānāṃ kapālakulālādīnāṃ vyāpāro notpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8811: tatra kapāsakulālādīnāṃ siddhānāmutpādanādhiṣṭhānānāṃ notpattyadhiṣṭhānatvamastīti pāriśeṣyādghaṭa eva sādhya utpatteradhiṣṭhānameṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8813: evañca ghaṭo bhavatītila ghaṭavyāpārasya dhātūpāttatvāttatrāsya kartṛtvamupapadyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8814: taṇḍulānāmiva satāṃ viklittau viklidyanti taṇḍulā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8824: api ca prāgutpatterasattvaṃ kāryasteti kāryābhāvasya bhāvena maryādākaraṇanupapannamityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8827: atyantābhāvasya bandhyāsutasya mā bhūnmaryādanupākhyo hi saḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8828: ghaṭaprāgabhāvasya tu bhaviṣyatā ghaṭenopākhyeyasyāsti maryādetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8830: uktametadadhastādyathā na jātu ghaṭaḥ paṭo bhavatyevamasadapi sanna bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8834: prāk prasiddhamapi kāryaṃ kadācitkāraṇena yojayituṃ vyāpāror'thavānmavedityata āha-tadananyatvācceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8840: evaṃ vastutaḥ kāryatattvaṃ na kāraṇādbhidyate kāraṇasvarūpameva hi tat,
GSP33vacbhamu:8841: anirvācyaṃ tu kāryarūpaṃ bhinnamivābhinnamiva cāvabhāsata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8856: iti ca sūtre nigadavyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyāte //19 // 2.1.6.20. // 20 // 2.1.7.21.
GSP33vacbhamu:8858: yadyapi śārīrātparamātmano bhedamāhuḥ śrutayastathāpyabhedamapi darśayanti śrutayo bahvayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8872: satyamayaṃ paramātmana sarvajñatvādyathā jīvān vastuta ātmano 'bhinnān paśyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8873: paśyatyevaṃ na bhāvata eṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāsaṅgostyavidyāvaśāttveṣāṃ tadvadabhimāna iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8874: tathā ca teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāyāmapyahamudāsīna iti na teṣāṃ bandhanāgāraniveśe 'pyastikṣatiḥ kācinmameti na hitākaraṇādidoṣāpattiriti rāddhāntaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8885: brahma khalvekamadvitīyatayā parānapekṣaṃ krameṇotpadyamānasya jagato vivadhavicitrarūpasyopādānamupeyate tadanupapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8894: ekaikaṃ mṛdādi kārakaṃ teṣāṃ tu sāmagryaṃ sādhanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:8898: idaṃ tāvadbhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām-kiṃ tāttvikamasya rūpamapekṣyemucyate utānādināmarūpabījasahitaṃ kālpanikaṃ sārvajñyaṃ sarvaśaktitvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8899: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe kiṃ nāma tato 'dvitīyādasahāyādupajāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8901: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8904: te 'pi hi bāhyacetanādikāraṇānapekṣā eva kālaparivaśena svata eva pariṇāmāntaramāsādayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8908: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ ti maheśvaram' iti kāryakrameṇa utparipāko 'pi kramavānunneyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8911: yadi tu cetanatve satīti viśeṣamānna kṣīrādibhirvyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8918: nanu na brahmaṇastattvataḥ pariṇāmo yena kārtsnyabhāgavikalpenākṣipyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8919: avidyākalpitena tu nāmarūpalakṣaṇena rūpabhedena vyākṛtāvyākṛtātmanā tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyena pariṇāmādivyavahārāspadatvaṃ brahma pratipadyate
GSP33vacbhamu:8921: nahi candramasi taimirikasya dvitvakalpanā candramaso dvitvamāvahati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8929: śrutestu śabdāmūlatvāt'ātmani caivaṃ' 'vicitrāśca hi' iti sūtrābhyāṃ vivartadṛḍhīkaraṇenaikāntikādvayalakṣaṇaḥ śrutyarthaḥ pariśodhyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:8937: svapnadṛgātmā hi manasaiva svarūpānupamardena rathādīn sṛjati //28 // 2.1.9.29.
GSP33vacbhamu:8943: yadyapi samudāyaḥ sāvayavastathāpi pratyekaṃ sattvādayo niravayavāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8944: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sattvamātraṃ pariṇamate na rajastamasī iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8953: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sa eva tadānīṃ tatra vartate na vartate ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8954: tathā coparyadhaḥpārśvasthāḥ ṣaḍapi paramāṇavaḥ samānadeśā iti prathimānupapatteraṇumātraḥ piṇḍaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8960: paramārthatastu bhāvikaṃ pariṇāmaṃ vā karyakāraṇabhāvaṃ vecchatāmeṣa durvāro doṣo na punarasmākaṃ māyāvādināmityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:8967: kulālādibhyastāvadbāhyakaraṇāpekṣebhyo devādīnāṃ bāhyanapekṣāṇāmāntarakaraṇāpekṣasṛṣṭhīnāṃ pramāṇena dṛṣṭo yathā viśeṣo nāpahnotuṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8969: evaṃ sarvaśakteḥ parasyā devatāyā āntarakaraṇānapekṣāyā jagatsarjanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na sāmānyato dṛṣṭamātreṇāpahnavamarhatīti //31 // 2.1.11.32.
GSP33vacbhamu:8974: prekṣāvataśca pravṛttiḥ svaparahitāhitaprāptiparihāraprayojanā satī nāprayojanālpāyāsāpi saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8982: tasmāt prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā tadabhāve 'nupapannā brahmopādānatāṃ jagataḥ pratikṣipatīti prāptam //32 // 2.1.11.33.
GSP33vacbhamu:8985: bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8990: anyathā 'na kurvīta vṛthā ceṣṭām' iti dharmasūtrakṛtāṃ pratiṣedho nirviṣayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8993: api cādṛṣṭahetukotpattikī śvāsapraśvāsalakṣaṇā prekṣāvatāṃ kriyā prayojanānusaṃdhānamantareṇa dṛṣṭā /
