GSP33vacbhamu:8999: līlāmātrātsatyapyanuniṣpādini prayojane naiva taduddeśena pravṛttirevaṃ brahmaṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:9001: dṛṣṭaṃ ca yadalpabalavīryabuddhināmaśakyamatiduṣkaraṃ vā tadanyeṣāmanalpabalavīryabuddhīnāṃ suśakamīṣatkaraṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9004: na cāyaṃ na pītaḥ saṃkṣipya culukena helayeva kalaśayoninā mahāmuninā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9005: na cādyāpi na dṛśyante līlāmātravinirmitāni mahāprāsādapramadavanāni śrīmannṛganarendrāṇāmanyeṣāṃ manasāpi duṣkarāṇi nareśvarāṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9006: tasmādupapannaṃ yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvādvā līlayā vā jagatsarjanaṃ bhagavato maheśvarasyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9007: api ca neyaṃ pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiryenānuyujyeta prayojanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9009: avidyā ca svabhāvata eva kāryonmukhī na prayojanamapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9012: sā ca caitanyacchuritā jagadutpādaheturutu cetano jagadyonirākhyāyata ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:9014: api ca na brahma jagatkāraṇamapi tattayā vivakṣantyāgamā api tu jagati brahmātmabhāvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9015: tathā ca sṛṣṭeravivakṣāyāṃ tadāśrayo doṣo nirviṣaya evetyāśayenāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:9022: nahi sabhyaḥ sabhāyāṃ niyukto yuktavādinaṃ yuktavādyasīti cāyuktavādinamayuktavādyasīti bruvāṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:9023: sabhāpatirvā yuktavādinamanugṛhṇannayuktavādinaṃ ca nigṛhṇannanukto dviṣṭo vā bhavatyapi tu madhyastha iti vītarāgadveṣa iti cākhyāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9024: tadvadīśvaraḥ puṇyakarmāṇamanugṛhṇannapuṇyakarmāṇaṃ ca nigṛhṇanmadhyastha eva nāmadhyasthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9028: ata eva na nairghṛṇyamapi saṃharataḥ samastān prāṇabhṛtaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9033: na ca 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate eṣa evāsādhu karma
GSP33vacbhamu:9034: kārayati taṃ yamadho niniṣate' iti śruterīśvara eṣa dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ sādhvasādhunī
GSP33vacbhamu:9035: karmaṇī kārayitvā svargaṃ narakaṃ vā lokaṃ nayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9038: yasmāt karma kārayitveśvaraḥ prāṇinaḥ sukhaduḥkhinaḥ sṛjati iti śruteravagamyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9040: naca vaiṣamyamātramatra brūmo na tvīśvarakāraṇatvaṃ vyāsedhāma iti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9042: tasmādīśvarasya savāsanakleśāparāmarśamabhivadantīnāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāmanugrahāyonninīṣate 'dho ninīṣata ityetadapi tajjātīyapūrvakarmābhyāsavaśātprāṇina ityevaṃ neyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9048: tathā ca māyākārasyevāṅgasākalyavaikalyabedena vicitrān prāṇino darśayato na vaiṣamyadoṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9050: evamasyāpi bhagavato vividhavicitraprapañcamanirvācyaṃ viśvaṃ darśayataḥ saṃharataśca svabhāvādvā līlayā vā na kaściddoṣaḥ //34 // 2.1.12.35.
GSP33vacbhamu:9057: akṛte karmaṇi puṇye pāpe vā tatphalaṃ bhoktāramadhyāgacchet,
GSP33vacbhamu:9064: sa ca rāgādibiḥ sahitaḥ svakāryairna śarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhabhogāyatanamantareṇa saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9067: naca pūrvaśarīramantareṇa mohādiriti pūrvapūrvaśarīrāpekṣo mohādirevaṃ pūrvapūrvamohādyapekṣaṃ pūrvapūrvaśarīramityanāditaivātra bhagavatī cittamanākulayati
GSP33vacbhamu:9070: rāgādveṣamohā rāgādayasta eva hi puruṣaṃ sāsāraduḥkhamanubhāvya kleśayantīti kleśāsteṣāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:9071: vāsanāḥ karmaparvṛttyanuguṇāstābhirākṣiptāni pravarttitāni karmāṇi tadapekṣā layalakṣaṇā avidyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9076: tadevamanāditve siddhe 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' iti prāk sṛṣṭeravibhāgāvadhāramaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:9081: dṛśyate sarvasya cetanādhiṣṭhitasyaiva loke pravṛttiriti lokānusāro darśitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9087: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrikabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9088: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyāyogakāraṇadādismṛtibhiḥ sāṃkhyādiprayuktatarkaiśca vedāntasamanvayavirodhaparihārākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9091: iha hi pāde khatantrā vedanirapekṣāḥ pradhānādisiddhiviṣayāḥ sāṃkhyādiyuktayo nirākariṣyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:9093: nahīdaṃ śāstramucchṛṅkhalatarkaśāstravatpravṛttamapi tu vedāntavākyāni brahmaparāṇīti pūrvapakṣottarapakṣābhyāṃ viniścetum /
GSP33vacbhamu:9100: na caitadeva cetanopādānamacetanopādānaṃ ceti samuccetuṃ śakyaṃ, virodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9101: na ca vyavasthite vastuni vikalpo yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9102: na cāgamabādhitaviṣayatayānumānameva nodīyata iti sāṃpratam. sarvajñapraṇītatayā sāṃkhyādyāgamasya vedāgamatulyatvāt tadbhāṣitasyānumānasya pratikṛtisiṃhatulyatayābādhyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9103: tasmāttadvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvayo vedāntānāṃ sidhyatīti na tatastattvajñānaṃ seddhumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9104: naca tattvajñānādṛte mokṣa iti svatantrāṇāmapyanumānānāmābhāsīkaraṇamiha śāstresaṃgatameveti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9105: yadyevaṃ tataḥ parakīyānumānanirāsa eva kasmātprathamaṃ na kṛta ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:9113: naca parapakṣadūṣaṇamantareṇa tattvanirṇayaḥ śakyaḥ kartumiti tatvanirṇayāya vītarāgeṇāpi parapakṣo dūṣyate na tu parapakṣatayeti na vītarāgakathātvavyāhatirityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9117: yāni hi yena rūpeṇā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyātsamanvīyante tāni tatkaraṇāni dṛṣṭāni,
GSP33vacbhamu:9118: yathā dhaṭādayo rucakādayaścā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyānmṛtsuvarṇānvitāstatkaraṇāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9119: tathā cedaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ ca bhāvajātaṃ suḥkhaduḥkhamohātmanānvitamupalabhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9123: yā ca mehātmatā tattama iti traiguṇyakāraṇasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9131: caitrasya tu straiṇasya tāmavindato moho viṣādaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9136: tacca triguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ pradhīyate kriyate 'nena jagaditi,
GSP33vacbhamu:9138: tacca mṛtsuvarṇavadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣasya bhogāpavargalakṣaṇamarthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvata eva pravartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9139: na tu kenacitpravartyate. tathā hyāhuḥ--- 'puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam' iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9145: yadi tāvadacetanaṃ pradhānamanadhiṣṭhitatvena mṛtsuvarṇādau dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi vyāpterupalabdherviruddhatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9147: tasmāt kṛtakatvamiva nityatvasādhanayā prayuktaṃ sādhyaviruddhena vyāptaṃ viruddham,
GSP33vacbhamu:9148: evaṃ samanvayādi cetanānadhiṣṭhitatve sādhya iti racanānupapatteriti darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9157: sa ca svabhāvapratibandhaḥ śaṅkitasamāropitopādhinirāse sati niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9159: tau cānvayavyatirekau na tathopādānācaitanye yathopādānācaitanye yathā cetanaprayuktatve 'tiparisphuṭau /
GSP33vacbhamu:9161: evamapi cetanaprayuktatvaṃ nābhyupeyeta yadi pramāṇāntaravirodho bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:9166: āntarāḥ khalvamī suḥkhaduḥkhamohaviṣādā bāhyebhyaścandanādibhyo 'tivicchinnapratyayapravedanīyebhyo vyatiriktā adhyakṣamīkṣyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:9167: yadi punareta eva suḥkhaduḥkhādisvabhāvā bhaveyustataḥsvarūpatvādhemante 'pi candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9171: evaṃ kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasya sukha iti manuṣyādīnāmapi prāṇabhṛtāṃ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9173: tasmādasukhādisvabhāvā api candanakuṅkumādayo jātikālāvasthādyapekṣayā sukhaduḥkhādihetavo na tu svayaṃ sukhādisvabhāvā iti ramaṇīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9174: tasmātsukhādirūpasamanvayo bhāvānāmasiddha iti nānena tadrūpaṃ kāraṇamavyaktamunnīyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9183: saṃsargapūrvakatve hi saṃsargasyaikasminnadvaye 'saṃbhavānnānātvaikārthasamavetasya nānākaraṇāni saṃsṛṣṭāni kalpanīyāni,
GSP33vacbhamu:9189: atha na yojanādimitatvaṃ parimāṇamiyattāṃ nabhaso brūmaḥ kintvavyāpitām,
GSP33vacbhamu:9195: nahi yathā taiḥ kāryajātamāviṣṭamevaṃ tāni parasparaṃ viśanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9200: evaṃ citiśaktirapi guṇairasaṃsṛṣṭeti sāpi parimitetyanaikāntikatvaṃ parimitatvasya hetoriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9204: na kevalaṃ racanābhedā na cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa bhavantyapi tu sāmyāvasthāyāḥ pracyutirvaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9205: tathā ca yadudbhūtaṃ balīyastadaṅgyabhibhūtaṃ ca tadanuguṇatayā sthitamaṅgam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9206: evaṃ hi guṇapradhānabhāve satyasya mahadādau kārye kā pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9208: na hi cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa mṛtpiṇḍe pradhāne 'ṅgabhāvena cakradaṇḍasalilasūtirādayo 'vatiṣṭhante /
GSP33vacbhamu:9209: tasmātpravṛtterapi cetanādhiṣṭhānasiddhiriti 'śaktitaḥ pravṛtteśca' ityayamapi hetuḥ sāṃkhyīyo viruddha evetyuktaṃ vakroktyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9212: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-- tvayā kilaupaniṣadenāsmadhetūn dūṣayitvā kevalasya cetanasyaivānyanirapekṣasya jagadupādānatvaṃ nimittatvaṃ ca samarthanīyam
GSP33vacbhamu:9215: aupaniṣadastu cetanahetukāṃ tāvadeṣa sāṃkhyaḥ pravṛttimabhyupagacchatu paścāt svapakṣamata eva samādhāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:9221: acetanāśrayaiva sarvā pravṛttirdṛśyate na tu cetanāśrayā kācidapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9227: na tāvaccetanaḥ pravṛtyāśrayatayā tatprayojakatayā vā pratyakṣamīkṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9230: sadbhāvamātraṃ tu tatra cetanasya gamyate rathādivailakṣaṇyājjīvaddehasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:9232: mā bhūdākāśa utpattimatāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇamasti hi sarvatreti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9233: tadanena dehātirikte satyapi cetane tasya na pravṛttiṃ prati nimittabhāvo 'stītyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9234: yataścāsya na pravṛttihetubhāvo 'sti ata eva pratyakṣe dehe sati pravṛttidarśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamiti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9235: tathā ca na cidātmanimittā pravṛttiriti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:9236: tasmānna racanāyāḥ pravṛttervā cidātmakāraṇatvasiddhirjagata iti aupaniṣadaḥ pariharati--
GSP33vacbhamu:9238: na tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamasiddhaḥ śārīro vā paramātmā vāsmābhiridānīṃ sādhanīyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9240: tatra mṛtaśarīre vā rathādau vānadhiṣṭhite cetanena pravṛtteradarśanāt tadviparyaye ca pravṛttidarśanādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cetanahetukatvaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:9246: dehaḥ svayaṃ cetanaḥ karacaraṇādimān svavyāpāreṇa pravartayatīti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9247: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kūṭasthanityaścetano vyāpārarahito jñānaikasvabhāvaḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt pravartako yukta iti codayati--
GSP33vacbhamu:9253: sāṃkhyānāṃ hi svadeśasthā rūpādaya indriyaṃ vikurvate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9254: tena tadindrayamarthaṃ prāptamarthākāreṇa pariṇamata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9257: yeṣāmacetanaṃ cetanaṃ cāsti teṣāmetadyujyate vaktuṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ pravartata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9260: teṣāṃ pravartyābhāve kaṃ prati pravartakatvaṃ cetanasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9263: kāraṇabhūtayā layalakṣaṇayāvidyayā prāksargopacitena ca vikṣepasaṃskāreṇa yat pratyupasthāpitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ tadeva māyā,
GSP33vacbhamu:9265: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- neyaṃ sṛṣṭirvastusatī yenādvaitino vastusato dvitīyasyābhāvādanuyujyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9266: kālpanikyāṃ tu sṛṣṭāvasti kālpanikaṃ dvitīyaṃ sahāyaṃ māyāmayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9273: yathā payombunoścetanānadhiṣṭhitayoḥ svata eva pravṛttirevaṃ pradhānasyāpīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9280: na ca sapakṣeṇa vyabhicāra iti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9284: iha tu sarvasya cetanāpekṣā pravṛttiḥ pratipādyata iti kuto na virodha ityata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:9286: sthūladarśilokābhiprāyānurodhena taduktaṃ na tu paramārthata ityarthaḥ //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9288: yadyapi sāṃkhyānāmapi vicitrakarmavāsanāvāsitaṃ pradhānaṃ sāmyāvasthāyāmapi tathāpi na karmavāsanāḥ sargasyeśate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9289: kintu pradhānameva svakārye pravartamānamadharmapratibaddhaṃ sanna sukhamayīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartumutsahata iti dharmeṇādharmapratibandho 'panīyate
GSP33vacbhamu:9292: yathāhuḥ-- 'nimittamaprayojakaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ varaṇabhedastu tataḥ kṣetrikavat' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9293: tataśca pratibandakāpanayasādhane dharmādharmavāsane api saṃnihite ityāgantorapekṣaṇīyasyābhāvāt sadaiva sāmyena pariṇameta vaiṣamyeṇa vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:9295: īśvarasya tu mahāmāyasya cetanasya līlayā vā yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvavaicitryādvā karmaparipākāpekṣasya pravṛttinivṛttī upapadyete eveti //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9297: dhenūpayuktaṃ hi tṛṇapallavādi yathā svabhāvata eva cetanānapekṣaṃ kṣīrabhāvena pariṇamate na tu tatra dhenūcaitanyamapekṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9299: evaṃ pradhānamapi svabhāvata eva pariṇaṃsyate kṛtamatra cetaneneti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9300: dhenūpayuktasya tṛṇādeḥ kṣīrabhāve kiṃ nimittāntaramātraṃ niṣidhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9304: buddhipūrvakārī tu tatrāpīśvara eva sarvajñaḥ saṃbhavatīti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9314: na kevalaṃ tāttviko bhogo 'nādheyātiśayasya kūṭasthanityasya puruṣasya na saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9316: yena hi prayojanena pradhānaṃ pravartitaṃ tadanena kartavyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9320: citeḥ sadā viśuddhatvānnaitasyāṃ jātu karmānubhavavāsanāḥ santi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9322: tathā ca pradhānapravṛtteḥ prāk citirmuktaiveti nāpavargārthamapi tatpravṛttiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9329: bhogasya ca sakṛcchabdādyupalabghimātrādeva samāptatvānna tadarthaṃ punaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartetetyayatnasādhyo mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9332: atha puruṣārthāya pravṛttaṃ kimarthaṃ sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiṃ karoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9334: hantāyāṃ sakṛcchabdādyupabhogena kṛtaprayojanasya pradhānasya nivṛttimātrādeva sidhyatīti kṛtaṃ sattvānyatākhyātipratīkṣaṇena /
GSP33vacbhamu:9336: tasmādubhayārthamapi na pradhānasya pravṛttirupapadyata iti siddhor'thābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9345: sā ca sarjanīyamantareṇānarthikā syāditi yatpradhānena śabdādi sṛjyate tadeva dṛkśakterdṛśyaṃ bhavatīti tadubhayārthavatvāya sarjanamiti śaṅkārthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9348: yathā hi pradhānasya sargaśaktirekaṃ puruṣaṃ prati caritārthāpi puruṣāntaraṃ prati pravartate 'nucchedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9349: evaṃ dṛkśaktirapi taṃ puruṣaṃ pratyarthavattvāyānucchedātsarvadā pravartetetyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9350: sakṛddṛśyadarśanena vā caritārthatve na bhūyaḥ pravarteteti sarveṣāmekapade nirmokṣaḥ prasajyeteti sahasā saṃsāraḥ samucchidyeteti //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9354: puruṣa eva dṛkśaktisampannaḥ paṅguriva pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ pradhānamandhamiva pravartayiṣyatīti śaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9366: yathāhuḥ-- 'nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9375: yatsāmyāvasthayā suciraṃ paryaṇamatkathaṃ tadevāsati vilakṣaṇapratyayopanipāte vaiṣamyamupaiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9376: anapekṣasya svato vāpi vaiṣamye na kadācitsāmyaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ //8 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9379: aṅgitvānupapattilakṣaṇo doṣastāvanna bhavadbhiḥ śakyaḥ parihartumiti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9398: tathā ca tapyena karmaṇā tāpakasamavetakriyāphalaśālinā tāpakādanyeva bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9400: anyatve tu tapyasya tāpakāccaitrasamavetagamanakriyāphalabhājo gamyasyeva nagarasya tapyatvopapatti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9404: nahi svabhāvādbhāvo viyojituṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9405: jaladheśca vīcitaraṅgaphenādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ santa āvirbhāvatirobhāvadharmāṇo na tu tairjaladhiḥ kadācidapi mucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9413: tadevamaupaniṣadaṃ matamasamañjasamuktvā sāṃkhyaḥ svapakṣe tapyatāpakayorbhede mokṣamupapādayati--
GSP33vacbhamu:9427: tathāpi yathā jayaḥ parājayo vā yogheṣu vartamānaḥ prādhānyātsvāminyapadiśyate ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9437: tāpo hi sāṃvyavahārika eva na pāramārthika atyasakṛdāveditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9438: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvanyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātāmityasmadabhyupagama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9439: sāṃkhyo 'pi hi bhedāśrayaṃ tapyatāpakabhāvaṃ bruvāṇo na puruṣasya tapikarmatāmākhyātumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9443: darśitaviṣayattvāttu buddhisatve tapye tadavibhāgāpatyā puruṣo 'pyanutapyata iva na tu tapyate 'pariṇāmitvādityuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9450: sahādarśanena nimittena vartata iti sanimittaḥ saṃyogastadapekṣatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9455: tasya ca buddhisatvasya tāmasaviparyāsādātmanaḥ puruṣādbhedamapaśyataḥ puruṣastapyata ityabhimānaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9457: tasya tu buddhisatvasya sāttvikyā vivekakhyātyā tāmasīyamavivekakhyātirnivartanīyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9459: tathā vicchinnāpi chinnabadarīva punastamasodbhūtena sattvamabhibhūya vivekakhyātimapodya śataśikharāvidyāvirbhāvyeteti bateyamapavargakathā tapasvino dattajalāñjaliḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9465: atha tasmin pratibimbe malinādarśopadhānānmalinatā padaṃ labhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9466: tathā cātmano malinaṃ mukhaṃ paśyan devadattastapyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9467: yadā tūpādhyapanayādbimbameva kalpanāvaśāt pratibimbaṃ taccāvadātamiti tattvamavagacchati tadāsya tāpaḥ praśāmyati naca malinaṃ me mukhamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:9468: evamavidyopadhānakalpitāvacchedo jīvaḥ paramātmapratibimbakalpaḥ kalpitaireva śabdādibhiḥ saṃparkāttapyate natu tattvataḥ paramātmano 'sti tāpaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9472: na cāsya punaḥ saṃsārabhayamasti taddhetoravāstavatvena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9477: yathaiva pradhānakāraṇavādo brahmakāraṇavādavirodhyevaṃ paramāṇukāraṇavādo 'pyataḥ so 'pi nirākartavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9478: 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ' ityasya prapañca ārabhyate-- tatra vaiśeṣikā brahmakāraṇatvaṃ dūṣayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9489: tasya tu sāvayavatve 'bhyupagamyamāne 'nantāvayavatvena sumerurājasarṣapayoḥ samānaparimāṇatvaprasaṅga ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9491: tato 'sau paramāṇvantareṇa saṃyujyadvyaṇukamārabhate. bahavastu paramāṇavaḥ saṃyuktā na sahasā sthūlamārabhante,
GSP33vacbhamu:9494: yadi hi ghaṭopagṛhītāḥ paramāṇavo ghaṭamārabheran na ghaṭe pravibhajyamāne kapālaśarkarādyupalabhyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:9497: tathā sati mudgaraprahārāt ghaṭavināśe na kiñcidupalabhyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:9500: tasmānna bahūnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ dravyaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇatvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9505: tadapi hi dvyaṇukameva bhavenna tu mahat /
GSP33vacbhamu:9514: tathā ca puruṣopabhogātiśayābhāvādadṛṣṭanimittatvācca viśvanirmāṇasya bhogārtatvāttatkāraṇena ca dvyaṇukena tanniṣpatteḥ kṛtaṃ dvyaṇukāśrayeṇa dvyaṇukāntareṇetyārambhavaiyarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9515: ārambhārthavattvāya bahubhireva dvyaṇukaistryaṇukaṃ caturaṇukaṃ vā dravyaṃ mahaddīrghamārabdhavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9518: tryaṇukādibhirārabdhaṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ kāraṇabahutvādvā kāraṇamahatvādvā kāraṇapracayabhedādvā mahadbhavatīti prakriyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9519: tadetayaiva prakriyayā kāraṇasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyameva gumāntaramārabhanta iti dūṣaṇamadūṣaṇīkriyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9522: yathā mahad dravyaṃ tryaṇukādi hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9525: yathā vā tadeva tryaṇukādi dīrdhaṃ hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9529: yathā dvyaṇukamaṇu hṛsvaparimāṇaṃ parimaṇḍalāt paramāṇoraparimaṇḍalaṃ jāyata evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jaganniṣpadyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9536: yadāhi dve dve dvyaṇukeiti paṭhitavye pramādādekaṃ dvepadaṃ na paṭhitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9538: itarathā hi dvyaṇukameva tadapi syānna tu mahadityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9543: tadevaṃ yojanīyam-- dvyaṇukādhikaraṇe ye dvitve te yadā caturaṇukamārabhete saṃkhyeyānāṃ caturṇāṃ dvyaṇukānāmārambhakatvāttattadgate dvitvasaṃkhye api ārambhike ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9544: evaṃ vyavasthitāyāṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyāyāṃ taddūṣaṇasya vyabhicāra uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9547: nāṇu jāyate no hṛsvaṃ jāyate iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9552: kāraṇagatā guṇā na kārye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhanta ityetāvataiveṣṭasiddhau na tadhetvanusāreṇa khedanīyaṃ mana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9553: api ca satparimāṇāntaramākrāmati notpatteśca prāk parimāṇāntaraṃ saditi kathamākrāmet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9573: paramāṇūnāmādyasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇābhyupagame 'nabhyupagame vā na karmātastadabhāvastasya dvyaṇukādikrameṇa sargasyābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9577: athavā saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthamubhayathāpi na karmātaḥ sargahetoḥ saṃyogasyābhāvāt pralayahetorvibhāgasyābhāvāttadabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9592: gurutvadravatve ca paramāṇugate sadātane iti karmasātatyaprasaṅgaḥ. dvitīyaṃ vyākhyānamāśaṅkāpūrvamāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:9600: yadyapi paramāṇukṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogaḥ paramāṇukarmajastathāpi tatpravāhasya sātatyamiti bhāvaḥ. sarvātmanā cedupacayābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9601: ekadeśena hi saṃyoge yāvaṇvorekadeśau nirantarau tābhyāmanye ekadeśāḥ saṃyogenāvyāptā iti prathamopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9602: sarvātmanā tu nairantarye paramāṇāvekasmin paramāṇvāntarāṇyapi saṃmāntīti na prathamā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9608: nahyasti saṃbhavo niravayava ekastadaiva tenaiva saṃyuktaścāsaṃyuktaśceti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9618: nanvabhighātanodanādayaḥ pralayārambhasamaye kasmādvibhāgārambhakakarmahetavo na saṃbhavantyata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:9624: yadyapi śarīrādipralayārambhe 'sti duḥkhabhogastathāpyasau pṛthivyādipralaye nāstītyabhipretyedamuditamiti mantavyam //12 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9628: na tāvat svatantraḥ samavāyo 'tyantaṃ bhinnaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ samavāyinau ghaṭayitumarhatyatiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9631: athāsau saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandhe na saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate saṃbandhisaṃbandhanaparamārthatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9633: na ca tasmin sati samabanghināvasaṃbanghinau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9634: tasmāt svabhāvādeva samavāyaḥ samavāyinorna saṃbandhāntareṇeti nānavastheti codayati--
GSP33vacbhamu:9641: naca tasmin sati saṃyogināvasaṃyoginau bhavata iti tulyacarcaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9647: yadyasamavāye 'syāguṇatvaṃ bhavati kāmaṃ bhavatu na naḥ kācitkṣatiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9651: tacca vināpi samavāyaṃ svarūpataḥ saṃyogasyopapadyata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:9652: naca kāryatvātsamavāyyasamavāyikāraṇāpekṣitayā saṃyogaḥ samavāyīti yuktamca ajasaṃyogasyātathātvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9653: api ca samavāyasyāpi saṃbandhyadhīnasadbhāvasya saṃbandhinaścaikasya dvayorvā vināśitvena vināśitvātkāryatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9654: nahyasti saṃbhavo guṇo vā guṇaguṇinau vāvayavo vāvayavāvayavinau vā na sto 'pyasti ca tayoḥ saṃbandha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9656: tathā ca yathaiṣa nimittakāraṇamātrādhīnotpāda evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9657: atha samavāyo 'pi samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇe apekṣate tathāpi saivānavastheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9663: tasmātsaṃyogaḥ saṃyoginoḥ samavāyena saṃbaddha iti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9670: yat kila bhūtabhautikānāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ tadrūpādimān paramāṇurnitya iti bhavadbhirabhyupeyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9674: tadanena prasaṅgena jagatkāraṇaprasiddhaye pravṛttaṃ sādhanaṃ rūpādimannityaparamāṇusiddheḥ pracyāvya brahmagocaratāṃ nīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9688: vyapadeśasya ca pratītipūrvakasya tadabhāve nirmūlasyāpi darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9691: yadi satāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ paridṛśyamānasthūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇāgrahaṇamavidyā tayā nityatvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9693: athādravyatve satīti viśeṣyetatathā sati na dvyaṇuke vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9699: api cādravyatve sati sattvādityata eveṣṭārthasiddheravidyeti vyartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:9709: yadi hi saṃyogasacivāni bahūni dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabheranniti prakriyā sidhyet sidhyet dravyadvayameva(?)
GSP33vacbhamu:9713: na tāvat tantvādhārastadvyatiriktaḥ paṭo nāmāsti yaḥ saṃyogasacivaistantubhirārabhyetetyuktamadhastāt. ṣaṭpadārthasya dūṣayannagre vakṣyati
GSP33vacbhamu:9717: tathāhi-- mṛdvā suvarṇaṃ vā sarveṣu ghaṭarucakādiṣvanugataṃ sāmānyamanubhūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9718: na caite ghaṭarucakādayo mṛtsuvarṇābhyāṃ vyatiricyanta ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9720: tasmānmṛtsuvarṇe eva tena tenīkāreṇa pariṇamamāne ghaṭa iti ca rucaka iti ca kapālaśarkarākaṇamiti ca śakalakaṇikācūrṇamiti ca vyākhyāyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:9722: na tu ghaṭādayo vā kapālādiṣu kapālādayo vā ghaṭādiṣu ca rucakādayo vā śakalādiṣu śakalādayo vā rucakādiṣu pratyabhijñāyante yatra kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9723: na ca vinaśyantameva ghaṭakṣaṇaṃ pratītya kapālakṣaṇo 'nupādāna evotpadyate tatkimupādānapratyabhijñāneneti vaktavyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9727: evaṃ vyavasthite yathā suvarṇadravyaṃ kāṭhinyāvasthāmapahāya dravāvasthayā parigaṇitaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9728: na ca tatrāvayavavibhāgaḥ sannapi dravatve kāraṇaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9731: api tu yadā yadā nirūpyante tadā tadā tadākāratayaiva prathante na tu prathāyāmeṣāmasti svātantryaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9732: tasmānnātiricyante dravyādapi tu dravyameva sāmānyarūpaṃ tathā tathā prathata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9741: yatra hi dvāvākāriṇau vibhinnābhyāmākārābhyāmavagamyate tau saṃbaddhāsaṃbaddhau vā vaiyadhikaraṇyena pratibhāsete,
GSP33vacbhamu:9742: yatheha kuṇḍe dadhi yathā vā gauraśva iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9750: yadi tu saṃyoginoḥ kāryayoḥ saṃbandhibhyāmanyadeśatve yutasiddhistato 'nyāyutasiddhiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9752: tathā cākāśaparamāṇvoḥ paramāṇvośca saṃyuktayoryutasiddhiḥ siddhā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9765: evaṃ lakṣaṇe 'pi hi samavāye guṇaguṇinorabhyupagamyamāne saṃbaddhe iti pratyayaḥ syānna tādātmyapratyayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9767: sa cedāsthito 'pi na pratyayamimamupapādayet kṛtaṃ tatkalpanayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9770: tadgocaratve hi paṭe śukla ityevamākaraḥ syānna tu paṭaḥ śukla iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9773: nahyagnirmāṇavaka ityupacaritāgnibhāvo māṇavakaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dahanātmanā prathate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9775: guṇādisadbhāve tadbhede ca pratyakṣānubhavādanyasya pramāṇasyābhāvāttasya ca bhrāntatve sarvābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9787: saṃbandhidvayādhīnasadbhāvo hi saṃbandho nāsatyekasminnapi saṃbandhini bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9788: naca samavāyo nityaḥ svatantra iti coktamadhastāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9790: evaṃ hi sati samavāyasya nityatvābhyupagamāt kāraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9791: utpattau ca samavāyasya saiva kāryasyāstu kiṃ samavāyena /
GSP33vacbhamu:9795: kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyate itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9809: saṃyogajo 'pi hi saṃyogo bhavadbhirabhyupeyate na kriyāja evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9813: api ca saṃbandhirūpātirikte saṃbandhe siddhe tadavāntarabhedāya lakṣaṇabhedo 'nuśrīyeta sa eva tu saṃbandhyatirikto 'siddhaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9814: uktaṃ hi parastādatiriktaḥ saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandho 'saṃbaddho na saṃbandhinau ghaṭayitumiṣṭe /
GSP33vacbhamu:9818: tasmāt kāryasya kāraṇādanatirekān kiṃ kena saṃbaddhaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9819: saṃyogasya ca saṃyogibhyāmanatirekāt kastayoḥ saṃyoga ityāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:9829: parāpekṣayā tu pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9848: saṃśleṣaḥ saṃgraho yata ekasaṃbandhyākarṣe saṃbandhyantarākarṣo bhavati tasyānupapattiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9851: nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpanīyaḥ samavāya iti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9868: kiṃ sūkṣmatvāt paramāṇavo na vinaśyantyatha niravayavatayā tatra pūrvasmin kalpe idamuktam--
GSP33vacbhamu:9877: api tu saṃyuktā eva santaḥ paraṃ prathanena nudyamānā adhikadeśavyāpakā bhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9878: evamagnisaṃyogena suvarṇadravyāvayavāḥ saṃyuktā eva santo dravībhāvamāpadyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:9882: evamantareṇāpyavayavasaṃyogavināśaṃ paramāṇavo vinaṅkṣyantyanye cotpatsyanta iti sarvamavadātam //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9887: te hi paramāṇvākāśādikkālātmamanasāṃ ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcinnityatvamabhyupetya śeṣāṇāṃ niranvayavināśamupayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9889: tena tadupanyāso vaināśikatvasāmyena sarvavaināśikān smārayatīti tadanantaraṃ vaināśikamatanirākaraṇamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9899: atha tvatrabhavatāṃ sarvajñānāṃ tattvapratipattibhedo na saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9905: ye tu prakṛṣṭamatayastebhyaḥ sākṣādeva śūnyatātattvaṃ pratipādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9921: rūpyante ebhiriti rūpyanta iti ca vyutpatyā saviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi rūpaskandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9922: yadyapi rūpyamāṇāḥ pṛthivyādayo bāhyāstathāpi kāyasthatvādvā indriyasaṃbandhādvā bhavantyādhyātmikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9924: vedanāskandho yā priyāpriyānubhayaviṣayasparśe suḥkhaduḥkhatadrahitaviśeṣāvasthā cittasya jāyate sa vedanāskandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9926: yathā ḍitthaḥ kuṇḍalī gauro brāhmaṇo gacchatītyevañjātīyakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9933: rūpavijñānādiskandhahetuke ca samudāya ādhyātmike 'bhipreyamāṇe tadaprāptistasya samudāyasyāyuktatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9936: cetano hi kulālādiḥ sarvaṃ mṛddaṇḍādyupasaṃhṛtya samudāyātmakaṃ ghaṭamāracayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9937: nahyasati mṛddaṇḍādivyāpārīṇi viduṣi kulāle svayamacetanā mṛddaṇḍādayo vyāpṛtya jātu ghaṭamāracayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9938: na cāsati kuvinde tantuvemādayaḥ paṭaṃ vayante /
GSP33vacbhamu:9942: cetanānadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo vyāvartamānā cetanādhiṣṭhitatva avāvatiṣṭhata iti
GSP33vacbhamu:9946: taddhīndriyādiviṣayasparśe satyabhijvalat tatkāraṇacakraṃ yathāyathā kāryāya paryāptaṃ tathātathā prakāśayadacetanāni kāraṇānyadhiṣṭhāya kāryamabhinirvartayatīti, tatrāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:9959: yadyucyeta asamavahitānyeva kāraṇāni kāryaṃ kariṣyanti parasparānapekṣāṇi,
GSP33vacbhamu:9965: yat khalvekaṃ yadi sthiramāsthīyeta tato nāmāntareṇātmaiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:9974: tena vyāpāravatā vyāpārātpūrvaṃ vyāpārasamaye ca bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9982: ayamarthaḥ-- saṃkṣepato hi pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇamuktaṃ buddhena 'idaṃ pratyayaphalam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9985: atha punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataśca pratyayopanibandhataśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:9987: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ-- yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuro 'ṅkurātpatraṃ patrātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnālo nālādgarbho garbhācchūkaḥ śūkātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9992: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9993: . aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahaṃ bījena nirvartita iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9994: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ phalaṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9996: tasmādasatyapi caitanye bījādīnāmasatyapi cānyasminnadhiṣṭhātari kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamo dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10004: tatra ca pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karoti yato 'ṅkuraḥ kaṭhino bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10010: tadeteṣāmavikalānāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāye bīje rohityaṅkuro jāyate nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10011: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ bījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10014: tathādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10015: tatrāsya hetūpanibandho yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇādaya udapatsyanta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10017: saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayamavidyayā nirvartitā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10018: evaṃ yāvajjātyā api naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ jarāmaraṇādyabhinirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10019: jarāmaraṇādīnāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirnirvartitā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10020: atha ca satsvavidyādiṣu svayamacetaneṣu cetanāntarānadhiṣṭhiteṣvapi saṃskārādīnāmutpattiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10030: yastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati pañcavijñānakāryasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10032: yadā hyādhyātmikāḥ pṛthivyādidhātavo bhavantyavikalāstadā sarveṣāṃ samavāyādbhavati kāyasyotpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10033: tatra pṛthivyādidhātūnāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ kāyasya kāṭhinyādi nirvartayāma iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10034: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamebhiḥ pratyayairabhinirvartita iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10084: janmādihetukā avidyādayo 'vidyādihetukāśca janmādayo ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamānāḥ santīti tadetairavidyādibhi
GSP33vacbhamu:10089: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-- yat khalu hetūpanibandhaṃ kāryaṃ tadanyānapekṣaṃ hetumātrādhīnotpādatvādutpadyatāṃ nāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:10098: na caikasmādeva kāraṇātkāryasiddheḥ kimanyaiḥ kāraṇairiti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10100: na caiko 'pitatkāraṇasamarthaṃ ityanya udāsata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10101: nahi te prekṣāvanto yenaisamālocayeyurasmāsu samartha eko 'pi kārye iti kṛtaṃ naḥ saṃnidhineti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10103: tāṃśca sarvananapekṣān pratītya kāryamapi na netpattumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10104: naca svamahimnā sarve kāryamutpādayanto 'pi nānākāryāṇāmīsate tatraiva teṣāṃ sāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10110: hantānena krameṇa tataḥ pūrve tataḥ pūrve sarva evānapekṣāstattatsvakāryopajanana
GSP33vacbhamu:10112: bījakṣaṇo janayitavyaḥ so 'napekṣa eva bījakṣaṇaḥ svakāryopajanane evaṃ sarva eva
GSP33vacbhamu:10113: tadantarānantapavartino bījakṣaṇa anapekṣā iti kusūlanihitabīja eva syāt kṛtī kṛṣīvalaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10115: yena hi bījakṣaṇena svakṣaṇaparamparayāṅkuro janayitavyastasyānapekṣāsau kṣaṇaparamparā kusūla evāṅkuraṃ kariṣyatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10116: tasmātparasparāpekṣā evāntyā vā madhyā vā pūrve vā kṣaṇāḥ kāryopajanana iti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10133: .tacca sthirapakṣe 'pi satyapi ca bhoktaryaghiṣṭhātāraṃ cetanamantareṇa na saṃbhavati kimaṅga,
GSP33vacbhamu:10136: sa tu bhoktāpi nāstīti dūrotsāritatvaṃ darśayati--
GSP33vacbhamu:10138: api ca bahava upakāryopakārakabhāvena sthitāḥ kāryaṃ janayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10146: yadā hi pratyayopanibandhaḥ pratītyasamutpādo bhavettadā cetano 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣetāpi,
GSP33vacbhamu:10149: hetuḥ svabhāvata eva kāryasaṃghātaṃ kariṣyati kevala iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10150: astu tāvadyathā kevalādhetoḥ kāryaṃ nopajāyata iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10155: asthirā api hi bhāvāḥ sadā saṃhatā evodayante vyante ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10157: tathā ca kṛtamatra saṃhantrā cetaneneti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10161: sa khalu saṃghātasaṃtativarti dharmādharmāhvayaḥ saṃskārasaṃtāno yathāyathaṃ sukhaduḥkhe janayannāgantukaṃ kañcanānāsādya svata eva janayet,āsādya vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10166: tasmādanenāgatantukānapekṣasya saṃdhātasaṃtānasyaiva sadṛśajanane visadṛśajanane vā svabhāva āstheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10169: aprāptabhogo hi bhogamāptukāmastatsādhane pravartata iti pratyātmasiddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:10170: seyaṃ pravṛttirbhogādanyasmin sthire bhoktari bhogatatsādhanasamayavyāpini kalpyate nāsthire /
GSP33vacbhamu:10172: nahi bhogo bhogāya kalpate nāpyanyo bhogāyānyasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:10192: kāraṇasya hi kāryotpādāt prākkālasattār'thavatī na kāryakālā,
GSP33vacbhamu:10193: tadā kāryasya siddhatvena tatsidydharthāyāḥ sattāyā anupayogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10196: bhūtvā vyāpṛtya bhāvāḥ prayeṇa hi kāryaṃ kurvanto loke dṛśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:10201: yathāhuḥ-- 'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate 'iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10202: bhavatyevaṃ vyāpāravattā tathāpi kṣaṇikasya na kāraṇatvamityāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:10205: yadi ca na kāryasamaye kāraṇaṃ sat kathaṃ teṣāṃ tadātmanānubhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10206: naca kāraṇasādṛśyaṃ kāryasya na tu tādātmyamiti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10210: sarvathā vailakṣaṇye tu hetuphalabhāvastantughaṭādāvapi prāptaṃ ityatiprasaṅga ityāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:10216: api ca cotpādanirodhayorvikalpatraye 'pi vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga ityāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:10228: evaṃ sukhādīnāmapi caittānāṃ cittābhinnahetujānāṃ catvāryotānyeva kāraṇāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:10229: seyaṃ pratijñā caturvidhān hetūn pratītya cittacaittā utpadyanta ityabhāvakāraṇatva uparudhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10241: hetuphalabhāvena hi vyavasthitāḥ saṃtānina evodayavyayadharmāṇaḥ saṃtānāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10244: sa kiṃ phalaṃ kiñcidārabhate na vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10250: tadasatve tajjanakamapyasajjanakatvenāsadityanena krameṇāsantaḥ sarva eva saṃtānina iti tatsaṃtāno nitarāmasanniti kasya pratisaṃkhyayā nirodha-
GSP33vacbhamu:10255: kathañcitsārūpye vā visabhāge 'pyantataḥ sattayā tadastīti na saṃtānocchedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10259: atra tāvadutpannamātrāpravṛttasya bhāvasya na pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10263: yato niranvayo vināśo na saṃbhavatyato nirūpākhyo 'pi na saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10271: tasya ca sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvānna vināśa ityavasthāvato 'vināśānnāvasthānāṃ niranvayo vināśa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10276: yenāsya na niranvayo nāśaḥ syādityata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:10278: atrāpi tattoyaṃ tejasā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalamambudatvāya nīyata ityanumeyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10280: śakyaṃ tatra vaktum'udambindau ca sindhau ca toyabhāvona bhidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10291: tathāhi-- jātimattvena sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyebhyo vibhaktasya śabdasyāsparśatve sati bāhyaikendriyagrāhyatvena gandhādivadguṇatvamanumitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10297: tasmādguṇo bhūtvā gandhādivadasādhāraṇendriyagrāhyo yadravyamanumāpayati tadākāśaṃ pañcamaṃ bhūtaṃ vastviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10306: smṛtirupapatsyata iti manyamāno na parituṣyati taṃ prati pratyabhijñāsamājñātapratyakṣavirodhamāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:10319: na tu tattvataḥ pūrvāparau kṣaṇau tayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ vā gṛhṇāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10323: nānāpadārthasaṃbhinnavākyārthābhāsastāvadayaṃ vikalpaḥ prathate tatraite nānāpadārthā na prathanta iti bruvāṇaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ bādheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10327: tathāsati pratyākāraṃ jñānānāṃ samāptesteṣāṃ ca parasparavārtājñānābhāvānnānetyeva na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10330: yadyucyeta astytasmin vikalpe tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti padadvayaprayogo na tviha tattedantāspadau padārthau tayośca sādṛśyamiti vivakṣitam,
GSP33vacbhamu:10335: na caitatsarvamasati vikalpānāṃ bāhyālambanatve 'sati ca lokaprasiddhapadārthakatve bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10336: jñānākāratve hi vikalpapratibhāsināṃ nityatvānityatvādīnāmekārthaviṣayatvābhāvāt jñānānāṃ ca dharmiṇāṃ bhedānna virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10338: na cālaukikārthenānityaśabdenātmani vibhutvaṃ vivakṣitvānityaśabdaṃ prayuñjāno laukikārthaṃ nityaśabdamātmani prayuñjānena vipratipadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10339: tasmādanena svapakṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhāpayiṣatā parapakṣasādhanaṃ ca nirācikīrṣatā vikalpānāṃ lokasiddhapadārthakatā bāhyalambanatā ca vaktavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10340: yadyucyeta dvividho hi vikalpānāṃ viṣayo grāhyaścādhyavaseyaśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10342: tathāca pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahalakṣaṇā vipratipattiḥ prasiddhapadārthakatvaṃ copapadyata ityata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:10353: nahi jātu sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10355: api ca tathāsati yukta iti pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10358: yadi gṛhyamāṇe tadā kiṃ vikalpenāho tatsamayajenāvikalpakena /
GSP33vacbhamu:10363: na ca tatsamayabhāvinā nirvikalpakena gṛhyamāṇe bāhye vikalpenāgṛhīte tatra vikalpaḥ svākāramāropayitumarhati. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10364: na hi rajatajñānāpratibhāsini purovartini vastuni rajatajñānena śakyaṃ rajatamāropayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10365: agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye svākāra ityeva syānna bāhya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10367: api cāyaṃ vikalpaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ santaṃ vikalpaṃ kiṃ vastusantaṃ svākāraṃ gṛhītvā paścādbāhyamāropayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10369: na tāvat kṣaṇikatayā kramavirahiṇo jñānasya kramavartinī grahaṇāropaṇe kalpete /
GSP33vacbhamu:10373: bāhyaṃ cāropyamāṇamaviśadaṃ sattato 'nyadeva syānna tu svākāraḥ samāropitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10377: hanta tarhi trailokyata evānena na bhedo gṛhīta iti yatra kvacana pravartetāviśeṣāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10380: api ca sādṛśyanibandhanaḥ saṃvyavahārastenedaṃ sadṛśamityevamākārabuddhinibandhano bhavenna tu tadevedamityākārabuddhinibandhana ityāha-- na
GSP33vacbhamu:10382: nanu jvālādiṣu sādṛśyādasatyāmapi sādṛśyabuddhau tadbhāvāvagamananibandhanaḥ saṃvyahāro dṛśyate yathā tatheheti bhaviṣyatīti pūrvāparitoṣeṇāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:10384: tathāhi -- vividhajanasaṃkīrṇagopureṇa puraṃ niviśamānaṃ narāntarebhya ātmanirdhāraṇāyāsādhāraṇaṃ cihnaṃ vidadhatamupahasanti pāśupataṃ pṛthagjanā iti //25 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10401: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-- kūṭastho hi kāryajananasvabhāvo vā syādatatsvabhāvo vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10402: sa cetkāryajananasvabhāvastato yāvadanena kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ tāvatsahasaiva kuryāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10405: yadyucye samartho 'pi kramavatsahakārisacivaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇi karotīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10412: bhede tūpakārasya tasmin sati kāryasya bhāvādasati cābhāvātsatyapi kūṭasthe kāryānutpādādanvayavyatirekābhyāmupakāra eva kāryakārī na bhāva iti nārthakriyākārī bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10413: taduktam- varṣātapābhyāṃ kiṃ vyomnaścarmaṇyasti tayoḥ phalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10428: viśeṣaṇayoge vā so 'pi bhāvaḥ syānna nirūpākhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10431: api ca yadyenānanvitaṃ na tattasya vikāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10440: sthiro 'pi bhāvaḥ kramavatsahakārisamavadhānāt krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10442: sa cāsya sahakāribhirādhīyamānā upakāro na bhinno nāpyabhinnaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10448: tathā ca śrutiḥ- mṛttiketyeva satyam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10449: apica ye 'pi sarvato vilakṣaṇāni svalakṣaṇāni vastusantyāsthiṣata,
GSP33vacbhamu:10452: nahi bījādbījāntarasya vā kramelakasya vātyantavailakṣaṇye kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10458: prapañcastu brahmatatvasamīkṣānyāyakaṇikayoḥ kṛta iti neha pratamyate vistarabhayāt //26. //
GSP33vacbhamu:10466: atha pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitiriti hi catusṛṣu vidhāsu tatvaparisamāptirāsāmānyatamābhāve 'pi tattvasyāvyavasthānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10467: tasmādanena vijñānaskandhamātraṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā catasro vidhā eṣitavyāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10469: nahyasti saṃbhavo vijñānamātraṃ catasro vidhāścetyata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:10472: tathāpi buddhyārūḍhena buddhiparikalpitenānyastha evaiṣa pramāṇaprameyaphalavyavahāraḥ pramātṛvyavahāraścetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10477: tathāhi- svarūpaṃ vijñānasyāsatyākārayuktaṃ prameyaṃ prameyaprakāśanaṃ pramāṇaphalaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10479: bāhyavādinorapi vaibhāṣikasautrāntikayoḥ kālpanika eva pramāṇaphalavyavahāro 'bhimata ityāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:10483: nahi khadiragocare paraśau palāśe dvaidhībhāvo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10487: na ca jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇamanaṃśamaṃśābhyāṃ vastusabhdyāṃ yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10500: sa hi vijñānālambanatvābhimato bāhyor'thaḥ paramāṇustāvanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10506: kimayaṃ pratibhāsasya jñānasya dharma uta pratibhāsanakāler'thasya dharmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10512: tathā hi-- rūpaparimāṇava eva nirantaramutpannā ekavijñānopārohiṇaḥ sthaulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10519: pratibhāsadaśāpannānāṃ tu teṣāṃ bhaviṣyati bahutvādivatsāṃvṛtaṃ sthaulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10523: sāṃvṛtaṃ grahaṇaṃ nānyatra ca vastugraho bhramaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10527: gandharasasparśaparamāṇvantaritā hi te rūpaparamāṇavo na nirantarāḥ tasmādārātsāntareṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:10528: vṛkṣeṣvekadhanavanapratyayavadeṣa sthūlapratyayaḥ paramāṇuṣu sāntareṣu bhrānta eveti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10529: tasmāt kalpanāpoḍhatve 'pi bhrāntatvāddhaṭādipratyayasya pītaśaṅkhādijñānavanna pratyakṣatā paramāṇugocaratvābhyupagame /
GSP33vacbhamu:10539: apratibhāsamānasadbhāve ca pramāṇābhāvānna bāhyālambanāḥ pratyayā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10541: nahi yathendriyamarthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayatyevaṃ vijñānamaparaṃ vijñānaṃ janayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10545: nahyasti saṃbhavo 'pratyutpanno dharmī dharmāścāsya pratyutpannā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10547: taccānākāraṃ sadājānato bhedābhāvāt kathamarthabhedaṃ vyavasthāpayediti tadbhedavyavasthāpanāyākārabhedo 'syaiṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10555: yadyena saha niyatasahopalambhanaṃ tattato na bhidyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:10558: niṣedhyo hi bhedaḥ sahopalambhāniyamena vyāpto yathā bhinnāvaśvinau nāvaśyaṃ sahopavabhyete kadācidabhrāpidhāne 'nyatarasyaikasyopalabdheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10559: so 'yamiha bhedavyāpakāniyamavirūddho niyama upalabhyamānastadvyāpyaṃ bhedaṃ nivartayatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10564: yo yaḥ pratyayaḥ sa sarvo bāhyānāvambanaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10566: tathā caiṣa vivādādhyāsitaḥ pratyaya iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10567: bāhyānālambanatā hi pratyayatvamātrānubandhinī vṛkṣateva śiṃśapātvamātrānubandhinīti tanmātrānubandhini nirālambanatve sādhye bhavati pratyayatvaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10571: sa hi mene ye yasmin satyapi kādācitkāste sarve tadatiriktahetusāpekṣāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10573: tathā ca vivādādhyāsitāḥ satyapyālayavijñānasaṃtāne ṣaḍapi pravṛttipratyayā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10577: tasyāśca svakāryopajanaṃ pratyābhimukhyaṃ paripākastasya ca pratyayaḥ svasaṃtānavartī pūrvakṣaṇaḥ saṃtānāntarāpekṣānabhyupagamāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:10582: nanvevamekasyaiva nīlajñānopajanasāmarthyaṃ tatprabodhasāmarthyaṃ ceti kṣaṇāntarasyaitanna syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10583: satve vā kathaṃ kṣaṇabhedātsāmarthyabheda ityālayasaṃtānavartinaḥ sarve samarthā iti samarthahetusadbhāve kāryakṣepānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10584: svasaṃtānamātrādhīnatve niṣedhyasya kādācitkatvasya viruddhaṃ sadātanatvaṃ tasyopalabdhyā kādācitkatvaṃ nivartamānaṃ hetvantarāpekṣatve vyavatiṣṭhata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10585: naca jñānasaṃtānāntaranibandhanatvaṃ sarveṣāmiṣyate pravṛttivijñānānāṃ vijñānavādibhirapi tu kasyacideva vicchinnagamanavacanapratibhāsasya pravṛttivijñānasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:10586: api ca sattvāntarasaṃtānanimittatve tasyāpi sadā saṃnidhānānna kādācitkatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10587: na hi sattvāntarasaṃtānasya deśataḥ kālato vā viprakarṣasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10589: tasmādasati bāhyer'the pratyayavaicitryānupapatterastyānumāniko bāhyārtha iti sautrāntikāḥ pratipedire,
GSP33vacbhamu:10593: tathāhi-- bāhyanimittakatve 'pi kathaṃ kadācit nīlasaṃvedanaṃ kadācit pītasaṃvedanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10595: atha pītasaṃnidhāne 'pi kimiti nīlajñānaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10600: evaṃ tarhi kṣaṇānāmapi svakāraṇabhedanibandhaḥ śaktibhedo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10601: saṃtānino hi kṣaṇāḥ kāryabhedahetavaste ca pratikāryaṃ bhidyante ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10602: na ca saṃtāno nāma kaścideka utpādakaḥ kṣaṇānāṃ yadabhedāt kṣaṇā na bhidyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:10605: anyathaika eva kṣaṇe nīlajñānajananasāmarthyaṃ iti na bhūyo nīlajñānāni jāyeran. tatsamarthasyātītatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:10611: hanta tarhi nīlasaṃtānānāmapi mitho bhinnānāṃ naikamasti nīlākārādhānasāmarthyamiti saṃnidhāne 'pi nīlasaṃtānāntarasya na nīlajñānamupajāyeta
GSP33vacbhamu:10612: tasmātsaṃtānāntarāṇāmiva kṣaṇāntarāṇāmapi svakāraṇabhedādhīnopajanānāṃ keṣāñcideva sāmarthyabhedaḥ keṣāñcinneti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10613: tathā caikālayajñānasaṃtānapatiteṣu kasyacideva jñānakṣaṇasya sa tādṛśaḥ sāmarthyātiśayo vāsanāparanāmā svapratyayāsāditaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10614: yato nīlākāraṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ jāyate na pītākāram /
GSP33vacbhamu:10615: kasyacittu sa tādṛśo yataḥ pītākāraṃ jñānaṃ na nīlākāramiti vāsanāvaicitryādeva svapratyayāsāditājjñānavaicitryasiddherna tadatiriktārthasadbhāve kiñcanāsti pramāṇamiti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10630: nahi sphuṭatare sarvajanīna upalambhe sati tadabhāvaḥ śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10635: upalabdhigrāhiṇā hi sākṣiṇopalabdhirgṛhyamāṇā bāhyaviṣayatvenaiva gṛhyate nopalabdhimātramityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10642: idamatrākūtam-- ghaṭapaṭādayo hi sthūlā bhāsante na tu paramasūkṣmāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10645: nānātvaṃ prasajyamānaṃ jñānākāratve 'pi na śakyaṃ śakreṇāpi vārayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10653: na ca tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī samastajñānākārasaṃkalanātmaka ekaḥ sthūlavikalpo vijṛmbhata iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10655: yathāha dharmakīrtiḥ- 'tasmānnārthe na ca jñāne sthūlābhāsastadātmanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10665: yaśca sahopalambhaniyama uktaḥ śo 'pi vkalpaṃ na sahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10666: yadi jñānārthayoḥ sāhityenopalambhastato viruddho heturnābhedaṃ sādhayitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10670: api ca kimekatvenopalambha āho eka upālambho jñānārthayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10674: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayo 'rupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityavagantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10675: yathā hi sarvaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prabhārūpānuviddhaṃ buddhibodhyaṃ niyamena manujairupalabhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:10679: api ca yatraikavijñānagocarau ghaṭapaṭau tatrārthabhedaṃ vijñānabhedaṃ cādyavasyanti pratipattāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10684: api ca svarūpamātraparyavasitaṃ jñānaṃ jñānāntaravārtānabhijñamiti yayorbhedaste dve na gṛhīte iti bhedo 'pi tadgato na gṛhīta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10686: evaṃ svamasādhāraṇamanyato vyāvṛtaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya tadapi yadvyāvartate yataśca vyāvartate tadanekajñānasādhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10697: evaṃ mokṣapratijñā ca yo mucyate yataśca mucyate yena mucyate tadanekajñānasādhyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10698: evaṃ vipratipannaṃ pratipādayituṃ pratijñeti yatpratipādayati yena pratipādayati yaśca tadanekajñānasādhyetyasatyekasminnanekārthajñānapratisaṃghātari nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10701: api ca bhedāśrayaḥ karmaphalabhāvo nābhinne jñāne bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10702: no khalu chidā chidyate kintu dāru /
GSP33vacbhamu:10704: tadihāpi na jñānaṃ svāṃśena jñeyamātmani vṛttivirodhādapi tu tadatiriktor'thaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10711: ayamarthaḥ-- svarūpādatiriktamarthaṃ cedvijñānaṃ gṛhṇāti tatastadapratyakṣaṃ sannarthaṃ pratyakṣayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10716: taccet jñānāntareṇa pratīyeta tadapratītaṃ nārthaviṣayaṃ jñānamaparokṣayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10717: evaṃ tattadityanavasthā tasmādanavasthāyā bibhyatā varaṃ svātmani vṛttirāsthitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10725: apitu tasminnindriyārthasaṃnikarṣādantaḥ karaṇavikārabheda utpannamātra eva prabhāturarthaścopalambhaśca pratyakṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10732: tasmādyathā chettā chidayā chedyaṃ vṛkṣādi vyāpnoti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10736: yathā vā paktā pākyaṃ pākena vyāpnoti nanu pākaṃ pākāntareṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:10737: nāpi pāka eva paktā kintu svata eva devadettādiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10738: evaṃ pramātā prameyaṃ nīlādi pramayā vyāpnoti na tu pramāṃ pramāntareṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:10740: kintu svata eva pramāyāḥ pramātā vyāpakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10741: na ca pramātari kūṭasthanityacaitanye pramāpekṣāsaṃbhavo yataḥ pramātuḥ pramāyāḥ pramātrantarāpekṣāyāmanavasthā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10742: tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṃ 'vijñānagrahaṇamātra eva vijñānasākṣiṇaḥ pramātuḥ kūṭasthanityacaitanyasya grahaṇakāṅkṣānutpādāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10748: grāhyatvaṃ ca jñānasya na grāhakakriyājanitaphalaśālitayā yathā bāhyārthasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:10749: phale phalāntarānupapatteḥ. yathāhuḥ-- 'na saṃvidaryate phalatvāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10751: grāhyo 'pyarthaḥ pramātāraṃ prati satyāṃ saṃvidi prakaṭaḥ saṃvidapi prakaṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10753: syādetatṣa yatprakāśate tadanyena prakāśyate yathā jñānārthau tathā ca sākṣiti nāsti pratyayasākṣiṇorvaiṣamyamityata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:10755: tathāhi-- asya sākṣiṇaḥ sadāsaṃdigdhāviparītasya nityasākṣātkāratānāgantukaprakāśatve ghaṭate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10756: tathāhi-- pramātā saṃdihāno 'pyasaṃdigdho viparyasyannapyaviparītaḥ parokṣamarthamutprekṣamāṇo 'pyaparokṣaḥ smarannapyanubhavikaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasya
GSP33vacbhamu:10761: ca pradīpavadvijñānamavabhāsakāntaranirapekṣaṃ svayameva prathata iti bruvatāpramāṇagamyaṃ vijñānamanavagantṛkamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10767: na phalasya kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ vāstīti pradīpavatkartrantarameṣitavyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10768: tathā ca na siddhasādhanamiti pariharati-- na /
GSP33vacbhamu:10770: nanu sākṣisthāne 'stvasmadabhimatameva vijñānaṃ tathā ca nāmnyeva vipratipattirnārthā iti śaṅkate--
GSP33vacbhamu:10775: bhavanti hi vijñānasyotpādādayo dharmā abhyupetāstathā cāsya phalatayā nāvagantṛtvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10783: jāgratpratyayasya tu bādhyatve svapnapratyayasyāsau na bādhako bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10785: tathā ca na svapnapratyayo mithyeti sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt svapnavaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:10786: tasmādbādhābādhābhyāṃ vaidharmyānna svapnapratyayadṛṣṭāntena jāgratpratyayasya śakyaṃ nirālambanatvamadhyavasātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10795: sāpi ca nidrādoṣādviparītāvartamānamapi pitrādi vartamānatayā bhāsayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10798: api ca svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe jāgratpratyayānāṃ yathārthatvamanubhavasiddhaṃ nānumānenānyathayituṃ śakyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:10814: yadi sākāraṃ vijñānaṃ saṃbhavati bāhyaścārthaḥ sthūlasūkṣmavikalpenāsaṃbhavī hantaivamarthajñāne sattena tāvadvicāraṃ na sahete /
GSP33vacbhamu:10827: - śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nādaraḥ kriyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10829: taiḥ khalu satsaditi gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtamaviparītaṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10831: sadasatośca vicārāsahatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddhaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10833: yadyucyeta tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pramāṇānāmanena vicāreṇa vyudasyate na sāṃvyavahārikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10836: pramāṇāni hi svagocare pravartamānāni tattvamidamityeva pravartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:10838: na punaḥ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ naḥ prāmāṇyaṃ na tu tāttvikamityeva pravartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:10840: yathā śuktikeyaṃ na rajataṃ marīcayo na toyamekaścandro na candradvayamityādi,
GSP33vacbhamu:10841: tadvadihāpi samastapramāṇagocaraviparītatattvāntaravyavasthāpanenātāttvikatvameṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakena darśanīyaṃ na tvavyavasthāpitatattvāntareṇa pramāṇāni śakyāni bādhitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10842: vicārāsahatvaṃ vastūnāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayadbādhakamatāttvikatvaṃ pramāṇānāṃ darśayatīti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:10844: kiṃ tadvastu paramārthataḥ sadādīnāmanyatamat kevalaṃ vicāraṃ na sahate,
GSP33vacbhamu:10846: tatra paramārthataḥ sadādīnīmanyatamadvicāraṃ na sahata iti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:10849: atha nistattvaṃ cet kathamanyatamattattvamavyavasthāpya śakyamevaṃ vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10852: so 'pi ca vicāraṃ na sahata ityuktaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10854: āropaśca tattvādhiṣṭhāno dṛṣṭo yathā śuktikādiṣu rajatādeḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10855: na cet kiñcidasti tattvaṃ kasya kasminnāropaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10857: tacca tattvaṃ vyavasthāpyātāttvikatvena sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakenopapadyata iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ //31 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10865: evaṃ kṣaṇikatvamabhyupetya 'utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā'iti nityatāmupaitītyādi bahūnnetavyamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:10879: pudgalāstikāyāḥ ṣoḍhā- pṛthivyādīni catvāri bhūtāni sthāraṃ jaṅgamaṃ cti dharmāstikāyaḥ pravṛttyanumeyo 'dharmāstikāyāḥ sthityanumeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10886: tatra mithyā pravṛttirāsravaḥ. samyakpravṛttī tu saṃvaranirjarau /
GSP33vacbhamu:10888: indriyadvārā hi pauruṣaṃ jyotirviṣayān spṛśadrūpādijñānarūpeṇa pariṇamata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10894: sā hyāsravasrotaso dvāraṃ saṃvṛṇotāti saṃvara ucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10896: sa hi niḥśeṣaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogena jarayatīti nirjaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10904: āhartadarśanābhyāsānna mokṣa iti jñānaṃ darśanāvaraṇīyaṃ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:10905: bahuṣu vipratiṣiddheṣu tīrthakarairupadarśiteṣu mokṣamārgeṣu viśeṣānavadhāraṇaṃ mohanīyaṃ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:10918: anye tūrdhvagamanaśīlo hi jīvo dharmādharmāstikāyena baddhastaddhimokṣādyadūrdhvaṃ gacchetyeva sa mokṣa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10934: yadi punarayamanekāntadyotakaḥ syācchabdo na bhavet syādastītivākye syātpadamanarthakaṃ syāt tadidamuktam-- 'arthayogitvāt'iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10935: anaikāntadyotakatve tu syādasti kathañcidastīti syātpadātkathañcidartho 'stītyanenānuktaḥ pratīyata iti nānarthakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10938: 'kiṃvṛtte pratyaye khalvayaṃ cinnipātavidhinā sarvathaikāntatyāgāt saptasvekānteṣu yo bhaṅgastatra yo nayastadapekṣaḥ san heyopādeyabhedāya syādvādaḥ kalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10939: tathāhi-- yadi vastvastyevetyevaikāntatastat sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanāstyeveti
GSP33vacbhamu:10940: na tadīpsājihāsābhyāṃ kvacit kadācit kathañcit kaścit pravarteta nivarteta vā prāptāprāpaṇīyatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:10942: anaikāntapakṣe tu kvacit kadācit kasyacit kathañcit sattve hānopādāne prekṣāvatāṃ kalpete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10949: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- satyaṃ yadasti vastutastatsarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanā nirvacanīyena rūpaṇāstyeva na nāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10957: laukikānāmabādhena tu tadvyavasthāyāṃ dehātmābhimānasyāpyabādhena tāttvikatve sati lokāyatamatāpātena nāstikatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10958: paṇḍitarūpāṇāṃ tu dehātmābhimānasya vicārato bādhanaṃ prapañcasyāpyanaikāntasya tulyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10959: api ca sadasattvayoḥ parasparaviruddhatvena samuccayābhāve vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10961: tasmāt sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānavat saptatvapañcatvanirdhāraṇasya phalasya nirdhārayituśca
GSP33vacbhamu:10962: pramātustatkaraṇasya pramāṇasya ca tatprameyasya ca saptatvapañcatvasya sadasattvasaṃśaye
GSP33vacbhamu:10971: ye hi paricchinnāste sarve 'nityā yathā ghaṭādayastathā cātmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10976: manuṣyakāyaparimāṇo hi jīvo na hastikāyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vyāptumarhatyalpatvādityātmanaḥ kṛtsnaśarīrāvyāpitvādakārtsnyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:10978: tathā ca hastiśīraraṃ parityajya yadā puttikāśarīro bhavati tadā na tatra kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyetetyakārsnyamātmanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10983: yathā hi pradīpo ghaṭamahāharmyodaravartī saṃkocavikāśavānevaṃ jīvo 'pi puttikāhastidehayorityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10999: kiṃ cātmano nityatvābhyupagame āgacchatāmapagacchatāṃ cāvayavānāmiyattānirūpeṇena cātmajñānābhāvānnāpavarga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11002: kiṃ caite jīvāvayavāḥ pratyekaṃ vā cetayeran samūho vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11003: teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ caitanye bahūnāṃ cetanānāmekābhiprāyatvaniyamābhāvāt kadācidviruddhadikkriyatvena śarīramunmathyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:11004: samūhacaitanye tu hastiśarīrasya puttikāśarīratve dvitrāvayavaśeṣo jīvo na cetayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11007: pūrvasūtraprasañjitāyāṃ jīvānityatāyāṃ bauddhavatsaṃtānanityatāmāśaṅkyedaṃ sūtram-- 'na ca paryāyādapyavirodho vikārādibhyaḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:11008: na ca paryāyāt parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi saṃtānābhyupagamenātmano nityatvādavirodho bandhamokṣayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11015: evaṃ hi mokṣāvasthābhāvi jīvaparimāṇaṃ nityaṃ bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:11034: sa ca nānākleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ pradhānapuruṣābhyāmanyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11045: paśava ātmānasteṣāṃ pāśo bandhanaṃ taddhimokṣo duḥkhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11046: eṣa teṣāmabhisaṃdhiḥ-- cetanasya khalvadhiṣṭhātuḥ kumbhakārādeḥ kumbhādikārye nimittakāraṇatvavirodhāditi prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11058: tena śrutasiddyarthamadṛṣṭāni dṛṣṭaviparītasvabhāvāni subahūnyapi kalpamānāni na lohagandhitāmāvahanti pramāṇavattvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11059: yastu tatra kathañciddṛṣṭānusāraḥ kriyate sa suhṛdbhāvamātreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:11060: āgamānapekṣitamanumānaṃ tu dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇa pravartamānaṃ dṛṣṭavivaryaye tuṣādapi bibhetitarāmiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11065: ayamarthaḥ-- yadīśvaraḥ karuṇāparādhīno vītarāgastataḥ praṇinaḥ kapūye karmaṇi na pravartayet,
GSP33vacbhamu:11068: na hīśvarādhīnā janāḥ svātantryeṇa kapūyaṃ karma kartumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11069: tadanadhiṣṭhitaṃ vā kapūyaṃ karma phalaṃ prasotumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11070: tasmātsvatantro 'pīsvaraḥ karmabhiḥ pravartyata iti dṛṣṭaviparītaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11075: pūrvakarmaṇeśvaraḥ saṃpratitane karmaṇi pravrartyate teneśvareṇa saṃpratitanaṃ karma svakārye pravartyeta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11081: tathehāpi dvāvapi pravartyāviti kaḥ kaṃ pravartayedityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11084: asmākaṃ tu nāyaṃ samaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11086: na ca kāruṇyaṃ doṣa ityata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:11088: kāruṇye hi satyasya duḥkhaṃ bhavati tena tatprahāṇāya pravartata iti kāruṇikā api svārthaprayuktā eva pravartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11089: nanu svārthaprayukta eva pravartatāmevamapi ko doṣa ityata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:11096: aprāptipūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogo na sarvagatānāṃ saṃbhavatyaprāpterabhāvānniravayavatvācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:11099: tasmādavyāpyavṛttitāyāḥ saṃyogasya vyāpikāyā nivṛttestadvyāpyasya saṃyogasya vinivṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11114: āgamo hi pravṛttiṃ prati na dṛṣṭāntamapekṣata ityadṛṣṭapūrve tadviruddhe ca pravartituṃ samarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11120: asmākaṃ tvīśvarāgamayoranāditvādīśvarayonitve 'pyāgamasya na virodha iti bhāvaḥ //38 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11126: anudbhūtarūpamityarthaḥ. rūpādihīnakaraṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ hi puruṣasya svabhogādāveva dṛṣṭaṃ nānyatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:11128: tasmādrūpādihīnaṃ karaṇaṃ vyāpārayata īsvarasya bhogādiprasaktiḥ tathā cānīśvaratvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11135: api ca sarvatrānumānaṃ pramāṇayataḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarāṇāmapi saṃkhyābedavattvamantavattvaṃ ca dravyatvāt saṃkhyānyatve sati prameyatvādvānumātavyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11137: asmākaṃ tvāgamagamyer'the tadbādhitaviṣayatayā nānumānaṃ prabhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11138: svarūpaparimāṇamapiyasya yādṛśamaṇu mahat paramamahaddīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11139: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11141: yasya tvanta eva nāsti tasya tadagrahaṇaṃ nāsarvajñatāmāvahati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11157: yadyapyanekaśilpaparyavadātaḥ paraśuṃ kṛtvā tena palāśaṃ chinatti,
GSP33vacbhamu:11158: yadyapi ca prayatnenendriyārthātmamanaḥ saṃnikarṣalakṣaṇaṃ jñānakaraṇamupādāyātmārthaṃ vijānāti,
GSP33vacbhamu:11159: tathāpi saṃkarṣaṇo 'karaṇaḥ kathaṃ pradyumnākhyaṃ manaḥ karaṇaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11175: na tāvadete parasparaṃ bhinnā īśvarāḥ parasparavyāhatecchā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11178: saṃbhūya ceśanāyāṃ pariśuddho na kaściddīśvaraḥ syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:11186: guṇibhyaḥ khalvātmabhyo jñānādīn guṇān bhedenoktvā punarabhedaṃ brūte--
GSP33vacbhamu:11188: ādigrahaṇena pradyumnāniruddhayormano 'haṅkāralakṣaṇatayātmano bhedamabhidhāyātmana evaita iti tadviruddhābhedābhidhānamaparaṃ saṃgṛhītam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11190: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11191: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥpādaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11201: iha hi pūrvapakṣe śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhaḥ pratipādyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:11204: tasyābhisaṃdhiḥ-yadyapi taittirīyake viyadutpattiśrutirasti tathāpi tasyāḥ pramāṇāntaravirodhādbahuśrutivirodhācca gauṇatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11210: athāsti tataḥ śrutivirodha iti tatparihārāya prayatnāntaramāstheyamityarthaḥ //1 // 2.3.1.2.
GSP33vacbhamu:11213: taittirīye hi sargaprakaraṇe kevalasyākāśasyaiva prathamaḥ sargaḥ śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11214: chāndogye ca kevalasya tejasaḥ prathamaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11216: śrutasiddhyarthaṃ khalvaśrutaṃ kalpyate na tu tadvidhātāya,
GSP33vacbhamu:11223: na khalviha sarge kṣīrāddadhi jāyate sargāntare ti dadhnaḥ kṣīramiti bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11224: tasmātsargaśrutayaḥ parasparavirodhinyo nāsminnarthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhantīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ //2 // 2.3.1.3.
GSP33vacbhamu:11230: samavāṭyasamavāyinimittakāraṇebhyo hi kāryasyotpattirniyatā tadabhāve na bhavitumarhati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāve /
GSP33vacbhamu:11232: apica ya utpadyante teṣāṃ prāgutpatteranubhavārthakriye nopalabhyte utpannasya ca dṛśyete,
GSP33vacbhamu:11265: api cāvyatiriktadeśakālamākāśaṃ brahmaṇā ca brahmakāryaiśca tadabhinnasvabhāvairataḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11266: kṣīrakumbhaprakṣiptakatipayapayobinduvadbrahmaṇi tatkārye ca vijñāte nabho viditaṃ bhavatītyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11270: brahmavivartātmatayājagatastadvikārasya vastuto brahmaṇābhede brahmaṇi jñāte jñānamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11272: tasmādākāśamapi tadvivartatayā tadvikāraḥ sattajjñānena jñātaṃ bhavati nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11273: avikāratve tu tatastattvāntaraṃ na brahmaṇi vidite viditaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11275: nahi kṣīrasya pūrṇakumbhe kṣīre gṛhyamāṇe satsvapi pāthobinduṣu pāthastattvaṃ prati jñātatvamasti vijñāne /
GSP33vacbhamu:11276: tasmānna te kṣīre vidite viditā iti pratijñādṛṣṭāntapracayānuparodhāya viyata utpattirakāmenābhyupeyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11287: nanvasahāyaṃ tejaḥ prathamamavagamyamānaṃ sasahāyatvena virudhyata ityuktamata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11303: nacāsminnartha ekasya vākyasya vyāpāro 'pi tu bhinnānāṃ vākyānāmityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11309: na caiṣa sṛṣṭiparo 'pi tu śamapara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11320: apica bhrāntimūlaṃ caitadvacanam 'ekamevādvitīyam' iti toye kṣīrabuddhivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:11329: nahi māṇavake siṃhatvamupacarya na siṃhādanyo 'sti manāgapi māṇavaka iti vadanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11330: tasmādbrahmatvamaikāntikaṃ jagato vivakṣitaṃ śrutyā na tvaupacārikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11331: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya ūvati natvaspatvamapi prāgevaupacārikamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11333: niḥśeṣavacanaḥ svarasataḥ sarvaśabdo nāsati śrutyantaravirodhe ekadeśavaviṣayo yujyata ityarthaḥ //6 // 2.3.1.7.
GSP33vacbhamu:11334: ākāśasyotpattau pramāṇāntaravirodhamuktamanubhāṣya tasya pramāṇāntarasya pramāṇāntaravirodhenāpramāṇabhūtasya na gauṇatvāpādanasāmarthyamata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11341: śūnyavādaśca nirākṛtaḥ svayameva śrutyopanyasya 'kathamasataḥ sajjāyeta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11345: etaduktaṃ bhavati-sopādānaṃ cetkāryaṃ tata ātmaivopānatvena śruterupādānāntarakalpanānupapatteriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11357: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11361: pramāpramāṇaprameyāṇāṃ vartamānātītānāgatatve 'pi pramātuḥ sadā vartamānatvenānubhavādapracyutasvabhāvasya nāgantukaṃ sattvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11366: nanu jīvataḥ pramāturmā bhūdanyathābhāvo mṛtasya tu bhaviṣyatītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11370: yasya tu na tadasyātmano na tasya tatkalpanaṃ yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:11374: tadanena prabandhena pratyanumānenākāśānutpattyanumānaṃ tūṣayitvānaikāntikatvenāpi dūṣayati-yattūkaṃ samānajātīyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11377: yatra hi kṣīraṃ dadhibhāvena pariṇamate tatra nāvayavānāmanekeṣāmupādanatvamabhyupagantavyaṃ kintūpāttameva kṣīramekamupādeyadadhibhāvena pariṇamate
GSP33vacbhamu:11381: yadyabhyāse bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvaṃ dūrata evopacaritatvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11395: bhūyasīḥ śrutīrapekṣya dve api śrutī śabdamātramukte //8 // 2.3.3.9.
GSP33vacbhamu:11397: nanu 'na cāsya kaścijjanitā' ityātmanaḥ sato 'kāraṇatvaśruteḥ kathamutpattyāśaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11398: naca vacanamadṛṣṭvā pūrvaḥ pakṣa iti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:11403: na cātmanaḥ kāraṇavattve 'navasthā lohagandhitāmāvahatyanāditvāt kāryakāraṇaparamparāyā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11409: sadekasvabhāvaṃ hi brahma śrūyate tadasati bādhake nānyathayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11410: uktametadvikārāḥ sattvenānubhūtā api katipayakālakalātikrame vinaśyanto dṛśyanta ityanirvacanīyāstraikālyāvacchedāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11411: na cātmā tādṛśastasya śruteranubhāvādvā vartamānaikasvabhāvatvaina prasiddhestadidamāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11415: yathā rajjūpādānaḥ sarpo na tu sarpopādānā rajjuriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11422: pāramārthiko hi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nādirnānavasthāyā duṣyati. samāropastu vikārasya na samāropitopādāna ityupapāditaṃ mādhyamikamataniṣedhādhikāre,
GSP33vacbhamu:11427: ye tu guṇadikkālotpattiviṣayamidamadhikaraṇaṃ varṇayāñcakrustaiḥ 'sato 'nupapatteḥ' iti kleśena vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11435: naca sākṣādbrahmajatvasaṃbhave tadvaṃśyatvena tajjatvaṃ paraṃparayāśrayituṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11437: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-yuktaṃ paśuyāgavājapeyoraṅgāṅginornānātvattatra sākṣādvājapeyāsaṃbandhe kleśena paraṃparāśrayaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11438: iha tu vāyorbrahmavikārasyāpi brahmaṇo vastuto 'nanyatvādvayūpādānatve sākṣādeva
GSP33vacbhamu:11444: yathā tasyāḥ śṛtamiti tu dṛṣṭāntaḥ paramparāmātrasāmyena na tu sarvathāṃ sāmyeneti sarvamavadātam //10 // 2.3.5.11.
GSP33vacbhamu:11448: annaśabdo 'yaṃ vyutpattyā ca prasiddhyā ca vrīhiyavādau tadvikāre caudane pravartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11450: sā ca vākyaśeṣeṇopodbalitā 'yatra kkacana varṣati' ityetena tasmādabhyavahārthaṃ vrīhiyavādyevātrādbhyo jāyata iti vivakṣitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11454: tataśca śrutyantareṇa 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī pṛthivyā oṣadhayaḥ' ityādinā virodha iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11456: tatra kim 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī' iti pṛthivīśabdo 'nnaparatayā nīyatāmuta 'annamasṛjata' ityannaśabdaḥ pṛthivīparatayeti viśaye,
GSP33vacbhamu:11458: punaḥ śrutyanurodhācca vākyaśeṣasya cānyathāpyupapatterannaśabdo 'nnakāraṇe pṛthivyāmiti rāddhāntaḥ //12 // 2.3.7.13.
GSP33vacbhamu:11461: idānīmākāśādibhūtādhiṣṭhātryo devatāḥ kiṃ svatantrā evottarottarabhūtasarge pravartanta uta parameśvarāpekṣāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:11462: prastāvasya ca liṅgasya ca pāramparyeṇāpi mūlākāraṇasya brahmaṇa upapatte-,
GSP33vacbhamu:11463: svatantrāṇāmevākāśādīnāṃ vāṭvādikāraṇatvamiti jagato brahmayonitvavyāghāta iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11467: naca cetanānāṃ svakāryasvātantryamityetadapyaikāntikaṃ paratantrāṇāmapi teṣāṃ bahulamupalabdherbhṛtyāntevāsyādivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:11468: tasmālliṅgaprastāvasāmañjasyāya sa īśvara eva tena tenākāśādibhāvenopādānabhāvenāvatiṣṭhamānaḥ svayamadhiṣṭhāya nimittakāraṇabhūtastaṃ taṃ vikāraṃ vāṭvādikaṃ sṛjatīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11472: tasmātsarvasya kāryajātasya sākṣātparameśvara evādhiṣṭhātā nimittakāraṇaṃ na tvākāśādibhāvamāpannaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11475: utpattau mahābhūtānāṃ kramaḥ śruto nāpyaye 'pyayamātrasya śrutatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11479: tatra kramabhedāpekṣāyāṃ kiṃ dṛṣṭo 'pyayakramo ghaṭādīnāṃ mahābhūtāpyayakramaniyāmako
GSP33vacbhamu:11480: 'stvāho śrauta utpattikrama iti viśaye śrautasya śrautāntaramabhyarhitaṃ samānajātīyatayā
GSP33vacbhamu:11483: tasmācchrautenaivotpattikrameṇāpyayakramo niyamyata iti prāpta ucyate-apyayasya kramāpekṣāyāṃ khalūtpattikramo niyāmako bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:11495: tadevaṃ bhāvanopayoginau bhūtānāmutpattipralayau vicārya buddhīndriyamanasāṃ kramaṃ vicārayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11496: atra ca vijñāyate 'neneti vyutpattyā vijñānaśabdenendriyāṇi ca buddhiṃ ca brūte /
GSP33vacbhamu:11497: tatraiteṣāṃ kramāpekṣāyāmātmānaṃ ca bhūtāni cāntarā samāmnānāttenaiva pāṭhena kramo niyamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11499: yata ātmanaḥ karaṇāni karaṇebhyaśca bhūtānīti pratīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:11501: annamayamiti ca mayaḍānandamaya itivat na vikārārtha iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-vibhaktatvāttāvanmanaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11502: kāraṇāpekṣāyāmannamayaṃ mana ityādiliṅgaśravaṇādapekṣitārthakathanāya vikārārthatvameva mayaṭo yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:11506: evaṃ codbhūtavikārā mana ādayo bhūtānāṃ parastādutpadyanta iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11517: tanmṛto devadatto jāto devadatta iti vyapadeśasya mukhyatvaṃ manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11522: ata eva smaranti 'evamenaḥ śamaṃ yāti bījagarbhasamudbhavam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11527: ākāśāderiva tu mahāsargādau tadante cotpattivināśau jīvasya bhaviṣyata iti śaṅkāntaramapanetumidamārabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11540: 'yathāgneḥ śrudrā visphaliṅgaḥ' iti ca śrutiḥ sākṣādeva brahmavikāratvaṃ jīvānāṃ darśayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11541: 'yathā sūdīptāt pāvakāt' iti ca brahmaṇo jīvānāmutpattiṃ ca tatrāpyayaṃ ca sākṣāddarśayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11549: evaṃ hi kasyāñcicchākhyāyāmāmnātasya katipāyāṅgasahitasya karmaṇaḥ śākhāntarīyāṅgopasaṃhāro na bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11551: tasmādākāśavajjīvātmāna utpadyanta iti prāpta ucyate-bhavedevaṃ yadi jīvā brahmaṇo bhidyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:11554: upādhīnā ca manomaya ityādīnāṃ śruterbhūyasīnaṃ ca nityatvājatvādigocarāṇāṃ śrutīnāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11556: ca 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ' iti śrutyaivoktatvānnityā jīvātmano na vikārā
GSP33vacbhamu:11560: karmaṇā hi jānātyartho vyāptastadabhāve na bhavati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāve,
GSP33vacbhamu:11568: na tu vyomna ivendriyādisaṃnikarṣe 'pyeṣā jñānaṃ na bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11569: tasmājjaḍā eva jīvā iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-yadāgantukajñānaṃ jaḍasvabhāvaṃ tatkadacit parokṣaṃ kadācit saṃdigdhaṃ kadācidviparyastaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11581: tathāca nityacaitanyavādinyaḥ śrutayo na kathañcit kleśena vyākhyātavyā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11591: sarvatra nityaprāptasya vā sarvātmakasya vā tadasaṃbhāvāditi //19 // 2.3.13.20.
GSP33vacbhamu:11594: taccācalato 'pi tatra sato dehasvāmyanivṛttyopapadyate na tu gatyāgatī /
GSP33vacbhamu:11595: tayoścalane nirūḍhayoḥ kartṛsthabhāvayorvyāpinyasaṃbhavāditi madhyamaṃ parimāṇaṃ mahattvaṃ śarīrasyaiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:11597: gatyāgatī ca paramanahati na saṃbhavato 'ta pāriśeṣyādaṇutvasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11598: gatyāgatibhyāṃ ca prādeśikatvasiddhau maraṇamapi dehādapasarpaṇameva jīvasya na tu tatra sataḥ svāmyanivṛttimātramiti siddhamityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11607: yata utkrāntyādiśrutibhirjīvānāmaṇutvaṃ prasādhitaṃ tato vyāpakātparamātmanasteṣāṃ tadvikāratayā bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11608: tathāca mahattvānanyādiśrutayaḥ paramātmaviṣayā na jīvaviṣayā ityavirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11609: yadi jīvā aṇavastato 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ parameṣu' iti kathaṃ śārīro mahattvasaṃbandhitvena pratinirdiśyate iti codayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:11613: yathā hi garbhastha eva vāmadevo jīvaḥ paramārthadṛṣṭyātmano brahmatvaṃ pratipede,
GSP33vacbhamu:11620: uddhṛtya mānamunmānaṃ bālāgrāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāgastasmādapi śatatamāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāga iti tadidamunmānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11624: aṇurātmā na śarīravyāpīti na sarvāṅgīṇaśaityopalabdhiḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11626: tvaksaṃyukto hi jīvaḥ tvakca sakalaśarīravyāpinīti tvagvyāpyātmasaṃbandhaḥ sakalaśaityopalabdhau samartha ityarthaḥ //23 // 2.3.13.24.
GSP33vacbhamu:11628: candanabindoḥ pratyakṣato 'lpīyastvaṃ buddhvā yuktā kalpanā bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:11629: yasya tu saṃdigdhamaṇutvaṃ sarvāṅgīṇaṃ ca kāryamupalabhyate tasya vyāpitvamautsargikamapahāya neyaṃ kalpanāvakāśaṃ labhata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11637: ye tu sāvayavatvāccandanabindoraṇusaṃcāreṇa dehavyāptirupapadyate na tvātmano 'navayavasyāṇusaṃcāraḥ saṃbhavī,
GSP33vacbhamu:11638: tasmādvaiṣamyamiti manyante tān pratidamucyate guṇādvā lokavaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11650: viśleṣānupraveśābhyāṃ ca sannapi viśleṣaḥ sūkṣmatvānnopalakṣyate iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11656: upalabhyamāno vā sūkṣma upalabhyeta na sthūla ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11663: na jātu ghaṭakarakādisaṃyogā nabhaso tabho vyaśruvate 'pitvalpāneva ghaṭakarakādīn,
GSP33vacbhamu:11664: itarathā yatra nabhastatra sarvatra ghaṭakarakādyupalambha iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:11668: 'pyadhiṣṭhitā tvagadhiṣṭhitaiveti śarīravyāpī jīvaḥ śaknoti sarvāṅgīṇaṃ śaityamanubhavituṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11670: aṇustu jīvo yatrāsti tasminneva śarīrapradeśo tadanubhavenna sarvāṅgīṇaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11672: kaṇṭakatodanasya tu prādeśikatayā na sarvāṅgīṇopalabdhiriti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11675: ata eva hi hemante viṣaktāvayavāpyadravyagate 'tisāndre śītasparśe 'nubhūyamānepyanudbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ nopalabhyate yathā,
GSP33vacbhamu:11676: tathā mṛgamadādīnāṃ gandhavāhaviprakīrṇasūkṣmāvayavānāmatisāndre gandhe 'nubhūyamāne rūpasparśau nānubhūyete tatkasya hetoḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11681: apica caitanyaṃ nāma na gumo jīvasya guṇānaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11694: apitu yo 'yaṃ mithyājñānadveṣādyanuṣaktaḥ sa eva pratyātmamanubhavagocaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11695: naca brahmasvabhāvasya jīvātmanaḥ kūṭasthanityasya svata icchādveṣānupaṅgasaṃbhava iti buddhiguṇānāṃ teṣāṃ tadabhedādhyāsena taddharmatvādhyāsaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11696: upadarāvādhyastasyeva candramaso bimbasya toyakampe kamapvattvādhyāsa ityupapāditamadhyāsabhāṣye /
GSP33vacbhamu:11698: nabha iva karakopahitaṃ karakaparimāṇam. tathā cotkrāntyādīnāmupattiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11722: antaḥkaraṇe 'pi sati tasya nityasaṃnidhānāt kasmānnityopalabdhyanupalabdhī na prasajyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:11724: tāvasatyevāntaḥ karaṇe ātmano vendriyāṇāṃ vā stāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11743: nanu 'tadguṇasāratvāt' ityanenaiva jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca labdhameveti tadvyutpādanamanarthakamityata āha-tadguṇasāratvādhikāreṇeti
GSP33vacbhamu:11744: tasyaivaiṣa prapañco ye bhoktaiva na karteti tannirākaraṇārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11745: 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāt' ityāha sma bhagavān jaiminiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11752: buddhiścetkartrī bhoktā cātmā tato yasyāpekṣitopāyo bhoktuna tasya kartṛtvaṃ yasya
GSP33vacbhamu:11753: kartṛtvaṃ naca tasyāpekṣitopāyā iti kiṃ kena saṃgatamiti śāstrasyānarthakatvamavidyamānābhidheyatvaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11755: yathā ca tadguṇasāratayāsyāvastusadapi bhoktṛtvaṃ sāṃvyavahārikamevaṃ kartṛtvamapi sāṃvyavahārikaṃ na tu bhāvikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11762: tadeteṣāṃ prāṇānāmindriyāṇāṃ vijñānena buddhyā vijñānaṃ grahaṇaśaktimādāyopādāyetyupādāne svātantryaṃ nākartuḥ saṃbhavati //35 // 2.3.14.36.
GSP33vacbhamu:11766: sarvatra hi buddhiḥ karaṇarūpā karaṇatvenaiva vyapadiśyate na kartṛtvena,
GSP33vacbhamu:11778: karaṇādīni kārakāntarāṇi kartā prayuṅkte na tvayaṃ kārakāntaraiḥ prayujyata ityetāvanmātramasya svātantryaṃ na tu kāryakriyāyāṃ na kārakāntarāṇyapekṣata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11779: īdṛśaṃ hi svātantryaṃ neśvarasyāpyatrabhavato 'stītyutsannasaṃkathaḥ kartā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11780: tathā cāyamadṛṣṭaparipākavaśādiṣṭamabhiprepsustatsādhanavibhrameṇāniṣṭopāyaṃ vyāpārayannaniṣṭaṃ prāpnuyādityaniyamaḥ kartṛtvaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11783: tena viṣayāvacchinnameva caitanyaṃ vṛttiriti vijñānamiti cākhyāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:11788: aviparyayāya tu karaṇāntarakalpanāyāṃ nāmni visaṃvāda iti //38 // 2.3.14.39.
GSP33vacbhamu:11797: so 'yamiha kartātmā samādhāvupadiśyamāna ātmanaḥ kartṛtvamavaitīti sūtrārthaḥ //39 // 2.3.15.40.
GSP33vacbhamu:11806: naca svābhāvike kartṛtve saṃbhavatyasatyapavāde tadaupādhikaṃ yuktam. atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11808: yathā jñānasvabhāvo jñeyābhāve 'pi nājño bhavatyevaṃ kartṛsvabhāvo 'pi kriyāveśābhāve 'pi nākartā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11816: tasya ca kadācidapyasaṃsarge kathaṃ tacchaktiyogo nirviṣayāyāḥ śakteraṃsabhavāt tathāca
GSP33vacbhamu:11817: yadi tatsidhyarthaṃ tadviṣaḥ kriyāveśo 'byupeyate tathā sati tatsvabhāvasya svabhāvocchedābhāvādbhāvanāśaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11826: tathāca tayākṣiptaṃ śakyaṃ sadaiva syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11848: ātmaiko 'pi bhinna iva viśuddho 'pyaviśuddha iva tataścaikabuddhyādisaṃghātāpagame
GSP33vacbhamu:11849: tatra mukta ivetaratra baddha iva yathā maṇikṛpāṇādyupadhānabhedādekameva mukhaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11850: nāneva dīrghamiva vṛttamiva śyāmamivāvadātamiva anyatamopadhānavigame tatra muktamivānyatropahitamiveti
GSP33vacbhamu:11853: nāpi buddhyādisaṃghātāsya kintu buddhyādyupahitasyātmasvabhāvasya jīvabhāvamāpannasyeti paramārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11863: takṣṇaḥ pāṇyādayaḥ santi tairayaṃ vāsyādīn vyāpārayan bhavatu duḥkhī,
GSP33vacbhamu:11864: paramātmā tvanavayavaḥ kena manaḥprabhṛtīni vyāpārayoditi vaiṣamyaṃ takṣṇo dṛṣṭāntenetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11869: manaḥprabhṛtīni tu karaṇādīni vyāpārayan duḥkhītyetāvatāsya sāmyaṃ na tu sarvathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11870: yathātmā ca jīvo 'vayavāntarānapekṣaḥ svaśarīraṃ vyāpārayatyevaṃ manaḥprabhṛtīni tu karaṇāntarāṇi vyāpārayatīti pramāṇasiddhe niyogaparyanuyogānupapattiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11873: yatparaṃ hi śāstraṃ sa eva śāstrārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11875: tena yathālokasiddhaṃ kartāramapekṣya svaviṣaye pravartamānaṃ na puṃsaḥ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamavagamayitutsahate,
GSP33vacbhamu:11879: aupādhikaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ nopādhyapagame saṃbhavatīti svābhāvikameva yujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11880: apica yatrāpi karaṇamasti tatrāpi kevalasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvaśravaṇātsvābhāvikameva yuktamityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11885: apica svapne yādṛśaṃ jñānaṃ tādṛśo vihāro 'pītyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11888: yadyapi kartṛvibhaktiḥ kevale kartari śrūyate tathāpi karmakaraṇopadhānakṛtamasya kartṛtvaṃ na śuddhasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:11890: nanu yadi na kevalasya kartṛtvamapi tu karaṇādisahitasyaiva,
GSP33vacbhamu:11895: api ceyamupādānaśrutiḥ karaṇavyāpāroparamamātraparā na svātantryaparā kartṛvibhaktistu bhāktī /
GSP33vacbhamu:11900: viklidyanti taṇḍulā jvalanti kāṣṭhāni sthālīti hi svavyāpāre sarveṣāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11902: tatkiṃ buddhyādīnāṃ kartṛtvameva na karaṇatvamityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11904: nanvevaṃ sati tasyāmevātmanaḥ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamastvityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11908: nahi nitye svabhāve cāsti bhāvasya vyāpārityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11914: nahi śarīrādi yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gamyaṃ tasyāmeva gantṛ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11919: yadā caupalabdhau buddherakartṛtvaṃ tadā yaduktaṃ buddherupalabdhṛtve karaṇāntaraṃ kalpanīyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11920: tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvāda iti tanna bhavatītyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:11927: kintu caitanyameva viṣayāvacchinnaṃ vṛttiriti copalabdhiriti cākhyāyate /
