GSP33vacbhamu:12313: indriyāṇyevāsya jyeṣṭhasya ca prāṇasya vṛttayo bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12321: naca bhedena vyapadeśo bhedasādhanam 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' ityādirmanaso 'pīndriyebhyo 'sti bhedena vyapadeśa ityanindriyatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12322: smṛtivaśāttu tasyendriyatve indriyāmāmapi prāṇādbhedena vyapadiṣṭānāmapyasti prāṇasvabhāvatve 'hanta asyaiva rūpamasāma' iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12323: tasmādupapatteḥ śruteśca prāṇasyaiva vṛttasya ekādaśendriyāṇi na tattvāntarāṇīti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12333: tatrāpi paurvāparyālocanāyāṃ bheda eva pratīyata ityuktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12334: tasmādbahuśrutivirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca prāṇarūpatābhidhānamindriyāṇāṃ prāṇāyattatayā bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12337: naca prāṇe bhedavyapadeśabāhulyaṃ tathā netuṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12339: tathā jyeṣṭhe prāṇaśabdasya mukhyatvādindriyeṣu tatastattvāntareṣu lākṣaṇikaḥ prāṇaśabda iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12342: anye tu bhedaśabdādhyayāhārabhiyā bhedaśruteśceti paunaruktyabhiyā ca tacchabdasya cānantaroktaparamārthakatvādanyathā varṇayāñcakruḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12343: kimekādaśaiva vāgādaya indriyāṇyāho prāṇo 'pīti viśaye indrasyātmano liṅgamindriyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12348: indraliṅgatā tu vyutpattimātranimittaṃ yathā gacchatīti gauriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12352: tasmādrūḍhervāgādaya evendriyāṇi na prāṇa iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:12355: satprakriyāyāṃ 'tatteja aikṣata' ityādinā saṃdarbheṇa tejo 'bannānāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ vidhāyopadiśyate-'seyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:12356: devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi
GSP33vacbhamu:12358: asyārthaḥ-pūrvoktaṃ bahubhavanamīkṣaṇaprayojanamadyāpi sarvathā na niṣpannamiti punarīkṣāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:12359: kṛtavatī bahubhavanameva prayojanamuddiśya kathaṃ hantedānīmahamimā yathoktāsteja
GSP33vacbhamu:12360: ādyāstisro devatāḥ pūrvasṛṣṭāvubhūtena saṃprati smaraṇasaṃnidhāpitena jīvena prāṇādharaṇakartrātmanānupraviśya
GSP33vacbhamu:12361: buddhyādibhūtamātrāyāmadarśa iva mukhabimbaṃ toya iva candramaso bimbaṃ chāyāmātratayānupraviśya
GSP33vacbhamu:12362: nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te vyākaravāṇi vispaṣṭaṃ karavāṇīdamasya nāmedaṃ ca rūpamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12363: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ tejo 'bannātmanā tryātmikāṃ tryātmikāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ karavāṇīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12365: yadi jīvakartṛkaṃ tataḥ 'ākāśo ha vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā' ityādiśrutivirodhādanadhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12368: tatra ḍitthaḍavitthādināmakaraṇe ca ghaṭapaṭādirūpakaraṇe ca jīvakartṛtvadarśanādihāpi trivṛtkaraṇe nāmarūpakaraṇe cāsti saṃbhāvanā jīvasya
GSP33vacbhamu:12369: tathāca yogyatvādanena jīveneti vyākaravāṇīti pradhānakriyayā saṃbadhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:12378: yadi punarasya sākṣātkartṛbhāvo bhavedanena jīvenetyanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12380: prayojakakartustatsākṣātkartā karaṇaṃ bhavati pradhānakriyoddeśena prayojakena prayojyakarturvyāpanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12381: tasmādatra jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ nāmarūpavyākaraṇe 'nyatra tu parameśvarasyeti virodhādanadhyavasāya iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12382: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-parameśvarasyaivehāpi nāmarūpavyākartṛtvamupadiśyate na tu jīvasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:12384: nanvanyatra ḍitthajavitthādināmaka4maṇi ghaṭaśarāvādirūpakarmaṇi ca kartṛtvadarśanādihāpi yogyatā saṃbhāvyata iti cet / na /
GSP33vacbhamu:12390: anupraviśya vyākaravāṇīti samānakartṛtve ktvaḥ smaraṇāt praveśanakarturjīvasyaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:12391: vyākartṛtvamupadiśyate 'nyathā tu parameśvarasya vyākartṛtve jīvasya praveṣṭṛtve
GSP33vacbhamu:12398: tathāhi-yo 'nnasyāṇiṣṭho bhāgastanmanastejasastu yo 'ṇiṣṭho bāgaḥ sa vāgityatra hi kāṇādānāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ cāsti vipratipattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12406: vāṅmanasa iti vaktavye māṃsādyabhidhānaṃ siddhena saha sādhyasyopanyāso dṛṣṭāntalābhāya /
GSP33vacbhamu:12407: yathā māṃsādi bhaumādyevaṃ vāṅmanase api taijasabhaume ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12412: tasmādasati bādhake śrutirāñjasī nānyathā kathañcinnetumuciteti kañciddoṣamityuktaṃ taṃ doṣaṃ darśayannāha pūrvapakṣī-
GSP33vacbhamu:12415: tribṛtkaraṇāviśeṣe 'pi yasya ca yatra bhūyastvaṃ tena tasya vyapadeśa ityarthaḥ //22 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12416: iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmadbhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12422: smṛtinyāyaśrutivirodhaparihāreṇa hi anadhyavasāyalakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyaṃ parihṛtaṃ tathāca niścalīkṛte tārtīyo vicāro bhavatyanyathā tu nirbījatayā na sidhyediti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12433: naca śrūyate tasmānna bhūtapariṣvakto raṃhasyapi tu karaṇamātrapariṣvaktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12443: kartrādikārakabhāvite cāntarikṣaṃ krameṇotkrāmya dyulokaṃ praviśantyau sūkṣmabhūte
GSP33vacbhamu:12448: yathāgnihotrādhikaraṇamāhavanīya evaṃ śraddhaśabdavācyāgnihotrāhutipariṇāmāvasthārūpāḥ sūkṣmā yā āpaḥ śraddhābhāvitāstadadhikaraṇaṃ dyulokaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12450: tena hīddho 'sau dyuloko dīpyate 'taḥ samindhanātsamit tasyādityasya raśmayo dhūmā indhanādivādityādraśmīnāṃ samutthānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12456: parjanyo vāva gautamāgniḥ parjanyo nāma vṛṣṭyupakaraṇābhimānī devatāviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12466: tasmindevā yajamānaprāṇā agnirūpāḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ juhvati tasya somasyāhutervarṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12467: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhākhyā āpo dyulokamāhutitvena praviśya candrākāreṇa pariṇatāḥ satyo dvitīye paryāye parjanyāgnau hutā vṛṣṭitvena pariṇamanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12468: 'pṛthivī vāva gautamāgniḥ' tasya pṛthivyākhyasyāgnaiḥ saṃvatsara eva samit /
GSP33vacbhamu:12469: saṃvatsareṇa kālena hi samiddhā bhūmirvrīhyādiniṣpattaye kalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12471: rātrirarciḥ pṛthivyā śyāmāyā anurūpā śyāmatayā rātriragnerivānurupamarciḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12472: diśoṅgārāḥ prage rātrirūpārciḥśamane upaśāntānāṃ prasannānāṃ diśāṃ darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12474: tasminnagnau śraddhāsomapariṇāmakrameṇāgatā apo vṛṣṭirūpeṇa pariṇatā devā juhvati tasyā āhuterannaṃ vrīhiyavādi bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12476: vācā khalvayaṃ tālvādyaṣṭasthānasthitayā varṇapadavākyābhivyaktikrameṇārthajātaṃ prakāśayan samidhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12482: tā evāpaḥ śraddhādipariṇāmakrameṇāgatāḥ vrīhyādirūpeḥ pariṇatā satyaḥ puruṣe 'gnau hutāstāsāṃ pariṇāmo retaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12483: yoṣā vāva gautamāgniḥ tasyā upastha eva samit /
GSP33vacbhamu:12484: tena hi sā putrādyutpādanāya samidhyate yadupamantrayate sa dhūmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12485: strīsaṃbhavādupamantraṇasya lomāni vā dhūmaḥ yonirarciḥ lohitatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12489: tasminnetasminnagnau devā reto juhvati tasyā āhutergarbhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12490: evaṃ śraddhāsomavarṣānnaretohavakrameṇa yoṣāgniṃ prāpyāpo garbhākhyā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12492: yataḥ pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti tasmādadbhiḥ pariveṣṭito jīvo rahatīti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12493: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhāśabdavācyā āpa ityagre vakṣyati tāsāṃ trivṛtkatatayā tejo 'nnāvinābhāvenābgrahaṇena tejonnayorapi saṃgraha ityetadapi vakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12494: yadyapyetāvatāpi bhūtaveṣṭitasya jīvasya raṃhaṇaṃ nāvagamyate tejobannānāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvamātraśravaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:12496: somo rāṭ' iti śrutyā saha 'śraddhāṃ juhvati tasyā āhuteḥ somo rājā saṃbhavati' ityasyāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12498: tathāhi-yā evāpo hutā dvitīyasyāmāhutau somabhāvaṃ gatāstābhireṣa pariṣvakto jīva iṣṭādikārī candrabhūyaṃ gataścandralokaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12499: nanu svatantrā āpaḥ śraddhādikrameṇa somabhāvamāpnuvantu tābhirapariṣvakta eva tu jīvaḥ sendriyamātro gatvā somabhāvamanubhavatu /
GSP33vacbhamu:12503: evaṃ hi śrutisāmānyaṃ kalpeta yadi yena rūpeṇa yena ca krameṇāpāṃ somabhāvastenaiva jīvasyāpi somabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12506: ato dadhipayaḥprabhṛtayo dravabhūyastvādāpo hutāḥ sūkṣmībhūtā iṣṭādikāriṇamāśritā
GSP33vacbhamu:12507: nondhanena vidhinā dehe hūyamāne hutāḥ satya āhutimapya iṣṭādikāriṇaṃ pariveṣṭya
GSP33vacbhamu:12511: ayamarthaḥ-evaṃ hi sūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhet yadyasya sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ raṃhato na bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12520: tasya ca dehendriyāderupādheḥ pradeśikatvānna tatra san dehāntaraṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12521: tasmātsūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhatikarmopasthāpitaḥ pratipattavyaḥ prāptavyo yo dehastadviṣayāyā bhāvanāyā utpādanāyā dīrghībhāvamātraṃ jalūkayopamīyate
GSP33vacbhamu:12527: ālayavijñānasaṃtāna ātmā tasya vṛttiḥ ṣaṭ pravṛttivijñānāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:12535: te hi śarīrātmavādino bhasmībhāvamātmana āhurna kasyacidgamanamiti //1 // 3.1.1.2.
GSP33vacbhamu:12543: yastu gandhasvedapākaprāṇāvakāśadānadarśanāddehasya pāñcabhautikatvaṃ paśyaṃstejobannātmakatvena tryātmakatve na parituṣyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:12547: ato na sa deho bhūtāntarāṇi pratyākhyāya kevalābhiradbhirārabdhuṃ śakyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12553: prāṇānāṃ jīvaddehe sāśrayatvamavagataṃ gacchati jīvaddehe tadanuvidhāyinaḥ prāṇā api gacchantīti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12555: sa caiṣāmanuvidheyaḥ sūkṣmo deho bhūtendriyamaya iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12558: śrāvite 'pi spaṣṭe jīvasya prāṇaiḥ saha gamane 'gnyādigatiśaṅkā śrutivirodhotthāpanārthā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12563: pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvaprakāre pṛṣṭe prathamāyāmāhutau anapāṃ śraddhāyā hetavyatābhidhānasaṃbhavaddhamanupapannaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:12564: nahi yathā paśvādibhyo hṛdayādayo 'vayavā avadāya niṣkṛṣya hūyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:12565: evaṃ śraddhā buddhiprasādalakṣaṇā niṣkraṣṭuṃ vā hotuṃ vā śakyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12572: teṣāṃ yaḥ samāhāraḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ sā ṣaṭpraśnī,
GSP33vacbhamu:12577: kriyāsamabhihāreṇāpyāyanāpakṣayau yathā somasya tathā bhakṣayanti somamayāṃllokānityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12582: bhoktṛṇāmeva satāṃ devopājīvitāmātreṇa bhākto gamayitavyo na tu carvaṇanigaraṇābhyāṃ mukhya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12586: yathā hi balīvardādayo bhuñjanā api svaphalaṃ svāmino halādivahanenopakurvāṇā bhogyāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12587: evaṃ paramatattvamavidvāṃsa iṣṭādikāriṇa iha dadhipayaḥpuroṭāśādināmuṣmiṃśca loke paricārakatayā devānāmupabhogyā iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12591: yo hi pañcāgnividyāṃ na vedaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayantīti nindyate pañcāgnividyāṃ stotuṃ tasyā eva prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12602: ca yatkiñceha karma kutaṃ tasyāntaṃ prāpyeti śravaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:12610: tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā ityācārameva yoninimittamupadiśati na tu karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:12611: stāṃ vā karmaśīle dve apyaviśeṣeṇānuśayastathāpi yadyapyayamiṣṭāpūrtakārī svayaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:12613: smaryate hyanyasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtābhyāmanyasya tatsaṃbandhinastatphalabhāgitā-'patatyardhaśarīreṇa yasya bhāryā surāṃ pibet' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:12615: tasmādyāvatsaṃpātamityupakramānurodhāt 'yat kiñceha karoti' iti ca śrutyantarānusārādramaṇīyacaraṇatvaṃ saṃbandhyantaragatamiṣṭāpūrtakāriṇi bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12616: tathāca niranuśayānāmeva bhuktabhogānāmavaroha iti prāpta ucyate-yena karmakalāpena phalamupabhojitaṃ tasminnatīte 'pi sānuśayā eva candramaṇḍalādavarohanti
GSP33vacbhamu:12625: nahi 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt' iti yāvajjīvamahāravihārādisamaye 'pi homaṃ vidhatte nāpi madhyāhnādāvapi tu sāyaṃprātaḥkālāpekṣayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12632: nahi yāvantaḥ saṃpātā yāvatāṃ vā puṃsāṃ saṃpātāste sarve tatreṣṭādikāriṇā bhogena kṣayaṃ nīyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:12637: api ceṣṭāpūrtakārīha janmani kevalaṃ na tanmātramakārṣīdapi tu godohanenāpaḥ praṇayan paśuphalamapyapūrvaṃ samacaiṣīt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12638: evamaharniśaṃ ca vāṅmanaḥ śarīraceṣṭābhiḥ puṇyāpuṇyamihāmutropabhogyaṃ saṃcitavato na martyalokādibhogyaṃ candraloke bhagyaṃ bhavitumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:12639: naca svaphalavirodhino 'nuśayasya ṛte prayāścittādātmajñānādvādattaphalasya dhvaṃsaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12642: anye tu sakalakarmakṣaye parāvṛttiśaṅkā nirbījeti manyamānā anyathādhikaraṇaṃ varṇayāñcakrurityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:12645: tatredamiha vicāryate-kiṃ dattaphalānāmiṣṭāpūrtakarmaṇāmavaśeṣādihāvartante uta tānyupabhogena nirāvaśeṣaṃ kṣapayitvānupabhuktakarmaśādihāvartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12646: tatreṣṭādīnāṃ bhogena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvānniranuśayā evānupabhuktakarmavaśādāvartanta iti prāpta ucyate-sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12648: yathā bhāṇḍasthe madhuni sarpiṣi vā kṣālite 'pi bhāṇḍalepakaṃ taccheṣaṃ madhu vā sarpirvā na kṣālayituṃ śakyamiti dṛṣṭamevaṃ tadanusārādetadapi pratipattavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12650: yathā sevako hāstikāśvīyapadātivrātaparivṛto mahārājaṃ sevamānaḥ kālavaśācchatrapādukāvaśeṣo
GSP33vacbhamu:12651: na sevitumarhatīti dṛṣṭaṃ tanmūlā ca laukikī smṛtiriti dṛṣṭasmṛtibhyāṃ sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12663: iha janmani hi paryāyeṇa sukhaduḥkhe bhujyamāne dṛśyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:12668: na cābhivyaktaṃ ca karma phalaṃ na datta iti ca saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12672: phalopabhogena prakṣayānnāsti teṣāṃ karmāśya iti na te saṃsareyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12678: anena niranuśayā evāvarohantīti pūrvapakṣabījaṃ nigūḍhamuddhāṭya nirasyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12684: 'ācārahīnaṃ na punaranti vedāḥ' iti hi smṛtyā vedapadena vedārthamupalakṣayantyā vedārthānuṣṭhānaśeṣatvamācārasyoktaṃ na tu svatantra ācāraḥ phalasya sādhanaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12695: 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti' iti kauṣītakināṃ samāmnānāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:12697: tathāhi-dyusomavṛṣṭyannaretaḥpariṇāmakrameṇa tā evāpo yoṣidagnau hutāḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantītyaviśeṣeṇa śrutam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12702: 'jāyasva mriyasveti tṛtīyaṃ sthānam' iti ca sthānatvamātreṇāvagamātpathitvenāpratīteścandralokādavatīrṇānāmapi ca tatsthānatvasaṃbhavādasaṃpūreṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:12703: ananyamārgatayā ca tadbhogavirahiṇāmapi grāmaṃ gacchan vṛkṣamūlānyupasarpatītivatsaṃyamanādiṣu yamavaśyatāyai candralokagamanopapatteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12706: na mārgatvaṃ tathāpi vettha yathāsau mārgo na saṃpūryate ityasya prativacanāvasare
GSP33vacbhamu:12708: yadi punastenaiva mārgeṇāgatya janmamaraṇaprabandhavat sthānamadhyāsīta naitattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12709: nahīṣṭādikāriṇaścandramaṇḍalādavaruhya ramaṇīyaṃ ninditāṃ vā yoniṃ pratipadyamānāstṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:12714: tato 'vagacchāmaḥ saṃyamanaṃ sapta ca yātanābhūmīryamavaśatayā pratipadyamānā aniṣṭādikāriṇo na candramaṇḍalādavarohantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12715: tasmāt 'ye vai ke ca' itīṣṭādikāriviṣayaṃ na sarvaviṣayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12724: yadyapi yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyumityato na tādātmyaṃ sphuṭamavagamyate tathāpi vāyurbhūtvetyādeḥ sphuṭataraṃ tādātmyāvagamādyathetamākāśamityetadapi tādātmya evāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12726: manuṣyaśarīrasya nandikeśvarasya devadeharūpapariṇāmasmaraṇāddevadehasya ca nahuṣasya tiryaktvasmaraṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12728: gauṇyāṃ ca vṛttau lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ prayukto guṇe lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12731: samāno bhāvo rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te sabhāvāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyamiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:12738: yadi tu devājagaśarīre samasamaye syātāṃ na devaśarīramajagaraśarīraṃ śilpiśatenāpi kriyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12739: nahi dadhipayasī samasamaye parasparātmanī śakye saṃpādayituṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12743: nanvākāśabhāvena saṃyogamātraṃ lakṣyatāṃ kiṃ sādṛśyenetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:12746: 'durniṣprapataram' iti duḥkhena niḥsaraṇaṃ brūte na tu vilambeneti manyate pūrvapakṣī /
GSP33vacbhamu:12747: vinā sthūlaśarīraṃ na sūkṣmaśarīre duḥkhabhāgīti durniṣprapataraṃ vilambaṃ lakṣayatīti rāddhāntaḥ //23 // 3.1.6.24.
GSP33vacbhamu:12749: ākāśasārūpyaṃ vāyudhūmādisaṃparko 'nuśayināmukta ihedānīṃ vrīhiyavā oṣādhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyanta iti śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12750: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimanuśayināṃ bhogādhiṣṭhānaṃ vrīhiyavādayaḥ sthāvarā bhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:12752: tatra manuṣyo jāyate devo jāyata ityādau prayoge janeḥ śarīraparigrahe prasiddhatvādatrāpi vrīhyādiśarīraparigraha eva janirmukhyārtha iti vrīhyādiśarīrā evānuśayina iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12753: naca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivat karmaviśeṣāsaṃkīrtanāmāttadabhāve vrīhyādīnāṃ śarīrabhāvābhāvātkṣetrajñānantarādhiṣṭhitānāmeva yatsaṃparkamātramiti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12757: sāmānyaśāstrasya hiṃsāmānyadvāreṇa viśeṣopasarpaṇaṃ vilambeneti sākṣādviśeṣaspṛśaḥ śāstracchīghratarapravṛttāddurbalatvāditi sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12758: nahi balavadityeva durbalaṃ bādhate kintu sati virodhe /
GSP33vacbhamu:12761: 'agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhet ' iti hi kratuprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ kratvarthatāmasya gamayati na tvapanayati niṣedhāpāditāmasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutām
GSP33vacbhamu:12762: tenāstu niṣedhādasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutā vidheścha kratvarthatā ko virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12764: na kratostatra vaiguṇyaṃ yathā coditasiddhitaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12766: yadi ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivadvrīhyādiṣvanuśayavatāṃ kamaviśeṣaḥ kīrtyeta na caitadasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12769: naca tadgataiyaiḥ paśuhiṃsāyā 'na hiṃsyāt' iti niṣedātkratvarthāyā api duḥkhaphalavatsaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12771: tathāhi-na hiṃsyāditi niṣedhasya niṣedhyādhīnanirūpaṇatayā yadarthaṃ niṣedhyaṃ tadartha eva niṣedho vijñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12772: na caitat 'nānṛtaṃ vadet' 'na tau paśau karoti' itivatkasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ yenānṛtatavadanavadasya niṣedhasya kratvarthate niṣedho 'pi kratvarthaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12773: paśau niṣiddhayorājyabhāgayoḥ kratvarthatvena niṣedhasyāpi kratvarthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12778: kevalaṃ tasya rāgataḥ prāptatvāttadanuvādena nañarthaṃ vidhirupasaṃkrāmati,
GSP33vacbhamu:12779: tena puruṣārtho niṣedhya iti tadadhīnanirūpaṇo niṣedho 'pi puruṣārtho bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12780: tathā cāyamarthaḥ saṃpadyate-yatpuruṣārthaṃ hananaṃ tanna kuryāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:12781: kratvarthasyāpi na niṣedhe hiṃsāyāḥ kratūpakārakatvamapi kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12782: naca dṛṣṭe puruṣokārakatve pratyarthini sati tatkalpanāspadam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12783: naca svātantryapāratantrye sati saṃyogapṛthaktve svādiratādivadekatra saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12784: tasmātpuruṣārthapratiṣedho na kratvarthamapyāskandatīti śuddhasukhaphalatvameveṣṭādīnāṃ na sthāvaśarīropabhogyaduḥkhaphalatvamapīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12789: vrīhyādibhāvamāpannāḥ khalvanuśayinaḥ puruṣairupabhuktā retaḥ sigbhāvamanubhavantī śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12791: vrīhyādidehatve hi vrīhyādiṣu lūneṣvavahantinā phalīkṛteṣu ca vrīhyādidehavināśādanuśayinaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12792: pravaseyuriti kathamanuśayināṃ retaḥsigbhāvaḥ saṃsargamātre tu saṃsargiṣu vrīhyādiṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:12793: naṣṭeṣvapi na saṃsargiṇo 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuriti retaḥsigbhāva upapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12796: sadyo jāto hi bālo na retaḥ sigbhavatyapi tu cirajātaḥ prauḍhayauvanaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12798: tatkimidānīṃ sarvatraivānuśayināṃ saṃsargamātraṃ tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇā ityādiṣu tathābhāva āpadyeteti netyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:12801: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīkamīmāṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:12802: iti tṛtīyādhyāyasya gatyāgaticintayā vairāgyanirūpaṇākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12805: idānīṃ tu tasyaiva jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvasiddhyartha prapañcayate-
GSP33vacbhamu:12806: kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12807: yadyapi brahmaṇo 'nyasyānirvācyatayā jāgratsvapnāvasthāgatayorubhayorapi sargayormāyamayatvaṃ tathāpi yathā jāgratsṛṣṭirbrahmātmabhāvasākṣātkārātprāganuvartate
GSP33vacbhamu:12809: evaṃ kiṃ svapnasṛṣṭirāhosvit pratidinameva nivartata iti vimarśārthaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:12815: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-iha hi sarvāṇyeva mithyājñānānyudāharaṇaṃ teṣāṃ satyatvaṃ pratijñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12819: atathātvasya tvapratīyamānasya tathābhāvaprameyavirodhena kalpanāspadatvāt bādhakapratyayādatathātvamiti cet / na /
GSP33vacbhamu:12825: yathāhi kṣīraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kālāntare dadhi bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:12828: yadyasya tīvrātapaklāntisahitaṃ cakṣuḥ sa tasya rajatarūpatāṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12831: evamutpalamapi nīlalohitaṃ divā saurībhirbhābhirabhivyaktaṃ nīlatayā gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12833: evamasatyāṃ nidrāyāṃ sato 'pi rathādīnna gṛhṇāti nidrāṇastu gṛhṇātīti sāmagrībhedādvā kālabhedādvā virodhābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12842: imamarthaṃ śrutirapi darśayati-'atha rathān rathayogān pathaḥ sṛjate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12843: naca 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na canthāno bhavanti' iti virodhādupacaritārthāṃ sṛjata iti śrutirvyākhyeyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12844: sṛjata iti hi śruterbahuśrutisaṃvādātpramāṇāntarasaṃvādācca balīyastvena tadanuguṇatayā na tatra rathā ityasyā bhāktatvena vyākhyānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12845: jāgradavasthādarśanayogyā na santi na tu rathā na santīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12852: tadyathā svapne śuklāmbaradharaḥ śuklamālyānulepano brāhmaṇāyanaḥ priyavrataṃ pratyāha-priyavrata,
GSP33vacbhamu:12854: sa ca jāgrattathātmano mānamanubhūya svapnapratyayaṃ satyamabhimanyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12859: na tāvat kṣīrasyeva dadhi rajatasya pariṇāmaḥ śuktiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12860: nahi jātvīśvaragṛhe cirasthitānyapi rajatabhājanāni śuktibhāvamanubhavanti dṛśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:12861: na cetarasya rajatānubhavasamaye 'nyo 'nākulendriyo na tasya śuktibhāvamanubhavati pratyeti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:12864: pāramārthike hāsya toyabhāve tatsādhyāmudānyopaśamalakṣaṇārthakriyāṃ kuryānmarīcisādhyāmapi rūpaprakāśalakṣaṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:12867: tadarthakriyākāritvavyāptaṃ toyatvaṃ mātrayāpi tāmakurvattoyameva na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12868: apica toyapratyayasamīcīnatvāyāsya dvaividhyamabhyupeyate taccābhyupagame 'pi na seddhumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12869: tathāhi-asamarthavidhāpāti toyametaditi manvāno na tṛṣṇayāpi marīcitoyamabhidhāvet yathā marīcīnanubhavan /
GSP33vacbhamu:12871: kimaparāddhaṃ marīciṣu toyaviparyāsena sarvajanīnena yattamatilaṅghya viparyāsāntaraṃ kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12873: tatrāpi rajatajñānaṃ pūrvamutpannaṃ bādhyamuttaraṃ tu bādhakaṃ śuktijñānaṃ prāptipūrvakatvātpratiṣedhasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:12874: rajatajñānātprākprāpakābhāvena śukteraprāptāyāḥ pratiṣedhasaṃbhavātpūrvajñānaprāptaṃ tu rajataṃ śuktijñānamapabadhitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12878: naca vartamānarajatāvabhāsi jñānaṃ bhaviṣyattāmasyāgocarayanna bhaviṣyatā svasamayavartinīṃ śuktiṃ gocarayatā pratyayena bādhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:12880: mā nāmāsya jñāsītpratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyattāṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvi tvanumānamupakārabhāvahetumivāsati vināśapratyayopanipāte sthemānamākalayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12882: tathāca rajatagocaraṃ pratyakṣaṃ vastutaḥ sthirameva rajataṃ gocarayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12890: yadi cirasthāyitvaṃ yogyatā na sā pratyakṣagocaraḥ śakteratīndriyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12895: tasmādatyantābhyāsavaśena pratyakṣānantaraṃ śīgratarotpannavinaśyadavasthānumānasahitapratyakṣābhiprāyemeva cirasthāyīti gṛhyata iti mantavyam
GSP33vacbhamu:12901: yattu satyaṃ svapnadarśanamuktaṃ tatrāpyākhyātrā brāhmaṇāyanenākhyāte saṃvādābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12903: tādṛśasyaiva bahulaṃ visaṃvādadarśadarśitaśca visaṃvādo bhāṣyakṛtā kātsnryenānabhivyaktiṃ vivṛṇvatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12905: rajanīsamaye 'pi hi bhāratādvarṣāntare ketumālādau vāsaro bhavatīti bhārate varṣa ityuktam //3 // 3.2.1.4.
GSP33vacbhamu:12912: prājñavyāpāratvena pāramārthikatvānumānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa bādhakapratyayena virudhyamānaṃ nātmānaṃ labhata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12918: iha hi nāḍīpuritatparamātmāno jīvasya suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ sthānatvena śrūyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:12922: yadā nāḍyo vā purītadvā suṣuptasthānaṃ tadā viparītagrahaṇanivṛttāvapi na jīvasya paramātmabhāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12923: avidyānivṛttāvapi jīvasya paramātmabhāvāya kāraṇāntaramapekṣitavyaṃ tacca karmaiva na tu tattajñānaṃ viparītajñānanivṛttimātreṇa tasyopayogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:12927: ata tu paramātmaiva nāḍīpurītasmṛtidvārā suṣuptisthānaṃ tato viparītajñānanivṛtterasti mātrayā paramātmabhāva upayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12928: tayā hi tāvadeṣa jīvastadavasthāno bhavati kevalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12929: tattvajñānābhāvena samūlakāṣamavidyāyā akāṣājjāgratsvapnalakṣaṇaṃ jīvasya vyutthānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12932: nāḍīpurītatparamātmasu sthāneṣu suṣuptasya jīvasya nilayaṃ prati vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12933: yathā bahuṣu prāsādeṣveko narendraḥ kadācitkkacinnilīyate kadācitkkacidevameko jīvaḥ kadācinnāḍīṣu kadācitpurītati kadācidbrahmaṇīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12934: yathā nirapekṣā vrīhiyavāḥ kratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśaprakṛtitayā śrutā ekārthā vikalpyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:12935: evaṃ saptamīśrutyā vāyatanaśrutyā vekanilayanārthāḥ parasparānapekṣā nāḍyadayo 'pi vikalpamarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12936: yatrāpi nāḍībhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śeta iti nāḍība3hmaṇorādhārayoḥ samuccayaśravaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12937: prāṇaśabdaṃ ca brahma 'athāsmin prāṇe brahmaṇi sa jīva ekadhā bhavati' nnirapekṣayoravedhāratvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12940: evaṃ tābhireva saṃcaramāṇasya kadācidbrahmaivādhāra iti siddhamādhāratve nāḍīpurītatparamātmanāmanapekṣatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12942: prāpte 'bhidhīyate-jīvaḥ samuccayenaivaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpena /
GSP33vacbhamu:12945: vikalpa āśritastatra gatiranyā na vidyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12946: prakṛtakratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśadravyaprakṛtitayā hi parasparānapekṣau vrīhiyavau vihitauśakrutaścaitau pratyekaṃ puroḍāśamabhinirvartayitum
GSP33vacbhamu:12947: tatra yadi miśrābhyāṃ puroḍāśo 'bhinirvartyeta parasparānapekṣavrīhiyavavidhātṛṇī ubhe api śāstre bādhyeyātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:12949: sa hi yathā vihitānyaṅgānyabhisamīkṣya pravartamāno naitānyanyathayitaṃ śakroti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12951: na cāṅgānurodhena pradhānābhyāso 'gosave ubhe kuryāt' itivadyuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12953: na cāṅgabhūtaindravāyavādigrahānurodhena yathā pradhānasya somayāgasyāvṛttirevamatrāpīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12956: 'somamabhiplāvayati' iti ca vākyāntarānulocanayā rasadvāreṇa yāgasādhanībhūtasyendravāyvādyuddeśena prādeśamātreṣūrdhvapātreṣu grahaṇāni pṛthakprakalpanāni saṃskārā vidhīyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:12961: naca yāvanmātramekamūrdhvapātraṃ vyāpnoti tāvanmātraṃ gṛhītvā pariśaṣṭaṃ tyajyeteti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12963: evaṃ taddṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavedyadi tatsarvaṃ yāga upayujyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:12965: tasmātsakalasya somarasasya yāgaśeṣatvena saṃskārārhatvādekaikena ca grahamena sakalasya
GSP33vacbhamu:12968: ata eva samuccayadarśanaṃ 'daśautānadhvaryuḥ prātaḥ savane grahan gṛhṇāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12972: teṣāṃ ca samuccaye sati yāvadyaduddeśena gṛhītaṃ tāvattasyai devatāyai tyaktavyamityarthādyāgasyāvṛttyā bhavativyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12973: yadi punaḥ pṛthakkṛtānyapyekīkṛtya kāñcana devatāmuddiśya tyajeran,
GSP33vacbhamu:12988: nanu yadi brahmaiva nilayanasthānaṃ tāvanmātramucyatāṃ kṛtaṃ nāḍyupanyāsenetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:12994: pittenābhivyāptakaraṇo na bāhyānviṣayānvedeti taddvārā sukhaduḥkhābhāvena tatkāraṇapāṣmāsparśena nāḍīstutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12995: yadā tu tejo brahma tadā sugamam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13000: tathāhi-nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhīnāṃ karaṇānāmāśrayo jīvastu brāhmāvyatirekātsvamahipratiṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13002: vikalpa tu vyatirekaṃ brahmaṇa ādhāratvamucyate jīvaṃ prati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13003: tathāca suṣuptāvasthāyāmupādhīnāmasamudācārājjīvasya brahmātmatvameva brahmādhāratvaṃ na tu nāḍīpurītādhāratvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13004: tadupādhikaraṇamātrādhāratayā tu suṣuptadaśārambhāya jīvasya nāḍīpurītadādhāratvamityatulyārthatayā na vikalpa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13006: autsagikaṃ brahmasvarūpatvaṃ jīvasyāsati jāgratsvapnadaśārūpe 'pavāde suṣuptavasthāyāṃ nānyathayituṃ śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13007: apica ye 'pi sthānavikalpamāsthiṣacata tairapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamalakṣaṇā suṣuptyavasthāṅgīkartavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13008: na ceyamātmatādātmyaṃ vinā nāḍyādiṣu paramātmavyatirikteṣu sthāneṣūpapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13009: tatra hi sthito 'yaṃ jīva ātmavyatirekābhimānī sannavaśyaṃ viśeṣajñānavān bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13010: tathāhi śrutiḥ-'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānye 'nyatpaśyet' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13012: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūtatkena kaṃ paśyedvijānīyāt' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13022: aupādhike tu paricchede yatropādhisaṃnihitastanmātraṃ na jānīyānna tu sarvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13027: naca suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ jīvasya svarūpeṇa nāḍyādisthānatvapratipādena kiñcitprayojanaṃ brahmabhūyapratipādena tvasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13028: tasmānna samapradhānabhāvena samuccayo nāpi vikalpa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13033: sa vānyo veti īśvaro veti saṃbhavamātreṇopanyāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13036: yadvi dvyahādinirvartanīyamekasya puṃsaścoditaṃ karma tasya pūrvedyuranuṣṭhitasyāsti smṛtiriti vakyavye 'nuḥ pratyabhijñānasūcanārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13040: jīvaḥ pratinyāyaṃ saṃprasāde suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ buddhāntāyādravati āgacchati pratiyoni /
GSP33vacbhamu:13041: yohi vyāghrayoniḥ suṣupto buddhāntamāgacchan sa vyāghra eva bhavati na jātyantaram /
GSP33vacbhamu:13043: na iha vyāghro vā siṃho veti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13045: yo hi jīvaḥ suptaḥ sa śarīrāntaraṃ uttiṣṭhati śarīrāntaragatastu suptajīvasaṃbandhini śarīra uttiṣṭhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:13047: apica na jīvo nāma kaścitparasmādanya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13051: evamanādyanirvacanīyāvidyopadhānabhedopādhikalpito jīvo na vastutaḥ paramātmano bhidyate tadupādyudbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ codbhūta ivābhibhūta iva pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13052: tataśca suṣuptādāvapi abhibhūta iva jāgradavasthādiṣudbhūta iva /
GSP33vacbhamu:13053: tasya cāvidyātadvāsanopādheranāditayā kāryakāraṇabhāvena pravahataḥ suvivecatayā tadupahito jīvaḥ suviveca iti //9 // 3.2.4.10.
GSP33vacbhamu:13058: tadyathā kaścitsuptotthitaḥ prāha sukhamahamasvāpsaṃ laghūni me gātrāṇi prasannaṃ me mana iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:13059: kaścitpunarduḥkhasamasvāpsaṃ gurūṇi me gātrāṇi bhramatyanavasthitaṃ me mana iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13063: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-yadyapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamena mohasuṣuptayoḥ sāmyaṃ tathāpi naikyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13065: bāhyendriyavyāpārabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tu bhede tayoḥ suṣuptamohayorapi prayojanabhedātkāraṇabhedāllakṣaṇabhedācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13068: yadyapi satyapi mohe na maraṇaṃ tathāpyasati mohe na maraṇamiti maraṇārtho mohaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13071: tasmāt suṣuptamohāvasthayorbrahmaṇā saṃpattāvapi suṣupte yādṛśī saṃpattirna tādṛśī moha ityardhasaṃpattiruktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13079: tathāpi prapañcaliṅgānāṃ bahvīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ darśanādbhavati punarvicikitsā atastannivāraṇāyārambhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13086: tasmādubhayaliṅgakaśāstraprāmāṇyādubhayarūpatā brahmaṇaḥ pāramārthikīti prāpta ucyate-na sthānata upādhito 'pi parasya brahmaṇa ubhayacihnatvasaṃbhavaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13088: pāramārthikatve hyupādhijanitasya rūpasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13104: kiṃ sāllakṣaṇaṃ ca prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ ca brahma kiṃ sallakṣaṇameva brahmeti prakāśalakṣaṇameveti tatra pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti-
GSP33vacbhamu:13112: yathā sarvagandhatvādayo 'pi tu prakāśarūpameva saditi nobhayarūpatvaṃ brahmaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13115: bhede na sthānato 'pīti nirākṛtamiti nādhikaraṇāntaraṃ prayojayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13117: sarveṣāṃ ca sādhāraṇe pravilayārthatve sati 'arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt' iti vinigamanakāraṇavacanamanavakāśaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13118: evaṃ hi tasyāvakāśaḥ syādyāda kāścidupāsanāparatayā rūpamācakṣīran kāścinnīrūpabrahmapratipādanaparā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13119: sarvāsāṃ tu pravilayārthatvena nīrūpabrahmapratipādanārthatve ukto vinigamanaheturna syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13123: vāstavasya vā prapañcasya pravilayaḥ sarpiṣa ivāgnisaṃyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13125: na tāvadvāstavaḥ sarvasādhāraṇaḥ pṛthivyādiprapañcaḥ puruṣamātreṇa śakyaḥ samucchettum /
GSP33vacbhamu:13126: apica prahlādaśukādibhiḥ puruṣadhaureyaiḥ samūlamunmūlitaḥ prapañca iti śūnyaṃ jagadbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13129: samāropitarūpastu prapañco brahmatattvajñāpanaparaireva vākyairbrahmatattvamavabodhayadbhiḥ śakyaḥ samucchettumiti kṛtamatra vidhinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13130: nahi vidhiśatenāpi vinā tattvāvabodhanaṃ pravartasvātmajñāna iti vā kuru prapañcapravilayaṃ veti pravartitaḥ śaknoti prapañcapravilayaṃ kartum
GSP33vacbhamu:13131: na cāsyātmajñānavidhiṃ vinā vedāntārthabrahmatattvāvabodho na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13132: maulikasya svādhyāyādhyayanavirodhereva vivakṣitārthatayā sakalasya vedarāśeḥ phalavadarthāvabodhanaparatāmāpādayato vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13136: tasmāt 'jartilayavāgvā juhuyāt' itivadvidhisarūpā ete 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavya' ityādayo na tu vidhaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13138: draṣṭavyādiśabdā api tattvābhimudhīkaraṇapradhānā na tattvāvabodhavidhipradhānā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13139: apica brahmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcamuktaṃ na tatra niyojyaḥ kaścitsaṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13156: kiñcānyanniyoganiṣṭhatayaiva ca paryavasyatyāmnāye yadabhyupagataṃbhavadbhiḥ śāstraparyālocanayāniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ jīvasyeti tadetacchāstrāvirodhādapramāṇakam
GSP33vacbhamu:13157: athaitacchāstramaniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ ca jīvasya pratipādayati jīvaṃ ca niyuktaṃ tato dvyarthaṃ ca viruddhārtha ca syādityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:13160: nahi tadvākyaṃ tasya niyojyatāmāhāpi tu laukikapramāṇasiddhāṃ niyojyatāmāśritya darśapūrṇamāsau vidhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:13161: idaṃ tu niyojyatāmapanayati ca niyuṅkte ceti durghaṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13163: paurvāparyālocanayā vedāntānāṃ tattvaniṣṭhatā śrutā na śrutā niyoganiṣṭhatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13164: apica niyoganiṣṭhatve vākyasya darśapaurṇāmāsakarmaṇa ivāpūrvāvāntaravyāpārādātmajñānakarmaṇo 'pyapūrvāvāntaravyāpārādeva svargādiphalavanmokṣasyānandarūpaphalasya siddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13170: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato vravīti ca bhūyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13172: dve eva brahmaṇo rūpe brahmaṇaḥ paramārthato 'rūpasyādhyāropite dve eva rūpe tābhyāṃ hi tadrūpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13176: atra pṛthivyaptejāṃsi trīṇi bhūtāni brahmaṇo rūpaṃ mūrtaṃ mūrcchitāvayavamitaretarānupraviṣṭāvayavaṃ kaṭhinamiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:13182: tasyaitasya brahmarūpasya tejo 'bannasya caturviśeṣaṇasyaiṣa rasaḥ sāro ya eṣa savitā sapati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13187: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa gatasmin savitṛmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13188: karaṇātmako hiraṇyagarbhaprāṇāhvayastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ sāro nityaparokṣatā ca sāmyamityadhidaivatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13190: mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yaccakṣuḥ sato hyoṣa rasa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13192: yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇekṣan puruṣastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13193: liṅgasya hi karaṇātmakasya hiraṇyagarbhasya dakṣiṇamakṣyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śruteradhigatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13194: tadevaṃ brahmaṇa aupādhikayormūrtāmūrtayorādhyātmikādhidaivikayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vibhāgo vyākhyātaḥ sattyacchabdavācyayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13195: athedānīṃ tasya karaṇātmanaḥ puruṣasya liṅgasya rūpaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13197: tadevaṃ niravaśeṣaṃ savāsanaṃ satyarūpamuktvā yattatsatyasya satyamuktaṃ brahma tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13198: yataḥ satyasya rūpaṃ niḥśeṣamuktamato 'vaśiṣṭaṃ satyasya yatsatyaṃ tasyānantaraṃ taduktihetukaṃ svarūpaṃ vakyavyamityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:13203: atraivamarthenetinā yatsaṃnihitaṃ parāmṛṣṭaṃ tanniṣidhyate nañā saṃnihitaṃ ca mūrtāmūrtaṃ savāsanaṃ rūpadvayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13205: tatredaṃ vicāryate-kiṃ rūpadvayaṃ savāsanaṃ brahma ca sarvameva ca pratiṣidhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:13206: uta brahmaivātha savāsanaṃ rūpadvayaṃ brahma tu pariśiṣyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13207: yadyapi teṣu teṣu vedāntapradeśeṣu brahmasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ tadasadbhāvajñānaṃ ca ninditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13208: 'astītyevopalabdhavyaḥ' iti cāsya sattvamavadhāritaṃ tathāpi sadbodharūpaṃ tadbrahma savāsanamūrtāmūrtarūpasādhāraṇatayā ca sāmānyaṃ tasya caite viśeṣā mūrtāmūrtādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13212: ata eva nahyetasmāditi netyanyatparamastīti niṣedhāt paraṃ nāstīti sarvaniṣedhameva tattvamāha śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13218: yathāhuḥ-'yena yasyābhisaṃbandho dūrasthasyāpi tena saḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13222: katarasyāstu niṣedha iti viśaye prapañcapratiṣedhe samastapratyakṣādivyākopaprasaṅgāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13223: brahmapratiṣedho tvavyākopādbrahmaiva pratiṣedhena saṃbadhyate yogyatvānna prapañcastadvaiparītyāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13227: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-upādhayo hyamī pṛthivyādayo 'vidyākalpitā na tu śoṇakarkādaya iva viśeṣā aśvatvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:13236: apariśiṣyamāṇe cānyasminya itaraḥ pratiṣeddhumārabhyate tasya pratiṣedbhumaśakyatvāttasyaiva paramārthatvāpatteḥ pratiṣādhānupapattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13243: tathāca yastasya śabdaḥ prāpakaḥ sa tatpara iti sa brahmaṇi pramāṇamiti kathamasya niṣedho 'pi pramāṇavān /
GSP33vacbhamu:13244: naca paryudāsādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena vikalpaḥ vastuni siddhasvabhāve tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13251: upakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraparyālocanayā hi vedāntānāṃ sarveṣāmeva brahmaparatvamupapāditaṃ prathame 'dhyāye /
GSP33vacbhamu:13252: na cāsatyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ dūratasthena pratiṣedhenaiṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13253: yacca vāṅmanasātītatayā brahmaṇastatpratiṣedhasya na pramāṇāntaravirodha iti tatrāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:13258: idānīṃ tu niṣprayojanamityuktaṃ 'prakṣālanāddhi paṅkasya' iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13259: tasmādvedāntavācā manasi saṃnidhānādbrahmaṇo vāṅmanasātītatvaṃ nāñjasamapi tu pratipādanaprakriyopakrama eṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13260: yathā gavādayo viṣayāḥ sākṣācchṛṅgagrāhikayā pratipādyante pratiyante ca naivaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:13262: nanu prakṛtapratiṣedhe brahmaṇo 'pi kasmānna pratiṣejha ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:13264: pradhānaṃ prakṛtaṃ prapañcasya pradhānaṃ na brahma tasya ṣaṣṭhyantatayā prapañcāvacchekatvenāpradhānatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13265: tato 'nyadbravītīti neti netīti pratiṣedhādanyadbhūyo bravītīti tannirvacanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13266: nahyetasmādityasya yadā nahyetasmāditi neti netyādiṣṭādbrahmaṇo 'nyatparamastīti vyākhyānaṃ tadā prapañcapratiṣedhādanyadbrahmaiva bravītīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13267: yadā tu nahyetasmāditi sarvanāmnā pratiṣedho brahmaṇa ādeśaḥ parāmṛśyate tadāpi prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ na pratipattavyamapi tu tena pratiṣedhena bhāvarūpaṃ brahmopalakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13271: atha brahmaṇo nāmadheyaṃ nāma satyasya satyamiti tadvyācaṣṭe śrutiḥ-'prāṇā vai satyam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13273: tat khalu satyamitarāpekṣayā tasyāpi paraṃ satyaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:13274: tadevaṃ yataḥ pratiṣedhasya parastadbravīti tasmānna prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ brahmāpi tu bhāvarūpamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13275: tadevaṃ pūrvasmin vyākhyāne nirvacanaṃ bravītīti vyākhyātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13280: kuṇḍalādirūpeṇa tu bheda ityuktaṃ tena viṣayabhedādbhedābhedayoravirodha ityekaviṣayatvena vā sarvadopalabdheravirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13281: viruddhamiti hi naḥ kka saṃpratyayo na yatpramāṇenopalabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13282: āgamataśca pramāṇādekagocarāvapi bhedābhedau pratīyamānau na virodhamāvahataḥ savitṛprakāśayoriva pratyakṣātpramāṇādbhedābhedāviti //27 // 3.2.6.28.
GSP33vacbhamu:13291: ahitvakuṇḍalatve bhinne iti vaktavyaṃ na tu vastunastābhyāṃ bhedābhedau /
GSP33vacbhamu:13294: atha vastuno na bhidyete ahitvakuṇḍalatve tathā sati ko bhedābhedayorviṣayabhedastayorvastuno 'nanyatvenābhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13295: na caikaviṣayatve 'pi sadānubhūyamānatvādbhedābhedayoravirodha svarūpaviruddhayorapyavirodhe kka nāma virodho vyavatiṣṭheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:13298: prapañcitaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra iti neha prapañcitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13303: yathāha śrutiḥ-'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13311: tadyathā prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā avayavā iva kalāḥ sa prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13312: etadupāsanāyāṃ prakāśavān mukhyo bhavatīti prakāśavān pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13313: athāparāḥ pṛthivyantarikṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra iti catasraḥ kalā eṣa dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantatavānnāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:13315: athāgniḥ sūryaścandramā vidyuditi catasraḥ kalāḥ sa jyotiṣmānnāma pādastṛtīyastadupāsanājjyotiṣmān bhavatīti jyotiṣmān pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13316: atha ghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgiti catasraḥ kalāścaturthaḥ pāda āyatanavānnāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:13317: ete ghrāṇādayo hi gandhādiviṣayā mana āyatanamāśritya bhogasādhanaṃ bhavantītyāyatanavānnāma pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13328: yathā hi tantavaḥ paṭaṃ vidhārayanti tadupādānatvādevaṃ brahmāpi jagadvidhārayati tadupapādakatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13335: manaso brahmapratīkasya samāropitabrahmabhāvasya vāgghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotramiti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13336: mano hi vaktavyaghrātavyadraṣṭavyaśrotavyān gocarān vāgādibhiḥ saṃcaratīti saṃcaraṇasādhāraṇatayā manasaḥ pādastadidamadhyātman /
GSP33vacbhamu:13337: ākāśasya brahmapratīkasyāgnirvāyurādityo diśa iti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13338: te hi vyāpino nabhasa udara iva goḥ pādā vilagnā upalakṣyanta iti pādastadidamadhidaivatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13339: tadanena pādavaditi vaidikaṃ nidarśanaṃ vyākhyāya laukikaṃ cedaṃ nidarśanamityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:13346: yathā saudhajālamārganiveśinyaḥ savitṛbhāso jālamārgopādhibedādbhinnā bhāsante tadvigame tu gabhastimaṇḍalenaikībhavantyatastena saṃbadhyanta evamihāpīti //34 // 3.2.7.35.
GSP33vacbhamu:13348: ekībhāvaḥ kasmādiha saṃbandhaḥ kathañcidvyākhyāyate na mukhya evetyetatsūtreṇa pariharati-
GSP33vacbhamu:13351: svabhāvaścedanena saṃbandhatvena spṛṣṭastataḥ svābhāvikastādātmyānnātiricyata iti tarkapāda upapāditamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13352: tathā bhedo 'pi trividho vānyādṛśaḥ svābhāvika ityarthaḥ //35 // 3.2.7.36.
GSP33vacbhamu:13356: brahmādvaitasiddhāvapi na sarvagatatvaṃ sarvavyāpitā sarvasya brahmaṇā svarūpeṇa rūpavattvaṃ sidhyatītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:13357: anena setvādinirākaraṇenaparahetunirākaraṇenānyapratiṣedhasamāśrayaṇena ca svasādhanopanyāsena ca sarvagatatvamapyātmanaḥ siddhaṃ bhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:13358: advaita siddhe sarvo 'yamanirvacanīyaḥ prapañcāvabhāso brahmādhiṣṭhāna iti sarvasya brahmasaṃbandhādbrahma sarvagatamiti siddham //37 // 3.2.8.38.
GSP33vacbhamu:13361: nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ kuta īśvaratvaṃ kutaśca phalahetutvamapītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:13371: atha karmaṇa eva phalaṃ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:13376: upāttamapi phalaṃ bhoktumayogyatvādvā karmāntarapratibandhādvā na bhujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13379: nahi svarga ātmānaṃ labhatāmityadhikāriṇaḥ kāmayante kintu bhogyo 'smākaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13381: tena yādṛśamebhiḥ kāmyate tādṛśasya phalatvamiti bhogyameva satphalamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13384: apica svarganarakau tīvratame sukhaduḥkhe iti tadviṣayeṇānubhavena bhogāparanāmnāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13385: tasmādanubhavayogye ananubhūyamāne śaśaśṛṅgavanna sta iti niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13387: athocyeta mā bhūtkarmānantaraṃ phalotpādaḥ karmākāryādapūrvātphalamutpatsyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13390: yadyadacetanaṃ tattatsarvaṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ pravartata iti pratyakṣagamābhyāmavadhāritam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13400: nanu 'svargakāmo yajeta' ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ phalaṃ prati na sādhanatayā yāgaṃ vidadhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13401: tathāhi-yadi yāgādaya eva kriyā na tadatiriktā bhāvanā tathāpi na eva svapadebhyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13402: pūrvāparībhūtāḥ sādhyasvabhāvā avagamyanta iti na sādhyāntaramapekṣanta iti na svargeṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:13404: athāpi taditarekiṇī bhavānāsti tathāpyasau bhāṣyapekṣāpi svapadopāttaṃ pūrvāgataṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13405: na bhāvyaṃ dhātvarthamapahāya na bhinnapadopāttaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ ca svargādi bhāṣyatayā svīkartumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13408: na kevalaṃ śabdato vastutaśca puruṣaprayatnasya bhāvanāyāḥ sākṣāddhātvartha eva sādhyo na tu svargādistasya tadavyāpyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13409: svargādestu nāmapadābhidheyatayā siddharūpasyākhyātavācyaṃ sādhyaṃ dhātvarthe prati 'bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyate' iti nyāyātsādhanatayā guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13410: tathāca pāramarṣe sūtram-'dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13412: samīhitasya ca svargāderasādhyatvānna yāgādayaḥ puruṣasyopakurvanyanupakāriṇāṃ caiṣāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13413: na puruṣa īṣṭe anīśānaśca na teṣu saṃbhavatyadhikārītyadhikārābhāvapratipāditānarthakyaparihārāya
GSP33vacbhamu:13418: tatrādhikārasyoktena krameṇa nirākaraṇādasato 'pi pratīyamānasya vicārāsahasyopāyatāmātreṇāvasthānādanena vākyena dehātmabhāvapravīlayastatpareṇa kriyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13420: niṣedhavākyāni ca sākṣādeva pravṛttiniṣedhena vidhivākyāni cānyāyi 'sāṃgrahaṇyā yajeta
GSP33vacbhamu:13421: grāmakāmaḥ' ityādīnā na sāṃgrahaṇyādipravṛttipāraṇyapi tūpāyāntaropadeśena saṃvādidṛṣṭopāyapratiṣedhārthāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:13422: yathā viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣava māsya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13425: tanniṣedhena tu brahmaṇi praṇidhānamādadhacchāstraṃ śāstra bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13427: kathaṃ tarhi vidhiḥ kimatra kathaṃ pravartanāmātratvādvidhestasya cādhikāramantareṇāpyupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13428: nahi yo yaḥ pravartayati sa sarvo 'dhikṛtamapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13430: tatra ca vidhiśruterviṣayabhāvopagamādyāgaḥ svargasyotpādaka iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13440: tathāca 'svargakāmo yajeta' ityādiṣu svargakāmādeḥ samīhitopāyā gamyante yāgādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13445: na caite sākṣādbhāvanābhāvyā api kartrapekṣitasādhanatāvidhyupahitamaryādā bhāvanoddeśyā bhavitumarhanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:13455: phalasya sākṣādbhāvanāvyāpyatvavirahiṇo 'pi taduddeśyatayā sarvatra vyāpitayā vyavasthānātsvargasādhane yāgādau svargakāmāderadhikāra iti siddham
GSP33vacbhamu:13456: na cāprāptārthaviṣayāḥ sāṃgrahaṇyādiyāgavidhayaḥ parisaṃkhyāyakā niyāmakā vā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13457: na cādhikārābhāve dehātmapravilayo vādhikāribhedapravilayo vā śakya upapādayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:13459: svarasataḥ pratīyamāner'the vākyasya tādarthye saṃbhavati na saṃpātāyātaparatvamucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13467: etaduktaṃ bhavati-karmaṇo hi phalaṃ prati yatsādhanatvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13469: naca vyāpāravati satyeva vyāpāro nāsatīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13471: asatyapi ca tailapānakarmaṇi tena puṣṭau kartavyāyāmantarā tailapariṇāmabhedānāṃ tadavāntaravyāpāratvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13472: tasmātkarmakāryamapūrve karmaṇā phale kartavye tadavāntaravyāpāra iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13480: nahi jātu mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍādayaḥ kumbhakārādyanadhiṣṭhitāḥ kumbhādyārambhāya vibhavavanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13483: tasmādacetanaṃ karma vāpūrve vā na cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ svakārye pravartitumutsahate naca caitanyamātraṃ karmasvarūpasāmānyaviniyogādiviśeṣavijñānaśūnyamupayujyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:13486: cetanādhiṣṭhānādacetanānāṃ kāryārambhakatvamiti tathā caitanyaṃ devatāyā asati bādhake
GSP33vacbhamu:13487: śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇaprasiddhaṃ na śakyaṃ pratiṣedhdhumityapi spaṣṭaṃ niraṭaṅki devatādhikaraṇe /
GSP33vacbhamu:13490: tadiha kevalaṃ karma vāpūrvaṃ vā cetanānadhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ phalaṃ prasūta iti dṛṣṭaviruddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:13491: yathā vinaṣṭaṃ karma na phalaṃ prasūta iti kalpyate dṛṣṭavirodhādevamihāpīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13492: tathā devapūjācmako yāgo devatāṃ naprasādayan phalaṃ prasūta ityapi dṛṣṭaviruddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:13498: naca śubhāśubhakāriṇāṃ tadanurūpaṃ phalaṃ prasuvānā devatā dveṣapakṣapātavatīti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13499: nahi rājā sādhukāriṇamanugṛhṇannigṛhṇan vā pāpakāriṇaṃ bhavati dviṣṭo rakto vā tadvadalaukiko 'pīśvaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13500: yathā ca paramāpūrve kartavye utpattyapūrvāṇāmaṅgāpūrvāṇāṃ copayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13503: tasmāddṛṣṭāvirodhena devatārādhanāt phalaṃ na tvapūrvātkarmaṇo vā kevalādvirodhato hetuvyapadeśaśca śrautaḥ smārtaśca vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13504: ye punarantaryimivyāpārāyā phalotpādanāyā nityatvaṃ sarvasādhāraṇatvamiti manyamānā bhāṣyakārīyamadhikaraṇaṃ dūṣavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13512: sāvayavasya hyavayavānāṃ bhedāttadavayavaviśiṣṭabrahmagocarāṇi vijñānāni gocarabhedādbhidyerannityavayavā brahmaṇo nirākṛtāḥ pūrvāparādītyanena
GSP33vacbhamu:13513: naca nānāsvabhāvaṃ brahma yataḥ svabhāvabhedādbhinnāni jñānānītyuktam-
GSP33vacbhamu:13517: yathā somaśarmaiko 'pyācāryo māyulapitā putro bhrātā bhartā jāmātā dvijottama ityanekarūpa ityata uktam-
GSP33vacbhamu:13519: ekasmin gocare saṃbhavanti bahūni vijñānāni na tvanekākāraṇītyuktam-
GSP33vacbhamu:13524: tattadguṇopādhānabrahmaviṣayā upāsanāḥ prāṇādiviṣayāśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakamuktiphalā viṣayabhedādbhidyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13534: jyotiṣṭomasya prakrāntatvādyajeteti tadanuvādājjyotiriti prātipadikamātraṃ paṭhitvā etenetyanukṛṣya karmasāmānādhikaraṇyena karmanāmavyavasthāpanāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13536: jyotiḥśabdasya 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā' iti ca jyotiṣṭome yogadarśanāt nāmaikadeśena ca nāmopalakṣaṇasya lokasiddhatvādbhīmasenopalakṣaṇabhīmapadavat,
GSP33vacbhamu:13540: prakṛtasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya sahasradakṣiṇālakṣaṇaguṇavidhānārthamayamanuvādo na tu karmāntaramiti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13541: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavetpūrvasmin guṇavidhiryadi tadeva prakaraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13546: na jātu dehi devadattāya gāmatha devāya vājinamiti devaśabdāddevadattaṃ vājibhājamavasyanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13547: tathā copariṣṭāt 'yajeta' iti śrūyamāṇamasaṃbaddhārthapadavyavāyāttatkarmabuddhimanādadhat tatra guṇavidhānamātrāsamarthaṃ karmāntarameva vidhatte
GSP33vacbhamu:13548: na caikatrānupapattyā lakṣaṇayā jyotiḥśabdo jyotiṣṭome pravṛtta ityasatyāmanupapattau lākṣaṇiko yuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13549: nahi gāṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gāṅgāpadaṃ lākṣaṇikamiti mīno gāṅgāyāmityatrāpi lākṣaṇikaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13550: bhede 'pi ca prathamaṃ saṃjñāntareṇollikhite yajiśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ karmanāmadheyatāmātratāmāvahati natu saṃjñāntaropajanitāṃ bhedadhiyamapanetumutsahate
GSP33vacbhamu:13553: bhavatu saṃjñāntarātkarmabhedaḥ prastute tu kimāyātamityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:13555: yathaiva kāṭhakādisamākhyā granthe prayujyanta evaṃ jñāne 'pi laukikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13556: na cāsti viśeṣo yato granthe mukhyāvijñāne gauṇī bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13559: tathāca yadā jyotiṣṭomasaṃnidhau śrūyamāṇaṃ samākhyāntaraṃ tatpratikamapi karmaṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:13560: bhedakaṃ tadā kaiva kathā śākhāntarīye viprakṛṣṭatame 'tatpratīkabhūtasamākhyāntarābhidheye jñāta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13561: tathā rūpabhedo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādakaḥ prasiddho yathā 'vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājinam' ityevamādiṣu /
GSP33vacbhamu:13562: idamāmnayate-'tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13565: atredaṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ pūrvāsminneva karmaṇi vājinaṃ guṇo vidhīyate uta karmāntaraṃ dravyadevatāntaraviśiṣṭamapūrvaṃ vidhīyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13567: dravyadevatāntaraviśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhau vidhigauravaprasaṅgāt karmāntarāpūrvāntarakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgācca na karmāntaravidhānamapi tu pūrvasminneva karmaṇi vājinadravyavidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13568: na cotpattiśiṣṭamikṣāguṇāvarodhāttatra vājinamalabdhāvakāśaṃ karmāntaraṃ gocarayatīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13569: ubhayorapi vākyayoḥ samasamayapravṛtterāmikṣāvājinayorutpattau samaṃ śiṣyamāṇatvena nāmikṣāyāḥ śiṣṭatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13571: na ca vaiśvadevītyatra śrauta āmikṣāsaṃbandho viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ yena vājinasaṃbandhādvākyagamyādbalavānbhavedubhayorapi padāntarāpekṣapratītitayā vākyagamyatvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13573: astu vā śrautatvaṃ tathāpi vājibhya iti padaṃ vājamannamāmikṣā tadeṣāmastīti vyutpattyā tatsaṃbandhino viśvāndevānupalakṣayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13575: yena ca śabdena codanā tenaivoddeśe devatātvaṃ na śabdāntareṇānyathārthaikatvena sūryādityapadayoḥ sūryādityacarvorekadaivatyaprasaṅgāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13576: tathāpi vājinnitīneḥ sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca sarvanāmārthatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13577: viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ ca viśvadevāpadena saṃnidhāpanāttatpadapuraḥsarā evaite vājipadenopasthāpyā na tu sūryādityapadavatsvatantrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13578: tathāca tadupalakṣaṇārthaṃ vājipadaṃ viśvadevopahitāmeva devatāmupalakṣayatīti na śabdāntarāddevatābhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13579: tataścāmikṣāsaṃbandhopajīvanena viśvebhyo vājinaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ nāmikṣayā bādhyate
GSP33vacbhamu:13580: kintu tayā saha samuccīyata iti na karmāntaramapi tu vākyābhyāṃ dravyayuktamekaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13581: karma vidhīyata iti prāpta ucyate-syādetadevaṃ yadi vaiśvadevīti taddhitaśrutyāmikṣā nocyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:13582: taddhitasya tvasyeti sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca viśeṣyasya sarvanāmārthatvāttatraiva taddhitasyāpi vṛttirnatu viśveṣu deveṣaṣu /
GSP33vacbhamu:13585: nanvevaṃ sati kasmādvaiśvadevīśabdamātrādeva nāmikṣāṃ pratīmaḥ kimiti cāmikṣāpadamapekṣāmahe /
GSP33vacbhamu:13588: idaṃ tu saṃnihitaviśeṣābhidhāyi tatsaṃnidhimapekṣamāṇaṃ saṃnidhāpakamāmikṣāpadamapekṣata iti kuta āmikṣāpadānapekṣa āmikṣāpratyayaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13590: ataśca satyāmapi padāntarāpekṣāyāṃ yatpadaṃ padāntarāpekṣamabhidhatte tatpramāṇabhūtaprathamabhāvipadāvagamyatvācchrautaṃ balīyaśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:13593: sasaṃbandhi pūrvasmādbhinatti vājipadaṃ kathañcidyaugikaṃ sāpekṣāvṛtti viśvadevaśabdāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13597: prāmāṇike ca vidhikalpanāgaurave abhyupetavye eva pramāṇasya tattvaviṣayatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13598: tasmādyatheha pūrvakarmāsaṃbhavino guṇātkarmabheda evamihāpi pañcāgnividyāyāḥ ṣaḍagnividyā bhinnā,
GSP33vacbhamu:13606: naca tānyeva karmāṇi bhūmibhojanādijanitamupakāramākāṅkṣanti nākāṅkṣanti ceti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13616: ca dhātubhedamantareṇa bhedānupapatteḥ 'samidho yajati' iti prathamabhāvinā vākyena
GSP33vacbhamu:13624: tena prāthamyābhāvāt prāptamityeva nāstīti kasya ko 'nuvādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13626: guṇaśravaṇe hi guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhāne vidhigauravabhiyā guṇamātravidhānalāghavāya karmānuvādapekṣāyāṃ viparivṛtterupakāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13627: yathā 'dadhnā juheti' iti dadhividhipare vākye viparivṛttyapekṣāyām 'agnihotraṃ juheti' iti vihitasya homasya viparīvartamānasyānuvādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13630: agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā ca kiṃvacanavihitakiṅkarmānuvādena kasya guṇavidhitvamiti na vinigamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13632: yataḥ pūrvabuddhivicchedena vidhīyamānaṃ ka4ma pūrvasmātsaṃjñāto vyavacchindyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13634: pratipadyamānā ākhyātasyānuvādatve 'nuvādā vidhitve vidhayo na tu svātantryeṇa kasyacidīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13636: bhindāno bhāvanāṃ bhinatti yathā tathā śākhāntaravihitā api vidyāḥ śākhāntaravihitābhyo
GSP33vacbhamu:13653: vijñānāni tasmiṃstasmin vedānte tāni tānyeva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13657: atra ca codyata iti codanā puruṣaprayatnaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13660: tasya devatoddeśena tyāgasyāsecanādikasyāvacchedyaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa eva śākhāntare
GSP33vacbhamu:13661: yathaivamihāpi prāṇajyeṣṭhatvaśreṣṭhatvavedanaviṣayaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa eva śākhāntareṣvapīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13664: yathā yāgasya yadekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ dravyadevatārūpaṃ tadeva śākhāntareṣvapīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13668: yathotpannasya tasya sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvādiha tvagniṣūtvapattigata eva guṇabheda iti kathaṃ vaiśvadevīvanna bhedaka iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13673: pañcaiva sāṃpādikā agnayo vājasaneyināmapi chāndogyānāmiva vidhīyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:13675: vaiśvadevyāṃ tūtpattau guṇo vidhīyata iti bhavatu bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13677: athavā bhavatu vājasaneyināṃ ṣaṣṭhāgnividhānaṃ mā ca bhūcchāndogyānāṃ tathāpi pañcatvasaṃkhyāyā
GSP33vacbhamu:13681: apratyabhijñāyamānāyāśca saṃkhyāyā anuvādyatvenānutpattervidhīyamānasya cādhikasya ṣoḍaśigrahaṇavadvikalpasaṃbhavānna śākhāntare jñānabhedaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13682: utpattiśiṣṭatve 'siddhe prāṇasaṃvādādayo 'pi prāṇasaṃvādādayo 'pi bhavanti pratyabhijñānādabhinnāstāsu tāsu śākhāsviti //2 // 3.3.1.3.
GSP33vacbhamu:13683: svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre 'dhikārācca savavacca tanniyamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13684: yairātharvaṇikagranthopāyā vidyā veditavyāṃ teṣāmeva śirovratapūrvādhyayanaprāptagranthabodhitā phalaṃ prayacchati nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13685: anyeṣāṃ tu chāndogyādīnāṃ saiva vidyā cīrṇaśirovratānāṃ phaladetyātharvaṇagranthādhyayanasaṃbandhādavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13687: 'teṣāmevaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta' iti vidyāsaṃyoge 'pyetāmiti prakṛtaparāmarśinā sarvanāmnādhyāyanasaṃbandhāvirodhādātharchavihitaiva vidyocyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13688: savā homāḥ sapta sauryādayaḥ śataudanāntā śataudanāntā ātharvaṇikānāṃ ta ekasminnevārtharvaṇike 'gnau kriyante na tretāyām //3 // 3.3.1.4.
GSP33vacbhamu:13690: bhūyobhūyo vidyaikatvasya vedadarśanādyatrāpi saguṇabrahmavidyānāṃ na sākṣādveda ekatvamāha tāsāmapi tatprāyapaṭhitānāṃ tadvidhānāṃ prāyadarśanādekatvameva
GSP33vacbhamu:13691: tathāhyagryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavedayamagrya iti buddhiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13693: etā hi pauruṣeyyaḥ samākhyāḥ kāṭakādipravacanayogāttāsāṃ śākhānāṃ na tūpāsanānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:13694: nahyetāḥ kāṭhādibhiḥ proktā naca kaṭhādyanuṣṭhānamāsāmitarānuṣṭhānebhyo viśeṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13695: naca kāṭhaproktānimittamātreṇa granthe pravṛttau tadyogācca kathañcillakṣaṇayopāsanāsu pravṛttau saṃbhavantyāmupāsanābhidhānāmapyāsāṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:13698: kaṭhādipuruṣapravacananimittāścaitāḥ samākhyāḥ kaṭhādibhyaḥ prāk nāsanniti tannibandhano jñānabhedo nāsīdidānīṃ cāstīti durghaṭamāpadyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:13701: yuktaṃ yadekaśākhāgato yajatyabhyāsaḥ samidādīnāṃ bhedaka iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13702: tatra hi vidhitvamautsargikamajñātajñāpanamapravṛttapravartanaṃ ca kupyeyātām 'śākhāntare tvadhyetṛpuruṣabhedādekatve 'pi nautsragikavidhitvavyākopa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13703: aśaktirapi na bhedahetuḥ svādhyāyo 'dhyetavya iti svaśākhāyāmadhyayananiyamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13706: yathādhvaryave karmaṇi jyotiṣṭomasya samāpti vyapadiśanti-'jyotiṣṭomaḥ samāptaḥ' iti tasmātsamāptibhedo 'pi na sādhanamupāsanābhedasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:13707: tadevamasati bādhake codanādyaviśeṣātsarvavedāntapratyayāni karmāṇi tāni tānyeveti siddham //4 // 3.3.2.5.
GSP33vacbhamu:13712: atraidamāśaṅkate-bhavatu sarvaśākhāpratyayamekaṃ vijñānaṃ tathāpi śākhāntaroktānāṃ tadaṅgāntarāṇāṃ na śākhāntarokte tasminnupasaṃhāro bhavitumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:13716: tasmādyathā naimittikaṃ karma sakalāṅgavadvihitamapi aśaktau yāvacchakyamaṅgamanuṣṭhātuṃ tāvanmātrajanyenopakāreṇaupakṛtaṃ bhavatyevamihāpyaṅgāntarāvidhānādeva bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13717: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-sarvatraikatve karmaṇaḥ sthite gṛhamedhīyanyāyena nopakārāvacchedo yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13718: nahi tadeva karma sattadaṅgamapekṣate nāpekṣate ceti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13719: naimittike tu nimittānurodhādavaśyakartavye sarvāṅgopasaṃhārasya sadātanatvāsaṃbhavādupakārāvacchedaḥ kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13721: iha tu śākhāntare katipayāṅgavidhānaṃ tāni vidhatte netarāṇi parisaṃcaṣṭe /

GSP33vacbhamu:13726: tataḥ kānīyasā eva devā jyāyasā asurāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13729: śāstrayuktyaparikalpitamatayastāmasavṛttipradhānā asurā asubhiḥ prāṇairanindriyairagṛhītaisteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu ramanta ityasurā ata eva te jyāyāṃsaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13736: hanta asurān yajña udgīthenātyayāma asurān jayāmāsminnābhicārike yajña udgīthalakṣaṇasāmabhaktyupalakṣitenodgātreṇa karmaṇoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13738: ninditvā atha hemamāsanyamāsye ūvamāsanyaṃ mukhāntarbilasthaṃ mukhyaṃ prāṇaṃ prāṇābhimānavatīṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13740: tathetyabhyupagamya tebhya eva prāṇa udagāyat te 'surā viduranena prāṇenodgātrā no 'smān devā atyeṣyantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13741: tamabhidrutya pāpmanāvidhyannasurā yathāśmānamṛtvā prāpya mṛttvālloṣṭo vā vidhvaṃsata evaṃ vidhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco 'surā vineśuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13752: ekatrodgātṛtvenocyate prāṇa ekatra codgānatvena kriyākartrośca sphuṭo bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13757: ekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ dṛṣṭametanna ca tatra vidyābheda ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:13759: bahutararūpapratyabhijñānānugrahāya comityanenāpi udgīthāvayavena udgītha eva lakṣaṇīya iti pūrvapakṣaḥ //6 // 3.3.3.7.
GSP33vacbhamu:13762: tasyaiva codgīthasya punajhapunaḥ saṃkīrtanāllakṣaṇāyāṃ ca chāndogye vājasaneyake
GSP33vacbhamu:13770: evaṃ hi śrūyate-'vivā etaṃ prajayā paśubhirardhayati vardhayatyasya bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya
GSP33vacbhamu:13771: havirniruptaṃ purastāccandramā abhyudeti sa tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye
GSP33vacbhamu:13772: dātre puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapedye sthiviṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścaruṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13773: ye kṣodiṣṭhāstān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13774: tatra saṃdehaḥ-kiṃ kālārādhe yāgāntaramidaṃ codyata uta teṣveva karmasu prakṛteṣu kālāparādhe nimitte devatāpanaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13775: eṣa tāvadatra viṣayaḥ-amāvāsyāyāmeva darśakarmārthaṃ vedikriyāgnipraṇayanakriyā vratādiśca yajamānasaṃskāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13778: yasya tu yajamānasya kutaścidbhamanibandhanāccaturdaśyāmevāmāvāsyābuddhau pravṛttaprayogasya candramā abhyudīyate tatredaṃ śrūyate-'yasya havirniruptam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13779: tena yajamānenābhyuditenāmāvāsyāyāmeva nimittādhikāraṃ parisamāpya purastadahareva vedyuddharaṇādikarma kṛtvā pratipadi darśaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13780: tatrābhāyudaye kiṃ naimittikamidaṃ karmāntaraṃ darśāccodyata uta tasminneva darśakarmaṇi pūrvadevatāpanayanena devanāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13782: yadi hi pūrvadevatābhyo havīṃṣi vibhajediti śrūyate tatastānyeva havīṃṣi devatāntareṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:13783: yujyamānāni na karmāntaraṃ gamayitumarhanti kintu prakṛtameva karma taddhaviṣkamapanītapūrtadevatākaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13785: atra punastredhā taṇḍulān vibhajediti haviṣa eva madhyamādikrameṇa vibhāgaśravaṇādanapanītā
GSP33vacbhamu:13786: haviṣi pūrvadevatā iti pūrvadavatāvaruddhe haviṣi devatāntaramalabdhāvakāśaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13788: apica prāpte pūrvasmin karmaṇi dadhnastaṇḍulānāṃ cendrādidevatā saṃbandhaśca vidhātavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13789: carutvaṃ cātra vihitaṃ nāstīti tadapiva vidhātavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13791: karmāntaraṃ tvapūrvaṃ śakyamekenaiva prayatnenānekaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ vidhātumiti nimitte karmāntarameva vidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13792: darśastu lupyate kālāparādhāditi prāpta ucyate-na karmāntaram /
GSP33vacbhamu:13795: bhavedetadevaṃ yadā tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajediti taṇḍulānāṃ tredhā vibhāgavidhānaparametadvākyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13796: syādapi tu vākyāntaraprāptaṃ taṇḍulānāṃ tredhātvamanūdya vibhajedityetāvadvidhatte
GSP33vacbhamu:13797: tatra vākyānyapanīte pūrvavat devatāsaṃbandhe haviṣastasminneva karmaṇyapratyūhaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13799: tathāca dravyamukhena prakṛtamukhapratyabhijñānāt devatāntarasaṃbandhe 'pi na karmāntarakalpanābhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13800: tataśca samāpte 'pi naimittikādhikārasiddhyarthaṃ tānyeva punaḥ karmāṇyanuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:13802: prakṛte hi karmaṇi taṇḍulapeṣaṇaprathanaṃ puroḍāśapākādi dadhipayasī ca prāptāni
GSP33vacbhamu:13803: tatrābhyudayanimitte dadhiyuktānāṃ payoyuktānāṃ ca taṇḍulānāṃ vibhajediti vākyena
GSP33vacbhamu:13804: pūrvadevatāpanayaṃ kṛtvā ye madhyamā ityādibhirvākyairdevatāntarasaṃbandhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13806: iti puroḍāśanivṛttau tadarthasya prathanasyāpi nivṛttiranivṛttastu pāko 'pavādābhāvāttathā cārthaprāptaścodyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13809: tasmāttadevedaṃ karma na tu karmāntaramiti siddham /

GSP33vacbhamu:13814: atra hi amāvāsyāmiṣṭveti samāpte yāge paśukāmeṣṭividhānaṃ nātra pūrvasya karmaṇo 'nanuvṛtteryāgāntaravidhiriti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13817: parasmāt paro varācca varīyāniti parovarīyānudgīthaḥ paramātmarūpaḥ saṃpannaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13819: paramātmadṛṣṭimudgīthe bhavayitum 'ākāśo hyevaibhyo bhūtebhyo jyāyān' ityākāśaśabdena paramātmānaṃ nirdiśati //7 // 3.3.3.8.
GSP33vacbhamu:13823: saṃjñaikatvaṃ tu śrutibāhyatayā bahiraṅgaṃ ca pauruṣeyatayā sāpekṣaṃ ca /
