GSP33vacbhamu:13829: evaṃ pratimāyāṃ vāsudevabuddhirnāmni ca brahmabuddhistathoṅkāga udgīthabuddhivyapadeśāviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13834: vyākhyāyāṃ ca paryāyāṇamapi sahaprayogo yathā sindhuraḥ karī pikaḥ kokila iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13839: pratyanuvākaṃ pratyṛcamupakrame ca samāptau cokāraḥ sardavedavyāpīti kiṅgato 'yamoṅkārastattadāpyādiguṇaviśiṣṭastasmai
GSP33vacbhamu:13844: dṛṣṭaśca samudāyaśabdo 'vayave lakṣaṇayā yathā grāmo dagdhaḥ paṭo dagdha iti tadekadeśadāhe /
GSP33vacbhamu:13851: lakṣaṇāyā hi lakṣaṇīyaparatvaṃ padasya tasyaiva vākyārthāntarbhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13852: yathā gāṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa iti lakṣyamāṇasya tīrasya vākyārthe 'ntarbhāvo 'dhikaraṇatayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13853: gaurvāhīka ityatra tu gosaṃbandhitīṣṭhanmūtrapurīṣādilakṣaṇayā na tatparatvaṃ gośabdasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:13859: evaṃ hi vijñānāndayorapi sphuṭataraḥ pravṛttinimittabhedaḥ satyapi brahmaṇyaikārthye /
GSP33vacbhamu:13864: saṃnidhānābhāvānna kauṣītakiprāṇasaṃvādavākye prāṇasya vasiṣṭhatvādibhirguṇairupāsyatvamapi tu jyeṣṭhatreṣṭhatvamātreṇeti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13865: siddhāntastu-satyaṃ saṃnihitaṃ parāmṛśati evaṅkāro na tu śabdopāttamātraṃ saṃnihitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13866: kintu yacchabdābhihitārthanāntarīyakatayā prāptaṃ tadapi hi buddhau saṃnihitaṃ saṃnihitameva /
GSP33vacbhamu:13867: yathā 'yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati' ityavyabhicāritakratusamanvayayā juhvopasthāpitaḥ kratuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13869: saṃnidhānātprakṛtaparāmarśinaivaṅkāreṇa parāmarśo yukta iti siddhaṃ kauṣītakibrāhmaṇagatena
GSP33vacbhamu:13874: kevalasya śrutasya hāniritarasahitasya cākṣutasya kalpanā na cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13882: nahi brahmaṇo dharmiṇaḥ sattve kaścidviśeṣa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13886: vidheyastu puruṣaprayatnatantraḥ puruṣaprayatnaśca yatra yāvadguṇaviśiṣṭe brahmaṇi coditaḥ sa tāvatyevāvatiṣṭhate nāvihitamapi guṇaṃ cotarīkartumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:13888: tasmādānandavijñānādayo brahmatattvātmatayoktā yatra yatra brahma śrūyate tatra tatrānuktā api labhyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:13898: tatra pratyekamarthādiparatvapratipādanaśruteḥ śrūyamāṇatattatparatve ca saṃbhavati na tattadatikarme sarveṣāmekaparatvādhyavasānaṃ nyāṭyam
GSP33vacbhamu:13906: puruṣaṃ nirguṇaṃ prāpya kālasaṃkhyā na vidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13909: vākyānīti prāptaya ucyate-indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā ityeṣa tāvatsaṃdarbho vastutattvapratipādanaparaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13912: tadatra yatpratyasya sākṣātprayojanavattvaṃ dṛśyate tatpratyayaparatvaṃ sarveṣām /
GSP33vacbhamu:13926: puruṣaśabdavācyasya cātmanaḥ svayaṃ śrutyaiva duradhigamatvāvadhāraṇādvastutaśca duradhigamatvādarthādīnāṃ ca sugamatvāttatparatvamevārthādiparatvābhidhānasyetyarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13930: arthādiparatve tu svarūpeṇa vivakṣite nāpekṣitaṃ śrutirācaṣṭe ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:13940: apica tābhyo gāmānayadityādayaśca vyavahāraḥ śrutyoktā viśeṣavatsvātmaparamātmaṣu prasiddhāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13942: ātmaśabdaprayogaścātrāpi dṛṣṭastasmādaparātmābhilāpo 'yamiti prāpta ucyati-paramātmano gṛhītiriha yathā itareṣu sṛṣṭiśravaṇeṣu 'etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' ityādiṣu /
GSP33vacbhamu:13944: etadabhisaṃhitam-mukhyaṃ tāvat sargātprākkevalatvamātmapadatvaṃ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ ca parameśvarasyātra bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13947: ākāśapūrvikāyāṃ vastuto brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭau yathā kkacittejaḥpūrvakasṛṣṭyabhidhānaṃ na virudhyate 'etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' iti darśanāt
GSP33vacbhamu:13948: ākāśaṃ vāyuṃ sṛṣṭveti hi tatra pūrayitavyamevahāpi mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭveti kalpanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13949: sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena jñānasya śrutisidvyarthamaśrutopalabdhau yatnavatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ śrute mahābhūtāditve sargasya śaithilyamādaraṇīyam
GSP33vacbhamu:13950: apica svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇo vedarāśiradhyayanavidhyāpāditaprayojanavadarthamabhidadhāno yathā yathā prayojanādhikyamāpnoti tathā tathānumanyatetarām
GSP33vacbhamu:13954: naca lokasargo 'pi hiraṇyagarbhavyāpāro 'pi tu tadanupraviṣṭasya paramātmana ityatraivoktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13956: bhedajātaṃ mahābhūtaiḥ sahānukamya brahmapratiṣṭhatvena brahmaṇa upasaṃhārādbrahmābhilāpatvamevāsyeti niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13957: yatra tu puruṣavidhādiśravaṇaṃ tasya bhavettvanyaparatvaṃ gatyantarābhāvāditi sarvamavadātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13960: tatra sacchabdasyāviśeṣeṇātmani cānātmani ca pravṛtternātmārthatvaṃ kintu samastavastvanugatasattāsāmānyārthatvaṃ tathā copakramabhedādbhinnārthatvam
GSP33vacbhamu:13961: sa ātmā tattvamasīti copasaṃhāra upakramānurodhena saṃpattyarthatayā vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13963: tadvijñānena ca sarvavijñānaṃ mahāsāmānyasya sattāyāḥ samastavastuvistāravyāpitvādityevaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13964: prāpta ucyate-ātmagṛhītirvājasaneyināmiva chāndogyānāmapyuttarātma ātmā tattvamasīti tādātmyopadeśāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13965: astu tāvadātmavyātiriktasya prapañcasya sadasattvābhyāmanirvācyatayā na sattvaṃ sattvaṃ tvātmadhātoreva tattvena nirvācyatvāttasmādātmaiva sanniti
GSP33vacbhamu:13967: sacchabdasya sattāsāmānyābhidhāyitvātprativyakti ca tasya pravṛtterātmani cānyatra ca sacchabdapravṛtteḥ saṃśaye satyupasaṃhārānurodhena sadevetyātmanyevāvasthāpyate
GSP33vacbhamu:13968: nītārthopakramānurodhena hyupasaṃhāravarṇanā na punaḥ saṃdigdhārthenopakrameṇopasaṃhāro varṇanīyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13971: na khalvākārādvṛkṣe jñāte śiṃśapādayastadviśeṣā jñātā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13973: atra ca pūrvasmin pūrvapakṣe hiraṇyagarbhopāsanā siddhānte tu brahmabhāvaneti //16 // 3.3.8.17. // 17 // 3.3.9.18.
GSP33vacbhamu:13977: ananaṃ prāṇanaṃ anaḥ prāṇaḥ taṃ prāṇamanagnaṃ kurvantaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13979: manyanta iti mananaṃ jñānaṃ tadvyānaparyantamiti cintanamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13982: khuraravamātreṇāpātata ubhayavidhānapakṣaṃ gṛhītvā madhyamaṃ pakṣamālambate pūrvapakṣī-
GSP33vacbhamu:13986: ayamabhisandhiḥ-yadyapi smārtaṃ prāyatyārthamācamanamasti tathāpi prāṇopāsanaprakaraṇe 'vidhānāttadaṅgatvenāprāptamiti vidhānamarthavadbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:13987: anṛtavadanapratiṣedha iva smārte jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe samāmnāto nānṛtaṃ vadediti pratiṣedho jyotiṣṭomāṅgatayārthavāniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13998: iha tu smārtamācamanaṃ sakalakarmāṅgatayā vihitaṃ prāṇopāsanāṅgamapīti vyāpakena smārtenācamanavidhinā punaruktatvādanarthakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13999: naca smārtasyānena paunarukyaṃ tasya ca vyāpakatvādetasya ca pratiniyaviṣayatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14009: na cānagnatāsaṃkalpo 'nyataḥ prāpto yataḥ stāvako bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:14012: api caikasya karmaṇa ekārthataivetyucitaṃ tasya balavatpramāṇavaśādananyagatitve satyanekārthatā kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14013: saṃkalpe tu karmāntare vidhīyamāne nāyaṃ doṣa ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:14017: yathā hi śvādimaryādasyānnasyāttumaśakyatvādannadṛṣṭiścodyate evamihāpyapāṃ paridhānāsaṃbhavāddṛṣṭireva codyata ityannadṛṣṭividhisāhacaryādgamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:14018: aśabdatvaṃ ca yadyapi dṛṣṭyabhyavahārayostulyaṃ tathāpi dṛṣṭiḥ śābdadṛśyanāntarīyakatayā sākṣācchabdena kriyamāṇopalabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14020: kiñca chāndogyānāṃ vājasaneyināṃ cācamane prāyeṇācāmantīti vartamānāpadeśaḥ evaṃ yatrāpi vidhivibhaktistatrāpi jartilayavāgvavā vā juhuyāditivadvidhitvamavivakṣitam
GSP33vacbhamu:14028: tasmātsamidho yajatītyādivadabhyāsādupāsanābheda iti prāpta ucyate-aikakarmyamekatvena pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14030: tatra bhūyāṃso guṇā yasya karmaṇo vidhīyante tatra tasya pradhānasya vidhiritaratra tu tadanuvādena katipayaguṇavidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14031: yathā yatra chatracāmarapatākāhāstikāścīyaśaktikayāṣṭīkadhānuṣkakārpāṇikaprāsikapadātipracayastatrāsti rājeti gamyate na tu katipayagajavājipadātibhāji tadamātye, tathehāpi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14037: yadyekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ tattvena pratyabhijñānādupāsanasya tatra vihitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃkaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14040: satyasya ca pradhānasya prakṛtatvādadhidaivamityasya viśeṣaṇatayopasarjanatvenāprastutvātprastutasya ca satyasyābhedātpūrvavadguṇasaṃkaraḥ //20
GSP33vacbhamu:14043: satyaṃ yatra svarūpamātrasaṃbandho dharmāṇāṃ śrūyate tatraivaṃ svarūpasya pratyabhijñāyamānatvāttanmātrasaṃbandhitvācca dharmāṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:14044: yatra tu saviśeṣaṇaṃ pradhānamavagamyate tatra saviśeṣaṇasyaiva tasya dharmābhisaṃbandho na nirviśeṣaṇasya nāṭyanyaviśeṣaṇasahitasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:14047: yathā cācāryasya gacchato 'nugamanaṃ vihitaṃ na tiṣṭhato bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:14054: brahma bhūtānāṃ prathamaṃ tu jajñe tenārhati brahmaṇā spardhituṃ kaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14055: ' brahma jyeṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni brahmajyeṣṭhā jajñe āsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:14056: yadyapi tāsu tāsu śāṇḍilyādividyāsvāyatanabhedaparigraheṇādhyatmikāyatanatvaṃ saṃbhṛtyādīnāṃ guṇānāmādhidaikatvamityāyatanabhedaḥ pratibhāti,
GSP33vacbhamu:14058: ca vidyāsvāyatanāśravaṇādantato brahmāśrayatayā sāmyena pratyabhijñāsaṃbhavāt saṃbṛtyādīnāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14059: guṇānāṃ śāṇḍilyādividyāsu ṣoḍaśakalādividyāsu copasaṃhāra iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14060: rāddhāntastu-mithaḥ samānaguṇaśravaṇaṃ pratyabhijñāya yadvidyā apūrvānapi tatrāśrutānguṇānupasaṃhārayati
GSP33vacbhamu:14062: yā tu kācidādhidaivikī vibhūtiḥ śāṇḍilyādividyāyaṃ śrūyate tasmāstatprakaraṇādhīnatvāttāvanmātraṃ grahīṣyate naitāvanmātreṇa saṃbhṛtyādīnanukraṣṭumarhati
GSP33vacbhamu:14068: tasmātsaṃbhṛtiśca dyuvyāptiśca tadidaṃ saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyapi cātaḥ pratyabhijñānābhāvānna śāṇḍilyādividyāsūpasaṃhriyata iti siddham //23 // 3.3.13.24.
GSP33vacbhamu:14073: yajñasya svarūpaṃ yajamānastasya ca cetanatvādviduṣa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14075: evaṃ prāpta ucyate yādṛśaṃ tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca puruṣayajñasaṃpādanaṃ tadāyuṣaśca tredhā vyavasthitasya savanatrayasaṃpādanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14083: ātmanastu cetanasya yajamānatvaṃ ca vidvattvaṃ copapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14084: tathā cāyamarthaḥ-evaṃ viduṣaḥ puruṣasya yaḥ saṃbandhī yajñaḥ tasya saṃbandhitayā
GSP33vacbhamu:14085: yajamāna ātmā tathā cātmano yajamānatvaṃ ca vidvatsaṃbandhitā ca yajñasya mukhye
GSP33vacbhamu:14086: syātāmitarachātmaśabdasya svarūpavācitve viduṣo yajñasyeti ca yajamāno yajñasvarūpamiti ca gauṇe syātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:14088: tasmātpuruṣayajñatā taittirīye nāstīti tayā tāvanna sāmyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14089: naca patnīyajamānavedavidyādisaṃpādanaṃ taittirīyāṇāmivi tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ vā vidyate savanasaṃpattirapyeṣāṃ vilakṣaṇaiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:14091: apica tasyaivaṃ viduṣa ityanuvādaśrutau satyāmanekārthavidhāne vākyabhedadoṣaprasaktirityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14092: api ceyaṃ paiṅgināṃ tāṇḍināṃ ca puruṣayajñavidyāphalāntarayuktā svatantrā pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14099: ātharvaṇikādyupaniṣadārambhe te te mantrāstāni tāni ca pravargyādīti karmāṇi samamnātīni /
GSP33vacbhamu:14104: saphalā hi sarvā vidyā āmnātāstatsannidhau mantrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14105: karmāṇi ca samāmnātāni 'phalavatsannidhāphalaṃ tadaṅgam' iti nyāyādvidyāṅgābhāvena vijñāyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:14109: nahi yathā darśapūrṇamāsāvārabhya samidādayaḥ samāmrātāstathā kāñcidvidyāmārabhya mantrā vā karmāṇi vā samāmrātāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:14111: naca śrutasvāṅgaparipūrṇā vidyā etānākāṅkṣitumarhati yena prakaraṇāpaditasāmānyasaṃbandhānāṃ saṃnidhirviśeṣasaṃbandhāyā bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14115: mantrāṇāṃ tu svādhyāyavidhyāpāditapuruṣārthabhāvanāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca pravargyādīnāṃ svavidhyāpāditapuruṣārthabhāvānāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14117: tatrāpi ca vidyānāṃ phalavattvāttādarthyamaphalānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:14121: idaṃ khalu nivṛttākāṅkṣāyā vidyāyāḥ saṃnidhāne śrutamanākāṅkṣāyā sākāṅkṣasyāpi saṃbaddhumasāmarthyāttasyā apyākāhkṣāmutthāpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14123: asamarthasya copakārakatvānupapatteḥ prakaraṇinaṃ prati upakārasāmarthyamātmanaḥ kalpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14124: naca satyapi sāmarthye tatra śrutyā aviniyuktaṃ sadaṅgatāmupagantumarhatītyanayā paramparayā saṃnidhiḥ śrutimarthāpattyā kalpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14127: prayogasamavetārthaprakāśanena hi mantrāṇāmupayogo varṇitaḥ 'aviśiṣṭastu vākyārthaḥ' ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:14129: yadyapi ca pravargyo na kiñcidārabhya śrūyate tathāpi vākyasaṃyogena kratusaṃyogena kratusaṃbandhaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14132: yadyapi jyotiṣṭomavikṛtāvapi santyupasadastathāpi tatrānumānikyo jyotiṣṭome tu pratyakṣavihitāstena śīghrapravṛttitayā jyotiṣṭomāṅgataiva vākyenāvagamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:14133: apica prakṛtau vihitasya pravargyasya codakenopasadvattadvikṛtāvapi prāptiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14134: prakṛtau vā adviruktatvāditi nyāyājjyotiṣṭome eva vidhānamupasadā saha yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14141: yathā 'agnaye tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi' iti mantre agnaye nirvapāmiti pade karmasamavetārthaprakāśake /
GSP33vacbhamu:14142: śiṣṭānāṃ tu padānāṃ tadekavākyatayā yathākathañcidvyākhyānamevamihāpi hṛdayapadasyopāsanāyāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14143: samavetārthatvāttadanusāreṇa tadekavākyatāpannāpi padāntarāṇi gauṇyā lakṣaṇayā ca
GSP33vacbhamu:14145: naca mantraviniyogo nopāsaneṣu dṛṣṭo yenātyantādṛṣṭaṃ kalpyata ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:14147: yadyapi vākyena balīyasā saṃnidhirdurbalo bādhyate tathāpi virodhe sati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14149: vākyena viniyuktasyāpi jyotiṣṭome pravargyasya saṃnidhinā vidyāyāmapi viniyogasaṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14150: yathā 'brahmavarcasakāmo bṛhaspatisavena yajeta' iti brahmavarcasaphalo 'pi bṛhaspatisavo vājapeyāṅgatvena codyate-vājapeyeneṣṭvā bṛhaspatisavena yajeteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14151: atra hi ktvaḥ samānakartṛkatvamavagamyate dhātusaṃbandhe pratyayavidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14152: dhātvarthāntarasaṃbandhaśca kathaṃ ca samānaḥ kartā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14157: naca guṇapradhānabhāvamantareṇaikaprayogatā saṃbandhaśca tatrāpi vājapeyasya prakaraṇe samāmnānādvājapeyaḥ pradhānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14160: nahyetadvacanaṃ kasyaciddarśapūrṇamāsamya somasya vā prakaraṇe samāmnātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14161: tathāca dvayoḥ sādhikāratayā agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ prati vinigamanābhāvenādhiṣṭhānamātravivakṣayā lākṣaṇikaṃ samānakartṛkatvamityadoṣaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:14164: tathā sati dvayorapi pṛthagadhikāratayā pratītaṃ samapradhānatvamatyaktaṃ bhaveditarathā tu guṇapradhānabhāvena tattyāgo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:14174: ābhicārike tu karmaṇi sarveṣāmarthasamavāya iti kimekapadasamavetārthatā kariṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14177: saṃnidhinācālayitumaśakyatvādevaṃ 'deva savitaḥ prasuva yajñam' ityāderapi yajñaprasavaliṅgasya
GSP33vacbhamu:14178: yajñaṅgatve siddhe jaghanyo vidyāsaṃnidhiḥ kiṃ kariṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14184: tatra tu śrutiliṅgayoḥ samavāye samānaviṣayatvalakṣaṇe virodhe kiṃ balīya iti cintā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14185: atrodāharaṇam-astyaindrī ṛk 'kadācanastarīrasi nendra' ityādikā śrutirviniyokī 'aindrayā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14187: śruteśca gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāto gārhapatyasya śeṣitvaṃ aindriyeti catṛtīyāśruteraindyā ṛcaḥ śeṣatvamavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14188: yadyapi gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāśruterāgneyīmṛcaṃ prati gārhapatyasya śeṣitvenopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14189: yadyapi caindrayeti ca tṛtīyāśruteraindrayā indraṃ prati śeṣatvanopapatteravirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14190: padāntarasaṃbandhe tu vākyasyaiva liṅgena virodho na tu śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14193: dvitīyātṛtīyāśrutī hi kārakavibhaktitayā kriyāṃ prati prakṛtyarthasya karmakaraṇabhāvamavagamayata iti viniyojike /
GSP33vacbhamu:14194: kriyāṃ prati hi karmaṇaḥ śeṣitvaṃ karaṇasya ca śeṣatvamiti hi viniyogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14195: padāntarānapekṣe ca kriyāṃ prati śeṣaśeṣitve śrutimātrātpratiyete iti śraute /
GSP33vacbhamu:14199: tasmādvākyalabhyaṃ viśiṣamapekṣya śrautaḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāvo liṅgena virudhyata iti śrutiliṅgavirodhe
GSP33vacbhamu:14200: kiṃ liṅgānuguṇena gārhatvamiti dvitīyāśrutiḥ saptamyarthe vyākhyāyatāṃ gārhapatyasamīpe
GSP33vacbhamu:14203: prabhavati hi svocitāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gārhapatya itīndra indarteraiśvaryavacanatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14205: no khalu yatrāsamarthaṃ tacchutisahasreṇāpi tatra viniyoktuṃ śakyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14208: taccāsyā ṛcaḥ pramāṇāntarataḥ śabdataśca indre pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14211: tasmāddārudahanasyeva dahanasya saliladahane viniyogo gārhapatye viniyoga aindrayāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14214: tasmādaindrayendra eva gārhapatyasamīpa upasthātavya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-'liṅgajñānaṃ purodhāya na śrutervinayoktṛtā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14216: yadi hi sāmarthyamavagamya śruterviniyogamavadhārayetpramātā tataḥ śruterviniyogaṃ prati liṅgajñānāpekṣatvāddurbalatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:14219: avagate tu tato viniyoge nāsamarthasya sa iti tannirvāhāya sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14222: viniyoge tu siddhe tadanyathānupapattyā paścātpratīyata iti śrutiviniyogātparācīnā sāmarthyapratītistadanurodhenāvasthāpanīyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14223: liṅgaṃ tu na svato viniyojakamapi tu viniyokīṃ kalpyitvā śrutim /
GSP33vacbhamu:14224: tathāhi-na svarasato liṅgādanenendra upasthātavya iti pratīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:14225: kintvīdṛgindra iti tasya tu prakaraṇāmnānasāmartyāt sāmānyataḥ prakaraṇāpatitaidamarthyasya
GSP33vacbhamu:14229: nahi trayo 'tra brahmaṇāḥ kaṭhakauṇḍinyāviti vākyaṃ pramāṇāntaropasthāpitena māṭhareṇopapādayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:14238: śrutyā gārhapatye viniyogaḥ siddha iti nivṛttākāṅkṣaṃ prakaramamiti kasyānupapattyā
GSP33vacbhamu:14242: pramite tu pramātṛṇāṃ pramautsukyaṃ vihanyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14243: tasmātpratītaśrautaviniyogopapattyai mantrasya sāmarthye tadanuguṇatvena nīyamānaṃ prathamāṃ vṛttimajahajjaghanyayāpi neyamiti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:14244: liṅgavākyayoriha virodho yathā-'syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suśeṣaṃ kalpyāmi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14245: tasminsīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamānaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14246: kimayaṃ kṛtsna eva mantraḥ sadanakaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca prayoktavya uta kalpyāmyanta upastaraṇe tasmintsīdetyevamādistu puroḍāśāsādana iti
GSP33vacbhamu:14247: yadi vākyaṃ balīyaḥ kṛtsnau mantra ubhayatra,
GSP33vacbhamu:14248: suśevaṃ kalpyāmītyetadapekṣo hi tasminsīdetyādiḥ pūrveṇaikavākyatāmupaiti yatkalpayāmi tasmintsīdeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14249: atha liṅgaṃ balīyastataḥ kalpyāmyantaḥ sadanakaraṇe tatprakāśane hi tatsamartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:14252: liṅgādvākyaṃ balīya ityubhayatra kṛtsnasya viniyoga iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14253: iha hi yattatpadasamabhivyāhāreṇa vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvādekavākyatāyāṃ siddhāyāṃ tadanurodhena paścāttadabhidhānasāmārthyaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14254: yathā devasyatvetimantre 'gnye nirvapāmīti padayoḥ samavetārthatvena tadekavākyatayā padāntarāṇāṃ tatparatvena tatra sāmarthyakalpanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14255: tadevaṃ pratītaikavākyatānirvāhāya tadanuguṇatayā sāmarthyaṃ kḷptaṃ sanna tadvyāpādayitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:14256: api tu viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ mantraḥ prayoktavya iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14258: tu avadhṛtasāmarthyānāṃ padānāṃ praśliṣṭapāṭhitānāṃ sāmarthyavaśena prayojanaikatvenekavākyatvāvadhāraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14259: yavanti padāni pradhānamekamarthamavagamayituṃ samarthāni vibhāge sākāṅkṣāṇi tānyekaṃ vākyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14262: tayośca sadanakaraṇaṃ kalpayāmyanto mantraḥ samarthaḥ prakāśayituṃ puroḍāśāsādanaṃ ca tasminsīdetyādiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14263: tataśca yāvadekavākyatāvaśena sāmarthyamanumīyate tāvatpratītaṃ sāmarthyamekaikasya bhāgasyaikaikasminnarthe viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ kalpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14264: tathāca śrutyaivaikaikasya bhāgasyaikatra viniyoge sati prakaraṇapāṭhopapattau na
GSP33vacbhamu:14265: vākyakalpitaṃ liṅgaṃ viniyojikāṃ śrutimaparāṃ kalpayitumarhatītyekavākyatābuddhirutpannāpyābhāsībhavati liṅgena bādhanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14266: yatra tu virodhakaṃ liṅgaṃ nāsti tatra samavetārthaikadvitripadaikavākyatā padāntarāṇāmapi sāmarthyaṃ kalpayatīti bhavati vākyasya viniyojakatvam
GSP33vacbhamu:14270: atra ca padānāṃ parasparāpekṣāvaśātkasmiṃścidviśiṣṭa ekasminnarthe paryavasitānāṃ vākyatvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14271: labdhavākyabhāvanāṃ ca punaḥ kāryāntarāpekṣāvaśena vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14272: kartavyāyāḥ khalu phalabhāvanāyā labdhadhātvarthakaraṇāyā itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyā vacanaṃ prakaraṇamācakṣate vṛddhāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14275: tadetasmin svapadagaṇena kiyatyapyarthe paryavasite karaṇopakāralakṣaṇakāryāntarāpekṣāyāṃ 'samidho yajati' ityādivākyāntarasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14276: samidādibhāvanā hi svavidhyupahitāḥ puruṣe hitaṃ bhāvyapekṣamāṇā viśvajitryāyena vānuṣaṅgato vārthavādato vā phalāntarāpratilambhena darśapūrṇamāsabhāvanāṃ nirvārayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14277: tasmāttadakāṅkṣāyāmupanipatitānyetāni vākyāni svakāryāpekṣāṇi tadapekṣitakaraṇopakāralakṣaṇaṃ kāryamasādya nirvaṇvanti ca nirvārayanti ca pradhānam
GSP33vacbhamu:14281: taśca na mitha ekavākyatāṃ gantumarhantīti liṅgena paurṇamāsīyāgādindrāgnīśabda utkraṣṭavyaḥ amāvāsyāyāṃ ca samavetārtatvātprayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14282: athedānīṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ yadindrāgnipadaikavākyatayā pratīyate 'avivṛdhethāṃ maho jyāyo 'kātām' iti tannotākraṣṭavyamutendrāgniśabdābhyāṃ sahotkraṣṭavyamiti
GSP33vacbhamu:14283: tatra yadi prakaraṇaṃ balīyastato 'panītadevatāko 'pi śeṣaḥ prayoktavyo 'tha vākyaṃ tato tatra devatāśabdastatraiva prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14288: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi viniyojyasvarūpasāmarthyamanapekṣya prakaramaṃ viniyojayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:14289: api tu viniyogāya tadapekṣaye 'nyathā pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrasya dvadaśopasattāyāśca notkarṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14290: tadrūpālocanāyāṃ ca tadyadeva śīghraṃ pratīyate tattadvalavadviprakṛṣṭaṃ tu durbalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14291: tatra yadi tadrūpaṃ śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vānyatra viniyuktaṃ tataḥ prakaramaṃ bhaṅktvotkṛṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:14293: atha svasya śīghrapravṛttaṃ śrutyādi nāsti tataḥ prakaramaṃ viniyojakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14299: yāvaditaratra vākyena sāmarthyaṃ tāvaditaratra sāmarthyena śrutistāvadiha śrutyā
GSP33vacbhamu:14300: viniyogastāvatā ca vicchinnāyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrutyanumāne vihate prakaraṇenāntarā kalpitaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14309: gāmānaya prasādaṃ paśyeti gāmityasya kriyāmātrāpekṣiṇaḥ paśyetyanenāpi saṃbandhasaṃbhavādvinigamanābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14313: ayameti putro rājñaḥ puruṣo 'pasāryatāmityatra rājña ityasya putrapuruṣapadasaṃnidhānāviśeṣānmā bhūdavinigamanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14315: atra putraśabdasya saṃbandhivacanatayā samutthitākāṅkṣasyāntike yadupanipatitaṃ saṃbandhyantarākāṅkṣaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14316: padaṃ tasya tenaivākāṅkṣāparipūrteḥ puruṣapadena puruṣarūpamātrābhidhāyinā svatantreṇaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:14320: tathā cākāṅkṣitamapi na yāvatsaṃnidhāpyate tāvanna saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14321: tathā saṃnihitamapi yāvannākāṅkṣyate na tāvatsaṃbadhyata iti dvayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ prati
GSP33vacbhamu:14324: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-rājasūyake kathaṃbhāvāpekṣā hi pavitrādārabhya kṣatrasya dhṛtiṃ yāvadanuvartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14326: anirjñātaphalaṃ karma tasya prakaraṇāṅgatā ' iti nyāyādrājasūyāṅgatā śaunaḥśopopākhyānādīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:14327: abhiṣecanīyasya tu svavākyopāttapadārthanirākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhipāṭhenākāṅkṣotthāpanīyā yāvattāvatsiddhākāṅkṣeṇa rājasūyenaikavākyatā kalpyate
GSP33vacbhamu:14328: yāvaccābhiṣecanīyaikavākyatayā liṅgaṃ kalpyate tāvatkḷptaliṅgaṃ viniyokrīṃ śrutiṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14329: kalpyati yāvadvākyakalpitena liṅgena śrutiritaratra kalpte tāvatkḷptayā śrutyā viniyoge
GSP33vacbhamu:14333: tasmātprakaraṇavirodhe kramasya bādha eva naca vikalpo durbalatvāditi siddham //
GSP33vacbhamu:14334: kramasamākhyayorvirodhodāharaṇam-pauroḍāśika iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sānnāṭyakrame ca śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya karmaṇa iti śundhanārtho mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14335: tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ samākhyānasya balīyastvātpuroḍāśapātrāṇāṃ śundhena viniyoktavyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14338: samākhyānāṃ balīya iti pauroḍāśikaśabdena hi puroḍāśasaṃbandhīnītyucyante tānyadhikṛtya pravṛttaṃ kāṇḍaṃ pauroḍāśikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14339: tataśca yāvatkrameṇa prakaraṇādyanumānaparamparayā saṃbandhaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ yāvatsamākhyayā
GSP33vacbhamu:14340: śrutyaiva sākṣādeva sa pratipādita iti arthaviprakarṣeṇa kramātsamākhyaiva balīyasīti
GSP33vacbhamu:14341: puroḍāśapātraśundhena mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ na sānnāṭyapātraśundhana iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14343: tathāhi-samākhyā na tāvatsaṃbandhasya vācikā kintu pauroḍāśaviśiṣṭaṃ kāṇḍamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:14344: tadviśiṣṭatvānyathānupapattyā tava saṃbandhaḥ kāṇḍasyānumīyate na tu sākṣānmantrabedasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:14346: na cāsau saṃbandho 'pi śrutyaiva śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14352: viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ sānnāṭyakramaḥ sānnāṭyaṃ prati prakaraṇādyanumānadvāreṇa viniyogaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14355: tathāhi-samākhyā saṃbandhanibandhanā sati tatsidhyarthaṃ saṃnidhimupakalpayati yāvattādvaidikena pratyakṣadṛṣṭena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate
GSP33vacbhamu:14356: yāvacca kḷptena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate tāvaditaratra kḷptayākāṅkṣayaikavākyatā tāvaditaratraikavākyatayā kḷptayopakārasāmarthyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14358: yāvadatra liṅgena viniyojikā śrutistāvaditaratra kḷptayā śrutyā viniyoga iti tāvataiva
GSP33vacbhamu:14359: prakaraṇapāṭhopapatteḥ sarvaṃ samākhyānakalpitaṃ vicchinnamūlatvāttūyamānaśasyamiva nirbījaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14364: tatrāpi ca 'bādhikaiva śrutirnityaṃ samākhyā bādhyate sadā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14367: tadvayaṃ vistarādbibhyato 'pi prathamatantrānabhijñānukampayā nidhrā vistare patitāḥ sma ityuparamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14368: tasmādyathānujñāpanānujñayoḥ prajñātakramayorupahūta upahūyasvetyevaṃ mantravāmnātau deśasāmānyāttathaivāṅgatayā prāpnutaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14369: upahūta iti liṅgato 'nujñāmantro nānujñāpane upahūyasveti ca liṅgato 'nujñāpano ca mantro nānujñāyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:14370: tadiha liṅgena kramaṃ bādhitvā viparītaṃ śeṣatvamāpādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14371: yāvaddhi sthānena prakaraṇamutpādyaikavākyatvaṃ kalpyate tāvalliṅgena śrutiṃ kalpayitvā sādhito viniyoga iti akalpitaliṅgaśruteḥ kramasya bādhaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:14372: tadvidihāpi viniyoge pratyekāntaritena liṅgena caturantaritasya vidyākramasya bādha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14373: yadyapi prathamatantra evāyamartha upapāditastathāpi virodhe tadupapādanamiha tvavirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14376: athaiva pratītivirodho naca vastuvirodhaḥ sa vidyāyāṃ viniyoge 'pi tulyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14382: upapādite tu śrutyādibiḥ prakaraṇapāṭhe kṣīṇatvādarthāpatteḥ kramo na svocitāṃ pramāmutpādayitumarhati pramityābhāvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14384: saṃyogapṛthaktvena viniyuktamapi viniyojayantī na śakyā śrutyantareṇa niroddhuṃ svapramāmiti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14388: tulyabalatayā bṛhaspatisamasya tulyatāśaṅkāpākaraṇadvāreṇa samuccayo na tu pṛthaguktitayā parasparāpekṣatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14392: yatra hānopāyane śrūyete tatrāvivādaḥ saṃnipāte yatrāpyupāyanamātraśravaṇaṃ tatrāpi nāntarīyakatayā hānamākṣiptamityasti saṃnipātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14393: yatra tu hānamātraṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ śrutaṃ na śrūyate upāyanaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14404: nanu yathopāyanaṃ śrutaṃ hānamupasthāpayatyevaṃ hānamapi upāyanamityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:14406: grahaṇaṃ hi na svāmino 'pagamamantareṇa bhavatīti grahaṇādapagamasiddhiravaśyaṃbhāvinī /
GSP33vacbhamu:14407: apagamastvasatyapyanyena grahaṇe dṛṣṭo yathā prāyaścittenāpagatirenasa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14411: ayamasyārthaḥ-karmāntare vihitaṃ hi na karmāntara upasaṃhriyate pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14412: yatpunarna vidhīyate kintu stutyarthaṃ siddhatayā saṃkīrtyate tadasati bādhake devatādhikaraṇanyāyena śabdataḥ pratīyamānaṃ parityaktumaśakyam
GSP33vacbhamu:14413: tathāca vidhūtayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayornirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmaśvaromādivatkiṃ bhavatvityākāṅkṣāyāṃ na tāvatprāyaścitteneva tadvilayasaṃbhavastathā satyaśvaromarāhudṛṣṭāntānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14417: tasmādarthavādasyāpekṣāyāṃ śabdasaṃnidhikṛto 'pi viśeṣa upāyanaṃ buddhau saṃnidhāpayituṃ śakrotyapekṣāṃ pūrayitumiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14425: yadyapyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyasya phalaṃ prayacchataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14426: yathā putrasya śrāddhakarma pitustṛptiṃ yathā ca piturvaiśvānarīyeṣṭiḥ putrasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:14428: tathāpyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte sākṣādanyasminna saṃbhavata ityāśayena śaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14434: prayojanaṃ copāsake sauhārdamācaritavyaṃ na svasauhārdamiti chanda evācchanda ācchādanādācchabdo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14445: 'api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyāṭyatvādvikalpasya vidhīnāmekadeśaḥ syāt' ityetadeva sūtramarthadvāreṇa paṭhati-
GSP33vacbhamu:14446: api tu vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥsyātsa cānyāṭya iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14447: evaṃ kila śrūyate-'eṣa vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryajñe yajñe 'nvāyatta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14451: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ vidhipratiṣedhayorvikalpa uta paryudāso 'nuyājavarjiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14453: dṛṣṭaṃ hi tādātvikīmasya sundaratāṃ gamayati nāyatau doṣavattāṃ niṣedhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14455: niṣedhaśāstraṃ tu tādātvikaṃ saundaryamabādhamānameva pravṛttyunmukhaṃ naraṃ nivārayadāyatyāmasya duḥkhaphalatvamavagamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14457: tato gārataḥ pravṛttamapyāyatyāṃ duḥkhato vibhyataṃ puruṣaṃ śaknoti nivārayitumiti balīyayān śāstrīyaḥ pratiṣedho gārataḥ pravṛtteriti na tayā vikalpamarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14462: naca vācyaṃ yāvadyajatiṣu yeyajāmahakaraṇaṃ yāvadyajatisāmānyadvāreṇānuyājaṃ yajativiśeṣamupasarpati
GSP33vacbhamu:14463: tāvadanuyājagatena niṣedhena tanniṣiddhamiti śīghrapravṛtteḥ sāmānyaśāstradviśeṣaniṣedho balavāniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14464: yato bhavatvevaṃvidhiṣu brāhmaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14465: tatra takradhaprāptyai tadvidhimapekṣate pravartitumiha tu prāptapūrvakatvāpratiṣedhasya yeyajāmahasya cānyato 'prāptestanniṣedhena niṣedhaprāptyai tadvidhirapekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14466: naca sāpekṣatayā niṣedhādvidhireva balīyānityatulyaśiṣṭatayā na vikalpaḥ kintu niṣedhasyaiva bādhanamiti sāṃprataṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14480: tenādoṣaduṣṭo 'pi vikalpa āsthīyate pakṣe 'pi prāmāṇyānmā bhūtpramatagītateti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14482: evaṃ hi tadā nañaḥ saṃbandho 'nanuyājeṣu yajatiṣvanuyājavartiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14493: yathā hi sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoramūrtayoḥ kalpanaṃ nāñjasaṃ sūrtyanuvidhāyitvātkampasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:14495: tasmādyatra vidhūnanamātraṃ śrutaṃ tatra kampanena varaṃ svakāryarambhāccālanamātrameva lakṣyatāṃ na tu tato 'pagatyānyatra saṃcāraḥ kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāt
GSP33vacbhamu:14496: tasmātsvakāryārambhāccālanaṃ vidhūnanamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-yatra tāvadupāyanaśrutistatrāvaśyaṃ tyāgo vidhūnanaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14497: kkacidapi codvidhūnanaṃ tyāge vartate tathā satyanyatrāpi tatraiva vartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14498: evaṃ hi na varteta yadi vidhūnanamiha mukhyaṃ labhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:14516: taditi hi sarvanāma tasmādarthe sannihitaparāmarśakaṃ tasya hetubhāvamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:14522: nahi tatra jīvanniti vā jīvata iti vā śrutam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14524: evañca na paryaṅkavidyātastatprakṣaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14525: rāddhāntastu vidyāsāmarthyavidhūtakalmaṣasya jñānavata uttareṇa pathā gacchato brahmaprāptirna cāprakṣīṇakalmaṣasyottaramārgagamanaṃ saṃbhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:14529: vidyaiva tādṛśī kalmaṣaṃ kṣapayati kṣapitakalmaṣaṃ cottaramārgaṃ prāpayatīti kathamardhapathe kalmaṣayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14538: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūyeti hi svatantrasya puruṣasya vyāpāraṃ brūte,
GSP33vacbhamu:14543: nanu yathā paretasyottareṇa pathā brahmaprāptirbhavatīti vidyāphalamevaṃ tasyaivārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtahānirapi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkāpadāni tebhya uttaramidaṃ sūtram /
GSP33vacbhamu:14548: sukṛtaduṣkṛtaprakṣayastu satyapi naraśarīre saṃbhavatīti samarthasya hetoryamaniyamādisahitāyā vidyāyāḥ karyakṣayāyogādyukto jīvata eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣaya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:14554: evaṃ kāraṇānantaraṃ kāryotpāde sati nimittanaimittakayostadbhāvasyopapattistāṇḍiśāṭhyāyaniśrutyośca saṃgatiritarathā svātantryābhāvenāsaṃgatiruktā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14556: ye tu parasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte kathaṃ paratra saṃkrāmata iti śaṅkottaratayā sūtraṃ vyācakhyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14562: tatrāpi kevalā hāniḥ śrūyate tatrāpi upāyanamupasthāpayatyevaṃ tatsannidhāveva devayānaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:14563: panthāḥ śruta iti yatrāpi sukṛtaduṣkṛtahāniḥ kevalā śrutā tatrāpi devayānaṃ panthānamupasthāpayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14566: tasmāddhānimātre devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃbadhyata iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14567: evaṃ prāptam ucyate-vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūyanirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaitīti hi viduṣo vidhūtapuṇyapāpasya vidyayā kṣemaprāptimāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:14570: nahi jātu rajjau sarpabhramanivṛttaye samutpannaṃ rajjutattavajñānaṃ deśaviśeṣamapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14574: yadi paramārabdhakāryakarmakṣapaṇāya śarīrapātāvadhyapekṣeti na devayānenāstīhārtha iti śrutidṛṣṭavirodhānnāpekṣitavya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14575: asti tu paryaṅkavidyāyāṃ tasmārtha ityuktaṃ dvitīyena sūtreṇeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14576: ye tu yadi puṇyamapi nivartate kimarthā tarhi gatarityāśaṅkya sūtramavatārayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14578: yadi punaḥ puṇyamanuvarteta brahmalokagatasyāpīha puṇyaphalopabhogāyavṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14580: tasmādduṣkṛtasyeva sukṛtasyāpi prakṣaya iti taiḥ punaranāśaṅkanīyamevāśaṅkitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14581: vidyākṣiptāyāṃ hi gatau keyamāśaṅkā yadi kṣīṇasukṛtaḥ kimarthamayaṃ yātīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14586: yadi tu tannādriyate tato darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādidharmāḥ saṃkīryeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:14587: naca teṣāṃ vikṛtiṣu sauryādiṣu dvādaśāhādiṣu codakataḥ prāptiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14591: na caivaṃ sati śrutyādoya'pi viniyojakāsteṣāmapi hi prakaraṇena sāmānyasaṃbandhe sati viniyojakatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14592: yatrāpi vināprakaraṇaṃ śrutyādibhyo viniyogo 'vagamyate tatrāpi tannirvāhāya prakaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kalpanīyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14594: tasmādyāsvevopāsanāsu devayānaḥ pitṛyāṇo vā panthā āmnātastāsveva na tūpāsanāntareṣu tadanāmnānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14595: naca 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' iti sāmānyavacanātsarvavidyāsu tatpathaprāptiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14598: apicaivaṃ satyekasyāṃ vidyāyāṃ mārgopadeśaḥ sarvāsu vidyāsvityekatraiva mārgopadeśaḥ kartavyo na vidyāntare /
GSP33vacbhamu:14601: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' iti na śraddhātapomātrasya
GSP33vacbhamu:14602: pathiprāptimāhāpi tu vidyayā tadārohāntītyatra nāvidvāṃsastapasvina iti kevalasya
GSP33vacbhamu:14605: tathānyatrāpi pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'bhidhīyate-'ya evametādvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14612: etaduktaṃ bhavati-bhavetprakaraṇaṃ niyāmakaṃ yadyaniyamapratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ śrautaṃ smārtaṃ vā na syādasti tu tattasya ca prakaraṇādbalīyastvam
GSP33vacbhamu:14613: tasmādaniyamo vidyāntareṣvapi saguṇeṣu devayānaḥ panthā asakṛnmārgopadeśasya ca prayojanaṃ varṇitaṃ bāṣyakṛteti //31 // 3.3.19.32.
GSP33vacbhamu:14615: saguṇānāṃ vidyāyāṃ cintāṃ kṛtvā nirguṇāyāṃ cintayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14625: naca 'tāvadevāsya ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' iti śruterviduṣo dehapātāvadhipratīkṣāvadvasiṣṭhādīnāmapi prārabdhakarmaphalopabhogapratīkṣeti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14626: yena hi karmaṇā vasiṣṭhādīnāmārabdhaṃ śarīraṃ tatpratīkṣā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14637: nirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmapavargalakṣaṇaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na stutimātratayā vyākhyāyamucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14640: uktaṃ hi 'na vidyau paraḥ śabdārtha' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14641: naca viduṣamapāntaramaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ tattaddehasaṃtārātsatyāmapi brahmavidyāyāmanirmokṣānna brahmavidyā mokṣasya heturiti sāmpratam /

GSP33vacbhamu:14695: prayoktavyānyatha yanna viniyujyante tatratyenopāṃśutvena svareṇa 'uccaiḥ sāmnopāṃśu yajuṣā iti śruteḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:14763: evaṃ hi nikṛṣṭa utkṛṣṭo bhavatīti prāptam /

GSP33vacbhamu:14771: kasmaicitphalāya tathā dhyānamātraṃ vidhīyatena tvasya nikṛṣṭatāmāpādayatīti cedihāpi vyatihārānucintanamātramupadiśyate phalāya na ti nikṛṣṭatā bhavatyutkṛṣṭasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:14775: tadvai tadetadeva tadāsa satyameva sa yo haitanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ

GSP33vacbhamu:14796: kasmiṃnnālambane tadupāsanīyamityata uttaram-sa ādityo ya eṣa ityādinā tasyopaniṣadaharahamiti /

GSP33vacbhamu:14829: tataśca vājasaneyoktānāṃ satyādīnāmupasaṃhāra ityatrārthe saiva hi satyādaya iti sūtraṃ vyākhyātaṃ tadetaddūṣayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:14835: tathāhi chāndogye-'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajanti etāṃśca satyānkāmān' ityātmavatkāmānāmapi vedyatvaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14836: vājasaneye tu nirguṇameva paraṃ brahmopadiśyate 'vimokṣāya brūhi' iti tathāpi tayoḥ parasparaguṇopasaṃhāraḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:14885: yathā jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayantīti patnīsaṃyājānāṃ jāghanyekadeśadravyajuṣāṃ jāghanīprayojakatvam /

GSP33vacbhamu:14891: tasmānna bhojanasya lope prāṇāgnihotralopa iti manyate pūrvapakṣī /

GSP33vacbhamu:14901: vidhyuddeśagatasyāgnihotranāmnastathābhāvādārthavādikasya tu siddhaṃ kiñcitsādṛśyamupādāya stāvakatvenopapatterna tadbhāvaṃ vidhātumarhatītyāha-

GSP33vacbhamu:14925: tathāca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram-'dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvātphalaśrutirarthavādaḥ syāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14926: evañca sati kratau parṇatāniyamavadupāsanāniyama iti prāpte ucyate-yuktaṃ parṇatāyāṃ phalaśruterarthavādamātratvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14931: nāpi svādiratāyāmiva prakṛtakratusaṃbaddho yūpa āśrayastadāśrayaḥ prakṛto 'sti anārabhyādhītatvātparṇatāyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14933: na cātatparaṃ vākyaṃ jñāpayitumarhatīti tatra vākyatātparyamavaśyāśrayaṇīyam /

GSP33vacbhamu:14945: tasmādyathā kratvāśrayāṇyapi godohanādīni phalasaṃyogādanityāni evamudgīthādyupāsanānīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14951: phalaparatve tvasya na śakyaṃ prayājādīnāṃ pārārthyenāphalatvaṃ vaktumiti //42 // 3.3.28.43.
GSP33vacbhamu:14953: tattacchutyarthālocanayā vāyuprāṇayoḥ svarūpābhede siddhe tadadhīnanirūpaṇatayā tadviṣayopāsanāpyabhinnā na cādhyātmādhidaivaguṇabhedādbhedaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:14969: nanvetasyai devatāyai iti devatāmātraṃ śrūyate na tu vāyustatkathaṃ vāyuprāptimāhetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:14971: vāyuḥ khalvagnyādīnsaṃvṛṇuta ityagnyādīnapekṣyānavacchinno 'gnyādayastutenaivāvacchinnā iti saṃvargaguṇatayā vāyuranavacchinnā devatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14973: militānāṃ śravaṇāviśeṣādindrasya devatāyā abhedātrayāṇāmapi puroḍāśānāṃ sahapradānāśaṅkāyāmutpattivākya
GSP33vacbhamu:14981: tatra yadyapi bhūyāṃsi santi liṅgāni manaścidādīnāṃ svātantryasūcakāni tathāpi na tāni svātantryeṇa svātantryaṃ prati prāpakāṇi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14984: na cedaṃ sāmarthyalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ yenāsya svātantryeṇa prāpakaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:14987: yathā vā 'paśunā yajeta' ityekatvasaṃkhyāyā arthasya saṃkhyeyāvacchetasāmarthyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14990: tasmādasati sāmarthyalakṣaṇe viroddhari prakaraṇapratyūhaṃ manaścidādīnāṃ kriyāśeṣatāmavagamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14991: naca te haite vidyācita evetyavadhāraṇaśrutiḥ kriyānupraveśaṃ vārayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14992: yena śrutivirodhe sati na prakaraṇaṃ bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:14994: naca vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavantīti puruṣasaṃbandhamāpādayadvākyaṃ prakaraṇamapabādhitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14997: tasmāttadapi na prakaraṇavirodhāyālamiti sāṃpādikā apyete agnayaḥ prakaraṇātkriyānupraveśina eva mānasavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:14998: dvādaśāhe tu śrūyate-'anayā tvā pātreṇa samudraṃ rasayā prājāpatyaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhṇāmi' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14999: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ mānasaṃ dvādaśāhā daharantamuta tanmadhyapātino daśamasyāhnāṅgamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15000: tatra vāgvai dvādaśāho mano mānasamiti mānasasya dvādaśāhādbhedena vyapadeśādvāṅmanasabhedavadbhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15001: nirdhūtāni dvādaśāhasya gatarasāni chandāṃsi tāni mānasenaivāpyāyantīti ca dvādaśāhasya
GSP33vacbhamu:15002: mānasena stūyamānatvādbhede ca sati stutistutyabhāvasyopapatterdvādaśāhādaharantaraṃ na tadaṅgaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:15003: patnīsaṃyājāntatvāccāhnāṃ patnīḥ saṃyājya mānasāya prasarpantīti ca mānasasya patnīsaṃyājasya parastācchuteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15005: prāpte 'bhidhīyate-pramāṇāntareṇa hi trayodaśatve 'hnāṃ siddhe dvādaśāha iti jaghanyayā vṛttyonnīyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:15011: patnīsaṃyājāntatā tu yadyapyautsargikī tathāpi daśamasyāhno viśeṣavacanānmānasāni grahaṇāsādanahavanādīni patnīsaṃyājātparāñci bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15013: eṣa vai daśamasyāhno visargo yanmānasamiti vacanāddaśamāharaṅgatā gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15014: visargo 'nto 'ntavato dharmo na svatantra iti daśame 'hani mānasāya pramarpantīti daśamasyāhna ādhāratvanirdeśācca tadaṅgaṃ mānasaṃ nāharantaramiti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:15021: nahi sāṃpādikānāmagnīnāmiṣṭakāsu citenāgninā kiñcidasti sādṛśyamanyatra kriyānupraveśāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15024: mā bhūdanyeṣāṃ śrutavidhyuddeśānāmanyārthadarśanānāmaprāptaprāpakatvameteṣu tvaśrutavidhāyuddeśeṣu 'vacanāni tvapūrvatvāt' iti nyāyādvidhirunnetavyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:15025: tathā caitebhyo yādṛśor'thaḥ pratīyate tadanurūpa eva sa bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15026: pratīyate caitebhyo manaścidādīnāṃ sāntatyaṃ cāvadhāraṇaṃ ca phalabhedasamanvayaśca puruṣasaṃbandhaśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:15027: na cāsya godohanādivatkratvarthāśritatvaṃ yena puruṣārthasya karmapāratantryaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:15036: yaduktaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā kratvaṅgatve pūrveṇeṣṭakācitena manaścidādīnāṃ vikalpa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15038: apica pūrvāparayorbhāgayorvidyāprādhānyadarśanāttanmadhyapātino 'pi tatsāmānyādvidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate na karmāṅgatvamityāha sūtreṇa-
GSP33vacbhamu:15041: asti rājasūyaḥ 'rājā svārājyakāmo rājasūyena yajeta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15044: yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutiṃ hutvābhighārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ yadi rājanya aindramiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15045: tatra saṃdihyate-kiṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ prāptānāṃ nimittārthena śravaṇamuta brāhmaṇādīnāmayaṃ yāgo vidhīyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15046: tatra yadi prajāpālanakaṇṭakoddharaṇādi karma rājyaṃ tasya kartā rājeti rājaśabdasyārthastato rājā rājasūyena yajeteti rājyasya kartū rājasūye 'dhikāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15047: tasmātsaṃbhavantyaviśiṣeṇa brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyā rājyasya kartāra iti siddhaṃ sarva evaite rājasūye prāptā iti 'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta' ityevamādayo nimittārthāḥ śrutayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15048: atha tu rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti rājakartṛyogāttatkarma rājyaṃ tataḥ ko rājetyapekṣāyāmāryeṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:15050: kṣatriyajātau rājaśabdaprasiddhistadavadhāraṇakāraṇamiti kṣatriya eva rājeti na brāhmaṇavaiśyayoḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:15051: prāptiriti rājasūyaprakaraṇaṃ bhittvā brāhmaṇādikartṛkāṇi pṛthageva karmāṇi prāpyanta
GSP33vacbhamu:15056: tathāhi-brāhmaṇādiṣu prajāpālanakartṛṣu kanakadaṇḍātapatraśvetacāmarādilāñchaneṣu rājapadamāndhrāścāryāścāvivādaṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:15060: nīyamānatvādrajyasya kartā rājeti siddhe nimittārthāḥ śrutayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15062: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-'rūpato na viśeṣo 'sti hyāryamlecchaprayogayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15064: tadiha rājaśabdasya karmayogādvā kartari prayogaḥ kartṛprayogādvā karmaṇīti viśaye
GSP33vacbhamu:15070: tatkartaryatajjātau rājaśabdo gauṇa iti kṣatriyasyaivākārādrājasūye tatprakaraṇamapodyāveṣṭerutkarṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15073: iyaṃ ca rājasūyādadhikārāntarametayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayediti nāstītikṛtvā cintā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15086: nasūtrakāreṇa tatroktaṃ yena punaruktaṃ bhavedapi tu bhāṣyakṛtetyatratyasyaivārthasyāpakarṣaḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇopayogitayā tatra kṛta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15087: yata iha sūtrakṛdvakṣyatyata eva bhagavatopavarṣeṇoddhāro 'pakarṣasya kṛtaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15092: nanvātmāstitvopapattaya evātrocyantāṃ kiṃ tadākṣepeṇetyata āha-ākṣepapūrvikā hīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15095: yadyapi samastavyasteṣu pṛthivyaptejovāyuṣu na caitanyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathāpi kāyākārapariṇateṣu bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15096: nahi kiṇvādayaḥ samastavyastā na madanā dṛṣṭā iti madirākārapariṇatā na madayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15097: ahamiti cānubhave deha eva gaurādyakāraḥ prathate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15098: na tu tadatiriktaḥ tadadhiṣṭhānaḥ kuṇḍa eva dadhīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15100: na jātu dadhisamānādhikaraṇāni madhurādīni kuṇḍasyaikādhikaraṇyamanubhavanti sitaṃ madhuraṃ kuṇḍamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15105: yadā ca upalabdhisādhyanāntarīyakabhāvasya liṅgasyeyaṃ gatistadā kaiva kathā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya
GSP33vacbhamu:15108: sa ca śarīrādhīnatayā dṛśyamānaḥ śarīradharma evaṃ prāṇaḥ śvāsapraśvāsādirūpaḥ śarīradharma eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:15109: icchāprayatnādayaśca yadyapyāntarāḥ tathāpi śarīrātiriktasya tadāśrayānupalabdheḥ sati śarīre bhāvāt antaḥ śarīrāśrayā eva,
GSP33vacbhamu:15111: śarīrātirikta ātmani pramāṇābhāvāccharīre ca saṃbhavāccharīre ca saṃbhavāccharīramevecchādimadātmeti prāpta ucyate- //53 // 3.3.30.54.
GSP33vacbhamu:15113: nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyo jāyate kuto bhavānanumānādīnāmaprāmāṇyamavadhāritavāniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15123: naca liṅgaṃ pramāṇaṃ yata ete sidhyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15124: na puṃsāmitthaṃbhāvamavijñāya yaṃ kañcana puruṣaṃ pratipipātayiṣato 'navadheyavacanasya prekṣāvattā nāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:15125: apica paśavo 'pi hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthinaḥ komalaśaṣpaśyāmalāyāṃ bhuvi pravartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:15130: tadeva mā nāma bhūnnāstikasya janmāntaramasminneva janmanyupasthito 'sya mūkatvapravṛttinivṛttiviraharūpo mahānnarakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15136: sūtrayojanā tu na tvavyatiriktaḥ kintu vyatirikta ātmā dehāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15138: caitanyādiryadi śarīraguṇaḥ tato 'nena viśeṣaguṇena bhavitavyam. na tu saṃkhyāparimāṇasaṃyogādivatsāmānyaguṇena /
GSP33vacbhamu:15139: tathāca ye bhūtaviśeṣaguṇaste yāvadbhūtabhāvino dṛṣṭā yathā rūpādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15140: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ bhūtaṃ ca rūpādirahitaṃ ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15143: prāṇaceṣṭādayo yadyapi dehadharmā eva tathāpi na dehamātraprabhavāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15145: tasmādyasyaite adhiṣṭānāddehadharmā bhavanti sa dehātirikta ātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15149: svaparapratyakṣā hi dehadharmā dṛṣṭā yathā rūpādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15155: apica madaśaktiḥ pratimadirāvayavaṃ mātrayāvatiṣṭhate tadvaddehe 'pi caitanyaṃ tadavayaveṣvapi mātrayā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:15157: naca bahūnāṃ cetanānāmanyonyābhiprāyānuvidhānasaṃbhava iti ekapāśanibaddhā iva bahavo vihaṅgamāḥ viruddhādikriyābhimukhāḥ samarthā api na hastamātramapi deśamatipatitumutsahante /
GSP33vacbhamu:15166: dūṣaṇāntaraṃ vivakṣuriṇāmabhedo rūpādirna tu bhūtacatuṣṭayādarthāntaramevaṃ bhūtapariṇāmabheda eva caitanyaṃ na tu bhūtebhyor'thāntaraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:15167: yena 'pṛthivyāpastejo vāyuriti tattvāni' iti pratijñāvyāghātaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15168: etaduktaṃ bhavati-caturṇāmeva bhūtānāṃ jagatpariṇāmo na tvasti tattvāntaraṃ yasya pariṇāmo rūpādayo 'nyadvā pariṇāmāntaramiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15171: bhūtadharmā rūpādayo jaḍatvādviṣayā eva dṛṣṭā na tu viṣayiṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15179: tasyāstataḥ svayaṃprakāśapratyayena bhūtadharmebhyo jaḍebhyo vailakṣaṇyena vyatirekaniścayāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15180: astu tarhi vyatirekādupalabdhirbhūtebhyaḥ svatantrā tathāpyātmani pramāṇābhāva ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:15185: evaṃ ca sati viṣayarūpatadbhedāveva sudurlabhāviti dūranirastā viṣayabhedādupalabdhibhedasaṃkathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15192: nānātve hi nānyenopalabdhe 'nyasya puruṣasya smṛtirupapadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15195: yo hi dehavyāpārādupalabdhirutpadyate tena dehadharma iti manyate taṃ pratīdaṃ dūṣaṇam-
GSP33vacbhamu:15202: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ yasminvede yadudrīthādayo vihitāsteṣāmeva tadvedavihitāḥ pratyayā utānyavedavihitānāmapyudrīthādīnāṃ te pratyayā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15205: nirviśeṣasya ca tasyānupapatterviśeṣakāṅkṣāyāṃ svaśākhāvihitasya viśeṣasya saṃnidhānāttenaivākāṅkṣāvinivṛtterna śākhāntarīyamudrīthāntaramapekṣate
GSP33vacbhamu:15207: yadi hi śrutisamarpitamarthamapabādhena tataḥ śrutiṃ pīḍayenna caitadasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15210: kṛṣṇādi yadi muñcāmaḥ kā śrutistatra pīḍyate' //
GSP33vacbhamu:15212: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-udrīthāṅgavavaddhāstu pratyayā nānāśākhāsu prativedamanuvarteranna pratiśākhaṃ vyavatiṣṭheran /
GSP33vacbhamu:15213: udrīthamityādisāmānyaśruteraviśeṣāt etaduktaṃ bhavati-yuktaṃ śuklaṃ paṭamānayetyādau paṭaśrutimaviśeṣapravṛttāmapi saṃnidhānācchuklaśrutirbādhata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15216: naca svārthamasmārayitvā viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanaṃ padānāmiti viśiṣṭārthaprayuktaṃ svārthasmāraṇaṃ na svaprayojakamapavādhitumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15217: mā ca vādhiprayojakābhāvena svārthasmāraṇamapīti yuktamaviśeṣapravṛttāyā api śruterekasminneva viśeṣe avasthāpanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15230: tatra divameva bhagavo rājanniti hovāceti pratyakamupāsanaśruteḥ pratyekaṃ ca phalavattvāmnānātsamastopāsane ca phalavattvaśruterubhayathāpyupāsanam
GSP33vacbhamu:15231: naca yathā vaiśvānarīyeṣṭau yadaṣṭākapālo bhavatītyādīnāmavayujyavādānāṃ pratyekaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:15238: iha tu samaste vyaste ca vartamānāpadeśasyāviśeṣādagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣaśatayā ubhayatrāpi vidhikalpanāyāḥ phalakalpanāyāśca bhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15240: śyāmo vāśvāhutimabhyavaharatītivadubhayavidhamupāsanamiti prāpta ucyate-samastopāsanasyaiva jyāyastvaṃ na vyastopāsanasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:15246: tathā caikavākyatālābhāya vākyabhedaparihārāya ca samastopāsanaparataiva saṃdarbhasya lakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15256: saṃprati tu sarvāsāmīśvaragocarāṇāṃ vidyānāṃ kimabhedo bhedo vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:15258: nanu yathā pratyayābhidheyāyā apūrvabhāvanāyā ājānato bhedabhāve 'pi dhātvarthena nirūpyamāṇatvāttasya ca yāgāderbhedātprakṛtyarthayāgādidhātvarthānubandhabhedādbhedaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:15260: evaṃ vidyānāmapi rūpato vedyasyeśvarasyābhede 'pi tattatsatyasaṃkalpatvādiguṇopadhānabhedādvidyābheda iti nāstyabhedāśaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15262: iha brahmaṇaḥ siddharūpatvājguṇānāmapi satyasaṃkalpatvādīnāṃ tadāśrayāṇāṃ siddhatayā sarvatrābhedo vidyāsu /
GSP33vacbhamu:15264: siṃhāsyo vṛṣaskandhaḥ evopadiśyamānaścakorekṣaṇatvādyapajahāti na khalu pratyupadeśaṃ vastu bhidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15269: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi vastuniṣṭānyupāsanavākyāni kintu tadviṣayāmupāsanābhāvanāṃ vidadhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15271: yadyapi copāsanābhāvanā upāsanādhīnanirūpaṇopāsanaṃ copāsyādhīnanirūpaṇamupāsyaṃ ceśvarādi vyavasthitarūpam,
GSP33vacbhamu:15273: yathaikaḥ strīkāyaḥ kenacidbhakṣyatayā kenacidupagantavyatayā kenacidapatyatayā kenacinmātṛtayā kenacidupekṣaṇīyatayā viṣayīkriyamāṇaḥ puruṣecchātantraḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:15283: vidyābhede tu na paunaruktyamekasyāṃ vidyāyāmuktā vidyāntare noktā iti vidyāntarasyāpi tadguṇatvāya vaktavyā anuktānāmaprāpteriti //58 // 3.3.34.59.
GSP33vacbhamu:15285: agnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādiṣu pṛthagadhikārāṇāmapi succayo dṛṣṭo niyamavāṃsteṣāṃ nityatvādupāsanāstu kāmyatayā na nityāstasmānnāsāṃ samuccayaniyamaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:15286: tena samānaphalānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādīnāmiva na niyamavānvikalpaḥ phabhūmārthinaḥ samuccayasyāpi saṃbhavāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15289: upāsanāntarābhyāse ca cittaikāgratāvyāghātena kasya cidupāsanāniṣpatteriha vikalpa eva niyamavāniti rāddhāntaḥ //59 // 3.3.35.60.
GSP33vacbhamu:15291: yāsūpāsanāsu vinopāsyasākṣātkāraṇamadṛṣṭenaiva kāmyasādhanaṃ tāsāṃ kāmyadarśapaurṇamāsādivatpuruṣecchāvaśena vikalpasamuccayāviti sāmpratam
GSP33vacbhamu:15296: iha tu satyapi puruṣārthatve kasmānnaikaprayogavacanagrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti pūrvoktamarthamākṣipan pratyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15297: yadyapi hi kāmyā etā upāsanāstathāpi na svatantrā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15298: tathā sati hi kratvarthānāśritatayā kratuprayogādbahirapyamūṣāṃ prayogaḥ prasajyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15301: evaṃ cāśrayatantratvādāśritānāṃ prayogavacanenāśrayāṇāṃ samuccayaniyamenāśritānāmapi samuccayaniyamo yukta itarathā tadāśritatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15302: sa ca prayogavacana upāsanāḥ samuccitanvaṃstattatphalakāmanānāmavaśyaṃbhāvamākṣipati tadabhāve tāsāṃ samuccayaniyamābhāvāditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15307: nahi kāmā vidhīyate yena samuccīyerannapi tūddiśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:15311: nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāt satyapi tadāśrayāṇāṃ nityatve idameva cāśrayatantratvamāśritānāṃ yadāśraye satyeva vṛttirnāsatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15312: na tu tatra vṛttireva nāvṛttiriti tadidamuktam-āśrayatantrāṇyapi hīti //61 // 3.3.36.62. // 62 // 3.3.36.63.
GSP33vacbhamu:15316: vedāntarohitapraṇavodgīthaikatvapratyayasāmarthyāddhotṛkarmaṇaḥ śaṃsanādudrātā pratisamādadhāti kiṃ tadityata āha durudrīthamapi vedāntarodite caudrātre karmaṇi utpannaṃ kṣatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15321: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15325: samprati tu kimaupaniṣadātmatattvajñānamapavargasādhanatayā puruṣārthamāho kratuprayogāpekṣitakartṛpratipādakatayā kratvarthamiti mīmāṃsāmahe
GSP33vacbhamu:15326: yadā ca kratvarthaṃ tadā yāvanmātraṃ kratuprayogavidhināpekṣitaṃ kartṛtvamāmuṣmikaphalopabhoktṛtvaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:15327: ca na caitadanityatve ghaṭate kṛtavipraṇāśākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgādato nityatvamapi,
GSP33vacbhamu:15331: yadyapi jīvānuvādena tasya brahmatvapratipādanaparatvamupaniṣadāmiti mahatā prabandhena
GSP33vacbhamu:15332: tatra tatra pratipāditaṃ tathāpyatra keṣāñcitpūrvapakṣaśahkābījānāṃ nirākaraṇe tadeva
GSP33vacbhamu:15335: yadyapi ca kartṛmātraṃ nāvyabhicāritakratusaṃbandhaṃ kartṛmātrasya laukikeṣvapi karmasu
GSP33vacbhamu:15337: vākyenaiva kratvarthamāpadyate tathāpi yādṛśa ātmā kartāmuṣmikasvargādiphalabhogabhāgī
GSP33vacbhamu:15338: dehādyatirikte vedāntaiḥ pratipādyate na tādṛśasyāsti laukikeṣu karmasūpayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15340: āmuṣmikaphalānāṃ tu vaidikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tamantareṇāsaṃbhavāttatsaṃbandha evāyamaupaniṣadaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:15346: priyādisūcitasya ca saṃsāriṇa evātmano draṣṭavyatvena pratijñāpanādapahatapāpmatvādi tu tadviśeṣaṇaṃ tasyaiva stutyartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:15352: na tvetatprakṛtodgīthavidyāviṣayaṃ yadeva vidyayeti sarvanāmavadhāraṇābhyāṃ vyāpteradhigamat /
GSP33vacbhamu:15353: yathā ya eva dhūmavāndeśaḥ sa vahvimāniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15354: samanvārambhavacanaṃ ca phalārambhe vidyākarmaṇoḥ sāhityaṃ darśayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15355: tacca yadyapyāpneyādiyagaṣaṭkavatsamapradhānatvenāpi bhavati tathāpyuktayā yuktyā vidyāyāḥ karma pratyaṅgabhāvenaiva netavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15356: vedārthajñānavataḥ karmavidhānādupaniṣado 'pi vedārtha iti tajjñānamapi karmāṅgamiti //1 // 3.4.1.2. // 2 // 3.4.1.3. // 3 // 3.4.1.4. // 4
GSP33vacbhamu:15360: yadi śarīrādyatiriktaḥ kartā bhoktātmetyetanmatra upaniṣadaḥ paryavasitāḥ syustataḥ syādevaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:15364: tathā caupaniṣadātmajñānasya kratvanuṣṭhānavirodhinaḥ kratusaṃbandha eva nāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15367: ata eva priyādisūcitena saṃsāriṇātmanopakramasya tasyaivātmano 'dhikopadidikṣāyāṃ paramātmanātyantābheda upadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15368: yathā samāropitasya bhujagasya rajjurūpādatyantābhedaḥ pratipādyate yo 'yaṃ sarpaḥ sā rajjuriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15373: yatha sarve brāhmaṇā bhojyantāmiti nimintritāpekṣayā teṣāmeva prakṛtatvāt //10 // 3.4.1.11.
GSP33vacbhamu:15383: tanmātravata evādhikāraḥ karmasu nopaniṣadadhyanavataḥ tadadhyayanasya karmasvanupayogāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:15384: adhyayanamātravata eveti mātragrahaṇenārthajñānaṃ vā vyavacchinnamiti manvāno bhrāntaścodayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:15393: apica vidyāphalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ darśayantī śrutiḥ kālāntarabhāviphalakarmāṅgatvaṃ vidyāyā nirākarotītyāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:15406: nindati hi pratyakṣā śrutirāśramāntaraṃ 'vīrahā vā eṣa devānām' ityādikā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15407: pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe ca smṛtyācārayoraprāmāṇyamuktaṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15414: na kevalamanyaparatayā parāmarśasyāśramāntaraṃ na labhyate api tvāśramāntaranindādvāreṇāpavādādapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15422: nahi tapa eva dvitīya ityatrāśramāntarābhidhāyī kaścidasti śabda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15423: nanvetameva pravrājina iti vacanādāśramāntaraṃ setsyatītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:15434: tatra skandhaśabdo yadyāśramaparo na syāditi tu samūhavacanastato dharmāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ prātisvikotpattīnāṃ kimapekṣya tritvamaṅkhyā suvyavasthāpyeta
GSP33vacbhamu:15436: tatra yajñādiliṅgo gṛhāśrama eko dharmaskandho brahmacārīti dvitīyastapa iti ca,
GSP33vacbhamu:15439: tasmādanyaparādapi parāmarthādaśramāntarāṇi pratīyamānāni devatādhikaraṇanyāyena na śakyante 'pākartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:15440: naca pratyakṣaśrutivirodho vīrahā vetyādeḥ pratipannagārhasthyaṃ pramādādajñānādvāgnimudvāsayituṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15441: evañca avirodhe siddhavatparāmarśādaśramāntarāṇāṃ śāstrāntarasiddhiṃ vā kalpayiṣyāmo
GSP33vacbhamu:15442: yathopavītavidhipare vākye 'upavyayate devalakṣmameva tatkurute' ityatra nivītaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:15443: manuṣyāṇāṃ prācīnāvītaṃ pitṛṇāmiti śāstrāntarasiddhayornivītaprācīnāvītayoḥ parāmarśa iti //19 // 3.4.2.20.
GSP33vacbhamu:15448: aparāmarśe ca stuterasaṃbhavena kiṃparatayā ekavākyatāstvitī tāṃ bhaṅktvā dhāraṇavadvaramapūrvatvādvidhirevāstu /
GSP33vacbhamu:15449: yathā 'adhastātsamidhaṃ dhārayannanudravedupari hi devebhyo dhārayati' ityatra satyāmapyadhodhāraṇenaikavākyatāpratītau vidhīyata evoparidhāraṇamapūrvatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:15464: yadi tāvadbrahmasaṃstha iti padaṃ pratyastamityāvayavārthaṃ parivrājake 'śvakarṇādipadavadrūḍhaṃ tadāśramaprāptimātreṇaivāmṛtībhāva iti na tadbhāvāyā brahmajñānamapekṣeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:15469: evañca caturṣvāśrameṣu yasyaiva brahmaṇi niṣṭhatvamāśramiṇaḥ sa brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvametīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15470: tatra tāvadbrahmacārigṛhasthau svaśabdābhihitau tapaḥpadena ca tapaḥpradhānatayā bhikṣuvānaprasthāvupasthāpitau /
GSP33vacbhamu:15473: yadi tāvatkarmayogaḥ karmitā sā bhikṣorapi kāyavāṅmanobhirasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15474: atha ye na brahmārpaṇena karma kurvanti kintu kāmārthitayā te karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15475: tathā sati gṛhasthādayo 'pi brahmārpaṇena karma kurvāṇā na karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15476: tasmādbrahmaṇi tātparyaṃ brahmaniṣṭhatā na tu karmatyāgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15478: tapasā ca dvayorāśramayorekīkaraṇena traya iti tritvamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15479: evañca trayo 'pyāśramā abrahmasaṃsthāḥ santaḥ puṇyalokabhājo bhavanti yaḥ punareteṣu brahmasaṃsthaḥ so 'mṛtatvabhāgiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15481: yathā devadattayajñadattau mandaprajñāvabhūtāṃ saṃprati tayoryajñādattastu śāstrābhyāsātpaṭuprajño vartate iti tathehāpi ya evābrahmasaṃsthāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:15483: tathāca brahmasaṃstha iti yaugikaṃ padaṃ prakṛtaviṣayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15484: yathā āgnepyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhata ityatra viniyuktāpi prakṛtaivāgneyī gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15486: yadi hyatrāgnotyupadiśyeta tato yathā pratītā tathoddiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15488: iha tu āgnīdhropasthāne sā vidheyatvena viniyujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15494: tathehāpi prakṛtā evāśramā buddhiviparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante nānuktaḥ parivrāḍeveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15499: yatsaṃkhyākāśca ye prasiddhāste tatsaṃkhyākā eva kīrtyante iti cocitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15501: aśādhāraṇenaikaikena lakṣaṇenaikeka āśramo vaktumupakrānta iti tathaiva samāpanamucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15503: naca tapo nāma nāsādhāraṇaṃ vānaprasthānāmityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:15505: na khalu parākādibhiḥ kāyakleśapradhāno yathā vānaprasthastathā bhikṣuḥ satyapyaṣṭagrāsādiniyame /
GSP33vacbhamu:15506: naca śaucasantoṣaśamādayastapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānāṃ tapaḥprasiddherasiddheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15507: ata eva vṛddhāstapaso bhedena śaucādīnācakṣate-'śaucasantoṣatapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni niyamāḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15511: traya eta iti kiṃ bhikṣurapi parāmṛśyate kintvā bhikṣuvarjaṃ traya eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:15512: na tāvantraya iti bhikṣusaṃgrahe tadvarjanamete traya ityatra vartuṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15513: eva iti prakṛtānāṃ sākalyena parāmarśādbhikṣusaṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇyalokatvamabrahmasaṃsthātvābhāvādbhikṣoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15514: tena tasya brahmasaṃsthasya sadā puṇyalokatvamamṛtatvaṃ ceti virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15524: satyaṃ yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛtasaṃbhave na tadatipattyāprakṛte vartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15525: asati tu saṃbhave mā bhūtpramādapāṭha ityaprakṛte vartayitavyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:15527: eṣa hi brahmasaṃsthatālakṣaṇo dharmo bhikṣorasādhāraṇa āśramāntarāṇi tatsaṃsthānyatatsaṃsthāni ca bhikṣustatsaṃstha ityeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:15528: tatsaṃsthatā hi svābhāvaṃ vyavacchindantī virodhādyastatsaṃstha eva tatrāñjasī nānyatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:15533: sarvasaṅgaparityāgo hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kuta ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:15537: tāni vā etānyavarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa evātyarecayaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:15539: tathā cedṛśaṃ nyāsalakṣaṇaṃ brahmasaṃsthatvaṃ bhikṣorevāsādhāraṇaṃ netareṣāmāśramiṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:15540: brahmajñānasya śabdajanitasya yaḥ paripākaḥ sākṣātkāro 'pavargasādhanaṃ tadaṅgatayā parivrājyaṃ vihitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15544: sa eṣa rasānāṃ rasatama ityādinā padasaṃdarbheṇaikavākyabhāvamupagataḥ stūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15556: tenaikavākyatānupapatteḥ saṃnihitasya tūpāsanāvidheḥ kiṃ viṣayasamarpaṇenopayujyatāmuta stutyeti viśaye viṣayasamarpaṇena yathārthavattvaṃ naivaṃ stutyā bahiraṅgatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15567: sāmānyoktau tadviśeṣāḥ pacedityādayo 'pi gamyanta iti tatra kuryādityākṣiptakartṛkā bhāvanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15570: evaṃ daṇḍī bhaveddaṇḍinā bhavitavyaṃ daṇḍinā bhūyetetyekadhātvarthaviṣayā vidhyupahitā bhāvanā udāhāryāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15572: yathā kulālavyāpārādghaṭo bhavati bījādaṅkuro bhavatīti prayuñjate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15576: yadyapi upaniṣadākhyānāni vidyāsaṃnidhau śrutāni tathāpi 'sarvāṇyākhyānāni pāriplave' iti sarvaśrutyā niḥśeṣārthatayā durbalasya saṃnidherbādhitatvātpariplavārthānyevākhyānāni
GSP33vacbhamu:15577: naca sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāditi viniyoge 'pi dāśatayīnāṃ prātisvikaviniyogāttatra
GSP33vacbhamu:15578: tatra karmaṇi yathā viniyogo na virudhyate tathehāpi satyapi pāriplave viniyege saṃnidhānādvidyāṅgatvamapi
GSP33vacbhamu:15580: dāśatayīṣu prātisvikānāṃ viniyogānāṃ samudāyaviniyogasya ca tulyabalatvādiha tu saṃnidhānāt śruterbalīyastvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15582: kintu pāriplavamācakṣītetyupakramya yānyāmnātāni manurvaivasvato rājetyādīni teṣāmeva tatra viniyogaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:15587: yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatra nimintrātāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabdaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15588: tathā copaniṣadākhyānānāṃ vidyāsaṃnidhirapratidvandīṃ vidyaikavākyatāṃ so 'rodīdityādīnāmiva vidhyekavākyatvaṃ gamayatīti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:15589: pratipattisaukaryāccetyupākhyānena hi bālā apyavadhīyante yathā tantropākhyāyikayeti //23 // 3.4.4.24. // 24 // 3.4.5.25.
GSP33vacbhamu:15591: vidyāyāḥ kratvarthatve sati tathā kratūpakaraṇāya svakāryāya kraturapekṣitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15593: yadā tu puruṣārthā tadā nānayā kraturapekṣitaḥ svakārye nirapekṣāyā eva tasyāḥ sāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15601: yathā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣyante āśramakarmāṇi evamutpattāvapi nāpekṣyeranniti śaṅkā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15611: caturthī sākṣātkāravatī vṛttirūpā nāntarīyakaṃ hi tasyāḥ kaivalyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15612: tatrādye tāvatpratipatti viditapadatadarthasya viditavākyagatigocaranyāyasya ca puṃsa upapadyete eveti na tatra karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15613: te eva ca cintāmayīṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratipattiṃ prasuvāte iti na tatrāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15614: sā cādaranairantaryadīrghakālasevitā sākṣātkāravatīmādhatta eva pratipattiṃ caturthīmiti na tatrāpyasti karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15615: tannāntarīyakaṃ ca kaivalyamiti na tasyāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15616: tadevaṃ pramāṇataśca prameyata utpattau ca kārye ca na jñānasya karmāpekṣeti bījaṃ śaṅkāyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:15617: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-utpattau jñānasya karmāpekṣā vidyate vividiṣotpādadvārā 'vividiṣanti yajñena' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15619: yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti parṇamayatāvidhirapūrvatvānna tvayaṃ vartamānāpadeśaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:15625: sa hi tattvato 'nityāśuciduḥ-khānātmani saṃsāre sati nityaśucimukhātmalakṣaṇena vibhrameṇa malinayati cittasattvamadharmanibandhanatvādvibhramāṇām
GSP33vacbhamu:15626: ataḥ pāpmanaḥ prakṣaye pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya tāttvikīmanityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhaṃ viniścineti
GSP33vacbhamu:15629: tato hānopāyaṃ prayeṣate paryeṣamāṇaścātmatattvajñānamasyopāya iti śāstradācāryavacanāccopaśrutya tajjijñāsata iti vividiṣopahāramukhenātmajñānotpattāvasti karmāṇamupayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15630: vividiṣuḥ khalu yukta ekāgratayā śravaṇamanane kartumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15633: yena bhāvanāyāṃ vā bhāvanākārye vā sākṣātkāre karmaṇāmupayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15637: dṛṣṭārtheṣu tu karmasu pratiṣiddhavarjamanadhikāre 'pyasaktasya svārasikī pravṛttirupapadyata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:15639: ataśca 'bhrāntyā cellaukikaṃ karma vaidikaṃ ca tathāstu te' iti pralāpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15641: upapāditaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra ite neha punaḥ pratyāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15642: tasmādvividiṣotpādadvārāśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyotpattāvupayogo na vidyākārya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:15646: eṣa kila vicāraviṣayaḥ-sarvāṇi khalu vāgādīnyavajitya prāṇo mukhya uvācaitāni kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tāni hocuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15647: yadidaṃ loke 'nnamā ca śvabhya ā ca śakunibhyaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ yadannaṃ tattavānnamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15648: tadanena saṃdarbheṇa prāṇasya sarvamannamityanucintanaṃ vidhāyāha śrutiḥ-'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15650: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimetatsarvānnābhyanujñānaṃ śamādivadetadvidyāṅgatayā vidhīyata uta stutyarthaṃ saṃkīrtyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15651: tatra yadyapi bhavatīti vartamānāpadeśānna vidhiḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15652: tathāpi yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti vartamānāpadeśādapi palāśamayītvavidhipratipattiḥ pañcamalakārāpattyā tathehāpi pravṛttiviśeṣakaratālābhe vidhipratipattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15653: stutau hi arthavādamātraṃ na tathārthavadyathā vidhau /
GSP33vacbhamu:15654: bhakṣyābhakṣyaśāstraṃ ca sāmānyataḥ pravṛttamanena viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15655: gamyāgamyavivekaśāstramiva sāmānyataḥ pravṛttaṃ vāmadevavidyāṅgabhūtasamastantryaparihāraśāstreṇa viśeṣaviṣayeṇeti prāpta ucyate-aśakteḥ kalpanīyatvācchāstrāntaravirodhataḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:15657: na tāvatkauleyakamaryādamannaṃ manuṣyajātinā yugapatparyāyeṇa vā śakyamattum /
GSP33vacbhamu:15659: na cātra liṅ iva sphuṭatarā vidhipratipattirasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15662: naca satyāṃ gatau sāmānyataḥ pravṛttasya śāstrasya viṣayasaṃkoco yuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15665: prāṇātyasya iti cāvadhāraṇaparaṃ prāṇātyaya eva sarvānnatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15666: tatropākhyānācca sphuṭataravidhismṛteśca surāvarjaṃ vidvāṃsamavidvāṃsaṃ prati vidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15675: kāmo ma udakapānamiti svātantryaṃ me udakapāne nadīkūpataḍāgaprāpādiṣu yathākāmaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:15676: prāpnomīti nocchiṣṭodakābhāve prāṇātyaya iti tatrocchiṣṭabhakṣaṇadoṣa iti maṭacīhateṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:15686: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-siddhe hi syādvirodho 'yaṃ na tu sādhye kathañcana /
GSP33vacbhamu:15689: na tu sādhyarūpaṃ yathā ṣoḍaśina ekasya grahaṇāgrahaṇe /
GSP33vacbhamu:15693: vidyāṅgatayā ca vidyāyāḥ kādācitkatayānavaśyaṃ bhāve 'pi 'kāmyo vā naimittiko vā vikṛtya niviśate' iti nyāyādanityādhikāreṇa niviśamānamapi na nityamanityayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:15694: tenāpi tasmiddheriti saṃyogapṛthaktvānna nityānityasaṃyogavirodha ekasya kāryasyeti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:15695: sahākiratvaṃ ca karmaṇāṃ na kārye vidyāyāḥ kiṃ tūtpattau /
GSP33vacbhamu:15698: yathā 'sahaiva daśābhiḥ pūtrairbhāraṃ vahati gardabhī' iti sātsveva daśaputreṣu saiva bhārasya vāhiketi /
GSP33vacbhamu:15703: catasṛṇāmapi ca pratipattīnāṃ brahmaṇi vidhānānupapatterityuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
GSP33vacbhamu:15704: draṣṭavyo nididhyāsitavya iti ca vidhisarūpaṃ ni vidhirityapyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15707: naca svaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sādhyaṃ nityatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15710: yathā māsamagnihotraṃ juhvatīti prakaraṇāntarātkarmabheda evamihāpi 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena
GSP33vacbhamu:15712: sati karmāntaramiti prāpta ucyate-satyapi prakaraṇāntare tadeva karma,
GSP33vacbhamu:15713: śruteḥ smṛteśca saṃyogabhedaḥ paraṃ yathā 'agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ' 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt' iti tadevāgnihotramubhayasaṃyuktam
GSP33vacbhamu:15715: kintu ajñātajñāpanasvaraso vidhiḥ prakaraṇaikye sphuṭatarapratyabhijñābalena svarasaṃ jahyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15717: iha tu siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuñjāno na juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15721: kāle hi karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla ityutsargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15722: iha tu vividiṣāyāṃ vidhiśrutiḥ na yajñādau /
GSP33vacbhamu:15726: yadi vidyāsahakārīṇyāśramakarmāṇi hanta bho vidhurādīnāmanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidyāyām,
GSP33vacbhamu:15735: yadyapi ceha janmani tatheha janmanyāśramakarmotpāditavividiṣa eva vidyāyāmadhikṛto netara ityanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidhuraprabhṛtīnāmityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:15742: daivātpunaḥ patnyādiviyogātaḥ satyanāśramitve bhavedadhikāro vidyāyāmiti śrutismṛtisaṃdarbheṇa vividiṣanti yajñenetyādinā jyāyastvāvagateḥ śrutiliṅgātsmṛtiliṅgāccvāgamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:15757: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmīti naiṣṭhikaṃ prati prāyaścittābhāvasmaraṇānnairṛtagardabhālambhaḥ prāyaścittamupakurvāṇakaṃ prati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15758: tasmācchinnaśirasa iva puṃsaḥ pratikriyābhāva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15759: sūtrayojanā tu-na cādhikārikamadhikāralakṣaṇe prathamakāṇḍe nirṇītam 'avakīrṇipaśuśca tadvadādhānasyāprāptakālatvāt' ityanena yatprāyaścittaṃ tanna naiṣṭhike bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15764: tasyāmapi ca sākṣātprāyaścittaṃ na kartavyamiti prāyaścittaniṣedho na gamyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:15766: tathā ca smṛtirniṣedhārtheti anumāya tadarthā śrutiranumātavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15770: sūtrārthastu-upapūrvamapi pātakaṃ naiṣṭhikasyāvakīrṇitvaṃ na mahāpātakamapirevakārārthe ata eke prāyaścittabhāvamicchantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15772: śāstrasthā yā vā prasiddhiḥ sā grāhyā śāstramūlatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15775: yadi naiṣṭhikādīnāmasti prāyaścittaṃ tatkimetaiḥ kṛtanirṇejanaiḥ saṃvyavahartavyamuta neti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15776: tatra doṣakṛtatvādasaṃvyavahārasya prāyaścittena tannibarhaṇādanibarhaṇe vā tatkaraṇavaiyarthyātsaṃvyavahāryā eveti prāpta ucyati-
GSP33vacbhamu:15778: niṣiddhakarmānuṣṭhānajanyameno lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhimāpādayati dvaidham lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhirapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇaiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15779: kasyācittu paralokāśuddhimātramapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇairihalokāśuddhistvenasāpāditā na śakyāpanetum /
GSP33vacbhamu:15782: tathā ca 'prāyaścittairapaityeno yadajñānakṛtaṃ bhavet' kāmataḥ kṛtamapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:15783: bālaghrādistu kṛtanirṇejano 'pi vacanādavyavahārya iha loke jāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15787: prathame kāṇḍe śeṣalakṣaṇe tathākāma ityatrartviksaṃbandhe karmaṇaḥ siddhe kiṃ kāmo
GSP33vacbhamu:15788: yājamāna utārtvijya iti saṃśapyārtvijye 'pi karmaṇi yājamāna eva kāmo guṇaphaleṣviti
GSP33vacbhamu:15789: nirṇītamihi tvevañjātīyakāni cāṅgasaṃbaddhāni upāsanāni kiṃ yājamānanyevotārtvijyānīti
GSP33vacbhamu:15793: vacane yajamānasya phalavadupāsanaṃ tasya phalaśruteḥ taṃ ha bako dālabhyo vidāñcakāretyāderupāsanasya
GSP33vacbhamu:15798: na cartvikkartṛka upāsane yajamānagāmitā phalasyāsaṃbhavinī tena hi sa parikrīyastadgāmine phalāya ghaṭate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15801: labdhvā bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15802: yatra hi vidhivibhaktiḥ śrūyate sa vidheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15803: bālyena tiṣṭhāsedityatra ca sā śrūyate na śrūyate tu maune /
GSP33vacbhamu:15806: tasmādbrāhnaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidyeti pāṇḍityavidhānādeva maunasiddheḥ pāṇḍityameva maunamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15807: athavā bhikṣuvacano 'yaṃ muniśabdastatra darśanāt 'gārhasthyamācāryakulaṃ maunaṃ vānaprastham' ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:15809: tasmādbālyamevātra vidhīyate maunaṃ tu prāptaṃ praśaṃsārthamanūdyata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15811: api tu jñānamātraṃ pāṇḍityaṃ jñānātiśayasaṃpattistu maunaṃ tatprasiddheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15813: tasmādapūrvatvānmaunasya bālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15814: evaṃ ca nirvedanīyatvamapi vidhāna āñjasaṃ syādityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:15830: api tu vidyodayāyābhyāse pravṛtto na punarutpannavidyātiśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15833: ata eva samidādirvidhyantaḥ sa hi vidhiḥ pradhānavidheḥ paścāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:15839: chāndogye bahulāyāsādhyakarmabahulatvādgārhasthyasya cāśramāntaradharmāṇāṃ ca keṣāñcidahiṃsādīnāṃ samavāyāttenopasaṃhāro na punastena samāpanādityarthaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:15840: evaṃ tadāśramadvayopanyāsena kkacitkadāciditarābhāvaśaṅkā mandabuddheḥ syāditi tadapākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram-
GSP33vacbhamu:15842: vṛttirvānaprasthānāmanekavidhairevaṃ brahmācāriṇo 'pīti vṛttibhedo 'nuṣṭhātāro vā puruṣā bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:15849: evaṃ ca śāstrāntarābādhenāpyupapattau na śāstrāntarabādhanamanyāpyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti //50 // 3.4.16.41.
GSP33vacbhamu:15853: kiṃ śravaṇādibhirihaiva vā janmani vidyā sādhyate utāniyama iha vāmutra veti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15854: yadyapi karmāṇi yajñādinyaniyataphalāni teṣāṃ ca vidyotpadasādhanatvena vidyotpādasyāniyamaḥ pratibhāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15855: tathāca garbhasthasya vāmadevasyātmapratibodhaśravaṇāt 'anekajanmasaṃsiddhastato yati parāṃ gatim' iti ca smaraṇādāmuṣmikatvamapyavagamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:15859: naca pramāṇeṣu pravartamānāḥ pramātāra aihikamapi cirabhāvinaṃ pramotpādaṃ kāmayante kintu tādātvikameva prāgeva tu pāralaukikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15860: nahi kumbhalādidṛkṣuścakṣuṣī samunmīlayati kālāntarīyāya kumbhadarśanāya kintu tādātvikāya /
GSP33vacbhamu:15862: śrutismṛtī ca pāralaukikaṃ vidyotpādaṃ stutyā brātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15864: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-yata evātra vidyotpāde śravaṇādibhiḥ kartavye yajñādīnāṃ sattvāśuddhidvāreṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:15865: vā vighnopaśamadvārā vopayogo 'ta eva teṣāṃ yajñādīnāṃ karmāntarapratibandhāpratibandhābhyāmaniyataphalatvena
GSP33vacbhamu:15868: tathāca teṣāṃ yajñādyapekṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ cāniyataphalatvena śravaṇādīnāmapyaniyataphalatvaṃ yuktamevaṃ śrutismṛtipratibandho na stutimātratvena vyākhyeyo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15869: puruṣāśca vidyārthinaḥ sādhanasāmarthyānusāreṇa tadanurūpameva kāmayiṣyante tadidamuktam-abhisaṃdherniraṅkaśatvāditi //51 // 3.4.17.52.
GSP33vacbhamu:15872: tathā ca yathā sādhanotkarṣanikarṣābhyāṃ tatphalasya vidyāyā utkarṣāvevaṃ vidyāphalasyāpi mukterutkarṣanikarṣau saṃbhāvyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:15873: naca muktāvaihikāmuṣmikatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣa upapadyate brahmopāsanāparipākalabdhajanmani vidyāyāṃ jīvato mukteravaśyaṃbhāvaniyamātsatyapyārabdhavipākakarmāprakṣaye
GSP33vacbhamu:15876: mukterapi vidyāphalatvādrūpataścotkarṣanikarṣau syātāmiti prāpata ucyate-na muktestatra
GSP33vacbhamu:15879: naca muktirbrahmaṇo nityasvarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇā nityā satī sādhyā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15883: naca cirācirotpādānutpādāvantareṇa vidyāyāmapi rūpato bhedaḥ kaścidupalakṣyate tasyā apyekarūpatvena śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15885: na cātra vidyātvaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15887: tasmāttasyā muktyavasthāyā aikarūpyāvadhṛtermuktilakṣaṇasya phalasyāviśeṣo yukta iti //52 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15888: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:15891: nābhyarthyā iha santaḥ svayaṃ pravṛttā na cetare śakyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15893: śaṅke saṃprati nirviśaṅkamadhunā svarājyasaukhyaṃ vahannendraḥ sāndratapaḥsthiteṣu kathamapyudvegamabhyeṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15899: codyamānānyadṛṣṭārthānīti yāvadvidhānamanuṣṭheyāni na tu tato 'dhikamāvartanīyāni pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15900: yatra punaḥ sakṛdupadeśa upāsītetyādiṣu tatra sakṛdeva prayogaḥ prayājādivaditi prāpta ucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15908: na caitānyanāvṛttāni satkāradīrghakālanairantaryeṇa sākṣātkāravate tādṛśānubhavāya kalpante /
GSP33vacbhamu:15910: na khalu pittopahṛtendriyasya guḍe tiktatāsākṣātkāro 'ntareṇamādhuryasākṣātkāraṃ sahasreṇāpyupapattibhirnivartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15911: atadvato narāntaravacāṃsivopapattisahasrāṇi vā parāmṛśato 'pi thūtkṛtya guḍatyāgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15917: tathāca nityasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo nitya eveti kṛtamatra pratyayāvṛtyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15924: virodhe vā tasya nityatvānnāvidyodīyeta kuta eva tu tena sahānuvarteta /
GSP33vacbhamu:15929: na khalu jyotiṣṭomavākyārthapratyayaḥ śataśo 'pyāvartamānaḥ sākṣātkārapramāṇaṃ svaviṣaye janayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15936: vākyaṃ cedyuktyapekṣaṃ sākṣātkārāya prabhavatitathā sati kṛtamāvṛtyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15940: na yuktivākye sākṣātkāraphale pratyakṣasyaiva pramāṇasya tatphalatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15941: te tu parokṣārthāvagāhinī sāmānyamātramabhiniviśate natu viśeṣaṃ sākṣātkuruta iti tadviśeṣasākṣātkārāyāvṛttirupāsyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15942: sā hi satkāradīrghakālanairantaryasevitā satī dṛḍhabhūmirviśeṣa sākṣātkārāya prabhavati kāminībhāvaneva straiṇasya puṃsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15946: sa khalvayaṃ sākṣātkāraḥ śāstra yuktiyonirvā syādbhāvanāmātrayonirvā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15947: na tāvatparokṣābhāsavijñānaphale śāstrayuktī sākṣātkāralakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaphalaṃ prasotumarhataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15954: kaścitkhalu śuddhasatvogarbhastha iva vāmadevaḥ śrutvā ca matvā ca kṣaṇamavadhāya jīvātmano brahmātmatamanubhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15956: ataścāvṛranarthikā yanniraṃśasya grahaṇamadrahaṇaṃ vā na tu vyaktāvyaktatve sāmānyavaśeṣavatpadmarāgādivadityata āha
GSP33vacbhamu:15960: ayamabhisandhiḥ---satyaṃ na brahmasākṣātkāraḥ sākṣādāgamayukttiphalamapi tu yuktyāgamārthajñānāhitasaṃskārasacivaṃ citameva brahmaṇi sākṣātkāravartīṃ buddhivṛttiṃ samādhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:15961: sā ca nānumānitavahmisākṣātkāravatprātibhatvenāpramāṇaṃ tadānīṃ vahnisvalakṣaṇasyaparokṣatvātsadātanaṃ tu brahmasvarūpasyopādhirūṣitasya jīvasyāparokṣatvam
GSP33vacbhamu:15971: pratyayapravāhe sākṣātkārāvadhau vyaktitāratamyaṃ prati kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15972: tadevaṃ vākyamātrasyārthe 'pi na drāgityeva pratyaya ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15973: tatvamasīti tu vākyamatyantadurgrahapadārthaṃ na padārthajñānapūrvake svārthe jñāne drāgityeva pravartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15976: syādetat padārthasaṃsargātmā vākyārthaḥ padārthajñānakrameṇa tadadhīnanirūpaṇīyatayā kramavatpratītiryujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15977: brahma tu niraṃśatvenāsasṛṣṭanānātvapadarthakamiti kasyānukramema kramavatī pratītiriti sakṛdeva tadgṛhyeta na vā gṛhyatetyuktamityata āha
GSP33vacbhamu:15981: tatkiṃmiyameva vākyajanitā pratītirātmani tathāca na sākṣātpratītirātmanyanāgataphalatvādasya ityata āha
GSP33vacbhamu:15983: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---vākyārthaśravaṇamananottarakālā viśeṣaṇatrayavatī bhāvanā brahma sākṣātkārāya kalpate iti vākyārthapratītiḥ sākṣātkārasya pūrvarūpamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15987: duḥkhitvādipratyayaścātmani sarveṣāṃ sarvadotpadyata ityabādhitatvātsamīcina iti balavānna śakyo 'panetumityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15993: uktaṃ cāsya tatra tatropapatyā bādhanamevaṃ duḥkhitvādyabhimāno 'pi tathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15994: nahi nityaśuddhabuddhasvabhāvasyātmanā upajanāpāyadharmaṇo duḥkhaśokādaya ātmano bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15996: nahi gauraśvasya dharmaḥ saṃbandhasyāpi vyatirekāvyatirekābhyāṃ saṃbandhāsaṃbandhābhyāṃ ca vicārāsahatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16004: kasmādanubhavārtha evāvṛtyabhyupagamo yāvatā draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavya ityādibhistatvamasivākyaviṣayādanyaviṣayaivāvṛttirvidhāsyata ityata āha
GSP33vacbhamu:16006: . ātmā vā are draṣṭavya ityādyātmaviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16007: na ca tattvamasīvākyaviṣayādanyadātmadarśanamāmnātaṃ yenopakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate sa vākyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16008: sadeva somyedamiti copakramya tattvamasītyupasaṃhṛta iti sa eva vākyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16012: nanu vidhipradhānatvādvākyasya na bhūtārthapradhānatvaṃ bhūtastvarthastadaṅgatayā pratyāyyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16013: yathāhuḥ 'codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantam' ityādi śābaraṃ vākyaṃ vyācakṣāṇāḥ--'kāryamarthamavagamayantū codanā taccheṣatayā bhūtādikamavagamayati' ityāśaṅkyāha---
GSP33vacbhamu:16015: yathā tāvadbhūtārthaparyavasitā vedāntā na kāryavidhiniṣṭāstathopapāditaṃ 'tattu samanvayāt'
GSP33vacbhamu:16019: yadyapi tatvamasūtyādyāḥ śrutayaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ pratipādayanti tathāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:16024: naca yathā samāropitaṃ sarpatvamanūdya rajjutvaṃ purovartino dravyasya.vidhīyata evaṃ prakāśātmano jīvabhāvamanūdya paramātmatvaṃ vidhīyata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16025: yuktaṃ hi purovartini dravye drāghīyasi sāmānyarūpeṇālocite viśeṣarūpeṇāgṛhīte viśeṣāntarasamāropaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16026: iha tu prakāśātmano nirviśeṣasāmānyasyāparādhīnaprakāśasya nāgṛhītamasti kiñcidrupamiti kasya viśeṣasyāgrahe kiṃ viśeṣāntaraṃ samāropyatām /
GSP33vacbhamu:16027: tasmādbrahmaṇo jīvabhāvāropāsaṃbhavājjīvo jīvo brahma ca hrahmeti tatvamasīti pratīkopadeśa eveti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16028: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate---śvetaketorātmaiva parameśvaraḥpratipattavyo na tu śvetaketorvyatiriktaḥ parameśvaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16029: bhede hi gauṇatvāpattirna ca mukhyasaṃbhave gauṇatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16030: apica pratīkopadeśe sakṛdvacanaṃ tu pratīyate bhedadarśananindā ca(?) /
GSP33vacbhamu:16035: naca mānāntaravirodha ityādi tu sarvamupāditaṃ prathamādhyāye /
GSP33vacbhamu:16037: kasyacidaṃśasyāgrahaṇādvibhrama iva paramārthastu na vibhramo nāma kaścinna ca saṃsāro nāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:16041: anye 'pyāhuḥ---'yadyadvaite toṣo 'sti mukta evāsi sarvadā ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16044: yathā hi śāstroktaṃ śuddhamukcatasvabhāvaṃ brahmātmatvenaiva jīvenopāsyate 'haṃ brahmāsmi
GSP33vacbhamu:16045: tatvamasi śvetaketo ityādiṣu tkasya hetorjīvātmano brahmarūpeṇa tātvikatvādadvitīyamiti śruteśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:16046: jīvātmanaścāvidyādarpaṇā yathā brahmapratibimbakāstathā yatra yatra mano brahmādityo
GSP33vacbhamu:16047: brahmetyādiṣu brahmadṛṣṭerupadeśastatra sarvatrāhaṃ mana ityādi draṣṭavyaṃ brahmaṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:16058: tasmādyasya yanmātrātmatayopāsanaṃ vihitaṃ tasya tanmātrātmatayaiva pratipattavyaṃ 'yāvadvacanaṃ vācanikam 'iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16060: naca sarvasya vākyajātasya prapañcasya vilayaḥ prayojanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16061: tadarthatve hi mana iti pratīkagrahaṇamanarthakaṃ viśvamiti vācyaṃ yathā sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16069: nanu yathāvacchinnasyāhaṅkarāspadasyānavacchinnabrahmātmatayā bhavatyābhāva evaṃ pratīkānāmapi bhaviṣyatītyata āha---
