GSP33vacbhamu:16075: etadato.bhavati---pradhānībhūtānāṃ na pratīkānāmucchedo yukto naca taducchede vidheyasyāpyupapattiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16080: tathāca tatra yathālokapratītivyavasthito jīvaḥ kartā bhoktā ca saṃsārī na brahmeti
GSP33vacbhamu:16084: pratīkāni tu manaḥprabhṛtīnibrahmavikārastathāpyavacchinnatayā jīvātmanaḥ pratīkaiḥ sāmyaṃ dṛṣṭavyam //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16086: yadyapi sāmānādhikaraṇmubhayathāpi ghaṭate tathāpi brahmaṇaḥ sarvādhyakṣatayā phalaprasavasāmarthyena
GSP33vacbhamu:16089: na caivaṃvidhe 'vadhṛte śāstrārthe nikṛṣṭadṛṣṭinorkṛṣṭa iti laukiko nyāyo 'pavādāya prabhavatyāgamavirodhena tasyaivāpoditatvāditi pūrvapakṣasaṃkṣepaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:16090: satyaṃ sarvādhyakṣatayā phalādātṛtvena brahmaṇa eva sarvatra vāstavaṃ prādhānyaṃ tathāpi śabdagatyanurodhena kvacitkarmaṇa eva prādhānyamavasūyate
GSP33vacbhamu:16093: atra hi sarvatra yāgādyārādhitā devataiva phalaṃ prayacchatīti sthāpitaṃ tathāpi śabdataḥ karmaṇaḥ karaṇatvāvagamane phalavatvapratūte- prādhānyam
GSP33vacbhamu:16095: taduktaṃ ----'yaistu dravyaṃ saṃcikīrṣyate guṇastatra pratīyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16096: tadiha yadyapi sarvādhyakṣatayā vastuto brahmaiva phalaṃ prayacchati tathāpi śāstraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16097: brahmabuddhyā'dityādau pratika upāsyamāne brahma phalāya kalpate ityabhivadati kiṃvādityādibuddhyā
GSP33vacbhamu:16098: brahmaiva viṣayīkṛtaṃ palāyetyubhayathāpi brahmaṇaḥ sarvādhyakṣasya phaladānopapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:16102: na kevalaṃ laukiko nyāyo niścaye heturapi tu ādityādiśabdānāṃ prāthamyena mukhyārthatvamapītyāha
GSP33vacbhamu:16105: tathāhi ----svaravṛtyā ādityādiśabdā yathā svārthe vartante tathā brahmaśabdo 'pi svārthe vartsyati yadi svārtho 'sya vapavakṣitaḥsyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16106: tathācetiparatvamanarthakaṃ tasmāditinā svārthātpracyāvya brahmapadaṃ jñānaparaṃ svarūpaparaṃ vā kartavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16108: pratūtipara evāyamitiparaḥśabdo yathā gauriti me gavayo 'bhavaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:16109: tathāca ādityādayo brahmeti pratipattavyā ityartho bhavatītyāha---
GSP33vacbhamu:16114: satsvapi ādityādiṣu phalānutpādādutpattimataḥ karmaṇa eva phaladarśanātkarmaiva phalavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:16117: ādityadiṣu punarudgīthādidṛṣṭāvudgīthādibudyopāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmātmakaḥsantaḥ phalāya kalpiṣyanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16118: ata eva ca pṛthvyagnyorṛksāmaśabdaprayoga upapanno yataḥ pṛthvyāmṛgdṛṣṭiradhyastāgnau ca sāmadṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16119: sāmni punaragnidṛṣṭau ṛci ca pṛthvīdṛṣṭau viparītaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:16124: evaṃ khalvadhikaraṇanirdeśo viṣayatvapratipādanapara upapadyate yadi lokeṣu sāmadṛṣṭiradhyasyeta nālyatheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16130: nahyādityādibhiḥ kiñcitkriyate yadvidyayā viryavattaraṃ bhavatītyādityamatīnāmupapadyate udgīthādiṣu saṃskārakatvenopayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16133: yatra hi karmaṇa- phalaṃ tatraivaṃ bhavatu yatra tu guṇātaphalaṃ tatra guṇasya siddhatvenākāryatvātkarotītyeva nāstītyatra vidyāyāḥ kva upayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16136: na tāvadguṇaḥ siddhasvabhāvaḥ kāryāya phalāya paryāptaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16138: tasmātprakṛtāpūrvasaṃniveśinaḥ phalotpāda iti tasya kriyamāṇatvena vidyayā vīryavattaratvopapattiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16147: api tu māṇavaka ivāgnidṛṣṭiḥ kenacittīvratvādinā guṇena gauṇyanabhibhūtamāṇavakatvāttathehāpi /
GSP33vacbhamu:16156: tatra yadi sāmadhīradhyasyeta tato na sāmānyupāsyeran api tu lokāḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16157: tathā ca dvitīyārthaṃ parityajya tṛtīyārthaḥ parikalpayeta sāmneti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16159: akāre gāvo vāsyantāṃ prāvāre kusumānītivat tenoktanyānurodhena saptamyāścobhayathāpyavaśyaṃ kalpanīyārthatvādvaraṃ yathāśrutadvitīyārthānurodhāya tṛtīyārthe saptamī vyākhyātavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16161: nanu yatrobhayatrāpi dvitīyānirdeśo yathā khalvamumevādityaṃ saptavidhaṃ hiṅkāraprastāvoṅkārodgīthapratīhāropadravanidhanaprakāraṃ sāmopāsīteti,
GSP33vacbhamu:16164: tatrāpi samastasya saptavidhasya sāmna upāsanamiti sāmna upāsyatvaśruteḥ sādhviti pañcavidhasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:16167: hiṅkārānuvādena pṛthivīdṛṣṭividhāne hiṅkāraḥ pṛthivīti prāpte viparītanirdeśaḥ pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16169: karmāṅgasaṃmandhiṣu yatra hi tiṣṭhataḥ karma coditaḥ tatra tatsaṃbaddhopāsānāni tiṣṭhataiva kratavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16172: pramāṇatantrā ca vastuvyavasthā pramāṇaṃ ca .....nāpekṣata iti tatrāpyaniyamaḥ(?) /
GSP33vacbhamu:16176: tatra codakaśāstrābhāvādaniyame prāpte yathā śakāyata ityupabhandhādāsīnasyaiva siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:16177: nanu yasyāmavasthāyāṃ dhyāyatirupacariyate prayujyate kimasau tadā tiṣṭhato na bhavati na bhavatītyāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:16181: same śucau śarkarāvahnivālukāvivarjita ityādivacanānniyame siddhe digdeśādiniyamamavācanikamapi prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajetetivadvaidikārambhasāmānyātkvacitkaścitadāśaṅkate
GSP33vacbhamu:16190: śāstraṃ hi niyojyasya kāryarūpaniyegasaṃbandhamavabodhayati tasyaiva karmaṇyaiśvaryalakṣaṇamadhikāraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16192: jīvanmuktena dṛṣṭatvānnāstīha tirohitamiva kiñcaneti kimatra śāstraṃ kariṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16193: nanvevamapyabhyudayaphalānyupāsanāni tatra niyoganiyojyalakṣaṇasya ca kramaṇi svāmitālakṣaṇasya
GSP33vacbhamu:16198: tāni khalu āprāyaṇaṃ tattadupāsyagocarabuddhipravāhavāhitayā dṛṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa prāyaṇasamaye tadbuddiṃ bhāvayiṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16199: kimatra phalavatprāyaṇasamaye buddhyākṣepeṇa nahi dṛṣṭe saṃbhavatyadṛṣṭakalpanā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16203: tathā ca śrutiḥ sarvādīndriyaviṣaya--'sa yathākraturasmāllokāt praiti tāvatkraturhāmuṃ lokaṃ pretyabhisaṃbhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16209: tatra tāvatprathamamidaṃ vicāryate kiṃ brahmādhigame brahmajñāne sati brahmajñānaphalānmokṣādviparītaphalaṃ duritaṃ bandhanaphalaṃ kṣīyate na kṣīyata iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16211: śāstreṇa hi phalāya yadvihitaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ cānarthaparihārāyāśvamedhādi brahmahatyādi
GSP33vacbhamu:16213: sa hi tasya vināśahetusdabhāve kathaṃ vinaśyediti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16215: adattaphalaṃ cetkarmāpūrvaṃ vinaśyati karmaṇa eva phalaprasavasāmarthyabodhakaśāstramapramāṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:16216: naca prāyaścittamiva brahmajñānamadattaphalānyapi karmapūrvāṇi kṣiṇotīti sāmpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16218: ata eva smaranti nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16219: yadi punarapekṣitopāyatātmā prāyaścittavidhirna niyojyaviśeṣapratilambhamātreṇa nirvṛṇotītyapekṣitakāṅkṣāyāṃ doṣasaṃyogena śravaṇāttannibarhaṇaphalaḥ kalpeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:16222: śāstraprāmāṇyātsaṃbhaviṣyatyasāvavasthā yasyāmupabhogena samastakarmakṣaye brahmajñānaṃ mokṣaṃ prasoṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16223: yogādhdyairva vā divi bhuvyantarīkṣe bahūni śarīrendriyāṇi nirmāya phalānayupabhujyarddhena yogasāmarthyena yogī karmāṇi kṣapayitvā mokṣī saṃpatsyate
GSP33vacbhamu:16224: sthite caitasminnarthe nyāyabalādyathā puṣkarapalāśa ityādivyapadeśo brahmavidyāstutimātraparatayā
GSP33vacbhamu:16225: vyākhyeya iti prāpta ucyate--vyākhyāyetaivaṃ vyapadeśo yadi karmavirodhaḥ syānna tvayamasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16226: śāstraṃ hi phalotpādanasāmarthyamātraṃ karmaṇāmavagamayati na tu kutaścidāgantukānnimittataḥ prāyaścittādestadapratibandhamapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:16228: yadi śāstrabodhitaphalaprasavasāmarthyamapratibaddhamāgantukena kenacit karmaṇā tatastatphalaṃ prasūta evāti na śāstravyāghātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16231: yatrāpi nirguṇāyāṃ paravidyāyāṃ doṣoddheśo nāsti tatrāpi tatsvabhāvālocanādeva tatprakṣayaprasavasāmarthyamavasīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16232: nahi tatvamasivākyārthaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭanikhilakartṛbhokktṛtvādivibhramo jīvaḥ phalopabhogona yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16233: nahi rajjavāṃ bhujaṅkasamāropanibandhanā bhayakampādayaḥ sati rajjutatvasākṣātkāre prabhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:16235: amumevārthamanuvadanto yathā puṣkarapalāśa ityādayo vyapadeśāḥ samavetārthāḥ santo na stutimātratayā kathañcidvyākhyānamarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16236: nanūktaṃ saṃbhaviṣyanti sāvasthā jīvātmano yasyāṃ paryāyeṇopabhogādvā yogarddheḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:16240: anādikālapravṛttā hi karmāśayā aniyatakālavipākāḥ kramavatā tāvadbhogena kṣetumaśakyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16246: nanu satsvapi karmāśayāntareṣusukhadukhaphaleṣu mokṣaphalāt karmaṇaḥ samudācarato brahmabhāvamanubhūyātha labdhavipākānāṃ karmāntarāṇāṃ phalāni bhokṣyanta ityāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:16248: nahi kāryaḥ sanmokṣo mokṣo bhavitumarhati brahmabhāvo hi saḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16255: apūrvādhānaparamparayā jñānasya mokṣaphale kalpyamāne jñānasya parokṣaphalatvamadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:16259: adharmasya svābhāvikatvena rāgādinibandhanatvena śāstrīyeṇa brahmajñānena pratibandho yuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16264: yathā devadatto dakṣiṇenākṣṇā paśyatītyukte na vāmena paśyatīti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16265: ubhe hyevaiṣa ete taratīti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16267: 'kṣīyante cāsya karmaṇi' iti ca sāmānyavacanaṃ 'sarve pāpmānaḥ' iti viśeṣaśravaṇātpāpakarmāṇīti viśeṣe upasaṃharaṇīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16268: tasmādbrahmajñānādduṣkṛtasyaiva kṣayo na sukṛtasyeti prāpte pūrvādhikaraṇarāddhānto 'tidiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16269: no khalu brahmavidyā kenacidadṛṣṭena dvāreṇa duṣkṛtamapanayatyapi tu dṛṣṭenaiva bhoktṛbhoktavyabhogādipravilayadvāreṇa taccaitattulyaṃ sukṛtepīti kathametadapi nocchindyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16270: evaṃ ca satina śāstrīyatvasāmyamātramavirodhaheturanahi pratyakṣatvasāmānyamātrādavirodho jalānalādīnāṃ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16276: tadyathā puṇyapāpe anukramya sarve pāpmāno 'to nivartaneta ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:16284: māyaivādinaśca puṇyapāpayoścamāyāmātravinirmitatvena māyānivṛttau na puṇyāpuṇye na tatasaṃskāro vastusantīti kasyānuvṛttiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16285: naca rajjau sarpādivibramajanitā bhayakamapādayo nivṛtte 'pi vibhrame yathānuvartante tathehāpīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16286: tatrāpi sarpāsatve 'pi tajjānasya satve tajjanitabhayakampādīnāṃ tatsaskārāṇāṃ ca vastusattvena nivṛtte 'pi vibhrame 'nivṛtteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16287: atra tu māyā na tajjaḥ saṃskāro na tadgocara iti tucchatvātkimanuvarteta /
GSP33vacbhamu:16289: naca tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃmapatya iti śruterdehāpratīkṣārabdhakāryāṇāṃ yuktā. nahyeṣā śrutiravadhibhedavidhāyinyapi tu kṣipratāparā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16290: yathā loka etāvanme ciraṃ yatsanāto bhuñjānaśceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16291: nahi tatra snānabhojane avadhitvena vidhīyate kitu kṣapīyastā pratipādyate. ubhayavidhāne
GSP33vacbhamu:16294: tathāpyanārabdhavipākaṃ karmajātaṃ drāgityeva samucchinatti na tvārabdhavipākaṃ saṃpāditajātyāyurvitatapūrvāparībhītasukhaduḥkhopabhogapravāhaṃ karmajātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16296: anyathā devarṣīṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhamanūddālakaprabhṛtīnāṃvigalitanikhilakleśajālāvaramatayā paritaḥ pradyotamānabuddhisatvānāṃ na jyogjīvitā bhavet
GSP33vacbhamu:16297: śrūyate caiṣāṃ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tatvajñatā ca mahākalpakalpamanvantarādijīvitā ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:16298: na caite mahadhiyo na tadīyasamastaphalopabhogapratīkṣā satyapi tatvasākṣātkāre /
GSP33vacbhamu:16299: tāvadeva ciramiti na ciratā vidhīyate. api tu śrutyantarasiddhāṃ ciratāmanūdya dehapātāvadhimātravidhānaṃ tadetadabhisaṃdhāyaucityamātratayāha bhagavān bhāṣyākāraḥ---
GSP33vacbhamu:16301: na cedaṃ na jātu dṛṣṭaṃ yadviredhisamavāye viroddhyantaramanuvartata ityāha---
GSP33vacbhamu:16303: yadā loke 'pi virodhinoḥ kiñcitkālaṃ sahānuvṛttirupalabdhā tadehagamabalāddīrghakālamapi bhavatīti na śakyā nivārayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:16305: tadevaṃ madhyasthanapratipādya ye bhāṣyakāramāptaṃ manyate tān pratyāha---
GSP33vacbhamu:16313: sa cāsanna nirvacanīya iti kuto vastusataḥ karyotpādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16319: yadi puṇyasyāpyaśleṣavināśau hanta nityamapyagnihotrādi na kartavyaṃ yogamārūrukṣuṇā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16322: naca vividiṣanti yajñena dāneneti mokṣalakṣaṇaikakāryatayā vidyākarmaṇoravirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16324: nahyetamātmānaṃ viduṣo vigalitākhilakartṛtvādiprapañcavibhramasya pūrvottare nitye kriyājanye puṇye saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16325: tasmādvividiṣanti yajñeneti vartamānāpadeśo brahmajñānasya yajñādīnāṃ vā stutimātraṃ na tu mokṣamāṇasya muktisādhanaṃ yajñādividhiriti prāpta ucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16328: naca karmaṇāṃ vidyayā virudhyamānānāṃ na vidyākāraṇatvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16332: evañca vividiṣanti yajñeneti yajñasādhanatvaṃ vidyāya apūrvamarthaṃ prāpayataḥ pañcamalakārasya nātyantaparokṣavṛttitayā jñānastutyarthatayā kathañcidvyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16334: jñānasyeva hi prāpakaṃ satkarama praṇaḍyā mokṣakāraṇamityupacaryate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16335: yata eva na vidyodayasamaye karmāsti nāpi parastādapi tu prāgeva vidyāyāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16344: vināśavacanaṃ śākhāntarīyavacanaṃ ca tasya putrā dāyamupayantīti //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16346: asti vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ yajñādi ya evaṃ vidvānyajetetyādikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16348: tatra yathā brāhmaṇāya hiraṇyaṃ dadyādiyukte viduṣe brāhmaṇāya dadyātra brāhmaṇabruvāya mūkhāyeti viśeṣapratilambhaḥ tatkasya hetostasyātiśayavatvāt
GSP33vacbhamu:16351: prāpte 'bhidhīyate--yadeva vidyayā karāti tadevāsya vīryavattaramiti tarabarthaśrutervidyārahitasya
GSP33vacbhamu:16354: tasmādastyasyāpi kayāpi mātrayā paravidyotpādopayoga iti vidyārahitamapi yajñādi paravidyārthinānuṣṭheyamiti siddham //18 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16356: anārabdhakārya ityasya nañaḥ phalaṃ bhogena nivṛttiṃ darśayatyanena sūtreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:16357: asya tūpapādanaṃ purastādapakṛṣya kṛtamiti neha kriyate punaruktibhayāt //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16358: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:16361: athāsmin phalavicāralakṣaṇe vāṅmanasi saṃpadyata ityādivicāro 'saṃgata ityata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:16363: aparavidyāphalaprāptyarthadevayānamārgārthatvādutkrāntestadgato vicāraḥ pāramparyeṇa bhavati phalavicāra iti nāsaṃgata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16364: nanvayamutkrāntikramo viduṣo nopapadyate 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantyatraiva samavanīyante' iti śravaṇāttatkathamasya vidyādhikāra ityata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:16379: tattvasya dharmiṇo vācaḥ pralayavivakṣāyāṃ tviha sarvatraiva paratreha cāvibhāgasāmyātkiṃ paratraiva viṃśiṣyādavibhāga iti na tvatrāpi /
GSP33vacbhamu:16386: āgamo hi dṛṣṭānusārataḥ prakṛtau vikārāṇāṃ layamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:16387: na ca vācaḥ prakṛtirmano yenāsminniyaṃ līyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16393: yata eva prakṛtivikārabhāvābhāvanmanasi na svarūpalayo vāco 'pi tu vṛttilayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16394: ata eva ca sarveṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāmidriyāṇāṃ satyeva savṛttike manasi vṛtteranugatirlayo na svarūpalayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16395: vācastu pṛthak grahaṇaṃ pūrvasūtre udāharaṇāpekṣaṃ na tu tadeveha vivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16397: yadi svaprakṛtau vikārasya layastato manaḥ prāṇe saṃpadyate ityatra manaḥsvarūpasyaiva prāṇe saṃpattyā bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16398: tathā hi manaḥ iti nopacārato vyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16400: annamayaṃ hi somya mana ityannātmatāmāha manasaḥ śrutirāpomayaḥ prāṇa iti ca prāṇasyābātmatām /
GSP33vacbhamu:16402: tathā ca prāṇo manasaḥ prakṛtiriti manaso vṛttimataḥ prāṇe laya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-- satyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:16405: khayoniprāṇāḍikayā tu mitho vikārayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvābhyupagame saṃkarādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16406: tasmādyo yasya sākṣādvikārastasya tatra laya ityannasyāpsu layo na tvabvikāre prāṇe 'nnavikārasya manasaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16407: tathā cātrāpi manovṛttervṛttimati prāṇe layo na tu vṛttimato manasa iti siddham //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16409: prāṇastejasīti tejaḥśabdasya bhūtaviśeṣavacanatvādvijñānātmani cāprasiddheḥ prāṇasya jīvātmanyupagamānugamāvasthānaśrutīnāṃ ca tejoddhāreṇāpyupapatteḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:16413: tasmāttejasyeva prāṇavṛttipravilaya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--- sa prakṛtaḥprāṇo 'dhyakṣe vijñānātmanyavatiṣṭhate tattantravṛttirbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16421: vijñāyate 'neneti vijñānaṃ pañcavṛttiprāṇasahita indriyagrāmastena sahāvatiṣṭhata iti savijñānaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16428: tathāpi sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena vidyānāṃ śrutyantarālocanayā vijñānātmani layo 'vagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16429: na ca tejasastatrāpi laya iti sāmpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16434: tejaḥsahacaritāni bhūtānyupalakṣyantāṃ tejaḥśabdenādhyakṣe tu kimāyātaṃ tasya tadasāhacaryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16437: yadā hyayaṃ prāṇo 'ntarāle 'dhyakṣaṃ prāpyādhyasaṃparkavaśādeva tejaḥprabhṛtīni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi prāpnoti tadopapadyate prāṇastesīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16457: praśaṃsāśabdo 'pi karmaṇāṃ prayojakatayā prakṛṣṭamāśrayatvaṃ brūte sati nikṛṣṭa āśrayāntare tadupapatterityāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:16460: atrābhṛtatvaprāptiśruteḥ paravidyāvantaṃ pratyetaditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16467: sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ hi sphuṭataraḥ pratipipādayiṣite vastuni pratyayo bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16468: na tu viduṣaḥ sakāśādviśeṣavanto 'vidvāṃso vidhīyante yena vidyāprakaraṇavyākhyāto bhavedapi tu vidyāṃ pratipādayituṃ lokasiddhānāṃ tadanuguṇatayā teṣāmanuvāda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16474: ayaṃ vidyopakrama ārambhaḥ prayatna iti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:16475: tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati-- neyaṃ parā vidyā yato nāḍīdvāramāśrayate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16477: na cāsyāmātyantikaḥ kleśapradāho yato na tatrotkrāntirbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:16481: siddhāṃ kṛtvā bījabhāvāvaśeṣaṃ paramātmasaṃpattiṃ vidvadaviduṣorutkrāntiḥ samarthitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16483: kimātmani tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ tatvapravilaya eva saṃpattirāhosvidbījabhāvāvaśeṣeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16487: tatrāprakṛtau na vikāratatvapravilayo yathā manasi na vāgādīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:16488: sarvasya ca janimataḥ prakṛtiḥ parā devateti tattvapralaya evātyantikaḥ syāttejaḥprabhṛtīnāmiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-- 'yonimanye prapadyante śarīratvāya dehinaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16490: ' ityavidyāvataḥ saṃsāramupadiśati śrutiḥ seyamātyantike tattvalaye nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16491: na ca prāyaṇasyaivaiṣa mahimā vidvāsamavidvāṃsaṃ vā pratīti sāṃpratamityāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:16500: kasmānna mūrtāntaraiḥ pratibadhyata iti śaṅkāmapākartumidaṃ sūtram--
GSP33vacbhamu:16504: tacca sūkṣmaṃ svarūpataḥ parimāṇataśca svarūpameva hi tasya tādṛśamadṛśyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16505: yathā cākṣuṣasya tejaso mahato 'pi adṛṣṭavaśādanudbhūtarūpasparśaṃ hi tat /
GSP33vacbhamu:16506: parimāṇataḥ saukṣmyaṃ yato nopalabhyate yathā trasareṇavo jālasūryamarīcibhyo 'nyatra pramāṇatastathopalabdhiriti vyācaṣṭe--
GSP33vacbhamu:16508: ādigrahaṇena cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdho vā anyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhya iti saṃgṛhītam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16512: yathā hi kācābhrapaṭalaṃ svacchasvabhāvasya na tejasaḥ pratidhātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16518: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- dṛṣṭaśrutābhyāmūṣmaṇo 'nvayavyatirekābhyāmasti sthūlāddehādatiriktaṃ kiñciccadāmātsūkṣmaṃ śarīramiti //11 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16526: yadi hi prāṇopalakṣitasya sūkṣmaśarīrasya jīvātmanaḥ sthūlaśarīrādutkrāntiṃ pratiṣedhecchrutiḥ tata etadupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16528: na tasmātprāṇa utkrāmantīti hi tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānāvamarśinābhyudayaniḥ śreyasādhikṛto dehi pradhānaṃ parāmṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16529: tathā ca tasmāddehino na prāṇaḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīramutkrāmantyapi tu tatsahitaḥ kṣetrajña evotkrāmatīti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16530: sa punaratikramya brahmanāḍya saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaparyantaṃ saliṅgo jīvaḥ parasminbrahmaṇi līyate tasmātparāmapi devatāṃ viduṣa utkrāntirata eva mārgaśrutayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16536: tathā hi -- ārtabhāgapraśnottare hyekasminpakṣe saṃsāriṇa eva jīvātmano 'nutkrāntiṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16537: parigṛhya na tarhyeṣa bhṛtaḥ prāṇānāmanutkrānteriti svayamāśaṅkya prāṇānāṃ pravilayaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16540: śarīrasya ca te itiśarīrameva tadapādānaṃ gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16543: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehi parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:16545: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehī parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha--
GSP33vacbhamu:16547: dehadehinordehiparāmarśinā sarvanāmnā deha eva parāmṛṣṭa iti pañcamīpāṭhe vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16550: api ca prāptipūrvaḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāprāpte /
GSP33vacbhamu:16551: aviduṣo hi dehādutkrāmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti viduṣo 'pi tatsāmānyāddehādutkramaṇe prāpte pratiṣedha upapadyate na tu prāṇānāṃ jīvāvadhikaṃ kvacidutkramaṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena tanniṣidhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16552: apicādvaitaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭanikhilaprapañcāvabhāsajātasya gantavyābhāvādeva nāsti gatirityāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:16554: apadasya hi brahmavido mārge padaiṣiṇo 'pi devā iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16562: tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditānīndriyāṇyekādaśa sūkṣmāṇi ca bhūtāni pañca /
GSP33vacbhamu:16571: itarā tu evamevāsya paridṛṣṭuḥ ityādikā vidvatpratipattyapekṣā tāttvikapramāṇāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16575: avidyānimittaśca vibhāgo nāvidyāyāṃ vidyayā samūlaghātamapahatāyāṃ sāvaśeṣo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16579: tatra kiṃ vidvānavidvāṃścāviśeṣeṇa mūrdhādibhya utkrāmatyāho vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva,
GSP33vacbhamu:16582: tasyopasaṃhṛtavāgādikalāpasyocciktamiṣato vijñānātmanā oka āyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasyāgraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16583: tasya jvalanaṃ yattatprakāśitadvāro viniṣkramadvāro vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva niṣkrāmati
GSP33vacbhamu:16590: hārdavidyāśeṣabhūtā hi mūrdhanyā nāḍī gatyai upadiṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16591: tadanuśīlanena khalvayaṃ jīvo hārdena sūpāsitena brahmaṇānugṛhītastasyānusmaraṃstadbhāvamāpanno mūrdhanyayaiva śatādhikayā nāḍya niṣkrāmati
GSP33vacbhamu:16592: hṛdayādudgatā hi brahmanāḍī bhāsvarā tālumūlaṃ bhittvā mūrdhānametya raśmibhirekībhūtā ādityamaṇḍalamanupraviṣṭā tāmanuśīlayatastayaivāntakāle nirgamanaṃ bhavatīti //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16594: rātrāvahani cāviśeṣeṇa raśmyanusārī sannādityamaṇḍalaṃ prāpnotīti siddhāntapakṣapratijñā //18 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16600: amuṣmādādityātpratāyante raśmayanta āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā bhavanti ya ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante
GSP33vacbhamu:16604: candramasā khalvaṃmayena saṃbadhyamānānāṃ sūrīṇāṃ bhāsāṃ candrikātvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16606: ye tyāhuḥ-- sa yāvatkṣipyenmanastāvadādityaṃ gacchediti nirapekṣaśravaṇādrātrau prete nāsti raśmyapekṣeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16610: ye tu manyante vidvānapi rātriprāyaṇāparādhena nordhvamākramata iti tānpratyāha--
GSP33vacbhamu:16612: nityavatphalasaṃbandhena vihitā vidyā na pākṣikaphalā yukteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16613: ye tu rātrau pretasya viduṣo 'harapekṣāṃ sūryamaṇḍalaprāptirācakṣate tanmatamāśaṅkyāha---
GSP33vacbhamu:16625: viduṣo 'pi ca bhīṣmasyottarāyaṇapratīkṣaṇamaviduṣa ācāraṃ grāha- yati 'yadyadācarati śreṣṭhastattadevetaro janaḥ' iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16631: kāla evātra prādhānyenocyate na tvātivāhikī devatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16632: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryate smārte caite /
GSP33vacbhamu:16633: smārtīmupāsanāṃ pratyayaṃ smārtaḥ kālabhedaviniyogaḥ pratyāsatteḥ na tu śrautīṃ pratītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16634: atra yadi smṛtau kālabhedavidhiḥ śrautau cāgnijyotirādividhistatrāgnyādīnāmātivāhikatayā viṣayavyavasthayā virodhābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16635: atha pratyabhijñānaṃ tathāpi yatra kāla ityatrāpi kālābhidhānadvāreṇātivāhikya eva devatā uktā ityavirodha eveti //21 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16636: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16641: gantavyamekaṃ nagaraṃ prati vakreṇādhvanā gatimapekṣya ṛjunādhvanā gatistvarāvatī kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16643: atha taireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ nopapadyate pathyantarasya nivartanīyasyābhāvāttasmātparānapekṣā
GSP33vacbhamu:16644: evaite panthāna ekabrahmalokaprāptyupāyā vrīhiyavāviva vikalperanniti prāpte pratyucyate-
GSP33vacbhamu:16647: saparvā hi panthā nagarādikamekaṃ gantavyaṃ prāpayati nābhāgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16648: tatra kimete raśmyaharvāyusūryādayo 'dhvanaḥ parvāṇaḥ santo 'dhvanaikena yujyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:16649: āho yathāyathamadhvānamapi bhindantīti saṃdehe 'bhede 'pyadhvano bhāgabhedopapatterna bhāgibhedakalpanocitā,
GSP33vacbhamu:16652: athaitaireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ na tāvadarthāntaranivṛttyarthaṃ tatprāpakaireva vākyāntarairvirodhāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:16654: na caikaṃ vākyamaprāptamadhvānaṃ prāpayati tasya cānapekṣatāṃ pratipādayatītyarthadvayāya paryāptaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16657: na khalvekasminneva gantavye pathibhedamapekṣya tvarāvakalpyate kintu gantavyabhedādapi tadupapattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16658: yathā kaśmīrebhyo mathurāṃ kṣipraṃ yāti caitra iti tathehāpyanyataḥ kutaścidgantavyādanenopāyena brahmalokaṃ kṣipraṃ prayātīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16660: ayamarthaḥ-ekatvātprāptavyasya brahmalokasyālpaparvaṇā mārgeṇa tatprāptau saṃbhavantyāṃ bahumārgopadeśo vyarthaḥ prasajyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16662: tasmādbhūyasāṃ parvaṇāmavirodhenālpānāṃ tadanupraveśa eva yukta iti //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16666: ' 'sa vāyumāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya khaṃ tena sa ūrdhvamākramate'
GSP33vacbhamu:16667: iti hi vāyunimittamūrdhvākramaṇaṃ śrutaṃ na tu vāyunimittamādityagamanaṃ 'sa ādityaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16675: bhavedetadevaṃ yadyūrdhvaśabdātkaścillokabhedaḥ pratīyeta sa tūparideśamātravācī lokabhedādvināparyavasyaṃllokabhedavācināditye vyavasthāpyate
GSP33vacbhamu:16677: pāṭhaḥ padārthamātrapradarśanārtho na tu kramāya prabhavati śrutivirodhāditi siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:16678: vājasaneyināṃ saṃvatsaraloko na paṭhyate chāndogyānāṃ devaloko na paṭhyate tatrobhayānurodhādubhayapāṭhe māsasaṃbandhātsaṃvatsaraḥ pūrvaḥ paścimo devalokaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16679: nahi māso devalokena saṃbadhyate kintu saṃvatsareṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:16680: tasmāttayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhānmāsārabhyatvācca saṃvatsarasya māsānantarye sthite devalokaḥ saṃvatsarasya parastādbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16681: tatrādityānantaryāya vāyoḥ saṃvatsarādityasya sthāne devalokādvāyumiti paṭhitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16695: na caiṣāṃ tvāvadhikānāmiva niyamavatī saṃvahanasvarūpā svatanantrakriyā buddhipūrvā saṃbhavatyacetanānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:16698: na heturnāguṇe hetau pañcamī dṛśyate kvacit //
GSP33vacbhamu:16699: jāḍyādbaddha ityādiṣu guṇavacaneṣu jāḍyādiṣu hetupañcamī dṛṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16700: na cārcirādiśabdā guṇavācino yena pañcamyā teṣāṃ vahanaṃ prati hetutvamucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16702: na cāmānavasya puruṣasya vidyudādiṣu voḍhṛtvadarśanādarcirādīnāmapi voḍhṛtvānnāmānavaḥ puruṣo voḍhā śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16704: tasmādbhogabhūmaya evārcirādayo nātivāhikā iti prāpte pratyucyate -saṃpiṇḍakaraṇānāṃ hi sūkṣmadehavatāṃ gatau /
GSP33vacbhamu:16705: na svātantryaṃ na cāgnyādyā netāro 'cetanāstu te //
GSP33vacbhamu:16706: īdṛśī hi niyamavatī gatiḥ svayaṃ vā prekṣāvato 'prekṣāvato vā prekṣāvatprayuktasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:16708: jīvātmāno mattamūrcchicavatsvayaṃ prekṣāvanto yadevaṃ svātantryeṇa gaccheyustadyadyarcirādayo
GSP33vacbhamu:16711: na caitebhyo 'nyasya cetanasya netuḥ kalpanā sati śrutānāṃ caitanyasaṃbhave /
GSP33vacbhamu:16714: tasmādvyavasthita eva parameśvarasya sarvādhyakṣatve yathā yathātvaṃ lokapālādīnāṃ svātantryamevamihāpyarcirādīnāmātivāhikatvameva darśanānusārācchabdārtha iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16718: arciṣa iti ca hetau pañcamī nāpādāne /
GSP33vacbhamu:16724: yathā brāhmaṇamānaya bhojayitavya iti tadviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ yadā tatsaṃnidhāvupanipatati padaṃ kaṇṭhādi(?)
GSP33vacbhamu:16727: vidyullokamāgato 'mānavaḥ puruṣo vaidyutastenaiva na tu varuṇādinā svayamuhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16729: varuṇādayastu tatsāhāyake vartamānā voḍhāro bhavantīti ca vaiṣamyaṃ na voḍhṛtve iti sarvamavadātam //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16733: kiṃ paraṃ brahma gamayatyāhosvidaparaṃ kāryaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16736: brahma gamayatītyatra hi napuṃsakaṃ brahmapadaṃ parasminneva brahmaṇi nirūḍhatvādanapekṣatayā mukhyamiti sati saṃbhave na kārye brahmaṇi guṇakalpanayā vyākhyātumucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16739: kiñca tatra tatra parameva brahma prakṛtya prajāpatisadmapratipattyādaya ucyamānā nāparabrahmaviṣayā bhavitumarhanti prakaraṇavirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16740: na ca parasmintsarvagate gatirnopapadyate prāptatvāditi yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16742: yathaikasminnyagrodhapādape mūlādagramagrācca mūlaṃ gacchataḥ śākhāmṛgasyaikenaiva nyagrodhapādapena nirantaraṃ saṃyogavibhāgā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16743: na caite tadavayavaviṣayī na tu nyagrodhaviṣayā iti sāmprataṃ tathā sati na śākhāmṛgo nyagrodhena yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16745: evaṃ dṛśyamānānāmapi tadavayavānāṃ na yogastadavayavayogāttadantena krameṇa tadavayaveṣu paramāṇuṣu vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16746: te cātīndriyā iti kasminnu nāmāyamanubhavapaddhatimadhyāstāṃ saṃyogatapasvī /
GSP33vacbhamu:16750: lokaśabdaścālokane prakāśe vartayitavyo na tu sanniveśavati deśaviśeṣe /
GSP33vacbhamu:16752: yathā vidyākarmavaśādarcirādinā gatasya satyalokamatikramya paraṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ brahma lokamālokaṃ svayaṃ prakāśakamiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:16753: prāptasya tatraiva liṅgaṃ pralīyate na tu gatimevaṃbhūtāṃ vinā liṅgapravilaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16754: ata eva śrutiḥ- puruṣamāṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16755: tadanenābhisandhinā paraṃ brahma gamayatyamānava iti mene jaiminirācāryaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16761: advaitabrahmatattvasākṣātkāravatastu vigalitanikhilaprapañcāvabhāsavibhramasya na gantavyaṃ na gatirna gamayitāra iti kiṃ kena saṃgatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16763: naca tatrāpi prāptaprāptiḥ karmajena hi vibhāgena niruddhāyāṃ pūrvaprāptāvaprāptasyaivottaraprāpterutpatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16764: etadapi vastuto vicārasahatayā sarvamanirvacanīyaṃ vijṛmbhitamavidyāyāḥ samutpannādvaitatattvasākṣātkāro na vidvānabhimanyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16767: paravidyāvata utkrāntipratiṣedhāt 'brahmaiva sanbrahmāpyeti na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmanti atraiva samavanīyante' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16768: yathā vidyābrahmaprāptyoḥ samānakālatā śrūyate- 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' 'ānandaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16769: brahmaṇo vidvānna bibheti' 'tadātmānameva vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti tatsarvamabhavat' 'tatra
GSP33vacbhamu:16770: ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ' iti paurvāparyāśravaṇāt paravidyāvato muktiṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16773: na khalu brahmaivedaṃ viśvamahaṃ brahmāsmīti paribhāvanābhuvā jīvātmano brahmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇonmūlitāyāmanavayavenāvidyāyāmasti
GSP33vacbhamu:16776: śraddhāvihīnasya dṛṣṭārthāni karmāṇi phalanti na phalanti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:16777: adṛṣṭārthānāṃ tu phale kā kathetyuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
GSP33vacbhamu:16778: na cārcirādimārgabhāvanāyāḥ parabrahmaprāptyarthamaviduṣaḥ pratyupadeśastathā ca karmāntareṣviva nityādiṣu tatrāpi syāttasya pravṛttirapi sāmpratam
GSP33vacbhamu:16781: na tāvadanapekṣā 'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' iti parabrahmavijñānādanyasyādhvanaḥ sākṣātpratiṣedhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16782: paravidyāpekṣatve tu mārgabhāvanāyāḥ kimiyaṃ vidyākārye mārgabhāvanā sāhāyakamācaratyatha vidyotpāde /
GSP33vacbhamu:16783: na tāvadvidyākārye tayā saha tasyā dvaitādvaitagocaratayā mitho virodhena sahāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16789: lokatvaṃ celāvṛttādivatsanniveśaviśeṣavati bhogabhūmau nirūḍhaṃ na kathañcidyogena prakāśe vyākhyātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16791: aprāmāṇikānāṃ bahupralāpāḥ sarvagatasya dravyasya guṇāḥ sarvagatā eva caitanyānandādayaśca
GSP33vacbhamu:16792: guṇinaḥ paramātmano bhedābhedavanto guṇā ityādayo dūṣaṇāyānubhāṣyamāṇā apyaprāmāṇikatvamāvahantyasmākamityupekṣitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16794: pratyagātmatvācca gantṝṇāṃpratiprati añcati gacchatīti pratyak pratibhāvavṛtti brahma tadātmatvādgantṝṇāṃ jīvātmanāmiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16813: saṃyogavibhāgaiḥ saṃyujyatāmayaṃ punaḥ paramātmā nirastanikhilabhedaprapañcaḥ kūṭasthanityo
GSP33vacbhamu:16828: api ceyaṃ gatirna vicāraṃ sahata ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:16832: atha kasmādātyantikamananyatvaṃ na kalpyata ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:16834: mṛdātmatayā hi svabhāvena ghaṭādayo bhāvāstadvikārā vyāptāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16835: tadabhāve na bhavanti śiṃśapeva vṛkṣatvābhāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16839: anyānanyatve api caikasya virodhādasaṃbhavantī iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16841: tathāca brahmaṇyasaṃsaratyapi jīvasya saṃsāraḥ kalpyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16849: apica jīvānāṃ brahmāvayavatvapariṇāmātyantabhedapakṣeṣu tāttvikī saṃsāriteti muktau svabhāvahānājjīvānāṃ vināśaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16850: brahmavivartatve tu brahmaivaiṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ pratibimbānāmiva bimbaṃ taccāvināśīti na jīvavināśa ityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:16855: yathā hi kaphanimitto jvara upāttasya kaphasya viśeṣaṇādibhiḥ prakṣaye kaphāntarotpattinimittadadhyādivarjane praśānto 'pi na punarbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16856: evaṃ karmanimitto bandha upāttānāṃ karmaṇāmupabhogātprakṣaye praśāmyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16857: karmāntarāmaṇāṃ ca bandhahetūnāmananuṣṭhānātkāraṇābhāve kāryānupapatterbandhābhāvātsvabhāvasiddho mokṣa ārogyamiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:16871: yadi hi nityanaimittikāni karmāṇi sukṛtamapi duṣkṛtamiva nirvaheyustataḥ kāmyakarmopadeśā dattajalāñjalayaḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:16872: nahyasti kaściccāturvarṇye cāturāśramye vā yo na nityanaimittikāni karmāṇi karoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16877: samyagdarśī hi viraktaḥ kāmyaniṣiddhe varjayannapi pramādādupanipatite tenaivasamyagdarśanena kṣapayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16878: jñānaparipāke ca na karotyeva ajñastu nipuṇo 'pi pramādātkaroti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16879: kṛte ca na kṣapayituṃ kṣamata iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16881: kartṛtvabhoktṛtve samākṣiptakriyābhoge te cedātmanaḥ svabhāvāvadhārite na tvāropite tato na śakyāvapanetum /
GSP33vacbhamu:16884: no khalu nīlamanīlaṃ śakyaṃ śakreṇāpi kartuṃ tadidamuktaṃ-
GSP33vacbhamu:16886: samāropitasya tvanirvacanīyasya tatsvabhāvasya śakyastattvajñānenāvaropaḥ kartuṃ sarpasyeva rajjutattvajñāneneti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16892: kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayornimittasaṃbandhasya ca śaktidvāreṇa nityatvādbhaviṣyati kadācideṣāṃ samudācāro yataḥ sukhaduḥkhe bhojyete iti saṃbhāvanātaḥ kutaḥ kaivalyaniścaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16899: santi hi mano brahmetyupāsītetyādyāḥ pratīkaviṣayā vidyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16900: tadvanto 'pyarcirādimārgeṇa kāryabrahmopāsakā iva gantumarhanti 'aniyamaḥ sarvāsām' ityaviśeṣeṇa vidyāntareṣvapi gateravadhāraṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16902: naca brahmakratava eva brahmalokabhājo nātatkratava ityapyekāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16904: na caite na brahmakratavo mano brahmetyupāsītetyādau sarvatra brahmānugamena tatkratutvasyāpi saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16909: kimiva hi vacanaṃ na kuryāt nāsti vacanasyātibhāra iha tu tadabhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16910: 'taṃ yathāyathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti śruterautsargikyānnāsati viśeṣavacane 'pavādo yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16914: āśrayāntarapratyayasyāśrayāntare prakṣepaḥ pratīka iti hi vṛddhāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16915: brahmāśrayaśca pratyayo nāmādiṣu prakṣipta iti nāmatantraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16920: na hyevamubhayathābhāva ubhayathārthatve kāṃścitpratīkālambanānna nayati vikāralambanānviduṣastu
GSP33vacbhamu:16921: nayatītyabhyupagame kaściddoṣo 'sti 'aniyamaḥ sarvāsām' ityasya nyāyasyeti sarvamavadātam //15 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16922: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16925: prāgabhūtasya niṣpattau kartṛtvaṃ na sato yataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16934: sveneti prāptamanūdyata iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-saṃbhavatyarthavattve hi nānarthakyamupeyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16936: anadhigatāvabodhanaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ śābdamagatyā kathañcidanuvādatayā varṇyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16939: sata iva ghaṭādeḥ sāṃvyavahārikeṇa pramāṇena bandhavigamasyāpi niṣpatterlokasiddhatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16947: nanu jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti paurvāparyaśravaṇāt svarūpaniṣpatteranyā jyotirupasaṃpattiḥ tathāca bhautikatve 'pi na mokṣavyāghātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16948: bhavedetadevaṃ yadi jyotirupasaṃpadya tat parityajediti śrūyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:16949: tadadhyāhāre 'pi tatpratipādanavaiyarthyaṃ tadaparityāge ca jyotiṣaiva svena rūpeṇeti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16950: tasya ca bhūtatve vikāratvānmaraṇadharmakatvaprasiddheramuktitvamiti prāpte pratyucyate-jyotiṣpadasya mukhyatvaṃ bhautike yadyapi sthitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16952: paraṃ jyotiriti hi parapadasamabhivyāhārātparatvasya cānapekṣasya brahmaṇyeva pravṛttejyotiṣi cāpare kiñcidapekṣya paratvātparaṃ jyotiriti vākyādātmaivātra gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16954: yat saṃpadya niṣpadyata iti tanmukhaṃ vyādāya svapitītivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:16957: yadyapi jīvātmā brahmaṇo na bhinna iti tatra tatropapāditaṃ tathāpi sa tatra paryetītyādhārādheyabhāvavyapadeśasya saṃpattṛsaṃpattavyabhāvavyapadeśasya ca samādhānārthamāha //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16959: upanyāsa uddeśo jñātasya yathā ya ātmāpahatapāpmetyādiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16961: yathā sa tatra paryeti jakṣadramamāṇa iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:16962: tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavatītyetadajñātajñāpanaṃ vidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16970: muktaḥ saṃpadyate svairityāha sma kila jaiminiḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:16971: na ca citsvabhāvasyātmano 'bhāvātmāno 'pahatapāpmatvādayo bhāvātmanaśca sarvajñatvādayo dharmā advaitaṃ ghnanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16979: atha na bhidyante tata ekasmādātmano 'bhedānmitho 'pi na bhidyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:16983: naca dharmiṇa ātmano na bhidyante mithastu bhidyanta iti sāmpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16986: bhedābhedau ca parasparavirodhādekatrābhāvānna saṃbhavata ityupapāditaṃ prathame sūtre /
GSP33vacbhamu:16987: abhāvarūpāṇāmadvaitāvihantṛtve 'pi tasya pāpmādeḥ kālpanikatayā tadadhīnanirūpaṇatayā teṣāmapi kālpanikatvamiti na tāttvikī taddharmatā śliṣyate
GSP33vacbhamu:16991: śabdavikalpajā evaiteapahatapāpmatvādayo na tu sāṃvyavahārikā apīti //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16999: apahatapāpmasatyakāmatvādayastvaupādhikatayātāttvikā api vyāvahārikapramāṇopanītatayā lokasiddhā nātyantāsanto yena tacchabdā rāhoḥ śira itivadavāstavā ityarthaḥ //7 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17003: loke hi kañcidarthaṃ cikīrṣuḥ prayatate prayatamānaḥ samīhate samīhānastamarthamāpnotīti kramo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17005: tena śrutyāpi lokavṛttamanurudhyamānayā viduṣastādṛśa eva kramo 'numantavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17006: avadhāraṇaṃ tu saṃkalpādeveti laukikaṃ yatnagauravamapekṣya vidyāprabhāvato viduṣo yatnalāghavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:17009: yathā manorathamātropasthāpitā strī straiṇānāṃ caramadhātuvisargaheturevaṃ pitrādayo 'pyasya saṃkalpopasthāpitāḥ kalpiṣyante svakāryāyetyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:17011: santi hi khalu kānicidvastusvarūpasādhyāni kāryāṇi yathā strīvastusādhyāni dantakṣatamaṇimālādīni /
GSP33vacbhamu:17013: tatra manorathamātropanīte pitrādau bhavantu tajjñānamātrasādhyāni kāryāṇi natu tatsādhyāni bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17015: puṣkalaṃ bhogamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate- pitrādīnāṃ samutthānaṃ saṃkalpādeva tacchruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17017: pramāṇāntarānapekṣā hi śrutiḥ svārthaṃ gocarayantī na pramāṇāntareṇa śakyā bādhitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:17018: anumānameva tu svotpādāya pakṣadharmatvādivanmānāntarābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ svasāmagrīmadhyapātenāpekṣamāṇaṃ sāmagrīkhaṇḍanena tadviruddhayā śrutyā bādhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17021: tathāhurāgaminaḥ-ko hi yogaprabhāvādṛte 'gastya iva samudraṃ pibati sa iva daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ sṛjati /
GSP33vacbhamu:17026: anekadhābhāvaścarddhiprabhāvabhuvo manobhedādvā stutimātraṃ vā kathañcidbhūmavidyāyāṃ nirguṇāyāṃ tadasaṃbhavādasatāpi hi guṇena stutirbhavatyeveti
GSP33vacbhamu:17031: ata eva saubharerabhivinirmitavividhadehasyāparyāyeṇa māndhātṛkanyābhiḥ pañcāśatā vihāraḥ pairāṇikaiḥ smaryate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17034: yadyapi nirguṇāyamidaṃ bhaumavidyāyāṃ paṭhyate tathāpi tasyāḥ purastādanena saguṇāvasthāgatenaiśvaryeṇa nirguṇaiva vidyā stūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17037: tasmānmanaḥ śarīrendriyayoga aiśvaryaśālināṃ niyameneti mene jaiminiḥ //11 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17039: manaseti kevalamanoviṣayāṃ ca sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavatīti śarīrendriyabhedaviṣayāṃ ca śrutimupalabhyāniyamavādī khalu bādarāyaṇo niyamavādau pūrvayorna sahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17042: kāmeṣu hi ramaṇaṃ samanaskendriyeṇa śarīreṇa puruṣāṇāṃ siddhameveti nāsti śaṅkā manoyogasyeti tadvyavacchedo vyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17048: dvādaśāhamṛddhikāmā upeyurityupāyicodanena ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satramupayantīti ca dvādaśāhasya satratvaṃ bahukartṛkasya gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17049: evaṃ tasyaiva dvādaśāhena prajākāmaṃ yājayediti yajaticodanena niyatakartṛparimāṇatvena dvirātreṇa yajatetyādivadahīnatvamapi gamyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17050: saṃprati śarīrendriyābhāvena manomātreṇa viduṣaḥ svapnavatsūkṣmo bhogo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:17053: yadi punaḥ suṣuptavadabhogo bhavet naiṣā śrutirupapadyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:17063: prādeśikaḥ sanna dehāntarāṇi svabhāvanirmitānyapi nānāpradeśavartīni sāntaḥkaraṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:17070: evaṃ nirmāṇaśarīrāṇyapi sendriyāṇīti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate-śarīratvaṃ na jātu syādbhogādhiṣṭhānatāṃ vinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:17071: sa tridheti śarīratvamuktaṃ yuktaṃ ca tadvibhau //
GSP33vacbhamu:17072: sa tridhā bhavati pañcadhā saptadhā navadhetyādikā śrutirviduṣo nānābhāvamācakṣāṇā bhinnaśarīrendriyopādhisaṃbandhe 'vakalpate nādehahetu(bhūta)bhede
GSP33vacbhamu:17073: nahi yantrāṇi bhinnāni nirmāya vāhayanyantravāho nānātvenāpadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17074: bhogādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ ca śarīratvaṃ nābhogādhiṣṭhāneṣu yantreṣviva yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17077: naca sarvagatasya vastuto vigalitaprāyāvidyasya viduṣaḥ pṛthagjanasyevautpattikāntaḥkaraṇavaśyatā yena tadautpattikamantaḥkaraṇamāgantukāntaḥkaraṇāntarasaṃbandhamasya vārayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:17078: tasmādvidvān sarvasya vaśī sarveśvaraḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ sendriyamanāṃsi śarīrāṇi nirmāya tāni caikapade praviśya tattadindriyamantaḥkaraṇaisteṣu lokeṣu mukto viharatīti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17079: pradīpavaditi tu nidarśanaṃ pradīpaikyaṃ pradīpavyaktiṣūpacaryate bhinnavartivartinīnāṃ bhinnavyaktīnāṃ bhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:17085: salilamiva salilaḥ salilaprātipadikātsarvaprātipadikebhya ityupamānādācāre kvipi kṛte pacādyaci ca kṛte rūpam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17090: āsu kāścicchrutayaḥ suṣuptimapekṣya kāścittu saṃpattiṃ tadadhikārāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:17091: aiśvaryaśrutayastu saguṇavidyāvipākāvasthāpekṣā muktyabhisaṃdhānaṃ tu tadavasthāsatteryathāruṇadarśane saṃdhyāyāṃ divasābhidhānam //16 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17095: 'āpnoti svārājyaṃ' 'sarve 'smai devā balimāvahanti' 'sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' ityādiśrutibhyo viduṣaḥ parabrahmaṇa ivānyānadhīnatvamaiśvaryamavagamyate
GSP33vacbhamu:17096: nanvasya brahmopāsanālabdhamaiśvaryaṃ kathaṃ brahmādhīnaṃ na tu svabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17101: na ca viduṣāṃ parameśvarādhīnaiśvaryasiddhitvāttadgatamaiśvaryaṃ yena laukikā iva rājāno mahārājādhīnaḥ svavyāpāre vidvāṃsaḥ parameśvarādhīnā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17102: na khalu yadadhīnotpādaṃ yasya rūpaṃ tattadrūpādūnaṃ bhavatīti kaścinniyamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17103: tatsamānāṃ tadadhikānāṃ ca darśanāttathā hyantevāsī gurvadhīnavidhaḥ tatsamastadadhiko vā dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17105: tadiha niratiśayaiśvaryatvāt parameśvarasya mā nāma bhūvanvidvāṃsastato 'dhikāstatsamāstu bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17108: tadete svatantrāḥ santastadvyāpāre jagatsarjane 'pi pravarteranniti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate-nityatvādanapekṣatvāt śrutestatprakramādapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:17110: jagatsargalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ kāraṇaikasvabhāvasyaiva hi bhavatu āho kāryakāraṇasvabhāvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:17111: tatrobhayasvabhāvasya svotpattau mūlakāraṇāpekṣasya pūrvasiddhaḥ parameśvara eva kāraṇamabhyupetavya iti sa evaiko 'stu jagatkāraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17117: apica samapradhānānāṃ hi na niyamavadaikamatyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti yadaikaḥ sisṛkṣati tadaivetaraḥ saṃjihīrṣatītyaparyāyeṇa sṛṣṭisaṃhārau syātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:17121: sa eva teṣāmadhīśa iti tattantrā vidvāṃsa iti parameśvaravyāpārasya sargasaṃhārasya neśate //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17124: yataḥ parameśvarādhīnamaiśvaryaṃ tasmāttato nyūnamaṇimādimātraṃ svārājyaṃ na tu jadatsraṣṭṛtvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17129: tathā pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtānīti vikāravarti rūpaṃ tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divīti nirvikāramāha rūpam //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17130: darśayataścāpare śrutismṛtī nirvikārameva rūpaṃ bhagavataste ca paṭhite /
GSP33vacbhamu:17131: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi brūṣe saguṇe brahmaṇyupāsyamāne yathā tadguṇasya niravagrahatvamapi vastuto 'stīti niravagrahatve viduṣā prāptavyamiti tadanena vyabhicārayate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17132: yathā savikāre brahmaṇyupāsyamāne vastutaḥ sthitamapi nirvikārarūpaṃ na prāpyate tatkasya hetoḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:17134: tathā tadguṇopāsanayā vastutaḥ sthitamapi niravagrahatvaṃ nāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17136: upāsakasya tadakratutvaṃ ca niravagrahatvasyopāsanavidhyagocaratvādvidhyadhīnatvāccopāsanāsu puruṣasvātantryābhāvātsvātantrye vā prātibhatvaprasaṅgāditi
GSP33vacbhamu:17143: saha parameśvarasyātiśayena vartata iti viduṣa aiśvaryaṃ sātiśayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17144: yacca kāryaṃ sātiśayaṃ tacca yathā laukikamaiśvaryam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17146: tathāca kāryatvādantavatprāptamiti tacca na yuktamānantyena tadviduṣāṃ tatra pravṛtteriti //21 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17158: na caitannirvāṇaṃ svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ yenānityaṃ syādityāha-
GSP33vacbhamu:17161: so 'yaṃ śāṅkarabhāṣyajātaviṣayo vācaspateḥ sādaraṃ saṃdarbhaḥ paribhāvyatāṃ sumatayaḥ svārtheṣu ko matsaraḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17172: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śaṅkarabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ /
